title: ActionSelect
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.ActionSelect.controller.ActionSelect"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<l:VerticalLayout
		class="sapUiContentPadding"
		width="100%">
		<ActionSelect
			id="select"
			buttons="button1 button2"
			items="{
				path: '/ProductCollection',
				sorter: { path: 'Name' }
			}">
			<items>
				<core:Item key="{ProductId}" text="{Name}" />
			</items>
			<dependents>
				<Button id="button1" text="Action 1" press="onButtonPress" />
				<Button id="button2" text="Action 2" press="onButtonPress" />
			</dependents>
		</ActionSelect>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	displayBlock="true">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">

				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Title text="Adaptive Card" />
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
			</Toolbar>

		<mvc:View viewName="sap.f.cardsdemo.view.common.CommonCardSettings" type="XML" async="true"></mvc:View>
		<Panel>
			<w:Card
				id="adaptivecard1"
				manifest="{manifests>/adaptiveCard/adaptive1}"

				height="auto"

				id="adaptivecard2"
				manifest="{manifests>/adaptiveCard/adaptive2}"

				height="auto"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
			<w:Card
				id="adaptivecard3"

</mvc:View>

title: AlternativeProfileObjectPageHeader
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:goals="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.goals"
	xmlns:personal="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.personal"
	controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.AlternativeProfileObjectPageHeader.controller.AlternativeProfileObjectPageHeader"
	height="100%">
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout" showTitleInHeaderContent="true">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader id="headerForTest"
							  objectTitle="Denise Smith"
							  showTitleSelector="true"
							  showMarkers="true"
							  markFavorite="true"
							  markFlagged="true"
							  markChanges="true"
							  markChangesPress="handleMarkChangesPress"
							  objectSubtitle="Senior Developer"
							  objectImageURI="test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_273624.png"
							  objectImageShape="Circle"
							  isObjectTitleAlwaysVisible="false"
							  isObjectSubtitleAlwaysVisible="false"
							  showPlaceholder="true">
				<actions>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton text="Public Profile" icon="sap-icon://edit" press="handlePress" tooltip="edit"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton text="Take Action" icon="sap-icon://action" tooltip="action"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageHeader>
		</headerTitle>
		<headerContent>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Link text="denise-smith"/>
				<m:Label text="(321) 123-4567"/>
				<m:Link text="DeniseSmith@sap.com"/>
				<layout:HorizontalLayout>
					<m:Image height="24px" width="24px"
							 src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/twitterIcon.png"/>
					<m:Image height="24px" width="24px"
							 src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/linkedInIcon.png"/>
				</layout:HorizontalLayout>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
			<m:Text width="200px"
					text="Hi, I'm Denise. I am passionate about what I do and I'll go the extra mile to make the customer win."/>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Label text="Profile completion"/>
				<m:ProgressIndicator
						percentValue="30"
						displayValue="30%"
						showValue="true"
						state="None"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
		</headerContent>
		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection title="2014 Goals Plan">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection>
						<blocks>
							<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection title="Personal">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Connect">
						<blocks>
							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
							<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
							<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
							<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="paymentSubSection" title="Payment information">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: Analysis
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.ui.support.supportRules.ui.controllers.Analysis"
		height="100%"
		xmlns="sap.ui.table"
		xmlns:m="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:t="sap.ui.table"
		xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout">
	<m:NavContainer
			id="rulesNavContainer"
			autoFocus="{= ${/tempRulesDisabled} === ${/tempRulesDisabledWarned} }">
		<l:Splitter id="rulesDisplayPage">
			<l:contentAreas>
				<m:Page
						showHeader="true"
						showSubHeader="{= ${/selectedSetPreviewKey} === 'availableRules' }">
					<m:headerContent>
						<m:Bar>
							<m:contentMiddle>
								<m:HBox fitContainer="true" renderType="Bare" class="customHBox">
									<m:items>
										<m:IconTabHeader
												id="ruleSetsView"
												select="onSelectedRuleSets"
												selectedKey="{/selectedSetPreviewKey}"
												class="customIconTabHeader">
											<m:layoutData>
												<m:FlexItemData growFactor="1" minWidth="0">
												</m:FlexItemData>
											</m:layoutData>
											<m:items>
												<m:IconTabFilter id="availableRulesId" key="availableRules" text="Available Rulesets" />
												<m:IconTabFilter key="additionalRulesets" text="Additional Rulesets" />
											</m:items>
										</m:IconTabHeader>
										<m:Button class="supportAnalyzeButton" text="Analyze" press="onAnalyze" type="Emphasized"/>
										<m:Button class="supportSettingsButton" icon="sap-icon://settings" press="onAnalyzeSettings" type="Emphasized"/>
									</m:items>
								</m:HBox>
							</m:contentMiddle>
						</m:Bar>
					</m:headerContent>
					<m:subHeader>
							<m:Bar>
								<m:contentLeft>
									<m:HBox renderType="Bare" width="100%">
										<m:Label text="Rule Preset:" labelFor="presetVariant" class="presetVariantLabel">
											<m:layoutData>
												<m:FlexItemData shrinkFactor="0" />
											</m:layoutData>
										</m:Label>
										<m:HBox id="presetVariant" class="sapUiSupportToolVariantCont" renderType="Bare">
											<m:layoutData>
												<m:FlexItemData growFactor="1" minWidth="0"/>
											</m:layoutData>
											<m:FormattedText
												id="presetVariantTxt"
												class="sapUiSupportToolVariantTxt"
												htmlText="{= ${/selectionPresetsCurrent/isModified} ?
																'<em>' + ${/selectionPresetsCurrent/title} + '</em>' :
																${/selectionPresetsCurrent/title} }"
												tooltip="Select a Rule Preset">
											</m:FormattedText>
											<m:Button
												id="presetVariantBtn"
												icon="sap-icon://slim-arrow-down"
												class="sapUiSupportToolVariantBtn"
												tooltip="Select a Rule Preset">
												<m:layoutData>
													<m:FlexItemData shrinkFactor="0" />
												</m:layoutData>
											</m:Button>
										</m:HBox>
									</m:HBox>
								</m:contentLeft>
								<m:contentRight>
									<m:Button
										id="createRuleBtn"
										text="Create Rule"
										icon="sap-icon://add"
										visible="{= !${/tempRulesDisabled}}"
										press="createNewRulePress"/>
								</m:contentRight>
							</m:Bar>
						</m:subHeader>
						<t:TreeTable
								id="ruleList"
								selectionMode="MultiToggle"
								rows="{
									path: 'ruleSets>/',
									parameters: {numberOfExpandedLevels: 1}
								}"
								enableColumnReordering="false"
								class="sapUiSizeCondensed"
								rowMode="Auto"
								selectionBehavior="RowSelector"
								rowActionCount="1"
								visible="{= ${/selectedSetPreviewKey} === 'availableRules' }"
								cellClick="onCellClick"
								rowSelectionChange="onRowSelectionChange"
								>
							<t:columns>
								<t:Column id="rulesColumn"
										  sortProperty="name"
										  filterProperty="name"
										  visible="{tableSettings>/columns/rules/visible}">
									<m:Label text="Rules ({/selectedRulesCount} selected)"/>
									<t:template>
										<m:Text text="{ruleSets>name}" wrapping="false"/>
									</t:template>
								</t:Column>
								<t:Column id="categoriesColumn"
										  width="10rem"
										  sortProperty="categories"
										  filterProperty="categories"
										  visible="{tableSettings>/columns/categories/visible}">
									<m:Label text="{tableSettings>/columns/categories/title}"/>
									<t:template>
										<m:Text text="{ruleSets>categories}" wrapping="false"/>
									</t:template>
								</t:Column>
								<t:Column id="audienceColumn"
										  sortProperty="audiences"
										  filterProperty="audiences"
										  visible="{tableSettings>/columns/audience/visible}">
									<m:Label text="{tableSettings>/columns/audience/title}"/>
									<t:template>
										<m:Text text="{ruleSets>audiences}" wrapping="false"/>
									</t:template>
								</t:Column>
								<t:Column id="ruleIdColumn"
										  width="10rem"
										  sortProperty="id"
										  filterProperty="id"
										  visible="{tableSettings>/columns/ruleId/visible}">
									<m:Label text="{tableSettings>/columns/ruleId/title}"/>
									<t:template>
										<m:Text text="{ruleSets>id}" wrapping="false"/>
									</t:template>
								</t:Column>
							</t:columns>
							<t:rowActionTemplate>
									<t:RowAction id="rowActionTemplate">
										<t:items>
											<t:RowActionItem icon="sap-icon://edit" text="Edit" press="editRule"  visible="{= ${ruleSets>libName} === 'temporary'}" />
											<t:RowActionItem icon="sap-icon://delete" text="Delete" press="deleteTemporaryRule" visible="{= ${ruleSets>libName} === 'temporary'}" />
											<t:RowActionItem icon="sap-icon://copy" text="Copy" press="duplicateRule" visible="{= !${/tempRulesDisabled} && ${ruleSets>libName} !== 'temporary' && ${ruleSets>type} !== 'lib'}" />
										</t:items>
									</t:RowAction>
							</t:rowActionTemplate>
						</t:TreeTable>
					<l:VerticalLayout id="librarySetContainer" width="100%" visible="{= ${/selectedSetPreviewKey} === 'additionalRulesets' }">
						<m:Text class="sapUiSupportToolAdditionRuleSetNote" text="The list of available rules is dynamic and changes based on the libraries currently required by your application.
								In the table below, you can select and load rulesets from the additional libraries."/>
						<m:Link class="sapUiSupportToolAdditionRuleSetNote" text="See more here" href="https://ui5.sap.com/#/topic/3fc864acf926406194744375aa464fe7" target="_blank"/>
						<m:List
							id="availableLibrariesSet"
							mode = "MultiSelect"
							includeItemInSelection= "true"
							items="{
								path: '/availableLibrariesSet'
							}">
							<m:StandardListItem
								title="{}"/>
						</m:List>
						<m:Button class="customMargin" text="Load" type="Emphasized" press="loadMarkedSupportLibraries" />
					</l:VerticalLayout>
				</m:Page>
			</l:contentAreas>
		</l:Splitter>
	</m:NavContainer>
</mvc:View>

			<w:Card
				id="stackedColumn"

			<w:Card

title: AnalyticsCloudContent
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.AnalyticsCloudContent"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	displayBlock="true">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
				<Title text="AnalyticsCloud Content Card "/>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>
		<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			<FormattedText htmlText="To run this sample:"></FormattedText>
			<FormattedText htmlText="1. You need to run the browser with disabled CORS checks."></FormattedText>
			<FormattedText htmlText="    For Windows: [chrome dir]./chrome.exe --user-data-dir="C://chrome-dev-disabled-security" --disable-web-security"></FormattedText>
			<FormattedText htmlText="2. There will be a popup with login which is required, see related Jira item for credentials."></FormattedText>
		</VBox>

		<Panel headerText="Samples" class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			<w:Card id="card1" width="25rem" class="sapUiSmallMargin" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/analyticsCloud/sample1/manifest.json">
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="card2" width="25rem" class="sapUiSmallMargin" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/analyticsCloud/sample2/manifest.json">
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="card3" width="25rem" class="sapUiSmallMargin" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/analyticsCloud/sample3.json">
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="card4" width="25rem" class="sapUiSmallMargin" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/analyticsCloud/sample4.json">
			</w:Card>
		</Panel>

		<Panel headerText="Samples with interpretation" class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			<w:Card id="card10" width="25rem" class="sapUiSmallMargin" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/analyticsCloud/sample5-interpretation.json">

		<Panel headerText="Error cases" class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			<w:Card id="card5" width="25rem" class="sapUiSmallMargin" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/analyticsCloud/errorSamples/error1.json">
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="card6" width="25rem" class="sapUiSmallMargin" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/analyticsCloud/errorSamples/error2.json">

			<w:Card id="card7" width="25rem" class="sapUiSmallMargin" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/analyticsCloud/errorSamples/error3.json">
			</w:Card>
		</Panel>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"

	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:sample="sap.uxap.sample.AnchorBar.controller.blocks"
	height="100%">
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout" upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"

					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Delete"/>
					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Copy"/>

				</actions>
			</ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>

title: AnchorBarWithNumbers
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:goals="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.goals"
	xmlns:personal="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.personal"
	xmlns:employment="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.employment"
	controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.AnchorBarWithNumbers.controller.AnchorBarWithNumbers"
	height="100%">
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout"
		subSectionLayout="TitleOnLeft"
		showTitleInHeaderContent="true"
		upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
				<expandedHeading>
					<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true" />
				</expandedHeading>

				<snappedHeading>
						<m:FlexBox fitContainer="true" alignItems="Center" >
							<m:Avatar src="sap-icon://picture" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd"/>
							<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true" />
						</m:FlexBox>
				</snappedHeading>

				<expandedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</expandedContent>

				<snappedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedContent>

				<snappedTitleOnMobile>
					<m:Title text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedTitleOnMobile>

				<actions>
					<m:Button text="Edit" type="Emphasized"/>
					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Delete"/>
					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Copy"/>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton icon="sap-icon://action" type="Transparent" text="Share" tooltip="action"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
		</headerTitle>

		<headerContent>
			<m:FlexBox wrap="Wrap" fitContainer="true">
				<m:Avatar class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd" src="sap-icon://picture" displaySize="L"/>

				<layout:VerticalLayout>
					<m:Link text="+33 6 4512 5158"/>
					<m:Link text="DeniseSmith@sap.com"/>
					<layout:HorizontalLayout>
						<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/linkedin.png"/>
						<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/Twitter.png" class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
					</layout:HorizontalLayout>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="Hello! I am Tim and I use UxAP"/>
					<m:VBox>
						<m:Label text="Achieved goals"/>
						<m:ProgressIndicator percentValue="30" displayValue="30%"/>
					</m:VBox>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="San Jose, USA"/>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>
			</m:FlexBox>
		</headerContent>

		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="2014 Goals Plan">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Goal summary" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal (2)">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
						<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
						<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
						<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
						<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing"/>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Employment (3)">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Job information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart1 id="jobinfopart1"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart2 id="jobinfopart2"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart3 id="jobinfopart3"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Employee Details" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart1 id="empdetailpart1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart2 id="empdetailpart2" columnLayout="1"/>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart3 id="empdetailpart3" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Job Relationship" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:EmploymentBlockJob id="employmentblockjob" showSubSectionMore="true">
								<employment:mappings>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp1"
												  externalPath="/Employee/0"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp2"
												  externalPath="/Employee/1"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp3"
												  externalPath="/Employee/2"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp4"
												  externalPath="/Employee/3"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp5"
												  externalPath="/Employee/4"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp6"
												  externalPath="/Employee/5"/>
								</employment:mappings>
							</employment:EmploymentBlockJob>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: ApiDetailDeprecated
code:
<mvc:View controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.ApiDetailIndexDeprecatedExperimental"
		  xmlns="sap.uxap"
		  xmlns:m="sap.m"
		  xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		  xmlns:app="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.CustomData/1">

	<ObjectPageLayout id="objectPage"
					  upperCaseAnchorBar="false"
					  sections="{/}">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader objectTitle="{i18n>API_DETAIL_DEPRECATED_TITLE}"/>
		</headerTitle>
		<headerContent>
			<m:MessageStrip text="{i18n>API_DETAIL_DEPRECATED_WARNING}"
					type="Error"
					class="specialListsMessageStrip"
					showIcon="true"/>
		</headerContent>
		<ObjectPageSection
				titleUppercase="false"
				title="{
					parts: [
						'i18n>API_DETAIL_AS_OF_VERSION',
						'name'
					],
					formatter: '.formatter.formatVersionTitle'
				}">
			<ObjectPageSubSection>
				<m:List items="{path: 'apis', templateShareable: false}"
						updateFinished="._modifyLinks"
						showSeparators="Inner"
						class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"
						width="auto">
					<m:items>
						<m:FeedListItem
								showIcon="false"
								sender="{parts : [{path : 'control'}, {path : 'entityName'}, {path: 'type'}],
										  formatter : '.formatter.formatSenderLink'}"
								text="{path : 'text', formatter: '.formatter.formatLinks'}"
								class="specialListFeedItem"
								app:control="{control}"
								app:entity="{entityName}"
								app:type="{type}"
								app:static="{static}"/>
					</m:items>
				</m:List>
			</ObjectPageSubSection>
		</ObjectPageSection>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

			<PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo
				contentRole="Main"
				contentLabel="API Reference"/>

title: ApiMaster
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.ApiMaster"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:custom="sap.ui.documentation"
	height="100%"
	displayBlock="true"
	class="sapContrast sapContrastPlus">

	<Page
		class="sapUiDocumentationMasterPage sapUiDemoKitApiMasterPage"
		enableScrolling="true"
		showFooter="false"
		showNavButton="false">

		<customHeader>
			<Toolbar height="100%" width="100%">
				<SearchField id="searchField" placeholder="{i18n>API_MASTER_PLACEHOLDER}" liveChange="onTreeFilter" />
				<Button id="expandAllButton" icon="sap-icon://expand-all" press="onTreeExpandAll" tooltip="{i18n>API_MASTER_EXPAND_BTN_TOOLTIP}" />
				<Button id="collapseAllButton" icon="sap-icon://collapse-all" press="onTreeCollapseAll" tooltip="{i18n>API_MASTER_COLLAPSE_BTN_TOOLTIP}" />
			</Toolbar>
		</customHeader>

		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar height="100%" width="100%">
				<FlexBox height="100%" width="100%" alignItems="Start" justifyContent="Start" wrap="Wrap">
					<CheckBox id="includeDeprecated" text="{i18n>API_MASTER_DEPRECATED_CB}" select="onIncludeDeprecatedItemsChange" />
					<CheckBox id="includeExperimental" text="{i18n>API_MASTER_EXPERIMENTAL_CB}" select="onIncludeExperimentalItemsChange" />
				</FlexBox>
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>

		<content>
			<l:FixFlex id="treeContainer" fixFirst="false" minFlexSize="100">
				<l:flexContent>
					<Tree
						id="tree"
						mode="SingleSelectMaster"
						noDataText="{i18n>API_MASTER_NO_DATA_TEXT}"
						selectionChange="onNodeSelect"
						items="{treeData>/}">
						<custom:DemokitTreeItem
							title="{treeData>displayName}"
							target="{treeData>name}"
							entityType="{treeData>kind}"
							section="api"
							class="sapDemokitTreeItem"
							deprecated="{treeData>deprecated}"
							experimental="{treeData>experimental}" />
					</Tree>
				</l:flexContent>
				<l:fixContent>
					<core:Fragment fragmentName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.view.FooterMaster" type="XML" />
				</l:fixContent>
			</l:FixFlex>
		</content>

	</Page>

</mvc:View>

title: AppTemplate

<mvc:View displayBlock="true" height="100%" controllerName="sap.ui.v4demo.controller.App"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:f2="sap.f"
	xmlns:mdc="sap.ui.mdc"
	xmlns:mdcc="sap.ui.mdc.chart"
	xmlns:mdcf="sap.ui.mdc.field"
	xmlns:mdct="sap.ui.mdc.table"
	xmlns:ui="sap.ui"
	xmlns:uit="sap.ui.table"
	xmlns:variants="sap.ui.fl.variants"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:types="sap.ui.v4demo.types"
	xmlns:demo="sap.ui.v4demo.controls"
	xmlns:template="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.template/1"
	>
	<App id="app">
		<Page id="P0" class="sapUiContentPadding" showNavButton="false">
			<customHeader>
				<Toolbar>
					<core:Icon src="sap-icon://dimension" />
					<Title text="MDC.ValueHelp Integration Test App"/>
					<ToolbarSpacer />
					<Label text="View" labelFor="viewSwitch" />
					<Select id="viewSwitch" forceSelection="false" selectedKey="{tplState>/activeViewPath}" change=".onViewSwitch">
						<template:repeat list="{path: 'tplState>/availableViews', sorter: {path: 'text', ascending: true}}" var="$item">
							<core:Item key="{$item>path}" text="{$item>text}" />		
						</template:repeat>
					</Select>
					<variants:VariantManagement id="VM" for="P0" />
				</Toolbar>
			</customHeader>
			<content>
				<core:Fragment id="contentFragment" fragmentName="{tplState>/activeView/path}" type="XML"/>
			</content>
			<footer>
			<template:if test="{tplState>/activeView/footer}">
				<core:Fragment id="footerFragment" fragmentName="{tplState>/activeView/footer}" type="XML"/>
			</template:if>
			</footer>
		</Page>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

title: Avatar
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.m.sample.Avatar.controller.Avatar"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		height="100%">

	<ScrollContainer
			height="100%"
			width="100%"
			horizontal="false"
			vertical="true">
		<Text
				text="The Avatar Control allows usage of different shapes, sizes and content. Border can also be applied:"
				width="100%"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginTop sapUiSmallMarginBegin sapUiMediumMarginBottom"/>
		<l:Grid
				defaultSpan="XL2 L3 M6 S6">
			<l:content>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Speakers}"
							displaySize="XL"
							displayShape="Square"
							showBorder="true"
							press="onPress"/>
					<Text
							text="Avatar of a product with border"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Woman01}"
							displaySize="XL"
							showBorder="true"
							press="onPress"/>
					<Text
							text="Avatar of a person with border"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							initials="IS"
							displaySize="XL"
							displayShape="Square"
							press="onPress"/>
					<Text
							text="Square with initials"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							enabled="false"
							initials="PI"
							displaySize="XL"
							press="onPress"/>
					<Text
							text="Disabled"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="XL"
							backgroundColor="Transparent"
							press="onPress"/>
					<Text
							text="Transparent background"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							initials="IS"
							displaySize="XL"
							backgroundColor="TileIcon"
							press="onPress"/>
					<Text
							text="TileIcon background"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="XL"
							backgroundColor="Placeholder"
							displayShape="Square"
							press="onPress"/>
					<Text
							text="Placeholder background"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="XL"

							text="Circular avatar with 3 letter initials"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
			</l:content>
		</l:Grid>
		<Text
				text="The Avatar can be set to a square or circular shape with a predefined size:"
				width="100%"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin sapUiMediumMarginTop sapUiMediumMarginBottom"/>
		<l:Grid
				defaultSpan="XL2 L2 M3 S12">
			<l:content>
				<VBox
						alignItems="Center"
						alignContent="End">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Screw}"
							displaySize="XL"
							displayShape="Square"/>
					<Text
							text="XL"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox
						alignItems="Center"
						alignContent="End">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Screw}"
							displaySize="L"
							displayShape="Square"/>
					<Text
							text="L"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Screw}"
							displaySize="M"
							displayShape="Square"/>
					<Text
							text="M"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Screw}"
							displaySize="S"
							displayShape="Square"/>
					<Text
							text="S"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Screw}"
							displaySize="XS"
							displayShape="Square"/>
					<Text
							text="XS"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
			</l:content>
		</l:Grid>
		<l:Grid
				defaultSpan="XL2 L2 M3 S12"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginTop">
			<l:content>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Woman02}"
							displaySize="XL"/>
					<Text
							text="XL"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Woman02}"
							displaySize="L"/>
					<Text
							text="L"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Woman02}"
							displaySize="M"/>
					<Text
							text="M"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Woman02}"
							displaySize="S"/>
					<Text
							text="S"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/Woman02}"
							displaySize="XS"/>
					<Text
							text="XS"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
			</l:content>
		</l:Grid>
		<l:Grid
				defaultSpan="XL2 L2 M3 S12"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginTop">
			<l:content>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							initials="IS"
							displaySize="XL"
							backgroundColor="Accent1"/>
					<Text
							text="XL"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
					<Text text="Accent1"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							initials="IS"
							displaySize="L"
							backgroundColor="Accent2"/>
					<Text
							text="L"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
					<Text text="Accent2"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							initials="IS"
							displaySize="M"
							backgroundColor="Accent3"/>
					<Text
							text="M"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
					<Text text="Accent3"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							initials="IS"
							displaySize="S"
							backgroundColor="Accent4"/>
					<Text
							text="S"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
					<Text text="Accent4"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							initials="IS"
							displaySize="XS"
							backgroundColor="Accent5"/>
					<Text
							text="XS"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
					<Text text="Accent5"/>
				</VBox>
			</l:content>
		</l:Grid>
		<l:Grid
				defaultSpan="XL2 L2 M3 S12"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginTop">
			<l:content>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="sap-icon://lab"
							displaySize="XL"
							backgroundColor="Accent6"/>
					<Text
							text="XL"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
					<Text text="Accent6"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="sap-icon://lab"
							displaySize="L"
							backgroundColor="Accent7"/>
					<Text
							text="L"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
					<Text text="Accent7"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="sap-icon://lab"
							displaySize="M"
							backgroundColor="Accent8"/>
					<Text
							text="M"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
					<Text text="Accent8"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="sap-icon://lab"
							displaySize="S"
							backgroundColor="Accent9"/>
					<Text
							text="S"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
					<Text text="Accent9"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="sap-icon://lab"
							displaySize="XS"
							backgroundColor="Accent10"/>
					<Text
							text="XS"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
					<Text text="Accent10"/>
				</VBox>
			</l:content>
		</l:Grid>
		<l:Grid
				defaultSpan="XL4 L5 M6 S12">
			<l:content>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Text
							text="The Avatar can be set to a custom size:"
							width="100%"
							class="sapUiMediumMarginTop sapUiMediumMarginBottom"/>
					<Avatar
							src="{/Lamp}"
							displaySize="Custom"
							customDisplaySize="250px"
							displayShape="Square"/>
					<Text
							text="Avatar with custom Size"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Text
							text="If there is no image, icon or initials set, the Avatar displays a Placeholder.
							If there is invalid image src, the control displays either initials (if provided) or icon Placeholder (if no initials are proivided):"
							width="100%"
							class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom sapUiMediumMarginTop"/>
					<l:Grid
							defaultSpan="XL4 L4 M6 S6">
						<l:content>
							<VBox alignItems="Center">
								<Avatar
										displaySize="L"
										displayShape="Square"
										backgroundColor="Random"/>
								<Text
										text="With product icon"
										class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
							</VBox>
							<VBox alignItems="Center">
								<Avatar
										displaySize="L"
										backgroundColor="Random"/>
								<Text
										text="With person icon"
										class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
							</VBox>
							<VBox alignItems="Center">
								<Avatar
										displaySize="L"
										displayShape="Square"
										fallbackIcon="sap-icon://accelerated"
										backgroundColor="Random"/>
								<Text
										text="With custom fallback icon"
										class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
							</VBox>
							<VBox alignItems="Center">
								<Avatar
										displaySize="L"
										initials="PB"
										src="{/Woman01}"
										backgroundColor="Random"/>
								<Text
										text="With invalid image source, but initials provided"
										class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"
										textAlign="Center"/>
							</VBox>
						</l:content>
					</l:Grid>
				</VBox>
			</l:content>
		</l:Grid>
	</ScrollContainer>
</mvc:View>

title: AvatarActiveState
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.m.sample.AvatarActiveState.controller.AvatarActiveState"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		height="100%">

		<MessageStrip 
			text="Active state of Avatar is set, when the user clicks on the Avatar and the Popover menu is opened. When the menu is closed, Active state is removed."
			showIcon="false"
			showCloseButton="false"
			class="sapUiTinyMargin"
				/>
		<Avatar
			id="myAvatar"
			src="{/Woman01}"
			displaySize="L"
			showBorder="true"
			class="sapUiTinyMargin"
			press="onPress"/>

</mvc:View>

title: AvatarGroup
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.f.sample.AvatarGroup.controller.AvatarGroup"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.f"
		xmlns:m="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		height="100%">
			<m:Slider id="slider" value="{/viewPortPercentWidth}" liveChange="onSliderMoved"/>
			<l:VerticalLayout id="vl1" width="100%" class="sapUiContentPadding">
				<m:Label text="AvatarGroup control in Individual mode"
					class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom sapUiMediumMarginTop" />
				<AvatarGroup
					id="avatarGroup"
					groupType="Individual"
					avatarDisplaySize="S"
					press="onIndividualPress"
					items="{path: 'items>/content'}">
						<AvatarGroupItem
						initials="{items>initials}"
						fallbackIcon="{items>fallbackIcon}"
						src="{items>src}"
						tooltip= "{items>name}"/>
				</AvatarGroup>
				<m:Label text="AvatarGroup control in Group mode"
					class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom sapUiMediumMarginTop" />
				<AvatarGroup 
					groupType="Group"
					tooltip="Avatar Group"
					avatarDisplaySize="M"
					press="onGroupPress"
					items="{path: 'items>/content'}">
					<AvatarGroupItem initials="{items>initials}"
						fallbackIcon="{items>fallbackIcon}"
						src="{items>src}" />
				</AvatarGroup>
			</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: AvatarValueState
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.m.sample.AvatarValueState.controller.AvatarValueState"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		height="100%">

	<ScrollContainer
			height="100%"
			width="100%"
			horizontal="false"
			vertical="true">
		<l:Grid
				class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"
				defaultSpan="XL3 L3 M6 S12">
			<l:content>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/GettyImages}"
							displaySize="M"
							imageFitType="Cover"
							badgeValueState="Warning"
							press="onPress"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://alert"
							badgeTooltip= "Sabine Mayer"/>
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="badgeValueState property set to 'Warning'"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="M"
							displayShape="Circle"
							badgeValueState="Information"
							press="onPress"
							src="{/LowShutterstock}"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://information"
							badgeTooltip= "Julie Armstrong"/>
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="badgeValueState property set to 'Information'"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="M"
							backgroundColor="Accent7"
							initials="JD"
							press="onPress"
							badgeValueState="None"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://camera" />
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="badgeValueState property set to 'None'"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="M"
							backgroundColor="Accent3"
							badgeValueState="Success"
							press="onPress"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://message-success" />
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="badgeValueState property set to 'Success'"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="M"
							badgeValueState="Error"
							press="onPress"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://message-error" />
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="badgeValueState property set to 'Error'"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
			</l:content>
		</l:Grid>
	</ScrollContainer>
</mvc:View>

title: AvatarWithAffordance
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.m.sample.AvatarWithAffordance.controller.AvatarWithAffordance"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		height="100%">

	<ScrollContainer
			height="100%"
			width="100%"
			horizontal="false"
			vertical="true">
		<Text
				text="The Avatar Control allows usage of different shapes, sizes and content, configured
with various types of visual affordance"
				width="100%"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginTop sapUiSmallMarginBegin sapUiMediumMarginBottom"/>
		<l:Grid
				defaultSpan="XL3 L3 M6 S6">
			<l:content>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/LightBox}"
							displaySize="L"
							displayShape="Circle">
						<detailBox>
							<LightBox>
								<LightBoxItem
										imageSrc="{/LightBox}"
										alt="Michael Adams"
										title="This is Michael Adams"
										subtitle="Michael Adams Human Relations">
								</LightBoxItem>
							</LightBox>
						</detailBox>
					</Avatar>
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="Avatar with Lightbox attached"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							src="{/GettyImages}"
							displaySize="XL"
							imageFitType="Cover"
							press="onPress"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://camera"
							badgeTooltip= "Sabine Mayer"/>
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="Avatar with predefined visual affordance suggesting an image change with a custom tooltip"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="M"
							displayShape="Circle"
							press="onPress"
							src="{/LowShutterstock}"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://edit"
							badgeTooltip= "Julie Armstrong"/>
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="Avatar with predefined visual affordance suggesting an editing action with a custom tooltip"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="M"
							backgroundColor="Accent7"
							initials="JD"
							press="onPress"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://camera" />
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="Avatar with predefined visual affordance suggesting an image change with default tooltip"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>

			</l:content>
		</l:Grid>
		<l:Grid
				defaultSpan="XL3 L3 M6 S6">
			<l:content>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="M"
							backgroundColor="Accent3"
							press="onPress"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://edit" />
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="Avatar with predefined badge affordance and badge tooltip"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="XL"
							displayShape="Square"
							press="onPress"
							src="{/Shutterstock}"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://edit" />
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="Avatar with predefined visual affordance suggesting an editing action with default tooltip"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="XL"
							backgroundColor="Accent5"
							src= "sap-icon://soccer"
							displayShape="Square"
							press="onPress"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://edit" />
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="Avatar with custom visual affordance and a custom tooltip"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
				<VBox alignItems="Center">
					<Avatar
							displaySize="XL"
							backgroundColor="Accent3"
							src= "sap-icon://customer"
							press="onPress"
							badgeIcon="sap-icon://add"
							badgeTooltip="People"/>
					<Text
							textAlign="Center"
							text="Avatar with custom badge affordance icon and custom badge tooltip"
							class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
				</VBox>
			</l:content>
		</l:Grid>
	</ScrollContainer>
</mvc:View>

title: Badge
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.integration.sample.Badge.Badge"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	xmlns:ic="sap.ui.integration.controls"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:card="sap.f.cards"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	class="badgeView">
	<Button text="Show Badges" press=".onButtonPress" />
	<f:GridContainer>
		<w:Card id="cardId1" manifest="./cardManifest.json">
			<w:customData>
				<card:CardBadgeCustomData icon="sap-icon://pushpin-off" visibilityMode="Persist" announcementText="The card is pinned on top."/>
				<card:CardBadgeCustomData value="New" announcementText="Card is newly added."/>
			</w:customData>
			<w:layoutData>
				<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
			</w:layoutData>
		</w:Card>
		<w:Card id="cardId2" manifest="./cardManifest.json">
			<w:customData>
				<card:CardBadgeCustomData icon="sap-icon://status-in-process" value="Updated" state="Indication03" announcementText="The card is recently updated."/>
			</w:customData>
			<w:layoutData>
				<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
			</w:layoutData>
		</w:Card>
	</f:GridContainer>
</mvc:View>

title: Badges
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:card="sap.f.cards"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	displayBlock="true">
	<Page id="badgesPage" title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Title text="Badges" />
				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>

		<f:GridContainer id="grid1" class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/listContent/card13}"
				baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
				<w:customData>
					<BadgeCustomData value="30940" />
				</w:customData>
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="6" columns="3" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/listContent/card13}"
				baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
				<w:customData>
					<card:CardBadgeCustomData  icon="sap-icon://status-in-process"  value="Updated" state="Indication03"/>

title: betweenLists
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:dnd="sap.ui.core.dnd" controllerName="mvc.betweenLists" displayBlock="true">
	<App>
		<Page title="Drag And Drop Between Lists">

			<List items="{/names}">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar>
						<Title text="Available Developers (drag from here)" />
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<dragDropConfig>
					<dnd:DragInfo
						sourceAggregation="items"
						groupName="sap"/>
				</dragDropConfig>

				<StandardListItem title="{lastName}" description="{firstName}"/>
			</List>

			<List id="targetList" items="{/selectedNames}" headerText="Selected Developers (drop here)">
				<dragDropConfig>
					<dnd:DropInfo
						targetAggregation="items"
						groupName="sap"
						drop="handleDrop"
						dragEnter="handleDragEnter"
						dropPosition="On"
						dropEffect="Copy"/>
				</dragDropConfig>
				<StandardListItem title="{lastName}" description="{firstName}"/>
			</List>

		</Page>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

title: BlanketReporterUI
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.ui.test.BlanketReporterUI"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:table="sap.ui.table"
		xmlns:tablerm="sap.ui.table.rowmodes"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form">
	<form:SimpleForm editable="false" layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" title="Blanket Code Coverage"
			columnsM="2">
		<core:Title text="Line Coverage"/>
		<Label text="Lines"/>
		<Text text="{path : '/lines/total', type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Int32'}"/>
		<Label text="Missed"/>
		<Text text="{path : '/lines/missed', type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Int32'}"/>
		<Label/>
		<ProgressIndicator width="10em" percentValue="{/lines/coverage}"
			displayValue="{path : '/lines/coverage', type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Double',
				formatOptions : {minFractionDigits : 1, maxFractionDigits : 1,
					preserveDecimals : false}} %"
			state="{= %{/lines/coverage} < %{/threshold} ? 'Error' : 'Success'}"/>
		<core:Title text="{= %{/branchTracking} ? 'Branch Coverage' : ''}"/>
		<Label text="Branches" visible="{= %{/branchTracking}}"/>
		<Text text="{path : '/branches/total', type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Int32'}"
			visible="{= %{/branchTracking}}"/>
		<Label text="Missed" visible="{= %{/branchTracking}}"/>
		<Text text="{path : '/branches/missed', type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Int32'}"
			visible="{= %{/branchTracking}}"/>
		<Label visible="{= %{/branchTracking}}"/>
		<ProgressIndicator width="10em" percentValue="{/branches/coverage}"
			displayValue="{path : '/branches/coverage', type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Double',
				formatOptions : {minFractionDigits : 1, maxFractionDigits : 1,
					preserveDecimals : false}} %"
			state="{= %{/branches/coverage} < %{/threshold} ? 'Error' : 'Success'}"
			visible="{= %{/branchTracking}}"/>
	</form:SimpleForm>
	<table:Table id="Files" selectionMode="Single" selectionBehavior="RowOnly" rows="{/files}"
			rowSelectionChange="onRowSelection">
		<table:extension>
			<HBox>
				<CheckBox selected="{/filterThreshold}" text="Below Threshold ({/threshold} %)"
					select="onFilterThreshold" visible="{= %{/threshold} > 0}"/>
				<CheckBox select="onRowSelection" selected="{/showHits}" text="Show Hits"/>
			</HBox>
		</table:extension>
		<table:rowMode>
			<tablerm:Interactive rowCount="{/visible}" minRowCount="1"/>
		</table:rowMode>
		<table:columns>
			<table:Column width="5em" hAlign="Right">
				<table:label>
					<Text text="Lines"/>
				</table:label>
				<table:template>
					<Text text="{path : 'lines/total', type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Int32'}"/>
				</table:template>
			</table:Column>
			<table:Column width="5em" hAlign="Right" sortProperty="lines/missed">
				<table:label>
					<Text text="Missed"/>
				</table:label>
				<table:template>
					<Text text="{path : 'lines/missed', type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Int32'}"/>
				</table:template>
			</table:Column>
			<table:Column width="5em" hAlign="Right" sortProperty="lines/coverage">
				<table:label>
					<Text text="%"/>
				</table:label>
				<table:template>
					<Text text="{path : 'lines/coverage', type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Double',
						formatOptions : {minFractionDigits : 1, maxFractionDigits : 1,
							preserveDecimals : false}}"/>
				</table:template>
			</table:Column>
			<table:Column width="5em" hAlign="Right" visible="{= %{/branchTracking}}">
				<table:label>
					<Text text="Branches"/>
				</table:label>
				<table:template>
					<Text text="{path : 'branches/total', type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Int32'}"/>
				</table:template>
			</table:Column>
			<table:Column width="5em" hAlign="Right" sortProperty="branches/missed"
					visible="{= %{/branchTracking}}">
				<table:label>
					<Text text="Missed"/>
				</table:label>
				<table:template>
					<Text text="{path : 'branches/missed',
						type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Int32'}"/>
				</table:template>
			</table:Column>
			<table:Column width="5em" hAlign="Right" sortProperty="branches/coverage"
					class="{= %{/branches/coverage} < %{/threshold} ? 'blanket_miss' : ''}"
					visible="{= %{/branchTracking}}">
				<table:label>
					<Text text="%"/>
				</table:label>
				<table:template>
					<Text text="{path : 'branches/coverage',
						type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Double',
						formatOptions : {minFractionDigits : 1, maxFractionDigits : 1,
							preserveDecimals : false}}"/>
				</table:template>
			</table:Column>
			<table:Column filterProperty="name" sortProperty="name" sorted="true" sortOrder="Ascending">
				<table:label>
					<Text text="File"/>
				</table:label>
				<table:template>
					<Text text="{name}"/>
				</table:template>
			</table:Column>
		</table:columns>
	</table:Table>
	<core:HTML id="blanket-source" sanitizeContent="true" visible="false"/>
</mvc:View>

title: BoxContainer
code:
<mvc:View
    xmlns="sap.m"
    xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
    xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.CustomData/1"
    controllerName="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid.gridplayground.controller.Main">

	<Slider value="100" app:mydata="boxContainer"  liveChange="onSliderMoved" />
	<Panel id="boxContainer" width="100%" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
		<headerToolbar>
			<Toolbar height="3rem">
				<Title text=" BoxContainer"/>
			</Toolbar>
		</headerToolbar>
		<content>
			<Panel id="boxContainerPanel" width="100%">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar height="3rem">
						<Title text=" BoxContainer boxMinWidth=17rem"/>
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<content>
					<grid:CSSGrid id="grid1" items="{ path: '/' }">

						<grid:customLayout>
							<grid:GridBoxLayout boxMinWidth="17rem"/>
						</grid:customLayout>

						<VBox height="100%">
							<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin demoBox">
								<layoutData>
									<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" />
								</layoutData>
								<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
								<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
							</VBox>
						</VBox>
					</grid:CSSGrid>
				</content>
			</Panel>
			<Panel width="100%">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar height="3rem">
						<Title text="BoxContainer boxWidth=7rem"/>
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<content>
					<grid:CSSGrid items="{ path: '/' }">

						<grid:customLayout>
							<grid:GridBoxLayout boxWidth="7rem"/>
						</grid:customLayout>

						<VBox height="100%">
							<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin demoBox">
								<layoutData>
									<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" />
								</layoutData>
								<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
								<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
							</VBox>
						</VBox>
					</grid:CSSGrid>
				</content>
			</Panel>
		</content>
	</Panel>
</mvc:View>

title: Branching
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.WizardCurrentStep.controller.Branching"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Wizard
		id="BranchingWizard"
		enableBranching="true"
		class="sapUiResponsivePadding--header sapUiResponsivePadding--content">
		<WizardStep validated="false" id="A" title="A" subsequentSteps="B1, B2">

			<RadioButtonGroup id="PathSelection" select="discardAndApplyPath">
				<buttons>
					<RadioButton text="A->B1->C->D->E->F1->F2->G"/>
					<RadioButton text="A->B2->C->D->E->F1->G" />
					<RadioButton text="A->B1->B2->C->D->E" />
				</buttons>
			</RadioButtonGroup>

		</WizardStep>
		<WizardStep validated="false" id="B1" title="B1" nextStep="C" />
		<WizardStep validated="false" id="B2" title="B2" nextStep="C" />
		<WizardStep validated="false" id="C" title="C" nextStep="D" />
		<WizardStep validated="false" id="D" title="D" nextStep="E" />
		<WizardStep validated="false" id="E" title="E" subsequentSteps="F1, F2" />
		<WizardStep validated="false" id="F1" title="F1" nextStep="G" />
		<WizardStep validated="false" id="F2" title="F2" nextStep="G" />
		<WizardStep validated="false" id="G" title="G" />
	</Wizard>
</mvc:View>

title: Breadcrumbs
code:
<mvc:View controllerName="sap.m.sample.Breadcrumbs.controller.Breadcrumbs"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core">
	<l:VerticalLayout class="sapUiContentPadding" width="100%">
		<l:content>
			<Breadcrumbs currentLocationText="Laptop" separatorStyle="{/selected}">
				<Link press="onPress" text="Products"/>
				<Link press="onPress" text="Suppliers"/>
				<Link press="onPress" text="Titanium"/>
				<Link press="onPress" text="Ultra portable"/>
				<Link press="onPress" text="12 inch"/>
				<Link press="onPress" text="Super portable deluxe"/>
			</Breadcrumbs>
			<HBox alignItems="Center">
				<items>
					<Label
							labelFor="separatorSelect"
							text="Change separator style"
					/>
					<Select
							class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
							id="separatorSelect"
							selectedKey="{/selected}"
							change="onChange"
							items="{
								path: '/items'
							}">
						<core:Item key="{text}" text="{key}" />
					</Select>
				</items>
			</HBox>

		</l:content>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

			<Link text="Page 5" press="onPress" />
		</Breadcrumbs>
		<HBox alignItems="Center">
			<Label labelFor="separatorSelect" text="Change separator style" />
			<Select class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
					id="separatorSelect"
					selectedKey="{/separatorStyle}"
					change="onChange"
					items="{ path: '/items' }">
				<core:Item key="{text}" text="{key}" />
			</Select>
		</HBox>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: Breakpoint
code:
<mvc:View
xmlns="sap.m"
xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
xmlns:app="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.CustomData/1"
controllerName="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid.gridplayground.controller.Main">

<Slider value="100" app:mydata="breakContainer"  liveChange="onSliderMoved" />
<Panel id="breakContainer" width="100%" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
	<headerToolbar>
		<Toolbar height="3rem">
			<Title text=" Breakpoints"/>
		</Toolbar>
	</headerToolbar>
	<content>
		<Panel  width="100%" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
			<headerToolbar>
				<Toolbar height="3rem">
					<Title text=" Breakpoint exmpl 1"/>
				</Toolbar>
			</headerToolbar>
			<content>
				<grid:CSSGrid id="grid1" items="{ path: '/' }">
					<grid:customLayout>
						<grid:GridResponsiveLayout containerQuery="true"  layoutChange="onLayoutChange">
							<grid:layoutS>
								<grid:GridSettings
										gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 8rem)"
										gridAutoRows="1fr"
										gridGap="0.25rem 0.25rem">
								</grid:GridSettings>
							</grid:layoutS>
							<grid:layoutM>
								<grid:GridSettings
										gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 12rem)"
										gridAutoRows="1fr"
										gridGap="0.5rem 0.5rem">
								</grid:GridSettings>
							</grid:layoutM>
							<grid:layoutL>
								<grid:GridSettings
										gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 16rem)"
										gridAutoRows="1fr"
										gridGap="0.75rem 0.75rem">
								</grid:GridSettings>
							</grid:layoutL>
							<grid:layoutXL>
								<grid:GridSettings
										gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 20rem)"
										gridAutoRows="1fr"
										gridGap="1rem 1rem">
								</grid:GridSettings>
							</grid:layoutXL>
						</grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
					</grid:customLayout>

					<VBox height="100%">
						<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin demoBox">
							<layoutData>
								<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" />
							</layoutData>
							<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
							<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
						</VBox>
					</VBox>
				</grid:CSSGrid>
			</content>
		</Panel>
		<Panel width="100%" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
			<headerToolbar>
				<Toolbar height="3rem">
					<Title text="BreakPoint exmpl2"/>
				</Toolbar>
			</headerToolbar>
			<content>
				<grid:CSSGrid items="{ path: '/' }">
					<grid:customLayout>
						<grid:GridResponsiveLayout layoutChange="onLayoutChange">
							<grid:layoutS>
								<grid:GridSettings
										gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 8rem)"
										gridAutoRows="1fr"
										gridGap="0.25rem 0.25rem">
								</grid:GridSettings>
							</grid:layoutS>
							<grid:layout>
								<grid:GridSettings
										gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 20rem)"
										gridAutoRows="1fr"
										gridGap="1rem 1rem">
								</grid:GridSettings>
							</grid:layout>
						</grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
					</grid:customLayout>
					<VBox height="100%">
						<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin demoBox">
							<layoutData>
								<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
							</layoutData>
							<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
							<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
						</VBox>
					</VBox>
				</grid:CSSGrid>
			</content>
		</Panel>
	</content>
</Panel>
</mvc:View>

title: CAP
code:
<mvc:View
	class="sapUiSizeCompact"
	controllerName="sap.ui.core.sample.odata.v4.DataAggregation_CAP.CAP"
	xmlns="sap.ui.table"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:rm="sap.ui.table.rowmodes">

	<!-- Note: for $$aggregation, see controller's onInit! -->
	<!-- Note: status is either 'B' or 'N', filter is just kiddin' ;-) -->
	<TreeTable id="table" ariaLabelledBy="title"
		rows="{path : '/Bookings',
			filters : {path : 'status', operator : 'NE', value1 : ''},
			parameters : {
				$count : true,
				$orderby : 'status,FlightPrice desc'
			}, suspended : true}"
		selectionMode="None" threshold="100">
		<extension>
			<m:Toolbar design="Transparent" class="sapMTBHeader-CTX">
				<m:Title id="title" level="H1" text="{$count} Flight Bookings"/>
				<m:ToolbarSpacer/>
				<m:SearchField id="search" placeholder="Search for anything..." search=".onSearch"
					value="{ui>/sSearch}" width="40%"/>
				<m:Button icon="sap-icon://download" press=".onDownload" tooltip="Download"/>
				<m:Button id="showMessages" icon="sap-icon://message-popup" tooltip="Show messages"
					press=".onToggleMessagePopover" text="{ui>/iMessages}"
					type="{= ${ui>/iMessages} ? 'Emphasized' : 'Default' }"/>
			</m:Toolbar>
		</extension>
		<rowMode>
			<rm:Interactive rowCount="{ui>/iVisibleRowCount}" fixedTopRowCount="1"/>
		</rowMode>
		<Column width="20em">
			<m:Label text="Airline"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{airline} - {airlineName}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Connection ID"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{ConnectionID}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="10em">
			<m:Label text="Departure"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{DepAirport} - {DepCity}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="10em">
			<m:Label text="Destination"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{DestAirport} - {DestCity}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column hAlign="End" width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Distance"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{
					parts : ['Distance', 'DistanceUnit', {
						mode : 'OneTime',
						path : '/##@@requestUnitsOfMeasure',
						targetType : 'any'
					}],
					type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Unit'
				}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Flight Date"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{FlightDate}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="6em">
			<m:Label text="Plane Type"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{PlaneType}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Status"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{status} - {statusName}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="5em">
			<m:Label text="Travel ID"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{TravelID}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Booking Date"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{BookingDate}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="6em">
			<m:Label text="Booking ID"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{BookingID}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column hAlign="End" width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Flight Price"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{
					parts : ['FlightPrice', 'CurrencyCode_code', {
						mode : 'OneTime',
						path : '/##@@requestCurrencyCodes',
						targetType : 'any'
					}],
					type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Currency',
					formatOptions : { showMeasure : false }
				}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="5em">
			<m:Label text="Currency"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{CurrencyCode_code}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column hAlign="End"  width="5em">
			<m:Label text="G.L.C." tooltip="Group Level Count"/>
			<template>
				<m:Label text="{= %{@$ui5.node.groupLevelCount} }"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
	</TreeTable>

	<m:FormattedText htmlText="<em>Available URL parameters:</em>
		<ul>
			<li> <code>BookingID</code> - If present, the leaf level is individual bookings
			<li> <code>filter</code> - Comma separated list of UI5-like filter conditions,
				for example <code>status EQ B,Distance BT 1000 5000,CurrencyCode_code EQ
				USD,FlightPrice GT 1234</code>
			<li> <code>grandTotalAtBottomOnly</code> - Optional boolean (empty, false, or
				true) or <code>off</code> to turn off grand totals
			<li> <code>subtotalsAtBottomOnly</code> - Optional boolean (empty, false, or
				true) or <code>off</code> to turn off subtotals
			<li> <code>threshold</code> - A number; default 100
			<li> <code>visibleRowCount</code> - A number; default 20
			<li> <code>$orderby</code> - OData system query option for sorting,
				for example <code>FlightPrice asc</code>"/>
</mvc:View>

title: CardActions
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:card="sap.f.cards"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.CardActions"
	displayBlock="true">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Title text="Card actions scenarios" />
				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>

		<Panel>
			<VBox>
				<VBox class="sapUiMediumMarginLeft">
					<Text text="Cards with semanticRole: listitem. - Action on card level" />
				</VBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						action=".onCardAction"
						semanticRole="ListItem"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/cardActions/noAction.json"
						width="400px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
				</HBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						action=".onCardAction"
						semanticRole="ListItem"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/cardActions/card.json"
						width="400px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
				</HBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						action=".onCardAction"
						semanticRole="ListItem"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/cardActions/cardAndListItem.json"
						width="400px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
				</HBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						action=".onCardAction"
						semanticRole="ListItem"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/cardActions/cardAndHeader.json"
						width="400px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
				</HBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						action=".onCardAction"
						semanticRole="ListItem"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/cardActions/header.json"
						width="400px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
				</HBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						action=".onCardAction"
						semanticRole="ListItem"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/cardActions/cardAndHeaderAndListItem.json"
						width="400px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />

<mvc:View
		xmlns="sap.m"

		xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
		controllerName="sap.ui.integration.sample.CardsLoading.CardLoading"

	<form:SimpleForm editable="true" width="40rem">
		<Label text="Loading time" />
		<Input id="loadingMinSeconds" width="8rem" type="Number" description="seconds" value="-1"/>
		<Button text="Start loading" type="Emphasized" press="onFormSubmit"/>

	<f:GridContainer id="grd" class="sapUiSmallMargin">
		<w:Card  id="listTest">

		<w:Card  id="list">
			<w:layoutData>
				<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3"/>

		<w:Card id="error">
			<w:layoutData>
				<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4"/>

		</w:Card>
		<w:Card id="all">
			<w:layoutData>
				<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4"/>
