title: CardMeasurements
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.CardMeasurements"
	xmlns:cssgrid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:codeeditor="sap.ui.codeeditor"
	displayBlock="true">
	<mvc:dependents>
		<VBox id="measurementDetails" class="sapUiTinyMarginTopBottom">
			<Title text="{cardMeasurements>name}" wrapping="true" titleStyle="H5"></Title>
			<HBox class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom" renderType="Bare">
				<Label text="Start Time" showColon="true" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData shrinkFactor="0"></FlexItemData>
					</layoutData>
				</Label>
				<Text text="{cardMeasurements>startTime}" wrapping="true"/>
			</HBox>
			<HBox class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom" renderType="Bare">
				<Label text="Duration (ms)" showColon="true" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData shrinkFactor="0"></FlexItemData>
					</layoutData>
				</Label>
				<Text text="{cardMeasurements>duration}" wrapping="true"/>
			</HBox>
			<HBox class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom" renderType="Bare">
				<Label text="Detail" showColon="true" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData shrinkFactor="0"></FlexItemData>
					</layoutData>
				</Label>
				<Text text="{cardMeasurements>detail}" wrapping="true"/>
			</HBox>
		</VBox>
	</mvc:dependents>
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
				<Title text="Card Performance Measurements" />
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>
		<FormattedText
			htmlText="To enable the measurements add <strong>sap-ui-xx-measure-cards=true</strong> in the query string of the URL or <strong>data-sap-ui-xx-measure-cards</strong> in the UI5 bootstrap configuration."
			class="sapUiSmallMargin">
		</FormattedText>
		<Panel headerText="Snippets for API usage" expandable="true" content="{cardMeasurements>/snippets}">
			<VBox >
				<Title text="{cardMeasurements>title}" class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom" titleStyle="H5"></Title>
				<codeeditor:CodeEditor value="{cardMeasurements>code}" height="3rem" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"></codeeditor:CodeEditor>
			</VBox>
		</Panel>
		<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			<MessageStrip text="This page is not optimized and the results should not be taken into account!" class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom"></MessageStrip>
			<Button text="Show Measurements" press=".showMeasurements"></Button>
		</layout:VerticalLayout>
		<cssgrid:CSSGrid class="sapUiSmallMargin" width="calc(100% - 2rem)" items="{path: 'cardMeasurements>/cards', factory: '.cardFactory'}">
			<cssgrid:customLayout>
				<cssgrid:GridBoxLayout boxMinWidth="20rem"></cssgrid:GridBoxLayout>
			</cssgrid:customLayout>
		</cssgrid:CSSGrid>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: CardsLayout
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.integration.sample.CardsLayout.CardsLayout"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:card="sap.f.cards"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	xmlns:cssgrid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid">
	<f:ShellBar
		title="Drone Hive"
		secondTitle="{/date}"
		homeIcon="{/homeIconUrl}"
		showCopilot="true"
		showSearch="true"
		showNotifications="true"
		showProductSwitcher="true"
		notificationsNumber="2"
		class="sapUiSmallMarginTop sapUiSmallMarginBegin">
		<f:menu>
			<Menu>
				<MenuItem text="Drone Hive" icon="{/homeIconUrl}" />
			</Menu>
		</f:menu>
		<f:profile>
			<Avatar initials="UI" />
		</f:profile>
	</f:ShellBar>
	<IconTabBar
		id="idIconTabBar"
		select="handleIconTabBarSelect"
		headerBackgroundDesign="Transparent"
		class="sapUiResponsiveContentPadding sapUiSmallMarginBegin">
		<items>
			<IconTabFilter text="Home">
				<f:GridContainer>
					<f:layout>
						<f:GridContainerSettings rowSize="5rem" columnSize="5rem" gap="1rem" />
					</f:layout>
					<f:layoutS>
						<f:GridContainerSettings rowSize="5rem" columnSize="5rem" gap="0.5rem" />
					</f:layoutS>
					<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/timeline}" action="onAction">
						<w:customData>
							<card:CardBadgeCustomData value="Updated" icon="sap-icon://status-in-process" state="Indication03" announcementText="The card is recently updated."/>
						</w:customData>
						<w:layoutData>
							<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData minRows="4" columns="4" />
						</w:layoutData>
					</w:Card>
					<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/object}" action="onAction">
						<w:layoutData>
							<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData minRows="4" columns="3" />
						</w:layoutData>
					</w:Card>
					<w:Card manifest="{path: 'manifests>/component', formatter: '.resolveCardUrl'}" action="onAction">
						<w:customData>
							<card:CardBadgeCustomData value="New" announcementText="Card was newly added."/>
							<card:CardBadgeCustomData icon="sap-icon://pushpin-off" visibilityMode="Persist" announcementText="The card is pinned on top."/>
						</w:customData>
						<w:layoutData>
							<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData  minRows="5" columns="6" />
						</w:layoutData>
					</w:Card>
					<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/calendar}" action="onAction">
						<w:customData>
							<card:CardBadgeCustomData value="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum congue libero ut blandit faucibus. Phasellus sed urna id tortor consequat accumsan eget at leo. Cras quis arcu magna."  announcementText="Lorem ipsum"/>
						</w:customData>
						<w:layoutData>
							<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData minRows="4" columns="4" />
						</w:layoutData>
					</w:Card>
				</f:GridContainer>
				<Title
					text="Incidents"
					titleStyle="H2"
					class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginTop sapUiSmallMarginBegin" />
				<f:GridContainer>
					<f:layout>
						<f:GridContainerSettings rowSize="5rem" columnSize="5rem" gap="1rem" />
					</f:layout>
					<f:layoutS>
						<f:GridContainerSettings rowSize="5rem" columnSize="5rem" gap="0.5rem" />
					</f:layoutS>
					<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/stackedColumn}">
						<w:layoutData>
							<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="5" columns="4" />
						</w:layoutData>
					</w:Card>
					<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/donut}">
						<w:layoutData>
							<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="4" columns="4" />
						</w:layoutData>
					</w:Card>
					<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/list1}" baseUrl="./">
						<w:layoutData>
							<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
						</w:layoutData>
					</w:Card>
					<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/list2}"  baseUrl="./" action="onAction">
						<w:layoutData>
							<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
						</w:layoutData>
					</w:Card>
				</f:GridContainer>
			</IconTabFilter>
			<IconTabFilter text="Team Distribution" />
			<IconTabFilter text="Drone Maintenance" />
			<IconTabFilter text="Drone Development" />
		</items>
	</IconTabBar>
</mvc:View>

title: Cart
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.demo.cart.controller.Cart"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<Page
		id="page"
		title="{cfg>/pageTitle}"
		backgroundDesign="Solid"
		showNavButton="{appView>/smallScreenMode}"
		navButtonPress=".onBack"
		showFooter="true">
		<landmarkInfo>
			<PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo
				rootRole="Region"
				rootLabel="{i18n>Cart_rootLabel}"
				contentRole="Main"
				contentLabel="{i18n>Cart_contentLabel}"
				footerRole="Region"
				footerLabel="{i18n>Cart_footerLabel}"
				headerRole="Region"
				headerLabel="{i18n>Cart_headerLabel}"/>
		</landmarkInfo>
		<headerContent>
			<Button
				id="editButton"
				icon="sap-icon://edit"
				enabled="{parts: [
					{path: 'cartProducts>/cartEntries'},
					{path: 'cartProducts>/savedForLaterEntries'}
				 ], formatter : '.formatter.hasItems'}"
				visible="{cfg>/notInDelete}"
				press=".onEditOrDoneButtonPress"
				tooltip="{i18n>cartEditButtonTooltip}"/>
		</headerContent>
		<footer>
			<Toolbar>
				<Text
					id="totalPriceText"
					text="{
						path : 'cartProducts>/cartEntries',
						formatter : '.formatter.totalPrice'
					} EUR"
					class="sapUiTinyMarginBegin"/>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
				<Button
					id="proceedButton"
					type="Accept"
					text="{i18n>cartProceedButtonText}"
					enabled="{
						path: 'cartProducts>/cartEntries',
						formatter: '.formatter.hasItems'
					}"
					visible="{cfg>/notInDelete}"
					press=".onProceedButtonPress"/>
				<Button
					id="doneButton"
					text="{i18n>cartDoneButtonText}"
					enabled="true"
					visible="{cfg>/inDelete}"
					press=".onEditOrDoneButtonPress"/>
			</Toolbar>
		</footer>
		<content>
			<List
				delete=".onCartEntriesDelete"
				id="entryList"
				items="{
					path : 'cartProducts>/cartEntries',
					sorter : {
						path : 'Name',
						descending : false
					}
				}"
				mode="{cfg>/listMode}"
				noDataText="{i18n>cartNoData}"
				selectionChange=".onEntryListSelect">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar>
						<Title
							level="H6"
							text="{i18n>Cart_contentLabel}"
							titleStyle="H6"/>
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<items>
					<ObjectListItem
						intro="{cartProducts>Quantity} x"
						type="{cfg>/listItemType}"
						icon="{
							path : 'cartProducts>PictureUrl',
							formatter : '.formatter.pictureUrl'
						}"
						title="{cartProducts>Name}"
						number="{
							path : 'cartProducts>Price',
							formatter : '.formatter.price'
						}"
						numberUnit="EUR"
						press=".onEntryListPress"
						iconDensityAware="false">
						<attributes>
							<ObjectAttribute
								active="true"
								press=".onSaveForLater"
								text="{i18n>cartSaveForLaterLinkText}"/>
						</attributes>
						<firstStatus>
							<ObjectStatus
								text="{
									path : 'cartProducts>Status',
									formatter : '.formatter.statusText'
								}"
								state="{
									path : 'cartProducts>Status',
									formatter : '.formatter.statusState'
								}"/>
						</firstStatus>
					</ObjectListItem>
				</items>
			</List>
			<List
				delete=".onSaveForLaterDelete"
				id="saveForLaterList"
				items="{
					path : 'cartProducts>/savedForLaterEntries',
					sorter : {
						path : 'Name',
						descending : false
					}
				}"
				mode="{cfg>/listMode}"
				noDataText="{i18n>cartNoItemsSavedForLater}"
				selectionChange=".onEntryListSelect">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar>
						<Title
							level="H6"
							text="{i18n>cartItemsSavedForLater}"
							titleStyle="H6"/>
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<items>
					<ObjectListItem
						intro="{cartProducts>Quantity} x"
						type="{cfg>/listItemType}"
						icon="{
							path : 'cartProducts>PictureUrl',
							formatter : '.formatter.pictureUrl'
						}"
						title="{cartProducts>Name}"
						number="{
							path : 'cartProducts>Price',
							formatter : '.formatter.price'
						}"
						numberUnit="EUR"
						press=".onEntryListPress"
						iconDensityAware="false">
						<attributes>
							<ObjectAttribute
								active="true"
								press=".onAddBackToBasket"
								text="{i18n>cartAddToCartLinkText}"/>
						</attributes>
						<firstStatus>
							<ObjectStatus
								text="{
									path : 'cartProducts>Status',
									formatter : '.formatter.statusText'
								}"
								state="{
									path : 'cartProducts>Status',
									formatter : '.formatter.statusState'
								}"/>
						</firstStatus>
					</ObjectListItem>
				</items>
			</List>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: Category
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.demo.cart.controller.Category"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<Page
		id="page"
		title="{CategoryName}"
		backgroundDesign="Solid"
		showNavButton="true"
		navButtonPress=".onBack">
		<landmarkInfo>
			<PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo
				rootRole="Region"
				rootLabel="{i18n>Category_rootLabel}"
				contentRole="Main"
				contentLabel="{CategoryName} {i18n>Category_contentLabel}"
				footerRole="Region"
				footerLabel="{i18n>Category_footerLabel}"
				headerRole="Region"
				headerLabel="{i18n>Category_headerLabel}"/>
		</landmarkInfo>
		<headerContent>
			<Button
				id="masterListFilterButton"
				icon="sap-icon://filter"
				press=".onFilter"/>
		</headerContent>
		<content>
			<List
				id="productList"
				mode="{= ${device>/system/phone} ? 'None' : 'SingleSelectMaster'}"
				selectionChange=".onProductDetails"
				noDataText="{i18n>categoryNoData}"
				busyIndicatorDelay="0"
				items="{
					path : 'Products',
					sorter : {
						path : 'Name',
						descending : false
					}
				}">
				<infoToolbar>
					<Toolbar
						id="categoryInfoToolbar"
						visible="false">
						<content>
							<Title id="categoryInfoToolbarTitle"/>
						</content>
					</Toolbar>
				</infoToolbar>
				<items>
					<ObjectListItem
						type="{= ${device>/system/phone} ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}"
						icon="{
							path : 'PictureUrl',
							formatter : '.formatter.pictureUrl'
						}"
						title="{Name}"
						number="{
							path : 'Price',
							formatter : '.formatter.price'
						}"
						numberUnit="{CurrencyCode}"
						press=".onProductDetails"
						iconDensityAware="false"
						tooltip="{i18n>openProductDetails} {Name}">
						<attributes>
							<ObjectAttribute visible="true"
											 text="{SupplierName}"/>
							<ObjectAttribute visible="{device>/system/desktop}"
											 active="true"
											 text="{i18n>CompareWith}"
											 press=".compareProducts"/>
						</attributes>
						<firstStatus>
							<ObjectStatus
								text="{
									path : 'Status',
									formatter : '.formatter.statusText'
								}"
								state="{
									path : 'Status',
									formatter : '.formatter.statusState'
								}"/>
						</firstStatus>
					</ObjectListItem>
				</items>
			</List>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"

	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<VBox>

		<CheckBox text="Option b" />
		<CheckBox text="Option c" selected="true" />
		<CheckBox text="Option d" />

		<CheckBox text="Option partially selected" selected="true" partiallySelected="true" />
		<CheckBox text="Required option" required="true" />
		<CheckBox text="Warning" valueState="Warning" />
		<CheckBox text="Warning disabled" valueState="Warning" enabled="false" selected="true" />
		<CheckBox text="Error" valueState="Error" />
		<CheckBox text="Error disabled" valueState="Error" enabled="false" selected="true" />
		<CheckBox text="Information" valueState="Information" />

		editable="true"

	</f:SimpleForm>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.CheckBoxTriState.CheckBoxTriState"
	xmlns:c="sap.ui.core"

	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"

	<l:VerticalLayout>

			text="select / deselect all"

		<CheckBox text="French" selected="{/child3}"/>

title: Checkout
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	controllerName="sap.ui.demo.cart.controller.Checkout"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	core:require="{StringType: 'sap/ui/model/type/String'}">
	<NavContainer id="wizardNavContainer">
		<pages>
			<Page
				id="wizardContentPage"
				title="{i18n>checkoutTitle}">
				<landmarkInfo>
					<PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo
						rootRole="Region"
						rootLabel="{i18n>Checkout_rootLabel}"
						contentRole="Main"
						contentLabel="{i18n>Checkout_contentLabel}"
						footerRole="Region"
						footerLabel="{i18n>Checkout_footerLabel}"/>
				</landmarkInfo>
				<headerContent>
					<Button
						id="returnToShopButton"
						type="Emphasized"
						text="{i18n>returnToShopButtonText}"
						press=".onReturnToShopButtonPress"/>
				</headerContent>
				<content>
					<Wizard
						id="shoppingCartWizard"
						complete="checkCompleted"
						enableBranching="true"
						finishButtonText="{i18n>checkoutWizardReviewbtn}">
						<steps>
							<WizardStep
								id="contentsStep"
								nextStep="paymentTypeStep"
								title="{i18n>checkoutContentsTitle}"
								icon="sap-icon://cart">
								<List
									id="entryList"
									noDataText="{i18n>cartNoData}"
									items="{
										path : 'cartProducts>/cartEntries',
										sorter : {
											path : 'Name',
											descending : false
										}
								}">
									<items>
										<ObjectListItem
											intro="{cartProducts>Quantity} x"
											icon="{
												path : 'cartProducts>PictureUrl',
												formatter : '.formatter.pictureUrl'
											}"
											title="{cartProducts>Name}"
											number="{
												path : 'cartProducts>Price',
												formatter : '.formatter.price'
											}"
											numberUnit="EUR"
											iconDensityAware="false">
											<firstStatus>
												<ObjectStatus
													text="{
														path : 'cartProducts>Status',
														formatter : '.formatter.statusText'
													}"
													state="{
														path : 'cartProducts>Status',
														formatter : '.formatter.statusState'
													}"/>
											</firstStatus>
										</ObjectListItem>
									</items>
								</List>
								<Bar>
									<contentRight>
										<Text
											text="{
												path : 'cartProducts>/cartEntries',
												formatter : '.formatter.totalPrice'
											} EUR"/>
									</contentRight>
								</Bar>
							</WizardStep>
							<WizardStep
								id="paymentTypeStep"
								title="{i18n>checkoutPaymentTitle}"
								subsequentSteps="creditCardStep, bankAccountStep, cashOnDeliveryStep"
								complete="goToPaymentStep"
								icon="sap-icon://money-bills">
								<Text
									class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
									text="{i18n>checkoutPaymentText}"/>
							<HBox
								renderType="Bare"
								alignItems="Center"
								justifyContent="Center"
								width="100%">
								<SegmentedButton
										selectionChange="setPaymentMethod"
										id="paymentMethodSelection"
										selectedKey="{/SelectedPayment}">
										<items>
											<SegmentedButtonItem
												id="payViaCC"
												key="Credit Card"
												text="{i18n>checkoutPaymentCreditCard}"/>
											<SegmentedButtonItem
												id="payViaBank"
												key="Bank Transfer"
												text="{i18n>checkoutPaymentBankTransfer}"/>
											<SegmentedButtonItem
												id="payViaCOD"
												key="Cash on Delivery"
												text="{i18n>checkoutPaymentCod}"/>
										</items>
									</SegmentedButton>
								</HBox>
							</WizardStep>
							<WizardStep
								id="creditCardStep"
								title="{i18n>checkoutCreditCardCreditCardInfo}"
								nextStep="invoiceStep"
								activate=".onCheckStepActivation"
								icon="sap-icon://credit-card"
								validated="false">
							<form:SimpleForm
								editable="true"
								layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
								<Label
									labelFor="creditCardHolderName"
									text="{i18n>checkoutCreditCardName}"
									required="true">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="creditCardHolderName"
									placeholder="{i18n>creditCardHolderText}"
									value="{
										path: '/CreditCard/Name',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 3,
											search: '^[a-zA-Z]+[\\s]?[a-zA-Z]+$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkCreditCardStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutCreditCardCardNo}"
									labelFor="creditCardNumber"
									required="true">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<MaskInput
									id="creditCardNumber"
									placeholder="{i18n>creditCardNumberText}"
									mask = "CCCC-CCCC-CCCC-CCCC"
									placeholderSymbol = "_"
									value="{
										path: '/CreditCard/CardNumber',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											search: '^[0-9-]+$',
											minLength: 16
										}
									}"
									change="checkCreditCardStep">
									<rules>
										<MaskInputRule
											maskFormatSymbol="C"
											regex="[0-9]"/>
									</rules>
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</MaskInput>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutCreditCardCode}"
									labelFor="creditCardSecurityNumber"
									required="true">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<MaskInput
									id="creditCardSecurityNumber"
									placeholder="{i18n>creditCardSecurityNumberText}"
									mask = "CCC"
									placeholderSymbol = "_"
									value="{
										path: '/CreditCard/SecurityCode',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 3,
											search: '^[0-9]+$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkCreditCardStep">
									<rules>
										<MaskInputRule
											maskFormatSymbol ="C"
											regex = "[0-9]"/>
									</rules>
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</MaskInput>
								<Label text="{i18n>checkoutCreditCardExpiration}">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<DatePicker
									id="creditCardExpirationDate"
									value="{
										path: '/CreditCard/Expire',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 7,
											maxLength: 7
										}
									}"
									valueFormat="MM/YYYY"
									displayFormat="MM/YYYY"
									required="true"
									change="checkCreditCardStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</DatePicker>
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
							id="bankAccountStep"
							title="{i18n>checkoutBankAccountTitle}"
							nextStep="invoiceStep"
							icon="sap-icon://official-service">
							<Panel>
								<layout:Grid
									defaultSpan="L6 M6 S10"
									hSpacing="2">
									<Label
										text="{i18n>checkoutBankAccountName}"
										design="Bold"/>
									<Label text="{i18n>beneficiaryNameText}"/>
									<Label
										text="{i18n>checkoutBankAccountBank}"
										design="Bold"/>
									<Label text="{i18n>bankNameText}"/>
									<Label
										text="{i18n>checkoutBankAccountNumber}"
										design="Bold"/>
									<Label text="{i18n>accountNumberText}"/>
								</layout:Grid>
							</Panel>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
							id="cashOnDeliveryStep"
							title="{i18n>checkoutCodTitle}"
							nextStep="invoiceStep"
							activate=".onCheckStepActivation"
							icon="sap-icon://money-bills"
							validated="false">
							<form:SimpleForm
								editable="true"
								layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutCodFirstName}"
									required="true"
									labelFor="cashOnDeliveryName">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="cashOnDeliveryName"
									placeholder="{i18n>firstNameText}"
									value="{
										path: '/CashOnDelivery/FirstName',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 2
										}
									}"
									change="checkCashOnDeliveryStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutCodLastName}"
									labelFor="cashOnDeliveryLastName"
									required="true">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="cashOnDeliveryLastName"
									placeholder="{i18n>lastNameText}"
									value="{
										path: '/CashOnDelivery/LastName',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 2
										}
									}"
									change="checkCashOnDeliveryStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutCodPhone}"
									labelFor="cashOnDeliveryPhoneNumber"
									required="true">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="cashOnDeliveryPhoneNumber"
									placeholder="{i18n>phoneNumberText}"
									value="{
										path: '/CashOnDelivery/PhoneNumber',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											search: '^[(0-9+]+[)\\s]?[0-9\\/\\s]+$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkCashOnDeliveryStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutCodEmail}"
									labelFor="cashOnDeliveryEmail"
									required="true">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="cashOnDeliveryEmail"
									placeholder="{i18n>emailAddressText}"
									value="{
										path: '/CashOnDelivery/Email',
										type: '.types.email'
										}"
									change="checkCashOnDeliveryStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
							id="invoiceStep"
							title="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddressTitle}"
							subsequentSteps="deliveryAddressStep, deliveryTypeStep"
							activate=".onCheckStepActivation"
							complete="invoiceAddressComplete"
							icon="sap-icon://sales-quote"
							validated="false">
							<form:SimpleForm
								layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
								editable="true">
								<Label text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddressDifferentDeliveryAddress}">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<CheckBox
									id="differentDeliveryAddress"
									selected="{/DifferentDeliveryAddress}"
									select="setDifferentDeliveryAddress">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</CheckBox>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddress}"
									required="true"
									labelFor="invoiceAddressAddress">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="invoiceAddressAddress"
									placeholder="{i18n>addressText}"
									value="{
										path: '/InvoiceAddress/Address',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 4,
											search: '^[a-zA-Z-]+\\.?\\s?[0-9a-zA-Z\\s]*$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkInvoiceStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddressCity}"
									required="true"
									labelFor="invoiceAddressCity">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="invoiceAddressCity"
									placeholder="{i18n>cityText}"
									value="{
										path: '/InvoiceAddress/City',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 3,
											search: '^[a-zA-Z\\s]+$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkInvoiceStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddressZip}"
									required="true"
									labelFor="invoiceAddressZip">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="invoiceAddressZip"
									placeholder="{i18n>zipCodeText}"
									value="{
										path: '/InvoiceAddress/ZipCode',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 3,
											search: '^[0-9]+$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkInvoiceStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddressCountry}"
									required="true"
									labelFor="invoiceAddressCountry">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="invoiceAddressCountry"
									placeholder="{i18n>countryText}"
									value="{
										path: '/InvoiceAddress/Country',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 2,
											search: '^[a-zA-Z]+$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkInvoiceStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddressNote}"
									required="false">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<TextArea
									rows="8"
									placeholder="{i18n>noteText}"
									value="{/InvoiceAddress/Note}">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</TextArea>
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
								id="deliveryAddressStep"
								activate=".onCheckStepActivation"
								validated="false"
								title="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressTitle}"
								nextStep="deliveryTypeStep"
								icon="sap-icon://sales-quote">
							<form:SimpleForm
								editable="true"
								layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressAddress}"
									required="true"
									labelFor="deliveryAddressAddress">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="deliveryAddressAddress"
									placeholder="{i18n>addressText}"
									value="{
										path: '/DeliveryAddress/Address',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 4,
											search: '^[a-zA-Z-]+\\.?\\s?[0-9a-zA-Z\\s]*$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkDeliveryAddressStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressCity}"
									required="true"
									labelFor="deliveryAddressCity">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="deliveryAddressCity"
									placeholder="{i18n>cityText}"
									value="{
										path: '/DeliveryAddress/City',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 3,
											search: '^[a-zA-Z\\s]+$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkDeliveryAddressStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressZip}"
									required="true"
									labelFor="deliveryAddressZip">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="deliveryAddressZip"
									placeholder="{i18n>zipCodeText}"
									value="{
										path: '/DeliveryAddress/ZipCode',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 3,
											search: '^[0-9]+$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkDeliveryAddressStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label
									text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressCountry}"
									required="true"
									labelFor="deliveryAddressCountry">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<Input
									id="deliveryAddressCountry"
									placeholder="{i18n>countryText}"
									value="{
										path: '/DeliveryAddress/Country',
										type: 'StringType',
										constraints: {
											minLength: 2,
											search: '^[a-zA-Z]+$'
										}
									}"
									change="checkDeliveryAddressStep">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Input>
								<Label text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressNote}">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL4 L4 M4 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</Label>
								<TextArea
									rows="8"
									placeholder="{i18n>noteText}"
									value="{/DeliveryAddress/Note}">
									<layoutData>
										<layout:GridData span="XL8 L8 M8 S12"/>
									</layoutData>
								</TextArea>
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
								id="deliveryTypeStep"
								title="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryTypeTitle}"
								icon="sap-icon://insurance-car">
								<Text
									class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
									text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryTypeText}"/>
							<HBox
								renderType="Bare"
								alignItems="Center"
								justifyContent="Center"
								width="100%">
								<SegmentedButton
										id="deliveryType"
										selectedKey="{/SelectedDeliveryMethod}">
										<items>
											<SegmentedButtonItem
												key="Standard Delivery"
												text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryTypeStandard}"/>
											<SegmentedButtonItem
												id="expressDelivery"
												key="Express Delivery"
												text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryTypeExpress}"/>
										</items>
									</SegmentedButton>
								</HBox>
							</WizardStep>
						</steps>
					</Wizard>
				</content>
				<footer>
					<Bar id="wizardFooterBar" visible="{= ${message>/}.length === 0 ? false : true}">
						<contentLeft>
							<Button
								id="showPopoverButton"
								icon="sap-icon://message-popup"
								text="{= ${message>/}.length }"
								type="Emphasized"
								press=".onShowMessagePopoverPress"/>
						</contentLeft>
					</Bar>
				</footer>
			</Page>
			<Page
				id="summaryPage"
				backgroundDesign="Solid"
				showHeader="false">
				<landmarkInfo>
					<PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo
							rootRole="Region" rootLabel="{i18n>Checkout_rootLabel}"
							contentRole="Main" contentLabel="{i18n>Checkout_summaryContentLabel}"
							footerRole="Banner" footerLabel="{i18n>Checkout_footerLabel}"/>
				</landmarkInfo>
				<content>
					<Panel>
						<headerToolbar>
							<Toolbar id="toolbarProductList">
								<Title
									id="checkoutItems"
									text="{i18n>checkoutSummaryTitle1}"
									level="H2"
									titleStyle="H4"/>
								<ToolbarSpacer/>
								<Button
									id="backtoList"
									icon="sap-icon://edit"
									tooltip="{i18n>backToWizard}"
									type="Emphasized"
									press="._navBackToStep">
									<customData>
										<core:CustomData key="navBackTo" value="contentsStep"/>
									</customData>
								</Button>
							</Toolbar>
						</headerToolbar>
						<content>
							<List
								id="summaryEntryList"
								noDataText="{i18n>cartNoData}"
								items="{
									path : 'cartProducts>/cartEntries',
									sorter : {
										path : 'Name',
										descending : false
									}
							 	}">
								<items>
									<ObjectListItem
										intro="{cartProducts>Quantity} x"
										icon="{
											path : 'cartProducts>PictureUrl',
											formatter : '.formatter.pictureUrl'
										}"
										title="{cartProducts>Name}"
										number="{
											path : 'cartProducts>Price',
											formatter : '.formatter.price'
										}"
										numberUnit="EUR"
										iconDensityAware="false">
										<firstStatus>
											<ObjectStatus
												text="{
													path : 'cartProducts>Status',
													formatter : '.formatter.statusText'
												}"
												state="{
													path : 'cartProducts>Status',
													formatter : '.formatter.statusState'
												}"/>
										</firstStatus>
									</ObjectListItem>
								</items>
							</List>
						</content>
					</Panel>
					<form:SimpleForm
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
						ariaLabelledBy="totalPriceTitle">
						<form:toolbar>
							<Toolbar id="toolbarTotalPrice">
								<ToolbarSpacer/>
								<Title
									id="totalPriceTitle"
									level="H3"
									titleStyle="H4"
									text="{
										path : 'cartProducts>/cartEntries',
										formatter : '.formatter.totalPrice'
									}"/>
							</Toolbar>
						</form:toolbar>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
						ariaLabelledBy="toolbarPaymentTitle">
						<form:toolbar>
							<Toolbar id="toolbarPayment">
								<Title
									id="toolbarPaymentTitle"
									text="{i18n>checkoutSummaryTitle2}"
									level="H2"
									titleStyle="H4"/>
								<ToolbarSpacer/>
								<Button
									id="backToPaymentType"
									icon="sap-icon://edit"
									tooltip="{i18n>backToWizard}"
									type="Emphasized"
									press="._navBackToStep">
									<customData>
										<core:CustomData key="navBackTo" value="paymentTypeStep"/>
									</customData>
								</Button>
							</Toolbar>
						</form:toolbar>
						<form:content>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutSummaryPaymentHeader}"/>
							<Text text="{/SelectedPayment}"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
							visible="{= ${/SelectedPayment}==='Credit Card' ? true : false}"
							editable="false"
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
							ariaLabelledBy="creditCardPaymentTitle">
						<form:toolbar>
							<Toolbar id="toolbarCreditCard">
								<Title
									id="creditCardPaymentTitle"
									text="{i18n>checkoutSummaryTitle3cc}"
									level="H2"
									titleStyle="H4"/>
								<ToolbarSpacer/>
								<Button
									id="backToCreditCard"
									icon="sap-icon://edit"
									tooltip="{i18n>backToWizard}"
									type="Emphasized"
									press="._navBackToStep">
									<customData>
										<core:CustomData key="navBackTo" value="creditCardStep"/>
									</customData>
								</Button>
							</Toolbar>
						</form:toolbar>
						<form:content>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutCreditCardName}"/>
							<Text text="{/CreditCard/Name}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutCreditCardCardNo}"/>
							<Text text="{/CreditCard/CardNumber}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutCreditCardCode}"/>
							<Text text="{/CreditCard/SecurityCode}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutCreditCardExpiration}"/>
							<Text text="{/CreditCard/Expire}"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
						visible="{= ${/SelectedPayment}==='Bank Transfer' ? true : false}"
						title="{i18n>checkoutSummaryTitle3bt}"
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label
								text="{i18n>checkoutBankAccountName}"
								design="Bold"/>
							<Text text="{i18n>beneficiaryNameText}"/>
							<Label
								text="{i18n>checkoutBankAccountBank}"
								design="Bold"/>
							<Text text="{i18n>bankNameText}"/>
							<Label
								text="{i18n>checkoutBankAccountNumber}"
								design="Bold"/>
							<Text text="{i18n>accountNumberText}"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>
					<form:SimpleForm
						visible="{= ${/SelectedPayment}==='Cash on Delivery' ? true : false}"
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
						ariaLabelledBy="cashOnDeliveryTitle">
						<form:toolbar>
							<Toolbar id="toolbarCOD">
								<Title
									id="cashOnDeliveryTitle"
									text="{i18n>checkoutSummaryTitle3cod}"
									level="H2"
									titleStyle="H4"/>
								<ToolbarSpacer/>
								<Button
									id="backToCashOnDelivery"
									icon="sap-icon://edit"
									tooltip="{i18n>backToWizard}"
									type="Emphasized"
									press="._navBackToStep">
									<customData>
										<core:CustomData key="navBackTo" value="cashOnDeliveryStep"/>
									</customData>
								</Button>
							</Toolbar>
						</form:toolbar>
						<form:content>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutCodFirstName}"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/FirstName}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutCodLastName}"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/LastName}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutCodPhone}"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/PhoneNumber}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutCodEmail}"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/Email}"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>
					<form:SimpleForm
							title=""
							editable="false"
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
							ariaLabelledBy="invoiceAddressTitle">
						<form:toolbar>
							<Toolbar id="toolbarInvoice">
								<Title
									id="invoiceAddressTitle"
									text="{i18n>checkoutSummaryTitle4}"
									level="H2"
									titleStyle="H4"/>
								<ToolbarSpacer/>
								<Button
									id="backToInvoiceAddress"
									icon="sap-icon://edit"
									tooltip="{i18n>backToWizard}"
									type="Emphasized"
									press="._navBackToStep">
									<customData>
										<core:CustomData key="navBackTo" value="invoiceStep"/>
									</customData>
								</Button>
							</Toolbar>
						</form:toolbar>
						<form:content>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddress}"/>
							<Text text="{/InvoiceAddress/Address}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddressCity}"/>
							<Text text="{/InvoiceAddress/City}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddressZip}"/>
							<Text text="{/InvoiceAddress/ZipCode}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddressCountry}"/>
							<Text text="{/InvoiceAddress/Country}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutInvoiceAddressNote}"/>
							<Text text="{/InvoiceAddress/Note}"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>
					<form:SimpleForm
							title=""
							editable="false"
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
							ariaLabelledBy="deliveryTypeTitle">
						<form:toolbar>
							<Toolbar id="toolbarShippping">
								<Title
									id="deliveryTypeTitle"
									text="{i18n>checkoutSummaryTitle5}"
									level="H2"
									titleStyle="H4"/>
								<ToolbarSpacer/>
								<Button
									id="backToDeliveryType"
									icon="sap-icon://edit"
									tooltip="{i18n>backToWizard}"
									type="Emphasized"
									press="._navBackToStep">
									<customData>
										<core:CustomData key="navBackTo" value="deliveryTypeStep"/>
									</customData>
								</Button>
							</Toolbar>
						</form:toolbar>
						<form:content>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutSummaryDeliveryHeader}"/>
							<Text id="selectedDeliveryMethod" text="{/SelectedDeliveryMethod}"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>
					<form:SimpleForm
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
						visible="{= ${/DifferentDeliveryAddress}}"
						ariaLabelledBy="shippingAddressTitle1">
						<form:toolbar>
							<Toolbar id="toolbar5ShippingAddress">
								<Title
									id="shippingAddressTitle1"
									text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressTitle}"
									level="H2"
									titleStyle="H4"/>
								<ToolbarSpacer/>
								<Button
									id="backToDeliveryAddress"
									icon="sap-icon://edit"
									tooltip="{i18n>backToWizard}"
									type="Emphasized"
									press="._navBackToStep">
									<customData>
										<core:CustomData key="navBackTo" value="deliveryAddressStep"/>
									</customData>
								</Button>
							</Toolbar>
						</form:toolbar>
						<form:content>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressAddress}"/>
							<Text text="{/DeliveryAddress/Address}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressCity}"/>
							<Text text="{/DeliveryAddress/City}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressZip}"/>
							<Text text="{/DeliveryAddress/ZipCode}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressCountry}"/>
							<Text text="{/DeliveryAddress/Country}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressNote}"/>
							<Text text="{/DeliveryAddress/Note}"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>
					<form:SimpleForm
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
						visible="{= !${/DifferentDeliveryAddress}}"
						ariaLabelledBy="shippingAddressTitle2">
						<form:toolbar>
							<Toolbar id="toolbar5SameAsInvoice">
								<Title
									id="shippingAddressTitle2"
									text="{i18n>checkoutDeliveryAddressTitle}"
									level="H2"
									titleStyle="H4"/>
								<ToolbarSpacer/>
								<Button
									id="backToDifferentDeliveryAddress"
									icon="sap-icon://edit"
									tooltip="{i18n>backToWizard}"
									type="Emphasized"
									press="._navBackToStep">
									<customData>
										<core:CustomData key="navBackTo" value="invoiceStep"/>
									</customData>
								</Button>
							</Toolbar>
						</form:toolbar>
						<form:content>
							<Text text="{i18n>checkoutSummarySameAsInvoice}"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>
				</content>
				<footer>
					<Bar id="summaryFooterBar">
						<contentRight>
							<Button
								id="submitOrder"
								type="Accept"
								text="{i18n>checkoutSummarySubmit}"
								press=".handleWizardSubmit"></Button>
							<Button
								id="cancelOrder"
								type="Reject"
								text="{i18n>checkoutSummaryCancel}"
								press=".handleWizardCancel"></Button>
						</contentRight>
					</Bar>
				</footer>
			</Page>
		</pages>
	</NavContainer>
</mvc:View>

title: ChildObjectPage
code:
<mvc:View
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.uxap"
		xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:m="sap.m"
		xmlns:goals="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.goals"
		xmlns:personal="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.personal"
		controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.ChildObjectPage.controller.ChildObjectPage"
		height="100%">

	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout" isChildPage="true" upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader id="headerForTest"
							  objectTitle="Denise Smith"
							  objectSubtitle="Example of a child page in ObjectPage terms"
							  objectImageShape="Circle"
							  objectImageURI="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png">
				<actions>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://action" text="action" tooltip="action"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://action-settings" text="settings" tooltip="action-settings"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://edit" text="edit" tooltip="edit"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://save" text="save" visible="false" tooltip="save"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://refresh" text="{buttons>/text}" tooltip="refresh"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="{buttons>/icon}"
												  text="{path:'/text', model:'buttons', formatter:'.onFormat'}" tooltip="chain-link"/>
				</actions>
				<breadcrumbs>
					<m:Breadcrumbs>
						<m:Link text="Page 2 long link" press="handleLink2Press"/>
					</m:Breadcrumbs>
				</breadcrumbs>
			</ObjectPageHeader>
		</headerTitle>
		<headerContent>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:ObjectStatus title="User ID" text="12345678"/>
				<m:ObjectStatus title="Functional Area" text="Developement"/>
				<m:ObjectStatus title="Cost Center" text="PI DFA GD Programs and Product"/>
				<m:ObjectStatus title="Email" text="email@address.com"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
			<m:Text width="200px"
					text="Hi, I'm Denise. I am passionate about what I do and I'll go the extra mile to make the customer win."/>

			<m:ObjectStatus text="In Stock" state="Error"/>
			<m:ObjectStatus title="Label" text="In Stock" state="Warning"/>

		</headerContent>
		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="2014 Goals Plan">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title=" " titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
							<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
							<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
							<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="paymentSubSection" title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: Code
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.Code"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:fileEditor="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controls" height="100%">
	<l:ResponsiveSplitter id="splitView" height="100%">
		<l:PaneContainer orientation="Horizontal">
			<l:SplitPane id="previewPane" requiredParentWidth="1">
				<Page
					id="samplePageEdit"
					showHeader="false"
					showNavButton="true"
					navButtonPress="onNavBack"
					busyIndicatorDelay="0"
					class="sapUiDocumentationSamplePage">
				<landmarkInfo>
					<PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo rootRole="Region" rootLabel="Details" headerRole="Region" headerLabel="Header" contentRole="Main" contentLabel="Content"></PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo>
				</landmarkInfo>
					<subHeader>
						<Bar id="header" class="sapContrast sapContrastPlus">
							<contentLeft>
								<Button type="Back" press="onNavBack" tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_BACK_BTN_TOOLTIP}" enabled="{= ${/disableNavBack} === undefined }"/>
							</contentLeft>
							<contentMiddle>
								<Title level="H1" text="{/title}" tooltip="{/title}"/>
								<Button
										id="warningSample"
										icon="sap-icon://warning"
										visible="{=${/showWarning}}"
										tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_EDITED_TOOLTIP}"
										class="sapUiExploredWarningIcon"
										press="onWarningSample"/>
							</contentMiddle>
							<contentRight>
								<Button
										id="infoSample"
										visible="{=${/details} !== undefined || ${/description} !== undefined}"
										icon="sap-icon://hint"
										tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_INFO_TOOLTIP}"
										press="onInfoSample"/>

								<Button id="apiRefButton" text="{i18n>SAMPLE_API_REFERENCE_BTN}" type="Emphasized" press="onAPIRefPress" visible="false"/>
								<Button
										id="prevSample"
										icon="sap-icon://navigation-up-arrow"
										class="sapUiHideOnPhone"
										tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_PREV_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
										enabled="{= ${/previousSampleId} !== undefined }"
										press="onPreviousSample"/>
								<Button
										id="nextSample"
										icon="sap-icon://navigation-down-arrow"
										class="sapUiHideOnPhone"
										tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_NEXT_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
										enabled="{= ${/nextSampleId} !== undefined }"
										press="onNextSample"/>
								<Button
										id="toggleFullScreenBtn"
										icon="sap-icon://full-screen"
										visible="{:= ${device>/system/desktop} ||
													( ${device>/system/tablet} &&
													${device>/orientation/landscape} ) }"
										tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_FULLSCREEN_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
										press="onToggleFullScreen" />
								<Button visible="{/showNewTab}"
										id="newTab"
										tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_NEW_TAB_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
										icon="sap-icon://inspect"
										press="onNewTab" />
							</contentRight>
						</Bar>
					</subHeader>
				</Page>
			</l:SplitPane>
			<l:SplitPane id="editorPane" requiredParentWidth="1">
				<Page
					id="page"
					showHeader="false"
					showNavButton="true"
					navButtonPress="onNavBack"
					title="{/title}"
					enableScrolling="false">
					<landmarkInfo>
						<PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo rootRole="Region" rootLabel="Details" headerRole="Region" headerLabel="Header" contentRole="Main" contentLabel="Content"></PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo>
					</landmarkInfo>
					<subHeader>
						<OverflowToolbar>
							<Button
								class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
								text="Run"
								type="Emphasized"
								icon="sap-icon://media-play"
								press="onRunPressed"
								enabled="{settings>/editable}"
							>
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="High" />
								</layoutData>
							</Button>
							<CheckBox text="Auto Run" selected="{settings>/autoRun}" enabled="{settings>/editable}">
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
								</layoutData>
							</CheckBox>
							<ToolbarSpacer />
							<Button
								text="{i18n>SAMPLE_RESET_CHANGES}"
								type="Emphasized"
								press="onClearButtonPressed" />
							<ToolbarSpacer />
							<MenuButton id="downloadSampleButton" icon="sap-icon://download" tooltip="Download" text="Download" type="Transparent">
								<menu>
									<Menu>
										<MenuItem text="All files as .zip" icon="sap-icon://attachment-zip-file" press="onDownload" />
										<!-- <MenuItem text="All files as .zip" icon="sap-icon://attachment-zip-file" press="onDownloadZip" /> -->
									</Menu>
								</menu>
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="High" />
								</layoutData>
							</MenuButton>
							<Button class="orientationBtn" press="onChangeSplitterOrientation" tooltip="Change position" icon="sap-icon://header" type="Transparent">
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
								</layoutData>
							</Button>
						</OverflowToolbar>
					</subHeader>
					<fileEditor:FileEditor
						id="fileEditor"
						fileChange="onFileEditorFileChange"
						fileSwitch="onFileSwitch"
						visible="{= ${settings>/editorType} === 'text' }" />
				</Page>
			</l:SplitPane>
		</l:PaneContainer>
	</l:ResponsiveSplitter>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.codeeditor.sample.CodeEditorIconTabHeader.CodeEditor"

	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:ce="sap.ui.codeeditor"
	height="100%">

		select=".onSelectTab">

</mvc:View>

title: ComboBoxGrouping
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.ComboBoxGrouping.controller.ComboBoxGrouping"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Page showHeader="false" class="sapUiContentPadding">
		<content>
			<ComboBox
				items="{
					path: '/ProductCollection',
					sorter: {
						path: 'SupplierName',
						descending: false,
						group: true
					}
				}">
				<core:Item key="{ProductId}" text="{Name}" />
			</ComboBox>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: ComboBoxLazyLoading
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.ComboBoxLazyLoading.controller.ComboBoxLazyLoading"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Page showHeader="false" class="sapUiContentPadding">
		<content>
			<ComboBox
				items="{
					path: '/ProductCollection',
					suspended: true
				}"
				loadItems="handleLoadItems">
				<core:ListItem key="{ProductId}" text="{Name}"/>
			</ComboBox>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: ComboBoxSearchBoth
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.ComboBoxSearchBoth.controller.ComboBoxSearchBoth"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Page showHeader="false" class="sapUiContentPadding">
		<content>
			<l:VerticalLayout>
				<ComboBox
					id="idComboBox"
					showSecondaryValues= "true"
					filterSecondaryValues= "true"
					value="{/comboBoxValue}"
					selectedKey="{/comboBoxKey}"
					items="{
						path: '/CountriesCollection',
						sorter: { path: 'text' }
					}">
					<core:ListItem key="{key}" text="{text}" additionalText="{key}"/>
				</ComboBox>
				<Label text="Formatted value (text and key):" labelFor="idComboBox"/>
				<Text text="{parts: [{path: '/comboBoxValue'}, {path: '/comboBoxKey'}], formatter: '.fnFormatter'}" />
			</l:VerticalLayout>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: ComboBoxValidation
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.ComboBoxValidation.controller.ComboBoxValidation"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<l:VerticalLayout class="sapUiContentPadding" width="100%">
		<Label text="Choose a country:" labelFor="idComboBox"/>
		<ComboBox
			id="idComboBox"
			items="{
				path: '/CountriesCollection',
				sorter: { path: 'text' }
			}"

		</ComboBox>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: ComboBoxValueState
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.ComboBoxValueState.controller.ComboBoxValueState"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Page showHeader="false" class="sapUiContentPadding">
		<content>
			<l:VerticalLayout>
				<Label text="ComboBox in a Success state" labelFor="idComboBoxSuccess"></Label>
				<ComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
					id="idComboBoxSuccess"
					valueState="Success"
						items="{
						path: '/CountriesCollection',
						sorter: { path: 'text' },
						suspended: true
					}"
						loadItems="handleLoadItems">
					<core:ListItem key="{key}" text="{text}"/>
				</ComboBox>
				<Label text="ComboBox in an Information state" labelFor="idComboBoxInformation"></Label>
				<ComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
					id="idComboBoxInformation"
					valueState="Information"
						items="{
						path: '/CountriesCollection',
						sorter: { path: 'text' },
						suspended: true
					}"
						loadItems="handleLoadItems">
					<core:ListItem key="{key}" text="{text}"/>
				</ComboBox>
				<Label text="Information state message with a link." labelFor="idComboBoxInformationWithLink"></Label>
				<ComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
					id="idComboBoxInformationWithLink"
					valueState="Information"
					valueStateText="Warning message. Extra long text used as a warning message. Extra long text used as a warning message - 2. Extra long text used as a warning message - 3."
					items="{
						path: '/CountriesCollection',
						sorter: { path: 'text' },
						suspended: true
					}"
					loadItems="handleLoadItems">
					<core:ListItem key="{key}" text="{text}"/>
					<formattedValueStateText>
						<FormattedText htmlText="Warning message. Long text used as a warning message with a %%0." >
							<controls>
								<Link text="link" href="" press=".handleValueStateLinkPress" />
							</controls>
						</FormattedText>
					</formattedValueStateText>
				</ComboBox>
				<Label text="ComboBox in a Warning state" labelFor="idComboBoxWarning"></Label>
				<ComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
					id="idComboBoxWarning"
					valueState="Warning"
					valueStateText="Warning message. Extra long text used as a warning message. Extra long text used as a warning message - 2. Extra long text used as a warning message - 3."
					items="{
						path: '/CountriesCollection',
						sorter: { path: 'text' },
						suspended: true
					}"
					loadItems="handleLoadItems">
					<core:ListItem key="{key}" text="{text}"/>
				</ComboBox>
				<Label text="Warning state with multiple links." labelFor="idComboWarningWithLinks"></Label>
				<ComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
					id="idComboBoxWarningWithLinks"
					valueState="Warning"
						items="{
						path: '/CountriesCollection',
						sorter: { path: 'text' },
						suspended: true
					}"
						loadItems="handleLoadItems">
					<core:ListItem key="{key}" text="{text}"/>
					<formattedValueStateText>
						<FormattedText htmlText="Error message. Long text used as an error message with %%0 %%1." >
							<controls>
								<Link text="multiple" href="" press=".handleValueStateLinkPress" />
								<Link text="links" href="" press=".handleValueStateLinkPress" />
							</controls>
						</FormattedText>
					</formattedValueStateText>
				</ComboBox>
				<Label text="ComboBox in an Error state" labelFor="idComboBoxError"></Label>
				<ComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
					id="idComboBoxError"
					valueState="Error"
						items="{
						path: '/CountriesCollection',
						sorter: { path: 'text' },
						suspended: true
					}"
						loadItems="handleLoadItems">
					<core:ListItem key="{key}" text="{text}"/>
				</ComboBox>
			</l:VerticalLayout>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: Commands
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:fb="sap.ui.comp.smartfilterbar"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	controllerName="samples.components.commands.Commands"
	displayBlock="true">
	<App id="commands">
		<Page id="page" title="Commands">
			<dependents>
				<core:CommandExecution id="CE_SAVE" command="Save" enabled="true" execute=".onSave" />
				<core:CommandExecution id="CE_DELETE" command="Delete" enabled="true" execute=".onDelete" />
			</dependents>
			<Panel headerText="Button">
				<Label width="100%" text="Vanilla Buttons"></Label>
				<Button icon="sap-icon://save" />
				<Button text="Save" tooltip="User Tooltip" />
				<Button icon="sap-icon://save" tooltip="User Tooltip" />

				<Label width="100%" text="Command Registered"></Label>
				<Button icon="sap-icon://save" press="cmd:Save" />
				<Button text="Save" tooltip="User Tooltip" press="cmd:Save" />
				<Button icon="sap-icon://save" tooltip="User Tooltip" press="cmd:Save" />

				<Label width="100%" text="Vanilla Buttons + direct shortcut hints"></Label>
				<Button id="b1" icon="sap-icon://save" />
				<Button id="b2" text="Save" tooltip="User Tooltip" />
				<Button id="b3" icon="sap-icon://save" tooltip="User Tooltip" />

				<Label width="100%" text="Command Registered + direct shortcut hints"></Label>
				<Button id="b4" icon="sap-icon://save" press="cmd:Save" />
				<Button id="b5" text="Save" tooltip="User Tooltip" press="cmd:Save" />
				<Button id="b6" icon="sap-icon://save" tooltip="User Tooltip" press="cmd:Save" />

				<Button id="b7" text="Non-existent command" tooltip="User Tooltip" press="cmd:MyCommand" />

				<fb:SmartFilterBar search="cmd:Save" />
			</Panel>
		</Page>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

title: CommonCardSettings
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	displayBlock="true"
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.CommonCardSettings">
	<VBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin">
		<SegmentedButton
				id="density-mode-segmented-button"
				selectedKey="cozy"
				selectionChange=".onFormFactorChange"
				class="VizTestDensityBtn sapUiSmallMargin">
			<items>
				<SegmentedButtonItem text="Cozy" key="cozy" />
				<SegmentedButtonItem text="Compact" key="compact" />
			</items>
		</SegmentedButton>
		<HBox
			renderType="Bare"
			alignItems="Center">
			<Label
				text="Loading"
				showColon="true">
			</Label>
			<Switch
				change=".onLoadingChange"
				tooltip="List placehoder doesn't react on dynamic switch of compact and cozy densities">
			</Switch>
		</HBox>
	</VBox>
</mvc:View>

title: Comparison
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:cards="sap.f.cards"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.ComparisonPattern.app.controller.Comparison"
	height="100%">
	<f:DynamicPage class="sapUiComparisonContainer">
		<f:title>
			<f:DynamicPageTitle
				id="dynamic-page"
				stateChange="onStateChange"
				backgroundDesign="Transparent">
				<f:heading>
					<Title text="Second Page" />
				</f:heading>
				<f:snappedContent>
					<Carousel
						height="auto"
						class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
						id="carousel-snapped"
						pageChanged="onPageChanged"
						pageIndicatorPlacement="Top"
						showPageIndicator="{= !${settings>/isDesktop} }"
						pages="{
							path: 'products>/Products'
						}">
						<customLayout>
							<CarouselLayout visiblePagesCount="{settings>/pagesCount}" />
						</customLayout>

						<f:Card class="sapUiTinyMarginTop">
							<f:header>
								<cards:Header
									title="{products>Name}"
									subtitle="{products>Status}"
									iconSrc="{
												path: 'products>ProductPicUrl',
												formatter: '.formatter.url'
											}"
									iconDisplayShape="Square" />
							</f:header>
						</f:Card>
					</Carousel>
				</f:snappedContent>
			</f:DynamicPageTitle>
		</f:title>
		<f:header>
			<f:DynamicPageHeader backgroundDesign="Transparent">
				<Carousel
					height="auto"
					class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
					id="carousel-expanded"
					pageChanged="onPageChanged"
					pageIndicatorPlacement="Top"
					showPageIndicator="{= !${settings>/isDesktop} }"
					pages="{
						path: 'products>/Products'
					}">
					<customLayout>
						<CarouselLayout visiblePagesCount="{settings>/pagesCount}" />
					</customLayout>

					<f:Card class="sapUiTinyMarginTop">
						<f:header>
							<cards:Header
								title="{products>Name}"
								subtitle="{products>Status}"
								iconSrc="{
											path: 'products>ProductPicUrl',
											formatter: '.formatter.url'
										}"
								iconDisplayShape="Square" />
						</f:header>
						<f:content>
							<l:VerticalLayout width="100%">
								<l:BlockLayout>
									<l:BlockLayoutRow>
										<l:BlockLayoutCell>
											<HBox>
												<Label text="Supplier:"/>
											</HBox>
											<HBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
												<Text text="{products>SupplierName}" />
											</HBox>
											<HBox>
												<Label text="Main Category:"/>
											</HBox>
											<HBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
												<Text text="{products>MainCategory}" />
											</HBox>
											<HBox>
												<Label text="Category:"/>
											</HBox>
											<HBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
												<Text text="{products>Category}" />
											</HBox>
										</l:BlockLayoutCell>
										<l:BlockLayoutCell>
											<HBox>
												<Label text="Width (cm)" />
											</HBox>
											<HBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
												<Text text="{products>Width}" />
											</HBox>
											<HBox>
												<Label text="Height (cm)" />
											</HBox>
											<HBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
												<Text text="{products>Height}" />
											</HBox>
											<HBox>
												<Label text="Weight (kg)" />
											</HBox>
											<HBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
												<Text text="{products>WeightMeasure}"/>
											</HBox>
										</l:BlockLayoutCell>
									</l:BlockLayoutRow>
								</l:BlockLayout>
							</l:VerticalLayout>
						</f:content>
					</f:Card>
				</Carousel>
			</f:DynamicPageHeader>
		</f:header>
		<f:content>
			<List id="listItems"
				backgroundDesign="Transparent"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
				items="{
				path: 'products>/Props'
			}" >
				<items>
					<CustomListItem class="sapUiComparisonContent">
						<Panel
							expandable="true"
							expanded="false"
							headerText="{products>key}"
							height="2.75rem"
							expand="onPanelExpanded">
						</Panel>
						<HBox class="sapUiTinyMarginTop"
								alignItems="Start"
								backgroundDesign="Solid"
								items="{
									path: 'products>values', templateShareable : true
								}">
							<items>
								<VBox class="sapUiTinyMarginTopBottom sapUiComparisonItem">
									<layoutData>
										<FlexItemData growFactor="1" baseSize="0" />
									</layoutData>
									<HBox>
										<FormattedText htmlText="{products>text}" />
									</HBox>
									<HBox class="sapUiSmallMarginTop" visible="false">
										<Text text="{products>description}" />
									</HBox>
								</VBox>
							</items>
						</HBox>
					</CustomListItem>
				</items>
			</List>
		</f:content>
	</f:DynamicPage>
</mvc:View>

title: ComplexTest
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		  xmlns="sap.m"
		  xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		  xmlns:smartField="sap.ui.comp.smartfield"
		  xmlns:smartForm="sap.ui.comp.smartform"
		  xmlns:smartFilterBar="sap.ui.comp.smartfilterbar"
		  xmlns:customData="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.CustomData/1"
		  xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
		  xmlns:smartTable="sap.ui.comp.smarttable"
		  xmlns:smartLink="sap.ui.comp.navpopover"
		  xmlns:vm="sap.ui.fl.variants"
		  xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
		  xmlns:sap.ui.layout="sap.ui.layout"
		  xmlns:sap.ui.dt="sap.ui.dt"
		  xmlns:app="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.CustomData/1"
		  controllerName="sap.ui.rta.test.ComplexTest">

	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}" id="mainPage">
		<headerContent>
			<Button text="{i18n>btnAdapt}" visible="{view>/showAdaptButton}" press=".switchToAdaptionMode" />
		</headerContent>
		<content>
			<Panel id="layout0" expandable="true" headerText="Not Adaptable Panel" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin" expanded="true" sap.ui.dt:designtime="not-adaptable-tree">
				<ObjectHeader id="obheader0" title="{CompanyCodeName}" number="{Summary}" numberUnit="{CoCodeCurrency}">
					<attributes>
						<ObjectAttribute id="attribute1" title="{AccountingDocumentTypeName}" text="{AccountingDocument}" active="false"/>
					</attributes>
					<statuses>
						<ObjectStatus id="status1" text="{AccountingDocumentStatus}" state="Error"/>
					</statuses>
					<attributes>
						<ObjectAttribute id="attribute2" title="{OverallDiscount}" text="{OverallDiscountAmount}" active="false"/>
					</attributes>
					<statuses>
						<ObjectStatus id="status2" text="{ExpirationState}" state="Error"/>
					</statuses>
				</ObjectHeader>
				<Text id="headerText1" text="This Layout and Text should not be adaptable" />
				<sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout id="layout01" width="100%">
					<Text id="headerText11" text="This nested Layout and Text should also not be adaptable" />
				</sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout>
			</Panel>

			<Panel id="layout1" expandable="true" headerText="Panel with QUnit Test Area and SimpleForm" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin" expanded="true">
				<VBox>
					<Label text="this VM control is responsible for the SmartForm created by the 'Create/Delete SmartForm' button" />
					<vm:VariantManagement id="variantManagementOrdersTable" for="newForm" />
					<HBox>
						<Button id="smartFormPopoverButton" text="Open Popover" press=".openSmartFormPopover" />
						<Button id="smartFormDialogButton" text="Open Smart Form Dialog" press=".openSmartFormDialog" />
						<Button id="createDeleteButton" text="Create/Delete SmartForm" press=".createOrDeleteContent" />
						<Button id="AnnotationButton" text="Annotation Button" sap.ui.dt:designtime="sap/ui/rta/test/AnnotationTest.designtime" />
					</HBox>
					<Text id="headerTextWithFormatter" text="{path: 'i18n>appTitle', formatter: '.sampleFormatter'}" />
				</VBox>

				<core:Fragment fragmentName="sap.ui.rta.test.fragment.QUnitTestArea" type="XML" />

				<form:SimpleForm title="Another SimpleForm with titles"
						id="SimpleForm1"
						maxContainerCols="3"
						editable="true"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
						labelSpanXL="4"
						labelSpanL="4"
						labelSpanM="4"
						emptySpanXL="0"
						emptySpanL="0"
						emptySpanM="0"
						columnsXL="3"
						columnsL="2"
						columnsM="2"
						class="editableForm">
					<form:content>
						<Label id="Label2" text="ZIP Code/City" />
						<Input id="Input3" value="2345">
							<layoutData>
								<sap.ui.layout:GridData span="L3 M3 S4" />
							</layoutData>
						</Input>
						<Input id="Input4" value="Walldorf" />
						<Label id="Label3" text="State/Country" />
						<Input id="Input31" value="BW" />
						<ComboBox id="ComboBox0"
							items="{
								path: '/CountriesCollection',
								sorter: { path: 'text' }
							}">
							<core:Item key="{key}" text="{text}" />
						</ComboBox>
						<core:Title id="Title1" text="Online" />
						<Label id="Label4" text="Web" />
						<Input id="Input5" value="www.sap.com" />
						<Label id="Label5" text="Twitter" />
						<Input id="Input6" value="@me" />
						<core:Title id="Title2" text="Contact data" />
						<Label id="Label6" text="Email" />
						<Input id="Input7" value="foo@bar.com" type="Email" />
						<Label id="Label7" text="Tel." />
						<Input id="Input8" value="234123423" type="Tel" />
						<Label id="Label8" text="SMS" />
						<Input id="Input9" value="234424333" type="Tel" />
					</form:content>
				</form:SimpleForm>
			</Panel>

			<Panel expandable="true" headerText="Panel with expandable SmartForm" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
				<smartForm:SmartForm id="MainFormExpandable" title="Expandable SmartForm" editable="true" entityType="Header" ignoredFields="TransactionCode" expandable="true" expanded="true">
					<smartForm:Group id="MainFormExpandable.GeneralLedgerDocument" title="General Ledger Document" expandable="true">
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="MainFormExpandable.GeneralLedgerDocument.Name" >
							<smartField:SmartField editable="true" contextEditable="true" value="{AccountingDocument}"/>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="MainFormExpandable.GeneralLedgerDocument.CompanyCode" >
							<smartField:SmartField value="{CompanyCode}"/>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="Ship-to-Adress" id="MainFormExpandable.GeneralLedgerDocument.CompanyAdress" >
							<smartField:SmartField value="{CompanyAdress}">
							</smartField:SmartField>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="MainFormExpandable.GeneralLedgerDocument.TextArea" >
							<TextArea value="{CreatedByUserName}"/>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="MainFormExpandable.GeneralLedgerDocument.Mandatory" >
							<smartField:SmartField value="Some Value" mandatory="true"></smartField:SmartField>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="Hello" id="MainFormExpandable.GeneralLedgerDocument.I18NTest" >
							<smartField:SmartField value="{i18n>groupElementLabelText}">
							</smartField:SmartField>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="SmartLink" id="MainFormExpandable.GeneralLedgerDocument.SmartLink">
							<smartLink:SmartLink id="Smartlink" text="Supplier" fieldName="SupplierId" semanticObject="semanticObjectSupplierId" contactAnnotationPath="to_Supplier" />
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="One-Bound-Field" id="MainFormExpandable.GeneralLedgerDocument.BoundButton" >
							<Button text="{i18n>buttonText}"></Button>
							<TextArea value="{CreatedByUser}"></TextArea>

							<smartField:SmartField value="{RequestedDeliveryDate}" />

					</smartForm:Group>
					<smartForm:Group title="Dates" id="MainFormExpandable.Dates" expandable="true">
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="Not Adaptable" id="Dates.NotAdaptable" sap.ui.dt:designtime="not-adaptable">
							<Text text="My field can't be adapted" id="NotAdaptable" />
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="Not Removable" id="Dates.NotRemovable" sap.ui.dt:designtime="not-removable">
							<Text text="My field can't be added or removed" id="NotRemovable" />
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="No visibility changes (visible)" id="Dates.NoVisibilityChanges1" sap.ui.dt:designtime="not-adaptable-visibility">
							<Text text="My field can't be added or removed" id="NoVisibilityChanges1" />
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="No visibility changes (invisible)" visible="false" id="Dates.NoVisibilityChanges2" sap.ui.dt:designtime="not-adaptable-visibility">
							<Text text="My field can't be added or removed" id="NoVisibilityChanges2" />
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="Two-Bound-Fields" id="MainFormExpandable.GeneralLedgerDocument.BoundButton35" >
							<Button text="{PostingDate}"></Button>
							<TextArea value="{CreationDate}"></TextArea>

						<smartForm:GroupElement label="With/without stable ID" id="Dates.StableIDField">

							<Input value="I have no ID" />

							<smartLink:SmartLink id="SmartlinkInHorizontalLayout" text="Supplier" fieldName="SupplierId" semanticObject="semanticObjectSupplierId" contactAnnotationPath="to_Supplier" />

						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="With custom settings action" id="Dates.customSetting" sap.ui.dt:designtime="sap/ui/rta/test/SubDialogSetting.designtime">
							<Text text="settings action dialog includes another dialog can be opened by selection control. Both dialogs shouldn't be adaptable" id="customSetting.Test" />
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
					</smartForm:Group>
					<smartForm:Group title="Reversal" id="MainFormExpandable.Reversal">

							<smartField:SmartField value="{ReverseDocument}" />
