			<Panel id="smartFilterLayout" expandable="true" headerText="Panel with SmartFilterBar / SmartTable" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
				<Button id="toggleUpdateMode" text="Change to 'LiveMode'" press="toggleUpdateMode"></Button>
				<smartFilterBar:SmartFilterBar id="smartFilterBar" entitySet="LineItems">
					<smartFilterBar:controlConfiguration>
						<smartFilterBar:ControlConfiguration
								key="MyOwnFilterField" index="1" label="Custom Filter Field"
								groupId="_BASIC" width="300px" mandatory="mandatory"
								visibleInAdvancedArea="true">
							<smartFilterBar:customControl>
								<Select id="foo" customData:hasValue="true">
									<core:Item key="1" text="ONE" />
									<core:Item key="2" text="TWO" />
									<core:Item key="3" text="THREE" />
								</Select>
							</smartFilterBar:customControl>
						</smartFilterBar:ControlConfiguration>
					</smartFilterBar:controlConfiguration>
					<!-- layout data used to make the table growing but the filter bar fixed -->
					<smartFilterBar:layoutData>
						<FlexItemData shrinkFactor="0"/>
					</smartFilterBar:layoutData>
				</smartFilterBar:SmartFilterBar>
				<smartTable:SmartTable
						id="smartTable" entitySet="LineItemsSet"
						smartFilterId="smartFilterBar" tableType="Table" enableExport="true"
						useVariantManagement="false" useTablePersonalisation="true" header="Line Items"
						showRowCount="true">
					<smartTable:layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" baseSize="0%" />
					</smartTable:layoutData>
				</smartTable:SmartTable>
			</Panel>

			<Panel expandable="true" headerText="Panel with SmartForm" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
				<smartForm:SmartForm id="SmartForm01" title="Smart Form with standard layout" editable="true" entityType="Header" ignoredFields="TransactionCode">
					<smartForm:Group id="SmartFormGroup01" title="SmartForm Group 01">
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="SmartFormGroup01.CompanyCodeName" >
							<smartField:SmartField editable="true" contextEditable="true" value="{CompanyCodeName}"/>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
					</smartForm:Group>
					<smartForm:Group id="SmartFormGroup02" title="SmartForm Group 02" >
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="SmartFormGroup01.CreationTime" >
							<smartField:SmartField editable="true" contextEditable="true" value="{CreationTime}"/>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="SmartFormGroup01.BoundButton01" label="No-Bound-Field" >
							<Button text="{i18n>buttonText}"></Button>
							<TextArea value="Some Text"></TextArea>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="SmartFormGroup01.UnboundButton" label="No-Bound-Field-1">
							<Button text="No Binding"></Button>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
					</smartForm:Group>
				</smartForm:SmartForm>
			</Panel>

			<Panel expandable="true" headerText="Panel with SmartForm with horizontal layout" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
				<smartForm:SmartForm id="SmartForm02" title="Smart Form with horizontal layout" editable="true" entityType="Header" ignoredFields="TransactionCode">
					<smartForm:layout>
						<smartForm:ColumnLayout columnsM="2" columnsL="3" columnsXL="4"/>
					</smartForm:layout>
					<smartForm:Group id="SmartForm02Group01" title="SmartForm Group 01" >
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="SmartForm02Group01.AccountingDocumentType" >
							<smartField:SmartField editable="true" contextEditable="true" value="{AccountingDocumentType}"/>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
					</smartForm:Group>
					<smartForm:Group id="SmartForm02Group02" title="SmartForm Group 02">
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="SmartForm02Group01.AccountingDocumentStatus" >
							<smartField:SmartField editable="true" contextEditable="true" value="{AccountingDocumentStatus}"/>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
						<smartForm:GroupElement label="Partially visible combined field" id="SmartForm02Group01.PartiallyVisible" >
							<smartField:SmartField value="{AccountingDocumentCategoryName}"/>
							<smartField:SmartField value="{TaxIsCalculatedAutomatically}" visible="false"/>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
					</smartForm:Group>
				</smartForm:SmartForm>
			</Panel>

			<Panel expandable="true" headerText="Smart Form with smartForm:Layout aggregation (gridDataSpan='L1 M1 S1')" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
				<smartForm:SmartForm id="SmartForm03" title="Smart Form with smartForm:Layout aggregation (gridDataSpan='L1 M1 S1')" editable="true" entityType="Header" ignoredFields="TransactionCode">
					<smartForm:layout>
						<smartForm:ColumnLayout columnsM="2" columnsL="3" columnsXL="4"/>
					</smartForm:layout>
					<smartForm:Group id="SmartForm03Group01" title="SmartForm Group 01" >
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="SmartForm03Group01.AlternativeReferenceDocument" >
							<smartField:SmartField editable="true" contextEditable="true" value="{AlternativeReferenceDocument}"/>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
					</smartForm:Group>
					<smartForm:Group id="SmartForm03Group02" title="SmartForm Group 02">
						<smartForm:GroupElement id="SmartForm03Group01.CoCodeCurrency" >
							<smartField:SmartField editable="true" contextEditable="true" value="{CoCodeCurrency}"/>
							<smartField:SmartField editable="true" contextEditable="true" value="{TransactionCurrency}"/>
						</smartForm:GroupElement>
					</smartForm:Group>
				</smartForm:SmartForm>
			</Panel>

			<Panel
					id="tableLayout"
					expandable="true"
					headerText="Panel with Table"
					width="auto"
					class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
				<Table
						id="idProductsTable"
						items="{ProductCollection>/}"
						inset="false">
					<columns>
						<Column
								id="idProductsTable-productColumn"
								width="12em">
							<Text
									id="idProductsTable-productText"
									text="Product" />
						</Column>
						<Column id="idProductsTable-supportColumn">
							<Text
									id="idProductsTable-supportText"
									text="Supplier" />
						</Column>
						<Column	id="idProductsTable-categoryColumn">
							<Text
									id="idProductsTable-categoryText"
									text="Category" />
						</Column>
						<Column	id="idProductsTable-activationColumn">
							<Text
									id="idProductsTable-activationText"
									text="Activation" />
						</Column>
					</columns>
					<items>
						<ColumnListItem id="idProductsTable-tableItem">
							<cells>
								<ObjectIdentifier
										id="idProductsTable-tableItemProductId"
										title="{ProductCollection>Name}"
										text="{ProductCollection>ProductId}"/>
								<Text
										id="idProductsTable-tableText"
										text="{ProductCollection>SupplierName}" />
								<sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout id="idProductsTable-columnLayout">
									<Text
											id="LayoutText01"
											text="{ProductCollection>MainCategory}" />
									<sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout id="idProductsTable-columnLayout02">
										<Text
												id="idProductsTable-layoutText02"
												text="{ProductCollection>Category}" />
										<Text
												id="idProductsTable-layoutText03"
												text="{ProductCollection>Status}" />
									</sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout>
								</sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout>
								<Select
										id="idProductsTable-tableSelect"
										items= "{ path: 'ProductCollection>Active', templateShareable: false}" >
									<core:Item
											id="idProductsTable-tableSelectItem"
											key="{ProductCollection>key}"
											text="{ProductCollection>text}" />
								</Select>
							</cells>
						</ColumnListItem>
					</items>
				</Table>
			</Panel>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m" controllerName="sap.ui.fl.support.apps.contentbrowser.controller.ContentDetails"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form">
	<Page
		title="{path: 'selectedContent>/', formatter: '.oDataUtils.formatItemTitle'}">
		<IconTabBar id="contentDetailsIconTabBar">
			<items>
				<IconTabFilter
					icon="sap-icon://attachment"
					text="{i18n>content}">
					<f:SimpleForm
						maxContainerCols="1"
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
						labelSpanL="12"
						labelSpanM="12"
						columnsL="1"
						columnsM="1">
						<Text class="codeBlock" text="{selectedContent>/data}" />
					</f:SimpleForm>
				</IconTabFilter>
				<IconTabFilter
					icon="sap-icon://hint"
					count="{selectedContent>/metadata/length}"
					text="{i18n>metadata}">
					<List
						items="{
							path: 'selectedContent>/metadata',
							sorter: {
								path: 'selectedContent>category',
								descending: true,
								group: true
							},
							groupHeaderFactory: '.oDataUtils.getGroupHeader'}" >
						<items>
							<DisplayListItem
								label="{selectedContent>name}"
								value="{selectedContent>value}" />
						</items>
					</List>
				</IconTabFilter>
			</items>
		</IconTabBar>
		<footer>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Button text="{i18n>edit}" press=".onEditClicked" />
				<Button text="{i18n>delete}" press=".onDeleteClicked" />
				<CheckBox id="activeVersionCheckBox" text="{i18n>onActiveVersion}" valueState="Warning" visible="false"/>
			</Toolbar>
		</footer>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		  xmlns="sap.m" controllerName="sap.ui.fl.support.apps.contentbrowser.controller.ContentDetailsEdit"

title: ContextVisibility
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.fl.variants.context.controller.ContextVisibility"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	displayBlock="true"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Panel id="visibilityPanel">
		<headerToolbar>
			<Toolbar id="visibilityToolbar">
				<Label id="visibilityToolbarLabel" labelFor="visibilityRadioButtonGroup" text="{i18n>RADIO_BUTTON_GROUP_LABEL}" design="Bold"  />
			</Toolbar>
		</headerToolbar>
		<content>
			<MessageStrip
				id="visibilityMessageStrip"
				text="{i18n>VISIBILITY}"
				visible="{parts: [{path: 'selectedContexts>/selected'}, {path: 'selectedContexts>/showMessageStrip'} ], formatter: '.isMessageStripVisible'}"
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true"/>
			<List
				id="selectedContextsList"
				noDataText="{selectedContexts>/noDataText}"
				mode="Delete"
				delete=".onDeleteContext"
				growing="true"
				items="{selectedContexts>/selected}">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar style="Clear" id="restrictedToolbar">
						<Label labelFor="selectedContextsList" text="{i18n>SELECTED_CONTEXT_LIST_TITLE}" design="Bold" wrapping="true"/>
						<ToolbarSpacer />
						<Button id="removeAllButton" text="{i18n>REMOVE_ALL_BUTTON}" press=".removeAll" enabled="{path: 'selectedContexts>/selected', formatter: '.isRemoveAllEnabled'}"/>
						<Button id="addContextsButton" ariaHasPopup="Dialog" text="{i18n>ADD_CONTEXTS_BUTTON}" press=".onAddContextsHandler"/>
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<StandardListItem
					title="{selectedContexts>id}"
					tooltip="{path: 'selectedContexts>description', formatter: '.formatTooltip'}"/>
			</List>
		</content>
	</Panel>
</mvc:View>

title: ControlsMaster
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.ControlsMaster"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		class="sapContrast sapContrastPlus">
	<Page
			id="exploredMasterPage"
			showFooter="false"
			navButtonPress="onNavBack"
			showNavButton="false"
			class="sapUiDocumentationMasterPage">

		<!-- Header -->
		<customHeader>
			<Toolbar width="100%">
				<SearchField id="searchField" placeholder="{i18n>CONTROLS_MASTER_FILTER_PLACERHOLDER}" liveChange="handleListFilter" class="sapUiDocumentationFilterField" />
				<Button id="listFilterSettings" icon="sap-icon://filter" press="handleListSettings" tooltip="{i18n>CONTROLS_MASTER_FILTER_BTN_TOOLTIP}"/>
			</Toolbar>
		</customHeader>

		<!-- Navigation List -->
		<content>
			<l:FixFlex id="treeContainer" fixFirst="false" minFlexSize="100">
				<l:flexContent>
					<List id="exploredMasterList"
							mode="{viewModel>/listMode}"
							selectionChange="onNavToEntity"
							noDataText="{i18n>CONTROLS_MASTER_NO_DATA_TEXT}"
							items="{path: '/entities',
							groupHeaderFactory: '.getGroupHeader',
							sorter: [{
								path: 'category',
								descending: false,
								group: true
							},{
								path: 'name',
								descending: false
							}]}">
						<infoToolbar>
							<Toolbar id="vsFilterBar"
									active="true"
									visible="false"
									press="handleListSettings">
								<Label id="vsFilterLabel" />
							</Toolbar>
						</infoToolbar>
						<items>
							<StandardListItem
									title="{name}"
									counter="{sampleCount}"
									type="{viewModel>/listItemType}"
									press="onNavToEntity" />
						</items>
					</List>
				</l:flexContent>
				<l:fixContent>
					<core:Fragment fragmentName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.view.FooterMaster" type="XML" />
				</l:fixContent>
			</l:FixFlex>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: CsrfToken
code:
<mvc:View xmlns="sap.m"
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.CsrfToken"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Title text="CSRF Tokens"/>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>
		<IconTabBar >
			<items>
				<IconTabFilter text="General" key="general">
					<f:GridContainer>
						<w:Card id="card1" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/cardManifest.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card id="card2" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/cardManifestTokenPath.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card id="card3" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/cardManifestExpiringToken.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card id="card4" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/cardManifestParams.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card id="card5" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/cardManifestWrongToken.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card id="card6" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/cardManifestExpiredToken.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
					</f:GridContainer>
				</IconTabFilter>
				<IconTabFilter text="Sharing a Token" key="sharingToken">
					<Button text="Mark shared token as expired" press="markSharedTokenAsExpired"></Button>
					<Button text="Refresh All Cards" press="refreshAllCards"></Button>
					<f:GridContainer >
						<w:Card id="reusedTokenCard1" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/sharingToken/cardManifest.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card id="reusedTokenCard2" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/sharingToken/cardManifest.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card id="reusedTokenCard3" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/sharingToken/cardManifestWithExtension.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card id="reusedTokenCard4" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/sharingToken/cardManifestWithExtension2.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
					</f:GridContainer>
				</IconTabFilter>
				<IconTabFilter text="Deprecated Features" key="deprecatedFeatures">
					<f:GridContainer>
						<w:Card id="deprecatedHostFeat1" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/deprecated/cardManifestHost.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card id="deprecatedHostFeat2" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/csrfTokens/deprecated/cardManifestHostInvalidTokenURL.json">
							<w:layoutData>

	controllerName="sap.ui.layout.sample.CSSGrid.CSSGridPageLayout"

	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"

	<Slider

		class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
	<Panel
		id="gridLayout"
		width="100%"
		height="100%">
		<headerToolbar>
			<OverflowToolbar height="3rem">
				<Title text=" CssGrid Layout example"/>
			</OverflowToolbar>
		</headerToolbar>
		<grid:CSSGrid
			id="grid1"
			gridTemplateColumns="1fr 2fr 1fr"
			gridTemplateRows="50px 200px 50px"
			gridGap="1rem">
			<core:HTML content='<header class="stylePageLayout">Header</header>'>
				<core:layoutData>
					<grid:GridItemLayoutData gridColumn="1 / 4"/>
				</core:layoutData>
			</core:HTML>
			<core:HTML content='<aside  class="stylePageLayout">Navigation</aside >' />
			<core:HTML content='<article class="stylePageLayout">Main Content</article>' />
			<core:HTML content='<aside class="stylePageLayout">Related Links</article>' />
			<core:HTML content='<footer class="stylePageLayout">Footer</footer>'>
				<core:layoutData>
					<grid:GridItemLayoutData gridColumn="1 / 4"/>
				</core:layoutData>
			</core:HTML>
		</grid:CSSGrid>
	</Panel>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.DataMode"

	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"

	<Page title="List Card with Active/Inactive data mode">
		<HBox class="sapUiSmallMargin sapUiSizeCompact">
			<VBox>
				<Label text="Data Mode:" vAlign="Middle" />
				<SegmentedButton
					width="12rem"
					selectionChange=".onSelectionChange"
					selectedKey="Inactive">
					<items>
						<SegmentedButtonItem key="Active" text="Active" />
						<SegmentedButtonItem key="Inactive" text="Inactive" />
					</items>
				</SegmentedButton>
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="sapUiLargeMarginBegin">
				<Label text="Update Interval" />
				<Input
					submit=".onSubmit"
					width="8rem"

				press=".onTryToRefresh"

title: Date
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.core.sample.odata.types.v4.Date.Date"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	core:require="{
		DateIntervalType: 'sap/ui/model/type/DateInterval',
		DateType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Date',
		StringType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/String'
	}">
	<App>
	<Page id="page" floatingFooter="true" showHeader="false"
		title="Example how to use OData V4 Edm.Date in SAPUI5 applications">
	<VBox width="100%">
		<form:SimpleForm class="sapUiResponsiveMargin" columnsL="1" columnsM="1" editable="true"
				labelSpanL="3" labelSpanM="3" layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
				title="How to use OData V4 Edm.Date type with SAPUI5 controls" width="auto">
			<form:content>
				<FormattedText htmlText="{json>/Description}" width="100%" />
				<Label text="sap.m.Text" />
				<!-- OData V4 determines the data types automatically if no type is given -->
				<Text text="{Date}" />
				<Label text="sap.m.Input" />
				<Input value="{Date}" />
				<Label text="sap.m.DatePicker" />
				<DatePicker value="{Date}" />
				<Label text="sap.m.DateRangeSelection" />
				<DateRangeSelection value="{
						formatOptions: {UTC: true},
						parts: ['Date', 'EndDate'],
						type: 'DateIntervalType'
					}" />
				<Button text="Use JSON Model with sap.ui.model.odata.type.Date Type"
					press=".onDialogOpen">
					<layoutData>
						<layout:GridData indent="XL3 L3 M3 S0" linebreak="true"
							span="XL6 L6 M6 S12"/>
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
			</form:content>
		</form:SimpleForm>
		<form:SimpleForm class="sapUiResponsiveMargin" columnsL="1" columnsM="1" editable="false"
				labelSpanL="3" labelSpanM="3" layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" title="Model values"
				width="auto">
			<form:content>
				<Label text="OData Model Value 'Date'" />
				<Text text="{
						path: 'Date',
						formatter: '.formatDate',
						type: 'StringType'
					}" />
				<Label text="'Date' Value as URI Parameter Value" />
				<Text text="{
						path: 'Date',
						formatter: '.formatDateAsURIParameter',
						type: 'StringType'
					}" />
				<Label text="OData Model Value 'EndDate'" />
				<Text text="{
						path: 'EndDate',
						formatter: '.formatDate',
						type: 'StringType'
					}" />
				<Label text="JSON Model Value '/Date'" />
				<Text text="{path: 'json>/Date', formatter: '.formatDate'}" />
				<Label text="JSON Model Value '/EndDate" />
				<Text text="{path: 'json>/EndDate', formatter: '.formatDate'}" />
				<Label text="Current Time Zone" />
				<Text text="{path: 'json>/Timezone', formatter: '.formatTimezone'}" />
			</form:content>
		</form:SimpleForm>
		<dependents>
			<Dialog contentWidth="50em" id="dialog"
				title="Use JSON Model with sap.ui.model.odata.type.Date Type">
				<buttons>
					<Button press=".onDialogTakeValues" text="OK"
						tooltip="Transfer the values to the OData Model" />
					<Button press=".onDialogClose" text="Close" />
				</buttons>
				<form:SimpleForm columnsL="1" columnsM="1" editable="true"
					labelSpanL="4" labelSpanM="4" layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
					<Label text="sap.m.Text" />
					<Text text="{path: 'json>Date', type: 'DateType'}" />
					<Label text="sap.m.Input" />
					<Input value="{path: 'json>Date', type: 'DateType'}" />
					<Label text="sap.m.DatePicker" />
					<DatePicker value="{
							path: 'json>Date',
							type: 'DateType'
						}" />
					<Label text="sap.m.DateRangeSelection" />
					<DateRangeSelection value="{
							formatOptions: {UTC: true},
							parts: [{
								path: 'json>Date',
								type: 'DateType'
							}, {
								path: 'json>EndDate',
								type: 'DateType'
							}],
							type: 'DateIntervalType'
						}" />
				</form:SimpleForm>
			</Dialog>
		</dependents>
	</VBox>
	</Page>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

title: DateFormat
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	displayBlock="true"
	core:require="{
		LocaleType: 'local/LocaleType',
		DateTimeType: 'sap/ui/model/type/DateTime',
		StringType: 'sap/ui/model/type/String'
	}">
	<App autoFocus="false">
		<Page title="DateFormat" enableScrolling="false">
			<HBox fitContainer="true">
				<ScrollContainer width="100%" height="100%" horizontal="false" vertical="true">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData baseSize="100%" />
					</layoutData>
					<content>
						<form:SimpleForm layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" columnsL="1" width="100%" editable="true">
							<core:Title text="Output" />
							<Label text="" />
							<Input class="large" change=".genericParse"
								value="{
									parts: ['/date', '/todate', '/type', '/formatOptions', '/locale', '/timezone'],
									formatter: '.genericFormat'
								}" />
							<core:Title text="Input" />
							<Label text="Format Options" />
							<TextArea id="formatOptions" class="large" rows="6" liveChange=".onFormatOptionChange" />
							<Label text="Type" />
							<Select selectedKey="{/type}" change=".onTypeChange">
								<core:Item key="Date" text="Date" />
								<core:Item key="Time" text="Time" />
								<core:Item key="DateTime" text="DateTime" />
								<core:Item key="DateTimeWithTimezone" text="DateTimeWithTimezone" />
							</Select>
							<Label text="Sample" />
							<Select selectedKey="{/sample}" items="{/samples}" change=".onSampleChange">
								<core:Item key="{key}" text="{text}" />
							</Select>
							<Label text="Local Date/Time" />
							<Input class="large largeinput"
								value="{
										path: '/date',
										type: 'DateTimeType',
										formatOptions: {
											calendarType: 'Gregorian',
											pattern: 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'
										}
									}" />
							<Label text="Timezone" visible="{= ${/type} === 'DateTimeWithTimezone'}" />
							<Input class="large largeinput" showSuggestion="true"
								value="{path: '/timezone', type: 'StringType'}"
								suggestionItems="{/timezonesSuggestions}"
								visible="{= ${/type} === 'DateTimeWithTimezone'}" >
								<suggestionItems>
									<core:ListItem additionalText="{diff}" text="{name}" />
								</suggestionItems>
							</Input>
							<Label text="To Date/Time" visible="{= ${/formatOptions}.interval === true}" />
							<Input class="large largeinput" visible="{= ${/formatOptions}.interval === true}"
								value="{
									path: '/todate',
									type: 'DateTimeType',
									formatOptions: {calendarType: 'Gregorian', pattern: 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'}
								}" />
							<Label text="Locale" />
							<Input class="large largeinput" showSuggestion="true" change=".onLocaleChange"
								suggestionItems="{/localesSuggestions}" value= "{path: '/locale', type: 'LocaleType'}">
								<suggestionItems>
									<SuggestionItem icon="{path:'name', formatter: '.formatLocaleIcon'}"
										text="{name}" />
								</suggestionItems>
							</Input>
						</form:SimpleForm>
					</content>
				</ScrollContainer>
				<ScrollContainer width="400px" height="100%" horizontal="false" vertical="true">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData baseSize="400px" />
					</layoutData>
					<content>
						<List items="{/locales}">
							<LocaleListItem xmlns="local" locale="{}"
								text="{
									parts: ['/date', '/todate', '/formatOptions', '/type', '', '/timezone'],
									formatter: '.formatLocaleText'
								}"/>
						</List>
					</content>
				</ScrollContainer>
			</HBox>
		</Page>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
		<MessageStrip
		text="Deprecated since version 1.32.8. Instead, dedicated sap.m.DatePicker, sap.m.TimePicker or sap.m.DateTimePicker controls should be used."
		type="Warning"
		class="sapUiSmallMarginTop sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
		showIcon="true" />
		<Label text="Date" labelFor="DTI1"/>
		<DateTimeInput
			id="DTI1"
			type="Date"
			placeholder="Enter Date"
			class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
		<Label text="Time" labelFor="DTI2"/>
		<DateTimeInput
			id="DTI2"
			type="Time"
			placeholder="Enter Time"
			class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
		<Label text="Date & Time" labelFor="DTI3"/>

		<DateTimePicker

title: DateTimeOffset
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.core.sample.odata.types.v4.DateTimeOffset.DateTimeOffset"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	core:require="{
		DateTimeOffsetType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/DateTimeOffset',
		DateTimeWithTimezoneType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/DateTimeWithTimezone',
		StringType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/String'
	}">
	<App>
	<Page id="page" floatingFooter="true" showHeader="false"
		title="Example how to use OData V4 Edm.DateTimeOffset in SAPUI5 applications">
	<VBox width="100%">
		<form:SimpleForm class="sapUiResponsiveMargin" columnsL="1" columnsM="1" editable="true"
				labelSpanL="3" labelSpanM="3" layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
				title="How to use OData V4 Edm.DateTimeOffset type with SAPUI5 controls" width="auto">
			<form:content>
				<FormattedText htmlText="{json>/Description}" width="100%" />
				<Label text="sap.m.Text" />
				<!-- OData V4 determines the data types automatically if no type is given -->
				<Text text="{Timestamp}" />
				<Label text="sap.m.Input" />
				<Input value="{Timestamp}" />
				<Label text="sap.m.DateTimePicker" />
				<DateTimePicker value="{Timestamp}" />
				<Button text="Use JSON Model with sap.ui.model.odata.type.DateTimeOffset Type"
					press=".onDialogOpen">
					<layoutData>
						<layout:GridData indent="XL3 L3 M3 S0" linebreak="true"
							span="XL6 L6 M6 S12"/>
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
			</form:content>
		</form:SimpleForm>
		<form:SimpleForm class="sapUiResponsiveMargin" columnsL="1" columnsM="1" editable="false"
				labelSpanL="3" labelSpanM="3" layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" title="Model values"
				width="auto">
			<form:content>
				<Label text="OData Model Value 'Timestamp'" />
				<Text text="{
						path: 'Timestamp',
						formatter: '.formatTimestamp',
						type: 'StringType'
					}" />
				<Label text="'Timestamp' in Current Time Zone" />
				<Text text="{
						parts: ['Timestamp', {value: null}],
						type: 'DateTimeWithTimezoneType'
					}" />
				<Label text="'Timestamp' Value as URI Parameter Value" />
				<Text text="{
						path: 'Timestamp',
						formatter: '.formatTimestampAsURIParameter',
						type: 'StringType'
					}" />
				<Label text="JSON Model Value '/Timestamp'" />
				<Text text="{path: 'json>/Timestamp', formatter: '.formatTimestamp'}" />
				<Label text="Current Time Zone" />
				<Text text="{path: 'json>/Timezone', formatter: '.formatTimezone'}" />
			</form:content>
		</form:SimpleForm>
		<dependents>
			<Dialog contentWidth="50em" id="dialog"
				title="Use JSON Model with sap.ui.model.odata.type.DateTimeOffset Type">
				<buttons>
					<Button press=".onDialogTakeValues" text="OK"
						tooltip="Transfer the values to the OData Model" />
					<Button press=".onDialogClose" text="Close" />
				</buttons>
				<form:SimpleForm columnsL="1" columnsM="1" editable="true"
					labelSpanL="4" labelSpanM="4" layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
					<Label text="sap.m.Text" />
					<Text text="{
							constraints: {V4: true},
							path: 'json>Timestamp',
							type: 'DateTimeOffsetType'
						}" />
					<Label text="sap.m.Input" />
					<Input value="{
							constraints: {V4: true},
							path: 'json>Timestamp',
							type: 'DateTimeOffsetType'
						}" />
					<Label text="sap.m.DateTimePicker" />
					<DateTimePicker value="{
							constraints: {V4: true},
							path: 'json>Timestamp',
							type: 'DateTimeOffsetType'
						}" />
				</form:SimpleForm>
			</Dialog>
		</dependents>
	</VBox>
	</Page>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.DelayedLoading"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	displayBlock="true">

	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">

		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
				<Title text="Loading behavior with Grid Container"/>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>

		<content>
			<form:SimpleForm editable="true" width="40rem" layout="ColumnLayout">
				<core:Title text="Cards loading will take random time in the given interval." />
				<Label text="Minimum loading time" />
				<Input id="loadingMinSeconds" width="8rem" type="Number" description="seconds" />
				<Label text="Maximum loading time" />
				<Input id="loadingMaxSeconds" width="8rem" type="Number" description="seconds" />
				<Label text="Preload manifests" />
				<CheckBox id="preloadManifests" selected="true" />
				<Label text="Number of cards" />
				<Input id="numberOfCards" width="4rem" type="Number" value="{/numberOfCards}" />
				<Label text="Delay Loading Placeholder" />
				<CheckBox id="delayLoading"></CheckBox>
				<Label text="dataMode to 'Active'"/>
				<CheckBox id="dataMode"></CheckBox>
				<Button text="Start loading" type="Emphasized" press=".onFormSubmit" />
			</form:SimpleForm>

			<f:GridContainer id="cardsContainer" class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			</f:GridContainer>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: DemoApps
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.DemoApps"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:card="sap.f.cards"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:custom="sap.ui.documentation"
	displayBlock="true"
	height="100%">

	<ScrollContainer
		class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsPage"
		id="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsPage"
		vertical="true"
		horizontal="false"
		width="100%"
		height="100%">

		<VBox class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsIntroCardSpacing">
			<f:Card class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsIntroCard">
				<f:header>
					<card:Header
						title="{i18n>DEMO_APPS_TITLE}"
						subtitle="{= ${versionData>/isOpenUI5}
							? ${i18n>DEMO_APPS_SUBTITLE_OPENUI5}
							: ${i18n>DEMO_APPS_SUBTITLE_SAPUI5} }"
						subtitleMaxLines="5" />
				</f:header>
				<f:content>
					<Button text="{i18n>DEMO_APPS_READ_MORE_BTN}" press=".onReadMoreButtonPress" />
				</f:content>
			</f:Card>
		</VBox>

		<grid:CSSGrid class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsLayoutSpacing">
			<!-- Page Content Ratio Config -->
			<grid:customLayout>
				<grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
					<grid:layout>
						<grid:GridSettings gridTemplateColumns="1fr" gridColumnGap="1rem" />
					</grid:layout>
					<grid:layoutL>
						<grid:GridSettings gridTemplateColumns="2fr 1fr" gridColumnGap="1rem" />
					</grid:layoutL>
					<grid:layoutXL>
						<grid:GridSettings gridTemplateColumns="3fr 1fr" gridColumnGap="1rem" />
					</grid:layoutXL>
				</grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
			</grid:customLayout>

			<grid:items>
				<!-- Main -->
				<grid:CSSGrid id="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsMain" class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsMain"
					items="{/demoAppsByCategory}">
					<grid:customLayout>
						<grid:GridBasicLayout gridRowGap="3rem" />
					</grid:customLayout>

					<grid:CSSGrid>
						<grid:customLayout>
							<grid:GridBasicLayout gridRowGap="1rem" />
						</grid:customLayout>

						<grid:customData>
							<core:CustomData
								key="demoAppsCategoryClass"
								value="{
									path: 'categoryId',
									formatter: '.formatter.getDemoAppsCategoryClass' }" />
						</grid:customData>

						<Title
							class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsCategoryTitle"
							text="{ path: 'categoryId', formatter: '.formatter.getDemoAppsCategoryTitle' }"
							level="H3"
							titleStyle="{= ${device>/system/phone} ? 'H4' : 'H3' }"
							wrapping="true" />

						<grid:CSSGrid items="{ path: 'rows', templateShareable: false }">
							<grid:customLayout>
								<grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
									<grid:layoutS>
										<grid:GridSettings
											gridTemplateColumns="1fr"
											gridAutoRows="minmax(15rem, auto)"
											gridGap="1rem" />
									</grid:layoutS>
									<grid:layout>
										<grid:GridSettings
											gridTemplateColumns="repeat(2, 1fr)"
											gridAutoRows="minmax(15rem, auto)"
											gridGap="1rem" />
									</grid:layout>
									<grid:layoutXL>
										<grid:GridSettings
											gridTemplateColumns="repeat(3, 1fr)"
											gridAutoRows="minmax(15rem, auto)"
											gridGap="1rem" />
									</grid:layoutXL>
								</grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
							</grid:customLayout>

							<f:Card class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsRegularCard">
								<f:header>
									<card:Header title="{name}" iconSrc="{= 'sap-icon://' + ${icon} }" />
								</f:header>
								<f:content>
									<VBox class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsCardContentSpacing" wrap="Wrap">
										<Text class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" text="{desc}" >
											<layoutData>
												<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
											</layoutData>
										</Text>
										<VBox
											class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom"
											items="{ path: 'links', templateShareable: false }"
											visible="{= !!${links}.length }"
											wrap="Wrap">
											<Link
												href="{ path: 'ref', formatter: '.formatter.crossLink' }"
												target="_blank"
												text="{name}"
												wrapping="true" />
										</VBox>
										<HBox wrap="Wrap">
											<Link
												class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsCardLink"
												href="{ref}"
												target="_blank"
												text="{i18n>DEMO_APPS_CARD_LINK}"
												wrapping="true" />
										</HBox>
											<customData>
												<core:CustomData key="config" value="{config}" />
												<core:CustomData key="label" value="{name}" />
											</customData>

											<Link
											class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsCardDownloadLink"
											text="{i18n>DEMO_APPS_CARD_DOWNLOAD_LINK}"
											press=".onDownloadPress"
											visible="{= !!${config} }"
											wrapping="true"  />
									</VBox>
								</f:content>
							</f:Card>
						</grid:CSSGrid>
					</grid:CSSGrid>

				</grid:CSSGrid> <!-- Main Container End-->

				<!-- Aside -->
				<grid:CSSGrid id="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsAside" class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsAside">
					<VBox class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsAsideDesktop" wrap="Wrap">
						<f:Card class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsAsideCard">
							<f:header>
								<card:Header title="{i18n>DEMO_APPS_DOWNLOAD_OVERVIEW}" />
							</f:header>
							<f:content>
								<List items="{/demoApps}" showSeparators="None">
									<InputListItem visible="{= !!${config} }" label="{name}">
										<customData>
											<core:CustomData key="config" value="{config}" />
										</customData>
										<Button class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsCardDownloadButton"
											type="Transparent" icon="sap-icon://download" press=".onDownloadPress" />
									</InputListItem>
								</List>
							</f:content>
						</f:Card>
					</VBox>

					<VBox class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsAsideMobile" wrap="Wrap">
						<Panel class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsAsidePanel" expandable="true" headerText="{i18n>DEMO_APPS_DOWNLOAD_OVERVIEW}">
							<List items="{/demoApps}" showSeparators="None">
								<InputListItem visible="{= !!${config} }" label="{name}">
									<customData>
										<core:CustomData key="config" value="{config}" />
									</customData>
									<Button class="sapUiDemoKitDemoAppsCardDownloadButton"
										type="Transparent" icon="sap-icon://download" press=".onDownloadPress" />
								</InputListItem>
							</List>
						</Panel>
					</VBox>
				</grid:CSSGrid> <!-- Aside Container End-->

			</grid:items>
		</grid:CSSGrid>

		<core:Fragment fragmentName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.view.Footer" type="XML" />
	</ScrollContainer>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View displayBlock="true" controllerName="sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayoutWithFullscreenPage.controller.DetailDetailDetail" height="100%"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.f"
		xmlns:m="sap.m">

	<DynamicPage toggleHeaderOnTitleClick="false">
		<title>
			<DynamicPageTitle>
				<heading>
					<m:FlexBox wrap="Wrap" fitContainer="true" alignItems="Center">
						<m:Title text="{products>text}" wrapping="true" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd"/>
					</m:FlexBox>
				</heading>

				<navigationActions>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton type="Transparent" icon="sap-icon://full-screen" press="handleFullScreen" id="enterFullScreenBtn" tooltip="Enter Full Screen Mode" visible="{= ${/actionButtonsInfo/endColumn/fullScreen} !== null }"/>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton type="Transparent" icon="sap-icon://exit-full-screen" press="handleExitFullScreen" id="exitFullScreenBtn" tooltip="Exit Full Screen Mode" visible="{= ${/actionButtonsInfo/endColumn/exitFullScreen} !== null }"/>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton type="Transparent" icon="sap-icon://decline" press="handleClose"  tooltip="Close end column" visible="{= ${/actionButtonsInfo/endColumn/closeColumn} !== null }"/>
				</navigationActions>

			</DynamicPageTitle>
		</title>
		<content>
			<m:Text text="Information about Supplier" />
		</content>
	</DynamicPage>
</mvc:View>

title: DetailSettings

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.demo.toolpageapp.controller.settings.MasterSettings"
	xmlns="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<m:Page
		showHeader="{device>/system/phone}"
		showNavButton="{device>/system/phone}"
		navButtonPress=".onNavButtonPress">
		<m:landmarkInfo>
			<m:PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo
				rootRole="Region"
				rootLabel="{i18n>SystemSettings_rootLabel}"
				contentRole="Main"
				contentLabel="{i18n>SystemSettings_contentLabel}"/>
		</m:landmarkInfo>
		<ObjectPageLayout id="objectPageLayout">
			<headerTitle>
				<ObjectPageHeader
					objectTitle="{i18n>systemSettingsTitle}"
					objectSubtitle="{i18n>systemSettingsDescriptionTitle}">
					<actions>
						<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton
							id="save"
							text="{i18n>save}"
							hideText="false"
							press=".onSavePressed"
							type="Emphasized"/>
						<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton
							id="cancel"
							text="{i18n>cancel}"
							press=".onCancelPressed"
							hideText="false"/>
					</actions>
				</ObjectPageHeader>
			</headerTitle>
			<headerContent>
				<m:MessageStrip
					text="{
						parts: [
							'i18n>systemSettingsLastLoginTitle',
							'view>/currentUser',
							'view>/lastLogin'
						],
						formatter: '.formatter.formatMessage'
					}"
					type="Information"
					showIcon="true">
				</m:MessageStrip>
			</headerContent>
			<sections>
				<ObjectPageSection>
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection
						id="shopOwnerId"
						title="{i18n>shopOwnerTitle}">
						<blocks>
							<ObjectPageLazyLoader
								id="shopOwnerLazyLoader">
								<f:SimpleForm
									title="{i18n>editOwnerDetailTitle}"
									columnsL="2"
									columnsM="2"
									editable="true"
									layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
									<f:content>
										<core:Title text="{i18n>ownerAddress}"/>
											<m:Label
												text="{i18n>ownerFirstName}"
												labelFor="firstNameInput"/>
											<m:Input
												id="firstNameInput"
												type="Text"
												width="100%"
												value="John"/>
											<m:Label
												labelFor="lastNameInput"
												text="{i18n>ownerLastName}"/>
											<m:Input
												id="lastNameInput"
												type="Text"
												width="100%"
												value="Doe"/>
											<m:Label
												labelFor="addressStreetInput"
												text="{i18n>ownerStreet}"/>
											<m:Input
												id="addressStreetInput"
												type="Text"
												width="100%"
												value="Midtown Street 23"/>
											<m:Label
												labelFor="addressTownInput"
												text="{i18n>ownerZipCode}"/>
											<m:Input
												id="addressTownInput"
												type="Text"
												width="100%"
												value="12345 Newport"/>
											<m:Label
												labelFor="addressCountryInput"
												text="{i18n>ownerCountry}"/>
											<m:Input
												id="addressCountryInput"
												type="Text"
												width="100%"
												value="England"/>
										<core:Title text="{i18n>ownerContact}" />
											<m:Label
												labelFor="phoneNumberInput"
												text="{i18n>ownerMobile}"/>
											<m:Input
												id="phoneNumberInput"
												type="Tel"
												width="100%"
												value="+1 234 / 56789"/>
											<m:Label
												labelFor="faxNumberInput"
												text="{i18n>ownerFax}"/>
											<m:Input
												id="faxNumberInput"
												type="Tel"
												width="100%"
												value="+1 987 / 654321"/>
											<m:Label
												labelFor="emailInput"
												text="{i18n>mail}"/>
											<m:Input
												id="emailInput"
												type="Email"
												width="100%"
												value="john.doe@myshop.com"/>
									</f:content>
								</f:SimpleForm>
							</ObjectPageLazyLoader>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
				</ObjectPageSection>
				<ObjectPageSection>
					<subSections>
						<ObjectPageSubSection
							id="shopConfigurationId"
							title="{i18n>shopConfigurationTitle}">
							<blocks>
								<ObjectPageLazyLoader
									id="shopConfigurationLazyLoader">
									<f:SimpleForm
										title="{i18n>editSystemConfigurationTitle}"
										columnsL="2"
										columnsM="2"
										editable="true"
										layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" >
										<f:content>
											<core:Title text="{i18n>storeSettings}" />
												<m:Label
													labelFor="storeNameInput"
													text="{i18n>storeName}"/>
												<m:Input
													id="storeNameInput"
													type="Text"
													width="100%"
													value="My Shop"/>
												<m:Label
													labelFor="storeDefaultLanguageInput"
													text="{i18n>storeDefaultLanguage}"/>
												<m:Input
													id="storeDefaultLanguageInput"
													type="Text"
													width="100%"
													value="English"/>
												<m:Label
													labelFor="storeCodeInput"
													text="{i18n>storeCode}"/>
												<m:Input
													id="storeCodeInput"
													type="Text"
													width="100%"
													value="R2D2-C3P0"/>
											<core:Title text="{i18n>StoreContact}" />
												<m:Label
													labelFor="storeWebsiteInput"
													text="{i18n>storeWebSite}"/>
												<m:Input
													id="storeWebsiteInput"
													type="Url"
													width="100%"
													value="http://www.myshop.com"/>
												<m:Label
													labelFor="storePhoneNumberInput"
													text="{i18n>storePhone}"/>
												<m:Input
													type="Tel"
													id="storePhoneNumberInput"
													width="100%"
													value="+1 2345/6789"/>
												<m:Label
													labelFor="storeMailInput"
													text="{i18n>mail}"/>
												<m:Input
													type="Email"
													id="storeMailInput"
													width="100%"
													value="info@myshop.com"/>
										</f:content>
									</f:SimpleForm>
								</ObjectPageLazyLoader>
							</blocks>
						</ObjectPageSubSection>
					</subSections>
				</ObjectPageSection>
			</sections>
		</ObjectPageLayout>
	</m:Page>
</mvc:View>

title: Dnd3
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:dnd="sap.ui.core.dnd"
	xmlns:fdnd="sap.f.dnd"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:card="sap.f.cards"
	displayBlock="true"
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.Dnd3">

	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">

		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
				<Title text="Using drag and drop with sap.f.GridContainer, Example 3"/>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>

		<content>

			<Panel headerText="Tiles Group 1">
				<f:GridContainer id="grid1" items="{
						path: '/',
						key: 'uniqueKey',
						factory: '.createItem'
					}">
				</f:GridContainer>
			</Panel>

			<Panel headerText="Tiles Group 2 (Empty)">
				<f:GridContainer id="gridEmpty" items="{
					path: '/',
					key: 'uniqueKey',
					factory: '.createItem'
				}">
				</f:GridContainer>
			</Panel>

			<Panel headerText="Tiles Group 3 (Different Drop Group)">
				<f:GridContainer id="gridDifferentGroup" items="{
						path: '/',
						key: 'uniqueKey',
						factory: '.createItem'
					}">
					<f:dragDropConfig>
						<fdnd:GridDropInfo groupName="different" dropLayout="Horizontal" targetAggregation="items" dropPosition="Between"></fdnd:GridDropInfo>
					</f:dragDropConfig>
				</f:GridContainer>
			</Panel>

			<HBox>
				<Panel headerText="Tiles Group 4 (Prevents Drop)">
					<f:GridContainer id="grid4" items="{
							path: '/',
							key: 'uniqueKey',
							factory: '.createItem'
						}">
					</f:GridContainer>
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" styleClass="sapUiMediumMarginEnd"></FlexItemData>
					</layoutData>
				</Panel>

				<Panel headerText="Tiles Group 5">
					<f:GridContainer id="grid5" items="{
							path: '/',
							key: 'uniqueKey',
							factory: '.createItem'
						}">
					</f:GridContainer>
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1"></FlexItemData>
					</layoutData>
				</Panel>
			</HBox>

			<Panel headerText="Card Group 1">
				<f:GridContainer id="grid6" snapToRow="true" items="{
						path: '/',
						key: 'uniqueKey',
						factory: '.createItem'
					}">
				</f:GridContainer>
			</Panel>

			<Panel headerText="Card Group 2">
				<f:GridContainer id="grid7" snapToRow="true" items="{
						path: '/',
						key: 'uniqueKey',
						factory: '.createItem'
					}">
				</f:GridContainer>
			</Panel>

			<Panel headerText="Links (test)">
				<List width="200px" id="links1" items="{
						path: '/',
						factory: '.createItem'
					}">
					<CustomListItem>
						<HBox>
							<Link id="link1" class="sapUiSmallMargin" text="{header}" target="_blank" href="{href}" />
						</HBox>
					</CustomListItem>
				</List>
			</Panel>

			<Panel headerText="Grid List">
				<f:GridList
					id="gridList1"
					items="{
						path: '/'
					}"
					growing="true"
					growingThreshold="9">

					<f:headerToolbar>
						<Toolbar>
							<content>
								<Title text="GridList, header (not droppable)" />
								<ToolbarSpacer/>
								<SearchField width="15rem"/>
							</content>
						</Toolbar>
					</f:headerToolbar>

					<f:customLayout>
						<grid:GridBoxLayout/>
					</f:customLayout>

					<CustomListItem>
						<VBox >
							<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
								<layoutData>
									<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" />
								</layoutData>
								<Title text="{title}" wrapping="true" />
								<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
							</VBox>
						</VBox>
					</CustomListItem>
				</f:GridList>
			</Panel>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: DragAndDrop
code:
<mvc:View xmlns="sap.m"
		  xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		  xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		  xmlns:table="sap.ui.table"
		  xmlns:unified="sap.ui.unified"
		  xmlns:dnd="sap.ui.core.dnd"
		  controllerName="sap.ui.table.mvc.DragAndDrop">
	<HBox renderType="Bare">
		<items>
			<table:Table id="table"
						 title="Table - Reorder rows and drag to TreeTable"
						 width="50%"
						 rows="{/listData}">
				<table:columns>
					<table:Column width="120px" sortProperty="lastName" filterProperty="lastName">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.Text"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<Text text="{lastName}" wrapping="false"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="6em" sortProperty="name" filterProperty="name">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.Label"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<Label text="{name}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="200px" sortProperty="objStatusState" filterProperty="objStatusState">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.ObjectStatus"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<ObjectStatus text="{objStatusText}" state="{objStatusState}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="80px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="core.Icon"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<core:Icon src="sap-icon://account" decorative="false"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="100px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.Button"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<Button text="{gender}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="200px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.Input"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<Input value="{name}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="200px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.DatePicker"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<DatePicker dateValue="{birthdayDate}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="150px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.Select"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<Select>
								<items>
									<core:Item key="v1" text="Value 1"/>
									<core:Item key="v2" text="Value 2"/>
									<core:Item key="v3" text="Value 3"/>
									<core:Item key="v4" text="Value 4"/>
								</items>
							</Select>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="150px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.ComboBox"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<ComboBox>
								<items>
									<core:Item key="v1" text="Value 1"/>
									<core:Item key="v2" text="Value 2"/>
									<core:Item key="v3" text="Value 3"/>
									<core:Item key="v4" text="Value 4"/>
								</items>
							</ComboBox>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="250px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.MultiComboBox"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<MultiComboBox>
								<items>
									<core:Item key="v1" text="Value 1"/>
									<core:Item key="v2" text="Value 2"/>
									<core:Item key="v3" text="Value 3"/>
									<core:Item key="v4" text="Value 4"/>
								</items>
							</MultiComboBox>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="50px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.CheckBox"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<CheckBox selected="{checked}" text="{lastName}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="150px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.Link"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<Link href="{href}" text="{linkText}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="200px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="unified.Currency"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<unified:Currency value="{money}" currency="{currency}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="150px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.ProgressIndicator"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<ProgressIndicator percentValue="{path: 'lastName', formatter: '.getProgress'}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="200px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="m.RatingIndicator"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<RatingIndicator value="{path: 'lastName', formatter: '.getRating'}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
				</table:columns>
				<table:dragDropConfig>
					<dnd:DragDropInfo
						sourceAggregation="rows"
						targetAggregation="rows"
						dropEffect="Move"
						dropPosition="Between"
						dragStart="tableDragStart"
						dragEnter="tableReorderDragEnter"
						drop="tableReorderDrop"/>
					<dnd:DragDropInfo
						sourceAggregation="rows"
						targetAggregation="rows"
						dropEffect="Copy"
						dropPosition="On"
						dragStart="tableDragStart"
						dragEnter="tableToTreeTableDragEnter"
						drop="tableToTreeTableDrop"
						targetElement="treetable"/>
				</table:dragDropConfig>
			</table:Table>
			<ToolbarSpacer width="1rem"/>
			<table:TreeTable
				id="treetable"
				title="TreeTable - Reorder rows and drag to Table"
				width="50%"
				expandFirstLevel="true"
				rows="{/treeData/root}"
				groupHeaderProperty="name">
				<table:columns>
					<table:Column width="300px" sortProperty="name" filterProperty="name">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="Name"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<Text text="{name}" wrapping="false"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="300px" sortProperty="description" filterProperty="description">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="Description"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<Text text="{description}" wrapping="false"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
					<table:Column width="500px">
						<table:label>
							<Label text="Available"/>
						</table:label>
						<table:template>
							<CheckBox selected="{checked}"/>
						</table:template>
					</table:Column>
				</table:columns>
				<table:dragDropConfig>
					<dnd:DragDropInfo
						sourceAggregation="rows"
						targetAggregation="rows"
						dropEffect="Move"
						dropPosition="OnOrBetween"
						dragStart="treeTableDragStart"
						dragEnter="treeTableReorderDragEnter"
						drop="treeTableReorderDrop"/>
					<dnd:DragDropInfo
						sourceAggregation="rows"
						dropEffect="Copy"
						dragStart="treeTableDragStart"
						dragEnter="treeTableToTableDragEnter"
						drop="treeTableToTableDrop"
						targetElement="table"/>
				</table:dragDropConfig>
			</table:TreeTable>
		</items>
	</HBox>
</mvc:View>

title: DynamicPageAnalyticalTable
code:
<mvc:View
		xmlns:c="sap.ui.core"
		controllerName="sap.f.sample.DynamicPageAnalyticalTable.controller.DynamicPageAnalyticalTable"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:u="sap.ui.unified"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:t="sap.ui.table"
		xmlns:f="sap.f"
		xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
		height="100%">
		<f:DynamicPage id="dynamicPageId" preserveHeaderStateOnScroll="true" headerExpanded="{/headerExpanded}" showFooter="true" fitContent="true">
			<!-- DynamicPage Title -->
			<f:title>
				<f:DynamicPageTitle>
					<f:heading>
						<Title text="Header Title"/>
					</f:heading>
					<f:expandedContent>
						<Label text="This is a subheading"/>
					</f:expandedContent>
					<f:snappedContent>
						<Label text="This is a subheading"/>
					</f:snappedContent>
					<f:snappedTitleOnMobile>
						<Title text="This is a subheading"/>
					</f:snappedTitleOnMobile>
					<f:content>
						<OverflowToolbar>
							<GenericTag text="SR"
								status="Error"
								press="onGenericTagPress"
								design="StatusIconHidden">
								<ObjectNumber number="2"
									unit="M"
									emphasized="false"
									state="Error"/>
							</GenericTag>
						</OverflowToolbar>
					</f:content>
					<f:actions>
						<ToolbarSpacer/>
						<Button
								text="Edit"
								type="Emphasized"/>
						<Button
								text="Delete"
								type="Transparent"/>
						<Button
								text="Copy"
								type="Transparent"/>
						<Button
								icon="sap-icon://action"
								type="Transparent"/>
					</f:actions>
				</f:DynamicPageTitle>
			</f:title>

			<!-- DynamicPage Header -->
			<f:header>
				<f:DynamicPageHeader pinnable="true">
						<FlexBox
								alignItems="Start"
								justifyContent="SpaceBetween">
							<items>
								<Panel
										backgroundDesign="Transparent"
										class="sapUiNoContentPadding">
									<content>
										<layout:HorizontalLayout
												allowWrapping="true">
											<layout:VerticalLayout
													class="sapUiMediumMarginEnd">
												<ObjectAttribute title="Location" text="Warehouse A"/>
												<ObjectAttribute title="Halway" text="23L"/>
												<ObjectAttribute title="Rack" text="34"/>
											</layout:VerticalLayout>
											<layout:VerticalLayout>
												<ObjectAttribute title="Availability"/>
												<ObjectStatus text="In Stock" state="Success" />
											</layout:VerticalLayout>
										</layout:HorizontalLayout>
									</content>
								</Panel>
							</items>
						</FlexBox>
				</f:DynamicPageHeader>
			</f:header>

			<f:content>
				<t:Table
						rows="{/ProductCollection}"
						selectionMode="MultiToggle"
						rowMode="Auto">
					<t:extension>
						<OverflowToolbar style="Clear">
							<Title text="Products"/>
						</OverflowToolbar>
					</t:extension>
					<t:columns>
						<t:Column width="11rem">
							<Label text="Product Name" />
							<t:template>
								<Text text="{Name}" wrapping="false" />
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="11rem">
							<Label text="Product Id" />
							<t:template>
								<Input value="{ProductId}"/>
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="6rem" hAlign="End">
							<Label text="Quantity" />
							<t:template>
								<Label text="{Quantity}" />
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="9rem">
							<Label text="Status" />
							<t:template>
								<ObjectStatus text="{Status}" state="{
								path: 'Available',
								formatter: '.formatAvailableToObjectState'
							}"/>
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="9rem">
							<Label text="Price" />
							<t:template>
								<u:Currency value="{Price}" currency="{CurrencyCode}"/>
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="12rem">
							<Label text="Supplier" />
							<t:template>
								<ComboBox value="{SupplierName}" items="{path: '/Suppliers', templateShareable: false}">
									<c:Item text="{Name}"/>
								</ComboBox>
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="9rem">
							<Label text="Image" />
							<t:template>
								<Link text="Show Image" href="{ProductPicUrl}" target="_blank"/>
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="9rem">
							<Label text="Details" />
							<t:template>
								<Button text="Show Details" press="handleDetailsPress"/>
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="7rem">
							<Label text="Heavy Weight" />
							<t:template>
								<CheckBox selected="{
								path: 'Heavy',
								type: 'sap.ui.model.type.String'
							}"/>
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="12rem">
							<Label text="Category" />
							<t:template>
								<Select selectedKey="{Category}" items="{path: '/Categories', templateShareable: false}">
									<c:Item text="{Name}" key="{Name}"/>
								</Select>
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="6rem" hAlign="Center">
							<Label text="Status" />
							<t:template>
								<c:Icon src="{
								path: 'Available',
								formatter: '.formatAvailableToIcon'
							}"/>
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
						<t:Column width="11rem" hAlign="Center">
							<Label text="Delivery Date" />
							<t:template>
								<DatePicker value="{
								path: 'DeliveryDate',
								type: 'sap.ui.model.type.Date',
								formatOptions: {source: {pattern: 'timestamp'}}
							}"/>
							</t:template>
						</t:Column>
					</t:columns>
				</t:Table>
			</f:content>
			<!-- DynamicPage Footer -->
			<f:footer>
				<OverflowToolbar>
					<ToolbarSpacer/>
					<Button type="Accept" text="Accept"/>
					<Button type="Reject" text="Reject"/>
				</OverflowToolbar>
			</f:footer>
		</f:DynamicPage>
</mvc:View>

title: DynamicPageWithWizard
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.f.sample.DynamicPageWithWizard.controller.DynamicPageWithWizard"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	height="100%">
	<NavContainer id="navContainer">
		<pages>
			<f:DynamicPage
				id="dynamicPage"
				toggleHeaderOnTitleClick="{/titleClickable}"
				stickySubheaderProvider="ShoppingCartWizard"
				class="sapUiNoContentPadding"
				showFooter="true">
				<!-- DynamicPage Title -->
				<f:title>
					<f:DynamicPageTitle>
						<f:heading>
							<Title text="Header Title"/>
						</f:heading>
					</f:DynamicPageTitle>
				</f:title>
				<!-- DynamicPage Header -->
				<f:content>
					<Wizard id="ShoppingCartWizard"
					        class="sapUiResponsivePadding--header sapUiResponsivePadding--content"
					        complete="completedHandler"
					        height="auto"
					        enableBranching="true">
						<WizardStep
							id="ContentsStep"
							nextStep="PaymentTypeStep"
							title="Shopping cart contents"
							icon="sap-icon://cart">
							<ObjectHeader
								title="Total"
								number="{/ProductsTotalPrice}"
								numberUnit="EUR">
								<attributes>
									<ObjectAttribute text="This is the list of items in your shopping cart"/>
								</attributes>
							</ObjectHeader>
							<List mode="Delete"
							      items="{/ProductCollection}"
							      enableBusyIndicator="true"
							      delete="handleDelete"
							      headerText="Items">
								<StandardListItem
									title="{Name}"
									type="Active"
									description="{Description}"
									icon="{ProductPicUrl}"
									info="{Price} {CurrencyCode}"
									iconDensityAware="false"
									iconInset="false"/>
							</List>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
							id="PaymentTypeStep"
							title="Payment type"
							subsequentSteps="CreditCardStep, BankAccountStep, CashOnDeliveryStep"
							complete="goToPaymentStep"
							icon="sap-icon://money-bills">
							<Text class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
							      text="We accept all major credit cards. No extra cost will be charged when paying with a credit card. Bank transfer and Cash on delivery are only possible for inland deliveries. A service charge of 2.99 EUR will be charged for these types of deliveries. Be aware, that for Bank transfers, the shipping will start on the day after the payment is received."/>
							<HBox
								alignItems="Center"
								justifyContent="Center"
								width="100%">
								<SegmentedButton selectionChange="setPaymentMethod" id="paymentMethodSelection"
								                 selectedKey="{/selectedPayment}">
									<items>
										<SegmentedButtonItem key="Credit Card" icon="sap-icon://credit-card"
										                     text="Credit card"/>
										<SegmentedButtonItem key="Bank Transfer" icon="sap-icon://official-service"
										                     text="Bank transfer"/>
										<SegmentedButtonItem key="Cash on Delivery" icon="sap-icon://money-bills"
										                     text="Cash on delivery"/>
									</items>
								</SegmentedButton>
							</HBox>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
							id="CreditCardStep"
							title="Credit card info"
							nextStep="BillingStep"
							activate="checkCreditCardStep"
							icon="sap-icon://credit-card">
							<MessageStrip text="Enter at least 3 symbols for credit card name."/>
							<form:SimpleForm
								editable="true"
								layout="ColumnLayout">
								<Label text="Name on card" required="true"/>
								<Input value="{/CreditCard/Name}" liveChange="checkCreditCardStep"
								       valueLiveUpdate="true"/>
								<Label text="Card number"/>
								<Input value="{/CardNumber}"/>
								<Label text="Security code"/>
								<Input value="{/CreditCard/SecurityCode}"/>
								<Label text="Expiration date"/>
								<DatePicker value="{/CreditCard/Expire}"/>
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
							id="BankAccountStep"
							title="Beneficial bank info"
							nextStep="BillingStep"
							icon="sap-icon://official-service">
							<Panel>
								<headerToolbar>
									<Toolbar height="0rem">
										<Title text=""/>
									</Toolbar>
								</headerToolbar>
								<layout:Grid
									defaultSpan="L6 M6 S10"
									hSpacing="2">
									<Label text="Beneficiary Name" design="Bold"/>
									<Label text="Singapore Hardware e-Commerce LTD"/>
									<Label text="Beneficiary Bank" design="Bold"/>
									<Label text="CITY BANK, SINGAPORE BRANCH"/>
									<Label text="Beneficiary Account Number" design="Bold"/>
									<Label text="06110702027218"/>
									<Label text="Bank Phone Number" design="Bold"/>
									<Label text="+65-6224-2622"/>
									<Label text="Bank Email Address" design="Bold"/>
									<Label text="customerservice@citybank.com"/>
								</layout:Grid>
							</Panel>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
							id="CashOnDeliveryStep"
							title="Cash on delivery info"
							nextStep="BillingStep"
							activate="checkCashOnDeliveryStep"
							icon="sap-icon://money-bills">
							<MessageStrip text="Enter at least 3 symbols for first name."/>
							<form:SimpleForm
								editable="true"
								layout="ColumnLayout">
								<Label text="First Name" required="true"/>
								<Input value="{/CashOnDelivery/FirstName}" liveChange="checkCashOnDeliveryStep"
								       valueLiveUpdate="true"/>
								<Label text="Last Name"/>
								<Input value="{/CashOnDelivery/LastName}"/>
								<Label text="Phone Number"/>
								<Input value="{/CashOnDelivery/Phone Number}"/>
								<Label text="Email address"/>
								<Input value="{/CashOnDelivery/Email}"/>
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
							id="BillingStep"
							title="Billing address"
							subsequentSteps="DeliveryAddressStep, DeliveryTypeStep"
							activate="checkBillingStep"
							complete="billingAddressComplete"
							icon="sap-icon://sales-quote">
							<MessageStrip text="Enter at least 3 symbols for each required field"/>
							<form:SimpleForm
								editable="true"
								layout="ColumnLayout">
								<Label text="Delivery address is different"/>
								<CheckBox
									selected="{/differentDeliveryAddress}"
									select="setDifferentDeliveryAddress"/>
								<Label text="Address" required="true"/>
								<Input value="{/BillingAddress/Address}" liveChange="checkBillingStep"
								       valueLiveUpdate="true"/>
								<Label text="City" required="true"/>
								<Input value="{/BillingAddress/City}" liveChange="checkBillingStep"
								       valueLiveUpdate="true"/>
								<Label text="Zip Code" required="true"/>
								<Input value="{/BillingAddress/ZipCode}" liveChange="checkBillingStep"
								       valueLiveUpdate="true"/>
								<Label text="Country" required="true"/>
								<Input value="{/BillingAddress/Country}" liveChange="checkBillingStep"
								       valueLiveUpdate="true"/>
								<Label text="Note" required="false"/>
								<TextArea rows="8" value="{/BillingAddress/Note}"/>
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
							id="DeliveryAddressStep"
							title="Delivery address"
							nextStep="DeliveryTypeStep"
							icon="sap-icon://sales-quote">
							<form:SimpleForm
								editable="true"
								layout="ColumnLayout">
								<Label text="Address"/>
								<Input/>
								<Label text="City"/>
								<Input/>
								<Label text="Zip Code"/>
								<Input/>
								<Label text="Country"/>
								<Input/>
								<Label text="Note"/>
								<TextArea rows="8"/>
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
							id="DeliveryTypeStep"
							title="Delivery type"
							icon="sap-icon://insurance-car">
							<Text class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
							      text="Standard delivery will be delivered within 5 workdays. Be aware, that around high-season sales, standard delivery may take up to one additional day. Express delivery is delivered within 36 hours. A service fee of 5.49 EUR is charged for Express delivery on a workday. For a holiday delivery, the service fee is 8,00 EUR. Express delivery is only available for inland deliveries. All service fees vary for deliveries  abroad."/>
							<HBox
								alignItems="Center"
								justifyContent="Center"
								width="100%">
								<SegmentedButton selectedKey="{/selectedDeliveryMethod}">
									<items>
										<SegmentedButtonItem key="Standard Delivery" text="Standard"/>
										<SegmentedButtonItem key="Express Delivery" text="Express"/>
									</items>
								</SegmentedButton>
							</HBox>
						</WizardStep>
					</Wizard>
				</f:content>
				<!-- DynamicPage Footer -->
				<f:footer>
					<OverflowToolbar>
						<ToolbarSpacer/>
						<Button type="Accept" text="Accept"/>
						<Button type="Reject" text="Reject"/>
					</OverflowToolbar>
				</f:footer>
			</f:DynamicPage>
			<Page id="wizardBranchingReviewPage" showHeader="false">
				<content>
					<form:SimpleForm
						title="1. List of products"
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<List items="{/ProductCollection}">
							<StandardListItem
								title="{Name}"
								type="Active"
								description="{Description}"
								icon="{ProductPicUrl}"
								info="{Price} {CurrencyCode}"
								iconDensityAware="false"
								iconInset="false"/>
						</List>
						<ObjectHeader
							title="Total"
							number="{/ProductsTotalPrice}"
							numberUnit="EUR">
							<attributes>
								<ObjectAttribute
									press="handleNavBackToList"
									active="true"
									text="Edit"/>
							</attributes>
						</ObjectHeader>
					</form:SimpleForm>
					<form:SimpleForm
						title="2. Payment type"
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label text="Chosen payment type"/>
							<Text text="{/selectedPayment}"/>
							<Link press="handleNavBackToPaymentType" text="Edit"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
						visible="{= ${/selectedPayment}==='Credit Card' ? true : false}"
						title="3. Credit Card payment"
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label text="Name on card"/>
							<Text text="{/CreditCard/Name}"/>
							<Label text="Card number"/>
							<Text text="{/CardNumber}"/>
							<Label text="Security code"/>
							<Text text="{/CreditCard/SecurityCode}"/>
							<Label text="Expiration date"/>
							<Text text="{/CreditCard/Expire}"/>
							<Link press="handleNavBackToCreditCard" text="Edit"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
						visible="{= ${/selectedPayment}==='Bank Transfer' ? true : false}"
						title="3. Bank Transfer"
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<layout:Grid
								defaultSpan="L6 M6 S10"
								hSpacing="2">
								<Label text="Beneficiary Name" design="Bold"/>
								<Label text="Singapore Hardware e-Commerce LTD"/>
								<Label text="Beneficiary Bank" design="Bold"/>
								<Label text="CITY BANK, SINGAPORE BRANCH"/>
								<Label text="Beneficiary Account Number" design="Bold"/>
								<Label text="06110702027218"/>
								<Label text="Bank Phone Number" design="Bold"/>
								<Label text="+65-6224-2622"/>
								<Label text="Bank Email Address" design="Bold"/>
								<Label text="customerservice@citybank.com"/>
							</layout:Grid>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
						visible="{= ${/selectedPayment}==='Cash on Delivery' ? true : false}"
						title="3. Cash on delivery"
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label text="First Name"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/FirstName}"/>
							<Label text="Last Name"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/LastName}"/>
							<Label text="Phone number"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/Phone Number}"/>
							<Label text="Email address"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/Email}"/>
							<Link press="handleNavBackToCashOnDelivery" text="Edit"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
						title="4. Billing Address"
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label text="Address"/>
							<Text text="{/BillingAddress/Address}"/>
							<Label text="City"/>
							<Text text="{/BillingAddress/City}"/>
							<Label text="Zip Code"/>
							<Text text="{/BillingAddress/ZipCode}"/>
							<Label text="Country"/>
							<Text text="{/BillingAddress/Country}"/>
							<Label text="Note"/>
							<Text text="{/BillingAddress/Note}"/>
							<Link press="handleNavBackToBillingAddress" text="Edit"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
						title="5. Delivery type"
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label text="Chosen delivery type"/>
							<Text text="{/selectedDeliveryMethod}"/>
							<Link press="handleNavBackToDeliveryType" text="Edit"/>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>
				</content>
				<footer>
					<Bar>
						<contentRight>
							<Button text="Submit" press="handleWizardSubmit"/>
							<Button text="Cancel" press="handleWizardCancel"/>
						</contentRight>
					</Bar>
				</footer>
			</Page>
		</pages>
	</NavContainer>
</mvc:View>

title: Employee

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.demo.nav.controller.employee.Employee"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	busyIndicatorDelay="0">
	<Page
		id="employeePage"
		title="{i18n>EmployeeDetailsOf} {FirstName} {LastName}"
		showNavButton="true"
		navButtonPress=".onNavBack"
		class="sapUiResponsiveContentPadding">
		<content>
			<Panel
				id="employeePanel"
				width="auto"
				class="sapUiNoContentPadding">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar>
						<Title text="{i18n>EmployeeIDColon} {EmployeeID}" level="H2"/>
						<ToolbarSpacer />
						<Link text="{i18n>FlipToResume}" tooltip="{i18n>FlipToResume.tooltip}" press=".onShowResume"/>
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<content>
					<f:SimpleForm
						editable="false"
						layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
						labelSpanL="3" labelSpanM="3" emptySpanL="4" emptySpanM="4"
						columnsL="1" columnsM="1">
						<f:content>
							<Label text="{i18n>formFirstName}"/>
							<Text text="{FirstName}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>formLastName}"/>
							<Text text="{LastName}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>formAddress}"/>
							<Text text="{Address}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>formCity}"/>
							<Text text="{City}, {Region}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>formPostalCode}"/>
							<Text text="{PostalCode}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>formPhoneHome}"/>
							<Text text="{HomePhone}"/>
							<Label text="{i18n>formCountry}"/>
							<Text text="{Country}"/>
						</f:content>
					</f:SimpleForm>
				</content>
			</Panel>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>
