title: Entity
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.Entity"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:m="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns="sap.uxap"
		xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
	<ObjectPageLayout
			id="ObjectPageLayout"
			useIconTabBar="true"
			selectedSection="samples"
			upperCaseAnchorBar="false"
			busyIndicatorDelay="0">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader
					id="entityHeader"
					objectTitle="{/name}">
				<actions>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton id="entityBackToSearch" text="{i18n>ENTITY_BACK_BTN}" hideIcon="true" hideText="false" press="backToSearch" visible="false"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton
							id="toggleFullScreenBtn"
							visible="{device>/system/desktop}"
							icon="sap-icon://full-screen"
							tooltip="{i18n>ENTITY_FULLSCREEN_TOOLTIP}"
							press="onToggleFullScreen" />
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageHeader>
		</headerTitle>

		<headerContent>
			<l:Grid defaultSpan="L4 M6 S12" class="sapUiNoMargin" hSpacing="0">
				<l:VerticalLayout width="98%" id="headerColumn0"/>
				<l:VerticalLayout width="100%" id="headerColumn1" visible="false"/>
				<l:VerticalLayout width="100%" id="headerColumn2" visible="false"/>
			</l:Grid>
		</headerContent>

		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection class="sapUiDemokitEntityAbout" id="about" title="{i18n>ENTITY_ABOUT}">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection>

						<l:VerticalLayout>
							<core:HTML content="{/description}" />

							<l:VerticalLayout visible="{/show/introLink}">
								<m:Text text="{/shortDescription}"/>
							</l:VerticalLayout>

						</l:VerticalLayout>

					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection class="sapUiDemokitEntitySamples" id="samples" title="{
					parts: [
						'i18n>ENTITY_SAMPLES',
						'/count/samples'
					],
					formatter: '.formatMessage'
				}"
				visible="{= ${/count/samples} > 0 }">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection>
						<m:VBox>
							<m:MessageStrip
									class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom sapUiSmallNegativeMarginBeginEnd"
									text="{/deprecatedMark}"
									type="Error"
									visible="{= ${/deprecated} === 'true'}"/>
							<m:Table
									class="myTable sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"
									width="auto"
									id="table"
									items="{/entity/samples}"
									fixedLayout="false"
									showSeparators="Inner" >
								<m:columns>
									<m:Column><m:Label text="{i18n>ENTITY_TABLE_NAME}" /></m:Column>
									<m:Column minScreenWidth="Tablet"><m:Label text="{i18n>ENTITY_TABLE_DESCRIPTION}" /></m:Column>
								</m:columns>
								<m:items>
									<m:ColumnListItem type="Navigation" press="onNavToSample" vAlign="Middle">
										<m:cells>
											<m:Text text="{name}" class="entitySampleName" wrapping="false" />
											<m:FormattedText htmlText="{= ${path: 'description'} ? ${path: 'description'} : ''}" />
										</m:cells>
									</m:ColumnListItem>
								</m:items>
							</m:Table>
						</m:VBox>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: ExploreSamples
code:
<mvc:View controllerName="sap.ui.demo.cardExplorer.controller.ExploreSamples"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:cardExplorer="sap.ui.demo.cardExplorer.controls">
	<l:ResponsiveSplitter id="splitView">
		<l:PaneContainer orientation="Horizontal">
			<l:SplitPane id="cardPane" requiredParentWidth="1">
				<Page>
					<customHeader>
						<Bar>
							<contentLeft>
								<Title class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin" text="{/sample/title}"></Title>
							</contentLeft>
							<contentRight>
								<ComboBox id="subSample" selectedKey="{/subSample/key}" items="{/sample/subSamples}" visible="{= ${/sample/subSamples} ? true : false }" selectionChange="onSubSampleChange">
									<core:Item key="{key}" text="{title}" />
								</ComboBox>
							</contentRight>
						</Bar>
					</customHeader>
					<VBox height="100%">
						<MessageStrip
							text="This sample includes cards that demonstrate the additional logic for integration with the host environment. If you want to use it in SAP Business Application Studio, it has to be imported there as an application."
							visible="{settings>/isApplication}"
							class="sapUiSmallMargin"
							showIcon="true"
						/>
						<MessageStrip text="This feature is experimental - it may be deleted, or incompatible API changes may be done before its official public release." visible="{= !!${/sample/experimental} || !!${/subSample/experimental} }" showIcon="true" type="Warning" class="sapUiSmallMargin"/>
						<MessageStrip text="This sample uses a mock server which may interfere with your data requests." visible="{= !!${/sample/mockServer} || !!${/subSample/mockServer} }" showIcon="true" type="Warning" class="sapUiSmallMargin"/>
						<MessageStrip text="The consent flow is simulated. Give consent in the popover window to proceed. Reload the browser window to retrigger the consent flow again." visible="{= !!${/sample/consentFlow} || !!${/subSample/consentFlow} }" showIcon="true" type="Warning" class="sapUiSmallMargin"/>
						<f:GridContainer id="cardContainer" visible="{= !${settings>/useIFrame} }"></f:GridContainer>
						<core:HTML id="iframeWrapper" visible="{= ${settings>/useIFrame} }" preferDOM="false" content='<div style="height:100%;"></div>'>
							<core:layoutData>
								<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
							</core:layoutData>
						</core:HTML>
					</VBox>
				</Page>
			</l:SplitPane>
			<l:SplitPane requiredParentWidth="1">
				<Page id="editPage" showFooter="{= ${settings>/editorType} === 'CARDEDITOR' && ${settings>/editorMode} !== 'Translation'}">
					<customHeader>
						<OverflowToolbar id="toolbar">
							<Button class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin" text="Run" type="Emphasized" icon="sap-icon://media-play" press="onRunPressed" enabled="{settings>/editable}">
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="High" />
								</layoutData>
							</Button>
							<CheckBox text="Auto Run" selected="{settings>/autoRun}" enabled="{settings>/editable}">
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
								</layoutData>
							</CheckBox>
							<CheckBox text="Schema Validation" selected="{settings>/schemaValidation}" enabled="{settings>/editable}" select=".onSchemaValidationCheck">
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
								</layoutData>
							</CheckBox>
							<ToolbarSpacer />
							<MenuButton id="downloadSampleButton" icon="sap-icon://download" tooltip="Download" text="Download" type="Transparent">
								<menu>
									<Menu>
										<MenuItem text="Manifest File"
											icon="sap-icon://document-text"
											visible="{= !${settings>/isApplication} }"
											press=".onDownloadCardManifestFile" />
										<MenuItem text="{= (${settings>/isApplication} || ${settings>/isPreloadProject}) ? 'All files as .zip' : 'Bundle as card.zip'}"
											icon="sap-icon://attachment-zip-file"
											press=".onDownloadZip" />
									</Menu>
								</menu>
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="High" />
								</layoutData>
							</MenuButton>
							<OverflowToolbarButton
								text="{= ${settings>/editorType} === 'TEXT' ? 'Switch to Visual BAS Editor' : 'Switch to Text Editor'}"
								tooltip="{= ${settings>/editorType} === 'TEXT' ? 'Switch to Visual BAS Editor' : 'Switch to Text Editor'}"
								icon="sap-icon://developer-settings"
								enabled="{settings>/editable}"
								type="Transparent"
								visible="{= ${settings>/editable} && ${settings>/internal} }"
								press=".onChangeBASEditor"
							>
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
								</layoutData>
							</OverflowToolbarButton>
							<OverflowToolbarButton
								text="{= ${settings>/editorType} === 'TEXT' ? 'Switch to Card Configuration Editor' : 'Switch to Text Editor'}"
								tooltip="{= ${settings>/editorType} === 'TEXT' ? 'Switch to Card Configuration Editor' : 'Switch to Text Editor'}"
								icon="sap-icon://wrench"
								enabled="{= ${settings>/editable}}"
								type="Transparent"
								visible="{= ${settings>/designtimeEnabled} && ${settings>/editable} && ${settings>/internal} && ${settings>/editorType} !== 'CARDEDITOR' }"
								press=".onChangeCardEditor"
							>
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
								</layoutData>
							</OverflowToolbarButton>
							<OverflowToolbarButton
								text="Change Position"
								tooltip="Change Position"
								class="orientationBtn"
								icon="sap-icon://header"
								type="Transparent"
								press=".onChangeSplitterOrientation"
							>
								<layoutData>
									<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
								</layoutData>
							</OverflowToolbarButton>
						</OverflowToolbar>
					</customHeader>
					<cardExplorer:FileEditor id="fileEditor" manifestChange="onFileEditorManifestChange" designtimeChange="onFileEditorDesigntimeChange" fileSwitch="onFileSwitch" visible="{= ${settings>/editorType} === 'TEXT' }" />
					<footer>
						<OverflowToolbar>
							<ToolbarSpacer/>
							<Button text="Apply" press=".onApplyCardEditorChanges" />
							<Button text="Reset" press=".onResetCardEditor" />
							<Button text="{= ${settings>/manifestChangesShowed} ? 'Hide Manifest Changes' : 'Show Manifest Changes'}" enabled="{settings>/manifestChanged}" press=".onShowManifestChanges"/>
						</OverflowToolbar>
					</footer>
				</Page>
			</l:SplitPane>
		</l:PaneContainer>
	</l:ResponsiveSplitter>
</mvc:View>

title: ExtendedXMLViewEventHandlerSyntax
ExtensionAndHost
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:editor="sap.ui.codeeditor"
	displayBlock="true"
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.ExtensionAndHost">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Title text="Extension and Host Usages" />
				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>

		<VBox>
			<Title text="General Extension and Host usage" class="sapUiSmallMargin"/>
			<HBox>
				<Button text="Set new actions" press="onSetNewActionsPress"/>
				<Button text="Set new extension formatters" press="onSetNewFormattersPress"/>
			</HBox>
			<f:GridContainer >
				<w:Card id="card1" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/cardWithExtension/manifest.json" action="onCardAction">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4"/>
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>
				<w:Card id="card2" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/cardWithExtensionLegacyActions/manifest.json" action="onCardAction">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4"/>
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>
				<w:Card id="card21" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardWithDestinations/manifest.json" action="onCardAction">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4"/>
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>
			</f:GridContainer>

			<Title text="Shared Extension" class="sapUiSmallMargin"/>
			<f:GridContainer >
				<w:Card id="card3" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/cardWithSharedExtension/manifest1.json">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4"/>
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>
				<w:Card id="card4" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/cardWithSharedExtension/manifest2.json">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4"/>
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>
				<w:Card id="card5" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/cardWithSharedExtension/manifest3.json">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="6"/>
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>
			</f:GridContainer>

			<Title text="Blocking Message" class="sapUiSmallMargin"/>
			<f:GridContainer >
				<w:Card id="card6" dataMode="Active" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/cardWithExtensionAndBlockingMessage/manifest.json">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4"/>
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>
			</f:GridContainer>
		</VBox>
	</Page>

</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.m.test.FeedInput"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">

	<Label class="caption" text="FeedInput with an Image" />
	<FeedInput
		maxLength="20"
		showExceededText="true"
		post="onPostFeedItem"
		icon="images/Woman_04.png" />

	<Label class="caption" text="FeedInput with an Image Placeholder (showIcon = true, no icon provided)" />
	<FeedInput
		post="onPostFeedItem" />

		post="onPostFeedItem"
		value="my Value" />

	<FeedInput
		post="onPostFeedItem"
		value="you cannot enter much here"
		maxLength="30" />

	<Label class="caption" text="Long Value" />
	<FeedInput
		post="onPostFeedItem"
		value="my very long Value that runs for many lines ... title: Field
code:
<mvc:View height="100%" controllerName="sap.ui.mdc.acc.field.Field"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:mdc="sap.ui.mdc"
	xmlns:mdcField="sap.ui.mdc.field"
	xmlns:mdcvh="sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp"
	xmlns:mdcValueHelpContent="sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.content"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:c="sap.ui.core">

	<m:App id="MyApp" defaultTransitionName="show">
		<m:Page id="P0" title="Field Samples" titleLevel="H1">
			<form:SimpleForm layout="ColumnLayout" editable="true"
				labelSpanXL="5" labelSpanL="5" labelSpanM="4" columnsXL="3" columnsL="2" columnsM="1"
				singleContainerFullSize="false" adjustLabelSpan="false">
				<form:title>
					<c:Title text="Sample data" level="H2"/>
				</form:title>
				<c:Title text="Product" level="H3"/>

				<m:Label text="{/#Product/ProductId/@sap:label}"/>
				<mdc:Field id="F-ID" value="{ProductId}" editMode="Display"/>
				<m:Label text="{/#Product/Name/@sap:label}"/>
				<mdc:Field id="F-Name" value="{Name}"/>
				<m:Label text="{/#Product/Description/@sap:label}"/>
				<mdc:Field id="F-Description" value="{Description}" editMode="Editable" multipleLines="true"/>
				<m:Label text="{/#Product/Category/@sap:label}"/>
				<mdc:Field id="F-Category" value="{Category}" editMode="ReadOnly"/>
				<m:Label text="{/#Product/Date/@sap:label}"/>
				<mdc:Field id="F-Date" value="{path:'Date', type:'sap.ui.model.odata.type.DateTime', formatOptions: {style: 'medium'}, constraints: {displayFormat: 'Date'}, targetType: 'string'}" delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/sample/field/FieldBaseODataV2.delegate"\}'/>

				<c:Title text="Parameters" level="H3"/>
				<m:Label text="{/#Product/Status/@sap:label}"/>
				<mdc:Field id="F-Status" value="{path: 'Status', type:'sap.ui.model.odata.type.String', constraints: {maxLength: 2}}" delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/sample/field/FieldBaseODataV2.delegate"\}' display="DescriptionValue" valueHelp="VH-Status">
					<mdc:dependents>
						<mdc:ValueHelp id="VH-Status">
							<mdc:typeahead>
								<mdcvh:Popover id="VH-Status-Pop">
									<mdcValueHelpContent:FixedList id="VH-Status-FL" useFirstMatch="false" items="{path: '/StatusCollection'}">
										<mdcValueHelpContent:FixedListItem key="{StatusId}" text="{Name}" additionalText="{StatusId}" />
									</mdcValueHelpContent:FixedList>
								</mdcvh:Popover>
							</mdc:typeahead>
						</mdc:ValueHelp>
					</mdc:dependents>
				</mdc:Field>

				<m:Label text="{/#Product/MatrId/@sap:label}"/>
				<mdc:Field
					id="F-Material"
					value="{path: 'MatrId', type:'sap.ui.model.odata.type.String', constraints: {maxLength: 1, nullable: false}, formatOptions:{'parseKeepsEmptyString': true}}"
					delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/sample/field/FieldBaseODataV2.delegate"\}'
					display="ValueDescription"
					valueHelp="VH-Material">
					<mdc:dependents>
						<mdc:ValueHelp id="VH-Material"
							delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/sample/field/ValueHelp.delegate", "payload": \{"searchKeys":["MatrId","Text"], "out": [\{"path": "defaultUnit", "target": "MatrUnit", "mode": "WhenEmpty"\}]\}\}'>
							<mdc:typeahead>
								<mdcvh:Popover id="VH-Material-Pop">
									<mdcValueHelpContent:MTable id="VH-Material-Pop-MTable"
										title="{/#Product/MatrId/@sap:label}"
										keyPath="MatrId"
										descriptionPath="Text"
										caseSensitive="true"
										useAsValueHelp="false">
										<m:Table id="VH-Material-Pop-Table" items="{path: '/MaterialCollection'}" width="26rem" mode="SingleSelectMaster">
											<m:columns>
												<m:Column>
													<m:Label text="{/#Material/MatrId/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
												<m:Column>
													<m:Label text="{/#Material/Text/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
												<m:Column>
													<m:Label text="{/#Material/defaultUnit/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
											</m:columns>
											<m:items>
												<m:ColumnListItem type="Active">
													<m:Text text="{path: 'MatrId', type:'sap.ui.model.odata.type.String', constraints: {maxLength: 1, nullable: false}, formatOptions:{'parseKeepsEmptyString': true}}"/>
													<m:Text text="{Text}"/>
													<m:Text text="{defaultUnit}"/>
												</m:ColumnListItem>
											</m:items>
										</m:Table>
									</mdcValueHelpContent:MTable>
								</mdcvh:Popover>
							</mdc:typeahead>
							<mdc:dialog>
								<mdcvh:Dialog id="VH-Material-Dialog" title="Material">
									<mdcValueHelpContent:MTable id="VH-Material-Dialog-MTable"
										title="{/#Product/MatrId/@sap:label}"
										keyPath="MatrId"
										descriptionPath="Text"
										caseSensitive="true">
										<m:Table id="VH-Material-Dialog-Table" items="{path: '/MaterialCollection'}" mode="SingleSelectMaster">
											<m:columns>
												<m:Column>
													<m:Label text="{/#Material/MatrId/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
												<m:Column>
													<m:Label text="{/#Material/Text/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
												<m:Column>
													<m:Label text="{/#Material/defaultUnit/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
											</m:columns>
											<m:items>
												<m:ColumnListItem type="Active">
													<m:Text text="{path: 'MatrId', type:'sap.ui.model.odata.type.String', constraints: {maxLength: 1, nullable: false}, formatOptions:{'parseKeepsEmptyString': true}}"/>
													<m:Text text="{Text}"/>
													<m:Text text="{defaultUnit}"/>
												</m:ColumnListItem>
											</m:items>
										</m:Table>
									</mdcValueHelpContent:MTable>
								</mdcvh:Dialog>
							</mdc:dialog>
						</mdc:ValueHelp>
					</mdc:dependents>
				</mdc:Field>

				<m:Label text="{/#Product/MatrQuantity/@sap:label}"/>
				<mdc:Field
					id="F-Quantity"
					value="{parts: ['MatrQuantity', 'MatrUnit', 'view>/ODataUnitCodeList'], type: 'sap.ui.model.type.Unit'}"
					placeholder="{/#Product/MatrQuantity/@sap:label}"
					display="Value"
					valueHelp="VH-Quantity">
					<mdc:dependents>
						<mdc:ValueHelp id="VH-Quantity"
							delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/sample/field/ValueHelp.delegate", "payload": \{"searchKeys":["unit","text"], "in": [\{"path": "MatrId", "source": "MatrId"}], "out": [\{"path": "MatrId", "target": "MatrId"\}]\}\}'>
							<mdc:typeahead>
								<mdcvh:Popover id="VH-Quantity-Pop">
									<mdcValueHelpContent:MTable id="VH-Quantity-Pop-MTable"
										keyPath="unit"
										descriptionPath="text"
										caseSensitive="true"
										useAsValueHelp="false">
										<m:Table id="VH-Quantity-Pop-Table" items="{/weightODataUnits}" width="16rem" mode="SingleSelectMaster">
											<m:columns>
												<m:Column width="10rem">
													<m:Label text="{/#ODataUnits/MatrId/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
												<m:Column width="3rem">
													<m:Label text="{/#ODataUnits/unit/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
												<m:Column >
													<m:Label text="{/#ODataUnits/text/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
											</m:columns>
											<m:items>
												<m:ColumnListItem type="Active">
													<m:Text text="{path: 'MatrId', type:'sap.ui.model.odata.type.String', constraints: {maxLength: 1, nullable: false}, formatOptions:{'parseKeepsEmptyString': true}}"/>
													<m:Text text="{unit}"/>
													<m:Text text="{text}"/>
												</m:ColumnListItem>
											</m:items>
										</m:Table>
									</mdcValueHelpContent:MTable>
								</mdcvh:Popover>
							</mdc:typeahead>
							<mdc:dialog>
								<mdcvh:Dialog id="VH-Quantity-Dialog" title="{/#Product/MatrQuantity/@sap:label}">
									<mdcValueHelpContent:MTable id="VH-Quantity-Dialog-MTable"
										keyPath="unit"
										descriptionPath="text"
										caseSensitive="true">
										<m:Table id="VH-Quantity-Dialog-Table" items="{/weightODataUnits}" mode="SingleSelectMaster">
											<m:columns>
												<m:Column width="10rem">
													<m:Label text="{/#ODataUnits/MatrId/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
												<m:Column width="3rem">
													<m:Label text="{/#ODataUnits/unit/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
												<m:Column >
													<m:Label text="{/#ODataUnits/text/@sap:label}"/>
												</m:Column>
											</m:columns>
											<m:items>
												<m:ColumnListItem type="Active">
													<m:Text text="{path: 'MatrId', type:'sap.ui.model.odata.type.String', constraints: {maxLength: 1, nullable: false}, formatOptions:{'parseKeepsEmptyString': true}}"/>
													<m:Text text="{unit}"/>
													<m:Text text="{text}"/>
												</m:ColumnListItem>
											</m:items>
										</m:Table>
										<mdcValueHelpContent:filterBar>
											<mdcvh:FilterBar id="VH-Quantity-FB" liveMode= "false" delegate='\{"name": "delegates/GenericVhFilterBarDelegate", "payload": \{"collectionName": ""\}\}'>
												<mdc:FilterField
													id="VHFBMaterialFF"
													label= "{/#ODataUnits/MatrId/@sap:label}"
													editMode= "Editable"
													display= "Value"
													dataType="sap.ui.model.odata.type.String"
													dataTypeConstraints='\{"maxLength": 1, "nullable": false\}'
													dataTypeFormatOptions='\{"parseKeepsEmptyString": true\}'
													width="100%"
													conditions="{$filters>/conditions/MatrId}">
												</mdc:FilterField>
												<mdc:FilterField
													id="VHFBTextFF"
													label= "{/#ODataUnits/text/@sap:label}"
													editMode= "Editable"
													display= "Value"
													dataType="sap.ui.model.type.String"
													width="100%"
													conditions="{$filters>/conditions/text}">
												</mdc:FilterField>
											</mdcvh:FilterBar>
										</mdcValueHelpContent:filterBar>
									</mdcValueHelpContent:MTable>
								</mdcvh:Dialog>
							</mdc:dialog>
						</mdc:ValueHelp>
					</mdc:dependents>
				</mdc:Field>
			</form:SimpleForm>
		</m:Page>
	</m:App>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View

title: FilterbarCustomContent
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	displayBlock="true"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:mdc="sap.ui.mdc"
	xmlns:ce="sap.ui.codeeditor"
	xmlns:custom="mdc.sample.controls"
	xmlns:mdcvh="sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp"
	xmlns:mdcValueHelpContent="sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.content"
	controllerName="mdc.sample.controller.FilterbarCustomContent"
	>

	<f:DynamicPage id="page">
		<f:header>
			<f:DynamicPageHeader pinnable="true">
				<mdc:FilterBar
					id="customFilterbar"
					delegate="{ name: 'mdc/sample/delegate/FilterBarDelegate', payload: {}}"
					p13nMode="Item,Value"
					filtersChanged="handleFiltersChanged">
					<mdc:filterItems>
						<!-- Slider (single-value) -->
						<mdc:FilterField id="F1"
							label="Number of words (single-value)"
							conditions="{$filters>/conditions/numberWords}"
							propertyKey="numberWords"
							dataType="sap.ui.model.type.Integer"
							maxConditions="1"
							operators="EQ"
							delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/field/FieldBaseDelegate", "payload": \{\}\}'>
							<mdc:contentEdit>
								<Slider id="F1-S" value="{path: '$field>/conditions', type: 'sap.ui.mdc.field.ConditionsType'}" min="0" max="100000"/>
							</mdc:contentEdit>
						</mdc:FilterField>

						<!-- Custom input (multi-value) -->
						<mdc:FilterField id="F2"
							label="Description (multi-value)"
							conditions="{$filters>/conditions/descr}"
							propertyKey="descr"
							dataType="sap.ui.model.type.String"
							maxConditions="-1"
							valueHelp="VH-Conditions"
							delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/field/FieldBaseDelegate", "payload": \{\}\}'>
							<custom:CustomMultiInput id="F3-CMI" value="{path: '$field>/conditions', type: 'sap.ui.mdc.field.ConditionsType'}" tokens="{path: '$field>/conditions'}">
								<Token text="{path: '$field>', type: 'sap.ui.mdc.field.ConditionType'}"/>
							</custom:CustomMultiInput>
						</mdc:FilterField>

						<!-- Custom Input (single-value) -->
						<mdc:FilterField id="F3"
							label="Status (single-value)"
							conditions="{$filters>/conditions/status}"
							propertyKey="status"
							dataType="sap.ui.model.type.String"
							maxConditions="1"
							operators="EQ"
							delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/field/FieldBaseDelegate", "payload": \{\}\}'>
							<custom:CustomSegmentedButton conditions="{path: '$field>/conditions'}">
								<custom:items>
									<SegmentedButtonItem text="Planning" key="planning"/>
									<SegmentedButtonItem text="In Process" key="inProcess"/>
									<SegmentedButtonItem text="Done" key="done"/>
								</custom:items>
							</custom:CustomSegmentedButton>
						</mdc:FilterField>
					</mdc:filterItems>

					<mdc:dependents>
						<mdc:ValueHelp id="VH-Conditions"
							delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/ValueHelpDelegate", "payload": \{\}\}'>
							<mdc:dialog>
								<mdcvh:Dialog title="Description">
									<mdcValueHelpContent:Conditions label="Description"/>
								</mdcvh:Dialog>
							</mdc:dialog>
						</mdc:ValueHelp>
					</mdc:dependents>
				</mdc:FilterBar>
			</f:DynamicPageHeader>
		</f:header>

		<!-- Code Editor -->
		<f:content>
			<VBox>
				<Title text="Conditions"/>
				<Text text="The following JSON is the output of the FilterField's conditions." class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
				<Label text="Editor height (px)" labelFor="inputText" />
				<Slider
					id="inputText"
					value="{/editorHeight}"
					min="100"
					enableTickmarks="true"
					max="800"
					step="50"
					class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom"/>
				<ce:CodeEditor
					type="json"
					value="{/conditionsText}"
					editable="false"
					height="{
						path: '/editorHeight',
						formatter: '.formatter.formatHeight'
					}" />
			</VBox>
		</f:content>
	</f:DynamicPage>
</mvc:View>

title: FilterbarCustomOperators
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	displayBlock="true"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:mdc="sap.ui.mdc"
	xmlns:ce="sap.ui.codeeditor"
	controllerName="mdc.sample.controller.FilterbarCustomOperators"
	>

	<f:DynamicPage id="page">
		<f:header>
			<f:DynamicPageHeader pinnable="true">
				<mdc:FilterBar
					id="mountainsFilterbar"
					delegate="{ name: 'mdc/sample/delegate/JSONFilterBarDelegate', payload: {}}"
					p13nMode = "Item,Value"
					filtersChanged="handleFiltersChanged"
					showAdaptFiltersButton="false">
					<mdc:filterItems>
						<!-- Rank - Custom operator -->
						<mdc:FilterField
							id="field-rank"
							label="Rank (Custom operator)"
							propertyKey="rank"
							dataType="sap.ui.model.type.Integer"
							conditions="{$filters>/conditions/rank}"
							delegate="{name: 'sap/ui/mdc/field/FieldBaseDelegate'}"
							operators="SRANGE,NOTSRANGE,EQ">
						</mdc:FilterField>
						<mdc:FilterField
							id="field-first-ascent"
							label="First ascent (Custom operator)"
							propertyKey="first_ascent"
							dataType="sap.ui.model.type.Date"
							conditions="{$filters>/conditions/first_ascent}"
							delegate="{name: 'sap/ui/mdc/field/FieldBaseDelegate'}"
							maxConditions="1"
							operators="MYNEXTDAYS,EQ">
						</mdc:FilterField>

					</mdc:filterItems>
				</mdc:FilterBar>
			</f:DynamicPageHeader>
		</f:header>
		<f:content>
			<VBox width="100%">
				<VBox>
					<Title text="Conditions"/>
					<Label text="Editor height (px)" labelFor="inputText" />
					<Slider
						id="inputText"
						value="{/editorHeight}"
						min="100"
						enableTickmarks="true"
						max="800"
						step="50"
						class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom"/>
				</VBox>
				<HBox width="100%">
					<VBox width="50%">
						<Text text="The following JSON is the output of the conditions of the FilterField." class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
						<ce:CodeEditor
							type="json"
							value="{/conditionsText}"
							editable="false"
							width="100%"
							height="{
								path: '/editorHeight',
								formatter: '.formatter.formatHeight'
							}" />
					</VBox>
					<VBox width="50%">
						<Text text="The following text is the output of the model filter of the FilterField." class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
						<ce:CodeEditor
							type="text"
							value="{/modelFilterText}"
							editable="false"
							width="100%"
							height="{
								path: '/editorHeight',
								formatter: '.formatter.formatHeight'
							}" />
					</VBox>
				</HBox>
			</VBox>
		</f:content>
	</f:DynamicPage>
</mvc:View>

title: FilterBarTest
code:
<mvc:View height="100%" controllerName="sap.ui.mdc.filterbar.sample.FilterBarTest"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:f="sap.f" xmlns:mdc="sap.ui.mdc">
	<App>
		<Page id="page" class="sapUiSizeCompact">
			<headerContent>
			</headerContent>
			<content>

				<f:DynamicPage id="dynamicPage">
					<f:title>
						<f:DynamicPageTitle>
							<f:heading>
							</f:heading>
					<f:snappedContent>
						<Text id="statusTextCollapsed" />
					</f:snappedContent>
					<f:expandedContent>
						<Text id="statusTextExpanded" />
					</f:expandedContent>

						</f:DynamicPageTitle>
					</f:title>
					<f:header>
						<f:DynamicPageHeader>
							<f:content>

								<mdc:FilterBar id="idFilterBarCtrl"
									delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/qunit/filterbar/sample/FilterBarTest.delegate", "payload": \{\}\}'
									filtersChanged="onFiltersChanged"
								    propertyInfo = '[\{"name": "prop1", "dataType": "sap.ui.model.type.Boolean", "label": "Boolean", "maxConditions": 1\}]'
									p13nMode="Item,Value">
									<mdc:filterItems>
										<mdc:FilterField
											delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/field/FieldBaseDelegate", "payload": \{\}\}'
											id="ff1" label="{i18n>prop1_label}" 
											conditions="{$filters>/conditions/prop1}"
											propertyKey="prop1"
											dataType="sap.ui.model.type.Boolean" maxConditions="1"
											required="false" />

										<mdc:FilterField
											delegate='\{"name": "sap/ui/mdc/field/FieldBaseDelegate", "payload": \{\}\}'
											id="ff2" label="String single"
											conditions="{$filters>/conditions/prop2}"
											propertyKey="prop2"											
											dataType="sap.ui.model.type.String" dataTypeConstraints='\{"maxLength": 3\}'
											maxConditions="1" required="true" display="Description" />
									</mdc:filterItems>
								</mdc:FilterBar>

<mvc:View

				<Title text="Filters" />
				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>

		<f:GridContainer id="grid1" class="sapUiSmallMargin">

					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="cardDateRange" manifest="{manifests>/filters/dateRangeFilter}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="cardDateRangeParam" manifest="{manifests>/filters/dateRangeFilterWithParameter}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="cardDateRangeParam2" manifest="{manifests>/filters/dateRangeFilterWithParameter2}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="filterVisibleFalse" manifest="{manifests>/filters/filterVisibleFalse}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
		</f:GridContainer>

			<Slider value="{settings>/cardWidth}"></Slider>

				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
		</Panel>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"

				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>

				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/listWithActions.json"
				width="270px"
				overflow="ShowMore"

				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/tinyList.json"
				width="270px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/list.json"
				width="360px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
		</Panel>
		<Panel headerText="Height is too small">
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/listWithActions.json"
				width="270px"
				height="335px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/tinyList.json"
				width="270px"
				height="295px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/list.json"
				width="360px"
				height="300px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
		</Panel>
		<Panel headerText="More samples">
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/object.json"
				width="360px"
				height="400px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/objectForm.json"
				width="360px"
				height="310px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
		</Panel>
		<Panel>
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/table.json"
				width="450px"
				height="400px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
		</Panel>
		<Panel>
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/analytical.json"
				width="450px"
				height="400px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
		</Panel>
		<Panel>
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/calendar.json"
				width="360px"
				height="300px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
		</Panel>
		<Panel>
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/webPage.json"
				width="360px"
				height="300px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
		</Panel>
		<Panel>
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/componentCard/booking/manifest.json"
				width="360px"
				height="250px"
				overflow="ShowMore"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
		</Panel>

		<Panel headerText="Resizable container">
			<l:Splitter orientation="Vertical" height="1500px">
				<HBox height="80%" class="sapUiSmallMargin">
					<layoutData>
						<l:SplitterLayoutData size="500px" />
					</layoutData>
					<w:Card
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/tinyList.json"
						width="270px"
						height="100%"
						overflow="ShowMore"
						class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin" />
					<w:Card
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/listWithActions.json"
						width="270px"
						height="100%"
						overflow="ShowMore"
						class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin" />
					<w:Card
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/fixedHeight/object.json"
						width="360px"
						height="100%"
						overflow="ShowMore"
						class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin" />
				</HBox>
				<HBox>
					<layoutData>
						<l:SplitterLayoutData size="auto" />
					</layoutData>
					<Text text="Use the handler to resize" />
				</HBox>
			</l:Splitter>
		</Panel>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: General
code:
<mvc:View
xmlns="sap.m"
xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
xmlns:app="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.CustomData/1"
controllerName="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid.gridplayground.controller.Main">
<Panel  id="CssLayOut" width="100%" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">
	<headerToolbar>
		<Toolbar height="3rem">
			<Title text=" CssGrid basic examples"/>
		</Toolbar>
	</headerToolbar>
	<content>
		<Panel id="panel1" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin"  expandable="true" expanded="false">
			<headerToolbar>
				<Toolbar height="3rem">
					<Title text=" CssGrid with properties: gridTemplateColumns=repeat(auto-fit, 8rem), gridAutoRows=1fr, gridGap=0.25rem 0.25rem"/>
				</Toolbar>
			</headerToolbar>
			<content>
				<Slider value="100" app:mydata="grid1" liveChange="onSliderMoved" />
				<grid:CSSGrid
						id="grid1"
						gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 8rem)"
						gridAutoRows="1fr"
						gridGap="     0.25rem     0.25rem    "
						items="{ path: '/' }">

					<VBox height="100%">
						<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin demoBox">
							<layoutData>
								<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
							</layoutData>
							<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
							<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
						</VBox>
					</VBox>
				</grid:CSSGrid>
			</content>
		</Panel>

		<Panel id="panel2" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin"  expandable="true" expanded="false">
			<headerToolbar>
				<Toolbar height="3rem">
					<Title text=" CssGrid as a container: no grid properties"/>
				</Toolbar>
			</headerToolbar>
			<content>
				<Slider value="100" app:mydata="grid2" liveChange="onSliderMoved" />
				<grid:CSSGrid items="{ path: '/' }" id="grid2">
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
						<layoutData>
							<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
						</layoutData>
						<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
						<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
					</VBox>
				</grid:CSSGrid>
			</content>
		</Panel>

		<Panel id="panel3" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin"  expandable="true" expanded="false">
			<headerToolbar>
				<Toolbar height="3rem">
					<Title text=" CssGrid: gridTemplateColumns=1fr 2fr gridGap=0.25rem 0.25rem"/>
				</Toolbar>
			</headerToolbar>
			<content>
				<Slider value="100" app:mydata="grid3" liveChange="onSliderMoved" />
				<grid:CSSGrid items="{ path: '/' }" id="grid3">
					<grid:customLayout>
						<grid:GridBasicLayout
								gridTemplateColumns="1fr 2fr"
								gridGap="0.25rem 0.25rem">
						</grid:GridBasicLayout>
					</grid:customLayout>
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
						<layoutData>
							<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
						</layoutData>
						<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
						<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
					</VBox>
				</grid:CSSGrid>
			</content>
		</Panel>
		<Panel id="panel4" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin"  expandable="true" expanded="false">
			<headerToolbar>
				<Toolbar height="3rem">
					<Title text=" CssGrid: gridTemplateRows=1fr 2fr gridGap=0.25rem 0.25rem"/>
				</Toolbar>
			</headerToolbar>
			<content>
				<Slider value="100" app:mydata="grid4" liveChange="onSliderMoved" />
				<grid:CSSGrid id="grid4">
					<grid:customLayout>
						<grid:GridBasicLayout
								gridTemplateRows="2fr 1fr"
								gridGap="0.25rem 0.25rem">
						</grid:GridBasicLayout>
					</grid:customLayout>
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
						<layoutData>
							<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
						</layoutData>
						<Title text="Tile 1" wrapping="true" />
						<Label text="Tile 1 subtitle" wrapping="true" />
					</VBox>
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
						<layoutData>
							<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
						</layoutData>
						<Title text="Tile 2" wrapping="true" />
						<Label text="Tile 2 subtitle" wrapping="true" />
					</VBox>
				</grid:CSSGrid>
			</content>
		</Panel>
		<Panel id="panel5" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin"  expandable="true" expanded="false">
			<headerToolbar>
				<Toolbar height="3rem">
					<Title text=" CssGrid: Page Layout"/>
				</Toolbar>
			</headerToolbar>
			<content>
				<Slider value="100" app:mydata="grid5" liveChange="onSliderMoved" />
				<grid:CSSGrid id="grid5" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop">
					<grid:customLayout>
						<grid:GridBasicLayout
								gridTemplateColumns="auto 1fr"
								gridTemplateRows="repeat(3, 2fr)"
								gridGap="1rem">
						</grid:GridBasicLayout>
					</grid:customLayout>
					<grid:items>
						<core:HTML content='<header class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom stylePageLayout">Header</header>'>
							<core:layoutData>
								<grid:GridItemLayoutData
										gridColumn="1 / 4"/>
							</core:layoutData>
						</core:HTML>
						<core:HTML content='<aside  class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom stylePageLayout">Left Side Bar</aside >'>
						</core:HTML>
						<core:HTML content='<article class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom stylePageLayout">Main Content</article>'>
						</core:HTML>
						<core:HTML content='<footer class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom stylePageLayout">Footer</footer>'>
							<core:layoutData>
								<grid:GridItemLayoutData
										gridColumn="1 / 4"/>
							</core:layoutData>
						</core:HTML>
					</grid:items>
				</grid:CSSGrid>
			</content>
		</Panel>
	</content>
</Panel>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.layout.sample.GridAutoFlow.GridAutoFlow"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid">
	<ToggleButton
		id="revealGrid"
		text="Reveal Grid"
		press="onRevealGrid"
		class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
	<Panel width="100%" height="100%">
		<headerToolbar>
			<OverflowToolbar height="3rem">
				<Title text="gridAutoFlow property example" />
			</OverflowToolbar>
		</headerToolbar>
		<RadioButtonGroup class="sapUiSmallMargin" select=".onRadioButtonSelected">
			<RadioButton text="Column - Vertical placement in columns" />
			<RadioButton text="ColumnDense - Vertical placement in columns and filling empty spaces" />
			<RadioButton text="Row - Horizontal placement in rows" />
			<RadioButton text="RowDense - Horizontal placement in rows and filling empty spaces" />
		</RadioButtonGroup>
		<grid:CSSGrid
			id="grid1"
			gridAutoFlow="Column"
			gridTemplateColumns="repeat(7, 1fr)"
			gridTemplateRows="repeat(2, 5rem)"
			gridAutoRows="5rem"
			gridAutoColumns="1fr"
			gridGap="0.5rem">

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.layout.sample.GridAutoRows.GridAutoRows"
	xmlns="sap.m"

<mvc:View
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:f="sap.f"
		xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
		displayBlock="true"
		controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.GridContainer">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Title text="Card Layout"/>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>
		<content>
			<Panel headerText="Experimental switches">
				<HBox>
					<HBox alignItems="Center">
						<Label class="sapUiSmallMargin" text="Snap to Row:"/>
						<Switch change="onSnapToRowChange" state="false" />
					</HBox>
					<HBox alignItems="Center">
						<Label class="sapUiSmallMargin" text="Allow dense fill:"/>
						<Switch change="onDensityChange" state="false" />
					</HBox>
					<HBox alignItems="Center">
						<Label class="sapUiSmallMargin" text="Inline block layout:"/>
						<Switch change="onInlineBlockChange" state="false" />
					</HBox>
				</HBox>
			</Panel>

			<Panel headerText="Card Group 1">
				<HBox>
					<f:GridContainer id="grid1">
						<f:layoutXL>
							<f:GridContainerSettings columns="14" rowSize="84px" columnSize="84px" gap="8px" />
						</f:layoutXL>
						<f:layoutL>
							<f:GridContainerSettings columns="10" rowSize="84px" columnSize="84px" gap="8px" />
						</f:layoutL>
						<f:layoutM>
							<f:GridContainerSettings columns="6" rowSize="84px" columnSize="84px" gap="8px" />
						</f:layoutM>
						<f:layoutS>
							<f:GridContainerSettings columns="4" rowSize="84px" columnSize="84px" gap="8px" />
						</f:layoutS>
						<f:layoutXS>
							<f:GridContainerSettings columns="4" rowSize="70px" columnSize="70px" gap="8px" />
						</f:layoutXS>
						<f:items>
							<GenericTile header="Sales Fulfillment Application Title" subheader="Subtitle">
								<layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="2" />
								</layoutData>
								<TileContent unit="EUR" footer="Current Quarter">
									<ImageContent src="sap-icon://home-share" />
								</TileContent>
							</GenericTile>

							<GenericTile header="Manage Activity Master Data Type" subheader="Subtitle">
								<layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="2" columns="2" />
								</layoutData>
								<TileContent>
									<ImageContent src="sap-icon://activities" />
								</TileContent>
							</GenericTile>
							<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/listContent/card13}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="6" columns="3" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/listContent/card13}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData minRows="6" columns="3" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/analyticalLine/manifest.json">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<GenericTile header="Account" subheader="Your personal information">
								<layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="2" columns="2" />
								</layoutData>
								<TileContent>
									<ImageContent src="sap-icon://account" />
								</TileContent>
							</GenericTile>
							<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/analytical/smallDonut.json" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="2" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/listContent/card13}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/analyticalLine/manifest.json">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="5" columns="4" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/analyticalLine/manifest.json">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="5" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/analyticalLine/manifest.json">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="6" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/listContent/card13}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/analyticalLine/manifest.json">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/analyticalLine/manifest.json">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<w:Card manifest="{manifests>/listContent/card13}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="5" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
							<GenericTile header="Appointments management">
								<layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="2" columns="2" />
								</layoutData>
								<TileContent unit="EUR" footer="Current Quarter">
									<ImageContent src="sap-icon://appointment" />
								</TileContent>
							</GenericTile>
							<GenericTile header="Jessica D. Prince Senior Consultant" subheader="Department">
								<layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="2" columns="2" />
								</layoutData>
								<TileContent unit="EUR" footer="Current Quarter">
									<ImageContent src="sap-icon://activity-individual" />
								</TileContent>
							</GenericTile>
							<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/bundles/analyticalLine/manifest.json">
								<w:layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
								</w:layoutData>
							</w:Card>
						</f:items>
					</f:GridContainer>
				</HBox>
			</Panel>

			<Panel headerText="Card Group 2">
				<HBox>
					<f:GridContainer id="grid2">
						<f:layoutXL>
							<f:GridContainerSettings columns="14" rowSize="84px" columnSize="84px" gap="8px" />
						</f:layoutXL>
						<f:layoutL>
							<f:GridContainerSettings columns="10" rowSize="84px" columnSize="84px" gap="8px" />
						</f:layoutL>
						<f:layoutM>
							<f:GridContainerSettings columns="6" rowSize="84px" columnSize="84px" gap="8px" />
						</f:layoutM>
						<f:layoutS>
							<f:GridContainerSettings columns="4" rowSize="84px" columnSize="84px" gap="8px" />
						</f:layoutS>
						<f:layoutXS>
							<f:GridContainerSettings columns="4" rowSize="70px" columnSize="70px" gap="8px" />
						</f:layoutXS>
						<f:items>
							<GenericTile header="Comulative Tools" subheader="Expenses">
								<layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="2" columns="2" />
								</layoutData>
								<TileContent unit="Unit" footer="Footer Text">
									<NumericContent value="1762" icon="sap-icon://line-charts" />
								</TileContent>
							</GenericTile>

							<GenericTile header="Cumulative Totals" subheader="Subtitle">
								<layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="2" columns="2" />
								</layoutData>
									<TileContent unit="Unit" footer="Footer Text">
										<NumericContent value="12" />
									</TileContent>
							</GenericTile>

							<GenericTile header="Travel and Expenses" subheader="Access Concur">
								<layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="2" columns="2" />
								</layoutData>
								<TileContent>
									<ImageContent src="sap-icon://travel-expense" />
								</TileContent>
							</GenericTile>

							<GenericTile header="Success Map" subheader="Access Success Map">
								<layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="2" columns="2" />
								</layoutData>
								<TileContent unit="EUR" footer="Current Quarter">
									<ImageContent src="sap-icon://map-3" />
								</TileContent>
							</GenericTile>

							<GenericTile header="My Team Calendar">
								<layoutData>
									<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData rows="2" columns="2" />
								</layoutData>
								<TileContent unit="EUR" footer="Current Quarter">
									<ImageContent src="sap-icon://check-availability" />
								</TileContent>
							</GenericTile>

						</f:items>
					</f:GridContainer>
				</HBox>
			</Panel>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: GridData
code:
<mvc:View
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		controllerName="sap.ui.layout.sample.GridData.controller.GridData"
		class="GridDataSample">

	<l:VerticalLayout
			width="100%">

		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMargin"
				text="Use the sliders to resize the grids and observe their behaviour."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>



		<!--								-->
		<!--  INDIVIDUAL SPAN SIZING DEMOS	-->
		<!-- 								-->

		<Title
				level="H1"
				titleStyle="H1"
				text="Individual span sizing"
				class="sapUiLargeMarginTop sapUiMediumMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="The second child will always be 6 columns wide, regardless of the screen size."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"
				class="gridWrapper">
			<l:Grid
					containerQuery="true">
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv"></div>" />
				<core:HTML
						content="<div class="exampleDiv">
								<p>span: XL6 L6 M6 S6</p>
								</div>">
					<core:layoutData>
						<l:GridData span="XL6 L6 M6 S6"/>
					</core:layoutData>
				</core:HTML>
			</l:Grid>
		</l:VerticalLayout>



		<!--											-->
		<!--  OVERRIDING INDIVIDUAL SPAN SIZING DEMOS	-->
		<!-- 											-->

		<Title
				level="H1"
				titleStyle="H1"
				text="Overriding individual span sizing"
				class="sapUiLargeMarginTop sapUiMediumMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="Set both children to always be 6 columns wide and then reset the second one."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"
				class="gridWrapper">
			<l:Grid
					containerQuery="true">
				<core:HTML
						content="<div class="exampleDiv">
								<p>span: XL6 L6 M6 S6</p>
								</div>">
					<core:layoutData>
						<l:GridData span="XL6 L6 M6 S6"/>
					</core:layoutData>
				</core:HTML>
				<core:HTML
						content="<div class="exampleDiv">
									<div class="propertiesDisplay">
										<p>span: XL6 L6 M6 S6</p>
										<p>spanL/XL: 3</p>
										<p>spanM: 6</p>
										<p>spanS: 12</p>
									</div>
								</div>">
					<core:layoutData>
						<l:GridData
								span="XL6 L6 M6 S6"
								spanXL="3"
								spanL="3"
								spanM="6"
								spanS="12"/>
					</core:layoutData>
				</core:HTML>
			</l:Grid>
		</l:VerticalLayout>



		<!--								-->
		<!--  INDIVIDUAL INDENTATION DEMOS	-->
		<!-- 								-->

		<Title
				level="H1"
				titleStyle="H1"
				text="Individual indentation"
				class="sapUiLargeMarginTop sapUiMediumMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="The second child will be indented by 2 columns on XL screens and by 6 columns on L screens."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"
				class="gridWrapper">
			<l:Grid
					containerQuery="true">
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv"></div>" />
				<core:HTML
						content="<div class="exampleDiv">
								<p>indent: XL2 L6</p>
								</div>">
					<core:layoutData>
						<l:GridData indent="XL2 L6"/>
					</core:layoutData>
				</core:HTML>
			</l:Grid>
		</l:VerticalLayout>



		<!--											-->
		<!--  OVERRIDING INDIVIDUAL INDENTATION DEMOS	-->
		<!-- 											-->

		<Title
				level="H1"
				titleStyle="H1"
				text="Overriding individual indentation"
				class="sapUiLargeMarginTop sapUiMediumMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="Add indentation on the first child for M screens initially and then modify it to apply for larger screens too."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"
				class="gridWrapper">
			<l:Grid
					containerQuery="true">
				<core:HTML
						content="<div class="exampleDiv">
									<div class="propertiesDisplay">
										<p>indent: M4</p>
										<p>indentL/XL: 4</p>
									</div>
								</div>">
					<core:layoutData>
						<l:GridData
								indent="M4"
								indentXL="4"
								indentL="4"/>
					</core:layoutData>
				</core:HTML>
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv"></div>" />
			</l:Grid>
		</l:VerticalLayout>



		<!--											-->
		<!--  			LINEBREAKING DEMOS				-->
		<!-- 											-->

		<Title
				level="H1"
				titleStyle="H1"
				text="Linebreaking"
				class="sapUiLargeMarginTop sapUiMediumMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="The second child will cause a linebreak, regardless of other children's width."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"
				class="gridWrapper">
			<l:Grid
					containerQuery="true">
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv"></div>" />
				<core:HTML
						content="<div class="exampleDiv">
								<p>linebreak: true</p>
								</div>">
					<core:layoutData>
						<l:GridData
								linebreak="true"/>
					</core:layoutData>
				</core:HTML>
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv"></div>" />
			</l:Grid>
		</l:VerticalLayout>

		<FormattedText
				htmlText="<pre>defaultSpan: XL4 L4 M4 S4</pre>"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin sapUiLargeMarginTop">
		</FormattedText>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="Grid children will be 4 columns wide on all screen sizes for demo purposes."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="The middle child will cause a linebreak only on M screens."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"
				class="gridWrapper">
			<l:Grid
					containerQuery="true"
					defaultSpan="XL4 L4 M4 S4">
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv"></div>" />
				<core:HTML
						content="<div class="exampleDiv">
								<p>linebreakM: true</p>
								</div>">
					<core:layoutData>
						<l:GridData
								linebreakM="true"/>
					</core:layoutData>
				</core:HTML>
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv"></div>" />
			</l:Grid>
		</l:VerticalLayout>



		<!--											-->
		<!--  			VISIBILITY DEMOS				-->
		<!-- 											-->

		<Title
				level="H1"
				titleStyle="H1"
				text="Visibility"
				class="sapUiLargeMarginTop sapUiMediumMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin sapUiLargeMarginTop"
				text="This example shows three children, the middle of which is hidden.
						When it disappears from the screen, the next child will take it's place"
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"
				class="gridWrapper">
			<l:Grid
					containerQuery="true">
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv"></div>" />
				<core:HTML
						content="<div class="exampleDiv">
									<div class="propertiesDisplay">
										<p>visibleS: false</p>
										<p>visibleM: false</p>
										<p>visibleL: false</p>
										<p>visibleXL: false</p>
									</div>
								</div>">
					<core:layoutData>
						<l:GridData
								visibleS="false"
								visibleM="false"
								visibleL="false"
								visibleXL="false"/>
					</core:layoutData>
				</core:HTML>
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv"></div>" />
			</l:Grid>
		</l:VerticalLayout>

		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin sapUiLargeMarginTop"
				text="The children will be hidden one by one while the screen size gets smaller."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"

			<l:Grid

				</core:HTML>
				<core:HTML

										<p>visibleS: false</p>

								</div>">

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.layout.sample.GridGap.GridGap"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form">
	<Slider
		value="100"
		liveChange=".onSliderMoved"
		class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
	<Panel id="panelCSSGrid">
		<headerToolbar>
			<OverflowToolbar height="3rem">
				<Title text=" Property gridGap example" />
			</OverflowToolbar>
		</headerToolbar>
		<Text class="infoText" text="The gridGap property sets both Row and Column gap values. Setting gridRowGap or gridColumnGap will overwrite the corresponding gridGap values." />
		<form:SimpleForm
			editable="true"
			layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
			labelSpanXL="4"
			labelSpanL="3"
			labelSpanM="4"
			labelSpanS="12"
			adjustLabelSpan="false"
			emptySpanXL="0"
			emptySpanL="4"
			emptySpanM="0"
			emptySpanS="0"
			columnsXL="2"
			columnsL="1"
			columnsM="1"
			singleContainerFullSize="false">
			<Label labelFor="gg" text="gridGap" />
			<Input id="gg" width="120px" value="1rem 0.5rem" change=".onInputChanged"/>
			<Label labelFor="grg" text="gridRowGap" />
			<Input id="grg" width="60px" change=".onInputChanged"/>
			<Label labelFor="gcg" text="gridColumnGap" />
			<Input id="gcg" width="60px" change="onInputChanged"/>
		</form:SimpleForm>
		<grid:CSSGrid
			id="grid1"
			gridAutoFlow="Column"
			gridTemplateColumns="repeat(6, minmax(30px,1fr))"
			gridTemplateRows="repeat(2, 5rem)"
			gridAutoRows="2rem"
			gridGap="1rem 0.5rem">
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<layoutData>
					<grid:GridItemLayoutData gridRow = "1 / 3" />
				</layoutData>
				<Text text="One (2 rows, 1 column)" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="Two" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="Three" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<layoutData>
					<grid:GridItemLayoutData gridColumn = "3 / 5" />
				</layoutData>
				<Text text="Four (1 row, 2 columns)" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="Five" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="Six" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="Seven" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="Eight" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="Nine" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="Ten" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
		</grid:CSSGrid>
	</Panel>
</mvc:View>

title: GridListItems
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	controllerName="sap.f.gridlist.controller.Main">

	<f:GridList
		headerText="GridList with mode 'SingleSelectLeft' and BoxLayout"
		id="GridListSingleSelectLeft"
		mode="SingleSelectLeft"
		items="{ path: '/' }">

		<f:customLayout>
			<grid:GridBoxLayout/>
		</f:customLayout>

		<f:GridListItem
			counter="{counter}"
			highlight="{highlight}">
			<VBox height="100%">
				<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
					</layoutData>
					<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
					<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
				</VBox>
			</VBox>
		</f:GridListItem>
	</f:GridList>

	<f:GridList
		headerText="GridList with mode 'MultiSelect' and 'showUnread'"
		showUnread="true"
		id="GridListMultiSelect"
		mode="MultiSelect"
		items="{ path: '/' }">

		<f:customLayout>
			<grid:GridBasicLayout
				gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 16rem)"
				gridGap="0.5rem">
			</grid:GridBasicLayout>
		</f:customLayout>

		<f:GridListItem
			counter="{counter}"
			highlight="{highlight}"
			unread="{unread}"
			type="{type}"
			selected="false">

			<VBox height="100%">
				<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
					</layoutData>
					<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
					<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
				</VBox>
			</VBox>
		</f:GridListItem>
	</f:GridList>

	<f:GridList
		headerText="GridList with mode 'Delete' and 'showUnread'"
		showUnread="true"
		id="GridListDelete"
		mode="Delete"
		items="{ path: '/' }">

		<f:customLayout>
			<grid:GridBasicLayout
				gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 16rem)"
				gridGap="0.5rem">
			</grid:GridBasicLayout>
		</f:customLayout>

		<f:GridListItem
			counter="{counter}"
			highlight="{highlight}"
			unread="{unread}"
			type="{type}"
			selected="false">

			<VBox height="100%">
				<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
					</layoutData>
					<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
					<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
				</VBox>
			</VBox>
		</f:GridListItem>
	</f:GridList>

	<f:GridList
		headerText="GridList with mode 'SingleSelectMaster'"
		id="GridListSingleSelectMaster"
		mode="SingleSelectMaster"
		items="{ path: '/' }">

		<f:customLayout>
			<grid:GridBasicLayout
				gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 16rem)"
				gridGap="0.5rem">
			</grid:GridBasicLayout>
		</f:customLayout>

		<f:GridListItem
			counter="{counter}"
			highlight="{highlight}"
			type="{type}"
			selected="false">

			<VBox height="100%">
				<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
					</layoutData>
					<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
					<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
				</VBox>
			</VBox>
		</f:GridListItem>
	</f:GridList>

title: GridProperties
code:
<mvc:View
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		controllerName="sap.ui.layout.sample.GridProperties.controller.GridProperties"
		class="GridPropertiesSample">

	<l:VerticalLayout
			width="100%">

		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMargin"
				text="Use the sliders to resize the grids and observe their behaviour."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>


		<!--								-->
		<!--		SIZING DEMOS			-->
		<!-- 								-->

		<Title
				level="H1"
				titleStyle="H1"
				text="Children's size"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginTopBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>

		<FormattedText
				htmlText="<pre>defaultSpan: XL3 L3 M6 S12 (Default)</pre>"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin">
		</FormattedText>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="Each child should take 3 columns on XL and L screens, 6 columns on M screens and 12 columns on S screens."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"
				class="gridWrapper">
			<l:Grid
					containerQuery="true">
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
			</l:Grid>
		</l:VerticalLayout>


		<FormattedText
				htmlText="<pre>defaultSpan: XL2 L4</pre>"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin sapUiMediumMarginTop">
		</FormattedText>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="Modify children's size for only XL and L screens."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"
				class="gridWrapper">
			<l:Grid
					containerQuery="true"
					defaultSpan="XL2 L4">
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
			</l:Grid>
		</l:VerticalLayout>


		<!--								-->
		<!--		EMPTY COLUMNS DEMOS		-->
		<!-- 								-->


		<Title
				level="H1"
				titleStyle="H1"
				text="Empty columns before each child"
				class="sapUiLargeMarginTop sapUiMediumMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
		<FormattedText
				htmlText="<pre>defaultIndent: L1 M4 S6</pre>"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin">
		</FormattedText>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="Insert 1 empty column before each child on XL and L screens, 4 on M screens and 6 on S screens."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<FormattedText
				htmlText="<pre>defaultSpan: L6 M6 S6</pre>"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin">
		</FormattedText>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
				text="For demo purposes children take 6 columns on all screens."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true">
		</MessageStrip>
		<Slider value="100" liveChange="onSliderMoved" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"/>

		<l:VerticalLayout
				width="100%"
				class="gridWrapper">
			<l:Grid
					containerQuery="true"
					defaultIndent="L1 M4 S6"
					defaultSpan="L6 M6 S6">
				<core:HTML content="<div class="exampleDiv" />" />
			</l:Grid>
		</l:VerticalLayout>


		<FormattedText
				htmlText="<pre>defaultIndent: L1 M3</pre>"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin sapUiMediumMarginTop">
		</FormattedText>
		<MessageStrip
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginBegin"

title: GridResponsiveness

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.layout.sample.GridResponsiveness.GridResponsiveness"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form">
	<ToggleButton
		id="revealGrid"
		text="Reveal Grid"
		press="onRevealGrid"
		class="sapUiSmallMargin"/>
	<Slider
		value="100"
		liveChange=".onSliderMoved"
		class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
	<Panel id="panelCSSGrid">
		<headerToolbar>
			<OverflowToolbar height="3rem">
				<Title text="GridResponsiveness example" />
			</OverflowToolbar>
		</headerToolbar>
		<Text class="message sapUiSmallMarginBottom" id="infoTxt" width="100%" text="Layout size is: " />
		<Text text="Responsive behaviour is fully configurable by the developer. It is possible to pass a GridResponsiveLayout to the customLayout aggregation of the CSSGrid and configure how it will look in different breakpoints (S, M, L, XL). The breakpoints can be calculated either by the screen size or by the grid container (with containerQuery property)." />
		<HBox alignItems="Center" renderType="Bare" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom sapUiSmallMarginTop">
			<Text text="GridResponsiveLayout containerQuery:" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd" />
			<SegmentedButton selectionChange="onSegmentedButtonChange" selectedKey="false">
				<items>
					<SegmentedButtonItem key="true" text="true" />
					<SegmentedButtonItem key="false" text="false" />
				</items>
			</SegmentedButton>
		</HBox>
		<grid:CSSGrid id="grid1">
			<grid:customLayout>
				<grid:GridResponsiveLayout layoutChange="onLayoutChange">
					<grid:layoutS>
						<grid:GridSettings
							gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 8rem)"
							gridAutoRows="5rem"
							gridRowGap="1rem"
							gridColumnGap="1rem">
						</grid:GridSettings>
					</grid:layoutS>
					<grid:layout>
						<grid:GridSettings
							gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 12rem)"
							gridAutoRows="5rem"
							gridRowGap="1rem"
							gridColumnGap="1rem">
						</grid:GridSettings>
					</grid:layout>
					<grid:layoutXL>
						<grid:GridSettings
							gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 20rem)"
							gridAutoRows="5rem"
							gridRowGap="1rem"
							gridColumnGap="1rem">
						</grid:GridSettings>
					</grid:layoutXL>
				</grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
			</grid:customLayout>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="A" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="B" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="C" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="D" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="E" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="F" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="G" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="H" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="I" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="J" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="K" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Text text="L" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
		</grid:CSSGrid>
	</Panel>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.layout.sample.GridTemplateRows.GridTemplateRows"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form">
	<Slider
		value="100"
		liveChange=".onSliderMoved"
		class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
	<Panel id="panelCSSGrid">
		<headerToolbar>
			<OverflowToolbar height="3rem">
				<Title text="Properties gridTemplateRows and gridTemplateColumns example" />
			</OverflowToolbar>
		</headerToolbar>
		<form:SimpleForm
			editable="true"
			layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
			labelSpanXL="3"
			labelSpanL="3"
			labelSpanM="4"
			labelSpanS="12">
			<Label text="Change the value of Rows Template" />
			<ComboBox
				id="rTem"
				width="40%"
				selectedKey="rFr"
				change=".onInputChanged">
				<core:Item text="1fr 2fr 1fr" key="rFr" />
				<core:Item text="1fr 3fr 1fr" />
				<core:Item text="1fr 2fr 3fr" />
				<core:Item text="auto" />
				<core:Item text="40px 4em 40px" />
				<core:Item text="25% 40% 25%" />
				<core:Item text="minmax(10px, 100px) auto auto" />
				<core:Item text="repeat(3, 50px)" />
				<core:Item text="repeat(3, minmax(40px, 60px))" />
				<core:Item text="repeat(auto-fill, 50px)" />
			</ComboBox>
			<Label text="Change the value of Columns Template" />
			<ComboBox
				id="cTem"
				width="40%"
				value="1fr 1fr"
				selectedKey="cFr"
				change=".onInputChanged">
				<core:Item text="1fr 1fr" key="cFr" />
				<core:Item text="1fr 2fr" />
				<core:Item text="auto" />
				<core:Item text="400px auto" />
				<core:Item text="25% 50%" />
				<core:Item text="minmax(100px, 200px) auto" />
				<core:Item text="repeat(2, 150px)" />
				<core:Item text="repeat(2, minmax(120px, 1fr))" />
				<core:Item text="repeat(auto-fill, 200px)" />
			</ComboBox>
		</form:SimpleForm>
		<grid:CSSGrid
			id="grid1"
			gridTemplateRows="1fr 2fr 1fr"
			gridTemplateColumns="repeat(2,1fr)"
			gridGap="1rem">
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Title text="A Box" wrapping="true" />
				<Text text="A Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Title text="B Box" wrapping="true" />
				<Text text="B Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Title text="C Box" wrapping="true" />
				<Text text="C Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Title text="D Box" wrapping="true" />
				<Text text="D Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Title text="E Box" wrapping="true" />
				<Text text="E Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Title text="F Box" wrapping="true" />
				<Text text="F Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
		</grid:CSSGrid>
	</Panel>

			<Text text="{0/introText1}" class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom" />
			<Text text="{0/introText2}" class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom" />
			<Text text="{0/introText3}" class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom" />
		</l:VerticalLayout>
		<Image src="resources/sap/ui/documentation/sdk/images/demoAppsTeaser.png"
			densityAware="false" width="100%">
			<layoutData>
				<l:GridData visibleS="false" />
			</layoutData>
		</Image>
	</l:Grid>

	<l:Grid hSpacing="0" vSpacing="0" binding="{/InformationCollection}"
		class="sapUiSmallMargin" defaultSpan="XL5 L5 M5 S12" defaultIndent="XL1 L1 M1">
		<Title level="H2" titleStyle="H2" text="Products">
			<layoutData>
				<l:GridData span="XL12 L12 M12 S12" indent="XL0 L0 M0" />
			</layoutData>
		</Title>
		<Image src="{3/ProductPicUrl2}" densityAware="false" width="100%">
			<layoutData>
				<l:GridData moveForward="M6" />
			</layoutData>
		</Image>
		<Image src="{1/ProductPicUrl}" densityAware="false" width="100%">
			<layoutData>
				<l:GridData moveBackwards="M6" />
			</layoutData>
		</Image>
	</l:Grid>

	<l:Grid binding="{/InformationCollection}" hSpacing="0"
		defaultSpan="XL3 L5 M5 S12" class="sapUiSmallMargin">
		<Image src="{2/ProductPicUrl}" densityAware="false" width="100%">
			<layoutData>
				<l:GridData indent="XL1 L1 M1"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Image>
		<l:VerticalLayout class="sapUiTinyMargin">
			<Text text="{0/Description1}" class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom"/>
			<Text text="{0/Description2}" />
		</l:VerticalLayout>
		<Image src="{1/ProductPicUrl2}" densityAware="false" width="100%">
			<layoutData>
				<l:GridData linebreakXL="false" linebreakL="true"
					visibleM="false" visibleS="true" indent="L1"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Image>
	</l:Grid>
</mvc:View>

code:
<mvc:View
    xmlns="sap.m"
    xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
    xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
    controllerName="sap.f.gridlist.controller.Main">

    <f:GridList
		headerText="Grouping with auto row height"
		items="{
				path: '/',
				sorter: {
					path: 'group',
					descending: false,
					group: true
				}
			}">

        <f:customLayout>
            <grid:GridBasicLayout
				gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 8rem)"
				gridGap="0.25rem 0.25rem">
            </grid:GridBasicLayout>
        </f:customLayout>

		<CustomListItem>
			<VBox height="100%">
				<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
					</layoutData>
					<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
					<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
				</VBox>
			</VBox>
		</CustomListItem>
    </f:GridList>

</mvc:View>

		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
