			</layout:VerticalLayout>
			<m:Text width="200px"
					text="Hi, I'm Denise. I am passionate about what I do and I'll go the extra mile to make the customer win."/>

			<m:ObjectStatus text="In Stock" state="Error"/>
			<m:ObjectStatus title="Label" text="In Stock" state="Warning"/>
			<m:ObjectNumber number="1000" unit="SOOK" emphasized="false" state="Success"/>
			<m:ProgressIndicator
					percentValue="30"
					displayValue="30%"
					showValue="true"
					state="None"/>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Label text="PC, Unrestricted-Use Stock"/>
				<m:ObjectNumber class="sapMObjectNumberLarge" number="219" unit="K"/>

			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<layout:layoutData>
					<ObjectPageHeaderLayoutData visibleS="false"/>
				</layout:layoutData>
				<m:Label text="PC, Not in Small Size"/>
				<m:ObjectNumber class="sapMObjectNumberLarge" number="220" unit="K"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<layout:layoutData>
					<ObjectPageHeaderLayoutData visibleM="false"/>
				</layout:layoutData>
				<m:Label text="PC, Not in Medium Size"/>

			</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:layoutData>

			</layout:VerticalLayout>
			<m:ObjectAttribute title="Label" text="In Stock"/>
			<m:Button icon="sap-icon://nurse" tooltip="nurse"/>
			<m:Tokenizer>
				<m:Token text="Wayne Enterprises"/>

	</ObjectPageHeaderContent>

</mvc:View>

title: HelloPanel

<mvc:View
	controllerName="ui5.walkthrough.controller.HelloPanel"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
>
	<Panel
		headerText="{i18n>helloPanelTitle}"
		class="sapUiResponsiveMargin"
		width="auto"
		expandable="{device>/system/phone}"
		expanded="{= !${device>/system/phone} }"
		accessibleRole="Region"
	>
		<content>
			<Button
				id="helloDialogButton"
				icon="sap-icon://world"
				text="{i18n>openDialogButtonText}"
				press=".onOpenDialog"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd sapUiVisibleOnlyOnDesktop"
			/>
			<Button
				text="{i18n>showHelloButtonText}"
				press=".onShowHello"
				class="myCustomButton"
			/>
			<Input
				value="{/recipient/name}"
				valueLiveUpdate="true"
				width="60%"
			/>
			<FormattedText
				htmlText="Hello {/recipient/name}"
				class="sapUiSmallMargin sapThemeHighlight-asColor myCustomText"
			/>
		</content>
	</Panel>
</mvc:View>

title: Html
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	controllerName="sap.ui.core.sample.Html.static.Html"
>

	<Panel
		headerText="Static HTML Provided as a String"
	>
		<content>
			<FormattedText
				htmlText='<p>This is the simple use case for the HTML control: Some - usually decorative - HTML fragment is specified as a string and set to the content property. Without further configuration, the HTML control will convert this string to DOM nodes whenever it has to render.</p>
				<p>This example contains an HTML control. The content of the HTML control is defined by a longer string literal. Whenever the control is rendered, the string content is rendered as inner HTML and thereby converted to DOM nodes.</p>
				<p>After rendering, the DOM nodes can be modified by an action such as add node, remove node, modify attribute, or attach event handler, for example. You can click into the HTML control below to simulate such dynamic changes. But whenever the control is rendered again, the original HTML fragment is also rendered and new DOM nodes replace the existing modified ones. Check it with the Redraw button which invalidates and re-renders the HTML control.</p>'
			/>

			<l:HorizontalLayout id="staticContentLayout">
				<l:content>
					<Button text="Redraw" press="onRedraw" />
				</l:content>
			</l:HorizontalLayout>

		</content>
	</Panel>
</mvc:View>

title: Image
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.ImageModeBackground.controller.Image"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<l:VerticalLayout class="sapUiContentPadding" width="100%">
		<l:content>
				<l:Grid
					defaultSpan="XL3 L3 M6 S12">
					<l:content>
						<VBox
							alignItems="Center">
							<Image
								src="{img>/products/pic1}"
								mode="{/imageMode}"
								height="{/imageHeight}"
								width="{/imageWidth}" >
								<layoutData>
									<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
								</layoutData>
							</Image>
							<Text text="Background covers the entire container" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
						</VBox>
						<VBox
							alignItems="Center">
								<Image
									src="{img>/products/pic1}"
									mode="{/imageMode}"
									height="{/imageHeight}"
									backgroundSize="5em 5em"
									backgroundPosition="center"
									width="{/imageWidth}" >
									<layoutData>
										<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
									</layoutData>
								</Image>
							<Text text="Center placed background" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
						</VBox>
						<VBox
							alignItems="Center">

							<Image
								src="{img>/products/pic1}"
								mode="{/imageMode}"
								height="{/imageHeight}"
								backgroundSize="2em 2em"
								backgroundRepeat="repeat"
								width="{/imageWidth}" >
								<layoutData>
									<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
								</layoutData>
							</Image>
							<Text text="Repeating background" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
						</VBox>
						<VBox alignItems="Center">
							<HBox class="imageContainer">
								<Image
										src="{img>/products/pic3}"
										mode="{/imageMode}"
										height="{/imageHeight}"
										backgroundSize="contain"
										backgroundPosition="center center"
										width="6em" />
							</HBox>
							<Text text="The background adjusts its lower dimension in order to fit in the container" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
						</VBox>

<mvc:View
        controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.blocks.IndexEntryController"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.uxap"
		xmlns:m="sap.m"
		xmlns:custom="sap.ui.documentation"
		xmlns:app="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.CustomData/1">
	<m:List items="{ path: 'apis', templateShareable: false}"
			showSeparators="Inner"
			class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"
			width="auto">
			<m:items>
				<m:CustomListItem
						class="indexEntry">
					<custom:JSDocText text="{parts : [
						{path : 'control'},
						{path : 'entityName'},
						{path: 'type'},
						{path: 'static'},
						 {path: 'text'}],
						formatter : '.formatText'}"
						app:control="{control}"
						app:entity="{entityName}"
						app:type="{type}"
						app:static="{static}"
						app:text="{text}"/>
				</m:CustomListItem>
			</m:items>
	</m:List>
</mvc:View>

code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.demo.iconexplorer.controller.Info"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:card="sap.f.cards"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<f:DynamicPage
		toggleHeaderOnTitleClick="false"
		class="sapUiNoContentPadding"
		id="page">
			<f:title>
				<f:DynamicPageTitle>
					<f:heading>
						<VBox>
							<Breadcrumbs currentLocationText="{i18n>infoTitle}" separatorStyle="GreaterThan">
								<Link press="onIconExplorerLinkPressed" text="{i18n>appTitle}"/>

				<l:Grid class="sapUiSmallMarginTop">

						<f:layoutData>
							<l:GridData span="XL3 L4 M6 S12" />

							<VBox>
								<Image src='{info>/svgCard}' width="100%" />

									htmlText='<p>{i18n>infoIconsTileFirstParagraph}</p>

								<!-- SAPUI5 -->

									<core:Icon

									<core:Icon

										width='3rem'
										height='3rem'
										src="sap-icon://sap-logo-shape"
										backgroundColor="#DED3FF"
										color="#552CFF" />
									<Link text='{i18n>infoFioriWDQuartz}'

										href='https://experience.sap.com/internal/fiori-design-web/icons/' />
								</HBox>
								<HBox visible="{= !${versionData>/isOpenUI5}}" alignItems='Center'>
									<core:Icon
										size='1.5rem'

										height='3rem'
										src="sap-icon://wrench"
										backgroundColor="#C2FCEE"

								<HBox visible="{= !${versionData>/isOpenUI5}}" alignItems='Center' class='sapUiTinyMarginTop'>
									<core:Icon
										size='1.5rem'
										width='3rem'
										height='3rem'
										src="sap-icon://sap-ui5"
										backgroundColor="#FFF3B8"
										color="#A45D00" />
									<Link text='{i18n>infoIconAndIconPool}'
										wrapping="true"
										emphasized="true"
										class='sapUiSmallMarginBegin'
										href='https://sapui5.hana.ondemand.com/#/topic/21ea0ea94614480d9a910b2e93431291' />
								</HBox>

							</VBox>
						</f:content>
					</f:Card>
					<f:Card>
						<f:layoutData>
							<l:GridData linebreakM="{= !${versionData>/isOpenUI5}}" span="XL3 L3 M6 S12" />
						</f:layoutData>
						<f:header>
							<card:Header title="{i18n>infoDownloadIconFonts}" />
						</f:header>
						<f:content>
							<VBox class='sapUiSmallMargin' width="100%">
								<HBox visible="{= !${versionData>/isOpenUI5}}" alignItems='Center' justifyContent="SpaceBetween">
									<Text text='{i18n>infoSAPBusinessSuite}' />
									<Button press="onDownloadBusinessSuiteIcons" type="Transparent" icon='sap-icon://download' />
								</HBox>
								<HBox alignItems='Center' justifyContent="SpaceBetween">
									<Text text='{i18n>infoSAPIcons}' />
									<Button press="onDownloadSAPIcons" type="Transparent" icon='sap-icon://download' />
								</HBox>
								<HBox alignItems='Center' justifyContent="SpaceBetween">
									<Text text='{i18n>infoSAPIconsTNT}' />
									<Button press="onDownloadTNTIcons" type="Transparent" icon='sap-icon://download' />
								</HBox>
							</VBox>
						</f:content>
					</f:Card>
					<f:Card visible="{= !${versionData>/isOpenUI5}}">
						<f:layoutData>
							<l:GridData span="XL3 L3 M6 S12" />
						</f:layoutData>
						<f:header>
							<card:Header title="{i18n>infoFigmaTitle}" />

								<Link text='{i18n>sapIconGuidelines}'

						</f:content>
					</f:Card>
				</l:Grid>
			</f:content>
	</f:DynamicPage>

</mvc:View>

title: Issues
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	controllerName="sap.ui.support.supportRules.ui.controllers.Issues"
	height="100%"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:tnt="sap.tnt"
	xmlns:c="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:t="sap.ui.table"
	xmlns:trm="sap.ui.table.rowmodes"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<l:Splitter>
		<l:contentAreas>
			<Page class="sapUiSupportToolIssuesPage">
				<customHeader>
					<Toolbar id="filtersBar" height="{/filterBarHeight}" class="sapUiSupportToolToolbar">
							<tnt:ToolHeader id="toolHeader" class="sapUiSupportToolIssueHeader" height="4rem"  width="100%">
								<l:VerticalLayout>
									<l:layoutData>
										<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
									</l:layoutData>
									<Label text="Severity:" class="customMargin" />
									<Select id='severityFilter'
											change="updateIssuesVisibility"
											selectedKey="{/severityFilter}"
											items="{/severitiesFilter}"
											class="customMargin" >
										<c:ListItem key="{}" text="{}" />
									</Select>
								</l:VerticalLayout>
								<l:VerticalLayout>
									<l:layoutData>
										<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
									</l:layoutData>
									<Label text="Category:" class="customMargin" />
									<Select id='categoryFilter'
											change="updateIssuesVisibility"
											selectedKey="{/categoryFilter}"
											items="{/categoriesFilter}"
											class="customMargin">
										<c:ListItem key="{}" text="{}" />
									</Select>
								</l:VerticalLayout>
								<l:VerticalLayout>
									<l:layoutData>
										<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
									</l:layoutData>
									<Label text="Audiences:" class="customMargin" />
									<Select id='audiencesFilter'
											change="updateIssuesVisibility"
											selectedKey="{/audienceFilter}"
											items="{/audiencesFilter}"
											class="customMargin" >
										<c:ListItem key="{}" text="{}" />
									</Select>
								</l:VerticalLayout>
								<l:VerticalLayout>
									<l:layoutData>
										<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
									</l:layoutData>
									<Label text="" class="customMargin" />
								</l:VerticalLayout>
								<ToolbarSpacer />
							</tnt:ToolHeader>
							<l:VerticalLayout>
								<Label text="" class="customMargin" />
								<MenuButton id='ReportMenuButton' text="Report" icon="sap-icon://order-status" visible="{= ${/analyzePressed}}">
											<menu>
												<Menu itemSelected="onReportPress">
													<items>
														<MenuItem text="View" />
														<MenuItem text="Download" />
													</items>
												</Menu>
											</menu>
								</MenuButton>
							</l:VerticalLayout>
					</Toolbar>
				</customHeader>
				<subHeader>
					<Toolbar
						id="messegeStrip">
						<FlexBox
							alignItems="Center"
							justifyContent="Start">
							<items>
								<l:VerticalLayout>
									<Text  text="{= 'Displaying: ' + ${/visibleIssuesCount} + ' out of ' + ${/issuesCount} + ' (scope: ' + ${/analyzeContext/displayName} + ')' }"/>
								</l:VerticalLayout>
							</items>
						</FlexBox>
					</Toolbar>
				</subHeader>
				<content>
					<FlexBox
						alignItems="Center"
						justifyContent="End">
						<items>
							<Text text="{
								parts: [
								'/severityFilter',
								'/categoryFilter',
								'/audienceFilter',
								'/elementFilter'
								],
								formatter: '.formatter.filteredText'
								}">
									<layoutData>
										<FlexItemData growFactor="2" />
									</layoutData>
								</Text>
								<Button icon="sap-icon://clear-filter"  press="clearFiltersAndElementSelection" enabled="{/bEnabledFilterButton}">
									<layoutData>
										<FlexItemData growFactor="0" />
									</layoutData>
								</Button>
						</items>
					</FlexBox>
					<t:TreeTable
							id="issuesList"
							class="sapUiSupportToolIssuesTreeTable"
							selectionMode="Single"
							selectionBehavior="RowOnly"
							enableColumnReordering="false"
							rows="{path: '/issues'}"
							rowSelectionChange="onRowSelectionChanged">
						<t:rowMode>
							<trm:Auto rowContentHeight="24"/>
						</t:rowMode>
						<t:columns>
							<t:Column resizable="false">
								<Label text="Issues"/>
								<t:template>
									<FormattedText htmlText="{formattedName}"/>
								</t:template>
							</t:Column>
						</t:columns>
					</t:TreeTable>
				</content>
			</Page>
			<Page enableScrolling="false">
				<customHeader>
					<Bar class="selectedRuleTitle">
						<contentLeft>
							<Title text="{/selectedIssue/name}"/>
						</contentLeft>
					</Bar>
				</customHeader>
				<content>
					<Panel visible="{= ${/selectedIssue} !== null}" height="100%">
						<Text text="{/selectedIssue/description}" class="sapUiTinyMarginBeginEnd sapUiTinyMarginBottom" />
						<t:Table
							rows="{path: '/selectedIssue/issues'}"
							selectionMode="Single"
							selectionBehavior="RowOnly"
							enableColumnReordering="false"
							rowSelectionChange="onRowSelection"
							id="issueTable">
							<t:rowMode>
								<trm:Fixed rowContentHeight="24" rowCount="{/visibleRowCount}"/>
							</t:rowMode>
							<t:columns>
								<t:Column
									width="36px"
									resizable="false">
									<t:template>
										<c:Icon class="issuesSeverityIcon"
												color="{severityColor}"
												src="{severityIcon}">
											<c:layoutData>
												<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
											</c:layoutData>
										</c:Icon>
									</t:template>
								</t:Column>
								<t:Column
									sortProperty="context/id"
									filterProperty="context/id"
									resizable="false">
									<Label text="Control Id"/>
									<t:template>
										<Text text="{context/id}" wrapping="false" tooltip="{context/id}"></Text>
									</t:template>
								</t:Column>
								<t:Column
									sortProperty="context/className"
									filterProperty="context/className"
									resizable="false">
									<Label text="Class name"/>
									<t:template>
										<Text text="{context/className}" wrapping="false" tooltip="{context/className}"></Text>
									</t:template>
								</t:Column>
							</t:columns>
						</t:Table>
						<f:Form
							editable="true"
							visible="{= ${/visibleIssuesCount} > 0}">
							<f:layout>
								<f:ColumnLayout />
							</f:layout>
							<f:formContainers>
								<f:FormContainer>
									<f:formElements>
										<f:FormElement label="Details">
											<f:fields>
												<Text
														text="{/selectedIssue/details}"
														width="100%"
														visible="{= ${/selectedIssue/details} !== ''}"/>
											</f:fields>
										</f:FormElement>
										<f:FormElement label="Resolution">
											<f:fields>
												<Text text="{/selectedIssue/resolution}" />
											</f:fields>
										</f:FormElement>
										<f:FormElement label="URLs"
													   visible="{
															parts: [
																'/selectedIssue/resolutionUrls'
															],
															formatter: '.formatter.hasResolutionUrls'
														}"
													   fields="{/selectedIssue/resolutionUrls}">
											<f:fields>
												<Link text="{
														parts: [
															'/selectedIssue/resolutionUrls',
															''
														],
														formatter: '.formatter.resolutionUrl'
													}" press="openDocumentation">
													<layoutData>
														<f:ColumnElementData cellsLarge="8" cellsSmall="12" />
													</layoutData>
												</Link>
											</f:fields>
										</f:FormElement>
									</f:formElements>
								</f:FormContainer>
							</f:formContainers>
						</f:Form>
					</Panel>
				</content>
			</Page>
			<c:HTML id="elementTreeContainer" content='<control-tree>  </control-tree>'>
			</c:HTML>
		</l:contentAreas>
	</l:Splitter>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:goals="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.goals"
	xmlns:personal="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.personal"
	controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.KPIObjectPageHeader.controller.KPIObjectPageHeader"
	height="100%">
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout" upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader id="headerForTest"
							  objectTitle="Generic T-Shirt Fa, SIZE AS, Colour blau"
							  objectSubtitle="AAUFSA000100003002">

				<actions>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://action" text="Open in..." tooltip="action"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://refresh" text="change design" tooltip="refresh"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageHeader>
		</headerTitle>
		<headerContent>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Label text="PC, Unrestricted-Use Stock"/>
				<m:ObjectNumber class="sapMObjectNumberLarge" number="219" unit="K"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Label text="Article Category"/>
				<m:ObjectAttribute text="Single Material"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Label text="Article Type"/>
				<m:ObjectAttribute text="Trading Goods"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
		</headerContent>
		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="2014 Goals Plan">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title=" " titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
							<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
							<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
							<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="paymentSubSection" title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: LayerContentMaster
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m" controllerName="sap.ui.fl.support.apps.contentbrowser.controller.LayerContentMaster">
	<Page
			showNavButton="true"
			navButtonPress=".navBack">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<SearchField
					id="search"
					liveChange="onSearch"
					width="100%" />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>
		<content>
			<List
				id="masterComponentsList"
				growing="true"
				growingThreshold="100"
				growingScrollToLoad="true"
				items="{content>/}">
				<items>
					<StandardListItem
						title="{content>name}"
						description="{path: 'content>fileType'}"
						type="Active"
						press="onContentSelected"
						visible="{path: 'content>', formatter: '.oDataUtils.isNotExcluded'}"
						icon="{= ${content>fileType} ? 'sap-icon://document' : 'sap-icon://folder-full'}">
					</StandardListItem>
				</items>
			</List>
		</content>
		<footer>
			<Toolbar>
				<Button
					icon="sap-icon://alert"
					text="{messages>/length}"
					type="Emphasized"
					press=".handleMessagePopoverPress"
					visible="{= ${messages>/length} > 0 }"/>
			</Toolbar>
		</footer>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

					press="onLayerSelected"

					text="{messages>/length}"
					type="Emphasized"
					press=".handleMessagePopoverPress"/>

		</footer>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

						style="Emphasized"
						placeholder="Choose a file for Upload..."/>
				<Label text="Manufacturing date"/>
				<DatePicker
						id="DP3"
						displayFormat="short"/>

				<SegmentedButton selectedItem="inStock">
					<items>

						<SegmentedButtonItem text="In depot"/>
						<SegmentedButtonItem text="In repository"/>
						<SegmentedButtonItem text="Out of stock"/>

					<core:Item key="Y" text="Y"/>
					<core:Item key="Z" text="Z"/>

					title="Pricing"
					activate="onActivate">
			<MessageStrip class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"

				<CheckBox selected="{/productVAT}"/>
			</form:SimpleForm>
		</WizardStep>
	</Wizard>

title: ListFormat
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout" xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	displayBlock="true"> 
	<App>
		<Page title="ListFormat" enableScrolling="false">
			<layout:Splitter>
				<layout:VerticalLayout width="100%">
						<form:SimpleForm layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" width="100%" editable="true">

							<core:Title text="ListFormatter" />

							<Label text="Format Options" />
							<TextArea id="formatOptions" class="large" editable="false" rows="3"
								value="{path:'/formatOptions', formatter: '.formatFormatOptions'}"
							/>

							<Label text="Type" />
							<Select change=".onTypeChange">
								<core:Item key="standard" text="standard" />
								<core:Item key="or" text="or" />
							</Select>

							<Label text="Style" />
							<Select change=".onStyleChange">
								<core:Item key="wide" text="wide" />
								<core:Item key="short" text="short" />
							</Select>

						</form:SimpleForm>

						<form:SimpleForm layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" columnsL="1" width="100%" editable="true">

							<core:Title text="Input" />

							<Label text="Array" />
							<Input class="large" 
									value="{
										path: '/parsedValueDisplay',
										bindingMode: 'OneWay'
									}"
									liveChange=".onInputLiveChange" />

							<Label text="String" />
							<Input class="large" 
									value="{
										path: '/formattedValue',
										bindingMode: 'OneWay'
									}"
									liveChange=".onStringLiveChange" />

						</form:SimpleForm>
						
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout width="90%">

						<List class="margin" items="{/locales}">
							<LocaleListItem xmlns="local"
									locale="{}"
									text="{
										parts: ['/parsedValue',  ''],
										formatter: '.formatLocaleText'
									}"
							/>
						</List>

				</layout:VerticalLayout>

			</layout:Splitter>
		</Page>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

title: LiveEditor
code:
<mvc:View
        controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.LiveEditor"
        xmlns="sap.m"
        xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
        xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
        xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
        xmlns:custom="sap.ui.documentation"
        xmlns:editor="sap.ui.codeeditor"
        class="liveEditor">
        <Page
		id="liveEditorPage"
		showSubHeader="false"
		showFooter="false"
		showNavButton="true"
        enableScrolling="false"
		title="{i18n>LIVE_EDITOR_TITLE}"
		navButtonPress="onNavButtonPress">
        <custom:DivContainer class="editorWrapper">
            <custom:DivContainer>
                <IconTabHeader selectedKey="{viewModel>/selectedFileName}" select="onFileSwitch">
                    <items>
                        <IconTabFilter text="App.view.xml" key="App.view.xml"/>
                        <IconTabFilter text="App.controller.js" key="App.controller.js"/>
                        <IconTabFilter text="index.js" key="index.js"/>
                        <IconTabFilter text="index.html" key="index.html"/>
                    </items>
                </IconTabHeader>
                <custom:DivContainer class="editorSrcWindow">
                    <editor:CodeEditor id="srcEditor"
                                       editable="{= ${viewModel>/selectedFileType} !== 'text' }"
                                       value="{viewModel>/selectedFileContent}"
                                       type="{viewModel>/selectedFileType}"
                                       liveChange="onSrcLiveChange"/>
                </custom:DivContainer>
            </custom:DivContainer>

            <VBox id="resultBox" class="liveEditorResultBox" width="100%" height="100%">
                <Toolbar style="Clear" class="editorToolbar">
                    <Button text="{i18n>LIVE_EDITOR_PREVIEW_BTN}"
                            press="requestExecuteCurrentSrc"
                            enabled="{= !${viewModel>/autoPreview}}"/>
                    <CheckBox text="{i18n>LIVE_EDITOR_LIVE_PREVIEW_TEXT}"
                              selected="{viewModel>/autoPreview}"/>
                </Toolbar>
                <core:HTML id="outputWindowWrapper" class="outputWindowWrapper" content="<div class="outputWindowWrapper"></div>">
                    <core:layoutData>
                        <FlexItemData growFactor="1"></FlexItemData>
                    </core:layoutData>
                </core:HTML>
            </VBox>
        </custom:DivContainer>
    </Page>

</mvc:View>

title: ManifestResolver
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.ManifestResolver"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:editor="sap.ui.codeeditor"
	displayBlock="true">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}" enableScrolling="false">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Title text="Resolve Manifest" />
				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>
		<VBox renderType="Bare" height="100%">
			<form:SimpleForm
				layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
				editable="true"
				labelSpanXL="2"
				labelSpanL="2"
				labelSpanM="2"
				labelSpanS="12"
				emptySpanXL="7"
				emptySpanL="6"
				emptySpanM="2"
				emptySpanS="0">
				<Label labelFor="manifestId" text="Manifest" />
				<Select id="manifestId" selectedKey="objectCard" change=".onManifestChange">
					<core:Item text="Object Card" key="objectCard" />
					<core:Item text="Object Card Form Inputs" key="objectCardFormInputs" />
					<core:Item text="Calendar Card" key="calendarCard" />
					<core:Item text="List Card" key="listCard" />
					<core:Item text="List Card with Grouping" key="listCardGrouping" />
					<core:Item text="List Card No Data" key="listCardNoData" />
					<core:Item text="Card with Dynamic Status Text" key="dynamicStatusText" />
					<core:Item text="List Card with Bullet Graph and Actions" key="listCardBulletGraphActions" />
					<core:Item text="List Card with Stacked Bar Chart" key="stackedBar" />
					<core:Item text="List Card with Data Error" key="withDataError" />
					<core:Item text="Table Card 1" key="tableCard1" />
					<core:Item text="Table Card 2" key="tableCard2" />
					<core:Item text="Table Card with Grouping" key="tableCardGroups" />
					<core:Item text="Table Card No Data" key="tableCardNoData" />
					<core:Item text="Timeline Card" key="timelineCard" />
					<core:Item text="Card with Filters" key="filtersCard" />
					<core:Item text="Card with Severe Error" key="cardWithSevereError" />
					<core:Item text="Card with Extension" key="cardWithExtension" />
				</Select>

				<Label text="baseUrl" labelFor="baseUrlInp" />
				<Input id="baseUrlInp" />

				<Label />
				<Button text="Resolve manifest" width="10rem" press=".onResolveManifestPress" />
			</form:SimpleForm>

			<MessageStrip id="error" type="Error" visible="false" />
			<HBox>
				<layoutData>
					<FlexItemData minHeight="0" growFactor="1"></FlexItemData>
				</layoutData>
				<VBox>
					<Title text="Manifest" class="sapUiTinyMargin" />
					<editor:CodeEditor
						id="editor"
						type="json">
						<editor:layoutData>

						</editor:layoutData>
					</editor:CodeEditor>
					<layoutData>

					</layoutData>

			</HBox>
		</VBox>

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.core.sample.odata.v4.MusicArtists.MasterList"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<Page id="masterList" title="Artist List">
		<List class="sapUiResponsiveMargin" growing="true" growingThreshold="10" id="Artists"
			items="{
				filters : {
					path : 'IsActiveEntity',
					operator : 'EQ',
					value1 : 'true'
				},
				sorter : {
					path : 'CreatedAt'
				},
				path : '/Artists'
			}"
			width="auto">
			<headerToolbar>
				<Toolbar>
					<ToolbarSpacer/>
					<Button press=".onCreate" text="Create"/>
					<ToolbarSeparator/>
					<Button press=".onRefresh" text="Refresh"/>
				</Toolbar>
			</headerToolbar>
			<items>
				<ObjectListItem number="{FoundingYear}" press=".onSelect" title="{Name}"
					type="Active">
				<firstStatus>
					<ObjectStatus state="None"
						text="{= %{HasDraftEntity} === true ? 'Draft' : '' }"/>
				</firstStatus>
				<attributes>
					<ObjectAttribute text="{CountryOfOrigin_Text}"/>
				</attributes>
			</ObjectListItem>
			</items>
		</List>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: MB
code:
<mvc:View controllerName="sap.m.sample.MenuButton.MB"
			height="100%"
			xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
			xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
			xmlns="sap.m">

	<OverflowToolbar>
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
		<Label text = "In a toolbar"/>
		<MenuButton text="File">
			<menu>
				<Menu>
					<MenuItem text="Edit" icon="sap-icon://edit" press="onPress">
						<customData>
							<core:CustomData
								key="target"
								value="p1" />
						</customData>
					</MenuItem>
					<MenuItem text="Save" icon="sap-icon://save" press="onPress" />
					<MenuItem text="Open" icon="sap-icon://open-folder" press="onPress" />
				</Menu>
			</menu>
		</MenuButton>
		<MenuButton text="Calculator" buttonMode="Split" useDefaultActionOnly="true">
			<menu>
				<Menu itemSelected="onMenuAction">
					<MenuItem text="basic" icon="sap-icon://chalkboard">
						<items>
							<MenuItem text="add" icon="sap-icon://add" />
							<MenuItem text="subtract" icon="sap-icon://less" />
							<MenuItem text="multiply" icon="sap-icon://decline" />
						</items>
					</MenuItem>
					<MenuItem text="complex" icon="sap-icon://display">
						<items>
							<MenuItem text="square" icon="sap-icon://status-completed" />
						</items>
					</MenuItem>
				</Menu>
			</menu>
		</MenuButton>
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
	</OverflowToolbar>

	<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
		<Label text = "With a complex menu"/>
		<MenuButton text="Calculator" buttonMode="Split" useDefaultActionOnly="true">
			<menu>
				<Menu itemSelected="onMenuAction">
					<MenuItem text="basic" icon="sap-icon://chalkboard">
						<items>
							<MenuItem text="add" icon="sap-icon://add" />
							<MenuItem text="subtract" icon="sap-icon://less" />
							<MenuItem text="multiply" icon="sap-icon://decline" />
						</items>
					</MenuItem>
					<MenuItem text="complex" icon="sap-icon://display">
						<items>
							<MenuItem text="square" icon="sap-icon://status-completed" />
						</items>
					</MenuItem>
				</Menu>
			</menu>
		</MenuButton>

		<Label text = "Regular mode button"/>
		<MenuButton text="File">
			<menu>
				<Menu itemSelected="onMenuAction">
					<MenuItem text="Edit" icon="sap-icon://edit" />
					<MenuItem text="Save" icon="sap-icon://save" />
					<MenuItem text="Open" icon="sap-icon://open-folder" />
				</Menu>
			</menu>
		</MenuButton>

		<Label text = "Split mode button with associated last action"/>
		<MenuButton text="File Menu" buttonMode="Split" defaultAction="onDefaultAction" beforeMenuOpen="onBeforeMenuOpen">
			<menu>
				<Menu itemSelected="onMenuAction">
					<MenuItem text="Edit" icon="sap-icon://edit" />
					<MenuItem text="Save" icon="sap-icon://save" />
					<MenuItem text="Open" icon="sap-icon://open-folder" />
				</Menu>
			</menu>
		</MenuButton>

		<Label text = "Split mode button with associated last action with initial icon"/>
		<MenuButton text="File Menu" buttonMode="Split" defaultAction="onDefaultAction" beforeMenuOpen="onBeforeMenuOpen">
			<menu>
				<Menu itemSelected="onMenuAction">
					<MenuItem text="Edit" icon="sap-icon://edit" />
					<MenuItem text="Save" icon="sap-icon://save" />
					<MenuItem text="Open" icon="sap-icon://open-folder" />
				</Menu>
			</menu>
		</MenuButton>

		<Label text = "Split mode button with default action only"/>
		<MenuButton text="File Menu" buttonMode="Split" defaultAction="onDefaultAction" beforeMenuOpen="onBeforeMenuOpen" useDefaultActionOnly="true">
			<menu>
				<Menu itemSelected="onMenuAction">
					<MenuItem text="Edit" icon="sap-icon://edit" />
					<MenuItem text="Save" icon="sap-icon://save" />
					<MenuItem text="Open" icon="sap-icon://open-folder" />
				</Menu>
			</menu>
		</MenuButton>

		<Label text = "Split mode with type Accept and constant default action"/>
		<MenuButton text="Accept" buttonMode="Split" type="Accept" defaultAction="onDefaultActionAccept" beforeMenuOpen="onBeforeMenuOpen" useDefaultActionOnly="true">
			<menu>
				<Menu itemSelected="onMenuAction">
					<MenuItem text="Send the response now" icon="sap-icon://response" />
					<MenuItem text="Edit the response before sending" icon="sap-icon://edit-outside" />
					<MenuItem text="Do not send a response" icon="sap-icon://action" />
				</Menu>
			</menu>
		</MenuButton>

		<Label text = "Menu button with menuPosition set to Right Bottom which in RTL will stay on the Right"/>
		<MenuButton text="File Menu" defaultAction="onDefaultAction" beforeMenuOpen="onBeforeMenuOpen" useDefaultActionOnly="true" menuPosition="RightBottom">
			<menu>
				<Menu itemSelected="onMenuAction">
					<MenuItem text="Edit" icon="sap-icon://edit" />
					<MenuItem text="Save" icon="sap-icon://save" />
					<MenuItem text="Open" icon="sap-icon://open-folder" />
				</Menu>
			</menu>
		</MenuButton>

	<Label text = "Menu button with menuPosition set to Begin Bottom. This way the menu in LTR will be positioned on the left and in RTL on the Right."/>
		<MenuButton text="Calculator" useDefaultActionOnly="true" menuPosition="BeginBottom">
			<menu>
				<Menu itemSelected="onMenuAction">
					<MenuItem text="basic" icon="sap-icon://chalkboard">
						<items>
							<MenuItem text="add" icon="sap-icon://add" />
							<MenuItem text="subtract" icon="sap-icon://less" />
							<MenuItem text="multiply" icon="sap-icon://decline" />
						</items>
					</MenuItem>
					<MenuItem text="complex" icon="sap-icon://display">
						<items>
							<MenuItem text="square" icon="sap-icon://status-completed" />
						</items>
					</MenuItem>
				</Menu>
			</menu>
		</MenuButton>
	</VBox>
</mvc:View>

title: MessagePopoverMessageHandling
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.m.sample.MessagePopoverMessageHandling.controller.MessagePopoverMessageHandling"
		height="100%"
		xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns="sap.m">
	<Page id="messageHandlingPage" showHeader="false">
		<content>
			<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin" id="formContainer" items="{
					path: '/forms'
				}">
				<f:SimpleForm id="SimpleFormChangeColumn_twoGroups234"
							  editable="true"
							  layout="ColumnLayout"
							  title="Personal"
							  columnsM="2"
							  columnsL="2"
							  columnsXL="2">
					<f:content>
						<core:Title text="Information" />
						<Label text="Name" />
						<Input required="true" change="onChange" value="{
							path : 'name',
							type : 'sap.ui.model.type.String'
						}"/>
						<Label text="Street/No." />
						<Input value="{street/name}">
						</Input>
						<Input value="{street/number}">
							<layoutData>
								<f:ColumnElementData cellsSmall="2" cellsLarge="2" />
							</layoutData>
						</Input>
						<Label text="ZIP Code/City" />
						<Input value="{
							path : 'zip/code',
							type : 'sap.ui.model.type.Integer'}">
							<layoutData>
								<f:ColumnElementData cellsSmall="3" cellsLarge="2" />
							</layoutData>
						</Input>
						<Input value="{zip/city}" />
						<Label text="Country" />
						<Select id="country" selectedKey="{country}">
							<items>
								<core:Item text="England" key="England"/>
								<core:Item text="Germany" key="Germany"/>
								<core:Item text="USA" key="USA"/>
							</items>
						</Select>
						<core:Title text="Contact" />
						<Label text="Email" />
						<Input value="{
							path : 'email',
							type : 'sap.ui.model.type.String',
							constraints: {
								search: '^\\w+[\\w-+\\.]*\\@[a-zA-Z]+.[a-zA-Z]+'
								}
							}"/>
						<Label text="Phone Number" />
						<Input value="{phone/number}">
						</Input>
						<Input value="{phone/time}">
							<layoutData>
								<f:ColumnElementData cellsSmall="2" cellsLarge="2" />
							</layoutData>
						</Input>
						<Label text="Personal website" />
						<Input value="{website}"/>
					</f:content>
				</f:SimpleForm>
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin" id="formContainerEmployment" items="{
					path: '/employment'
				}">
				<f:SimpleForm editable="true"
							  layout="ColumnLayout"
							  title="Personal"
							  columnsM="2"
							  columnsL="2"
							  columnsXL="2">
					<f:content>
						<core:Title text="Information" />
						<Label text="Job Classification" />
						<Input value="{jobTitle}"/>
						<Label text="Pay Grade" />
						<Input value="{payGrade}">
						</Input>
						<Label text="Standard Weekly Hours" />
						<Input change="onChange" value="{
							path: 'weeklyHours',
							type: 'sap.ui.model.type.Integer',
							constraints: {
								maximum: 40
							}
						}">
						</Input>
						<core:Title text="Rating" />
						<Label text="Unit" />
						<Input value="{unit}">
						</Input>
						<Label text="Employee Class" />
						<Input value="{class}"/>
						<Label text="FTE" />
						<Input value="{fte}">
						</Input>
					</f:content>
				</f:SimpleForm>
			</VBox>
		</content>
		<footer>
			<OverflowToolbar>
				<Button id="messagePopoverBtn"
					visible="{=!!${message>/}.length}"
					icon="{ path: '/', formatter: '.buttonIconFormatter' }"
					type="{ path: '/', formatter: '.buttonTypeFormatter' }"
					text= "{path: '/', formatter: '.highestSeverityMessages' }"
					press=".handleMessagePopoverPress"
					ariaHasPopup="Dialog"/>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
				<Button type="Emphasized" text="Save" press="generateInvalidUserInput" />
				<Button text="Cancel" />
			</OverflowToolbar>
		</footer>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: MessageStrip
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<l:VerticalLayout
		class="sapUiContentPadding"
		width="100%">
		<l:content>

			<MessageStrip
				text="Default (Information) with default icon and close button:"
				showIcon="true"
				showCloseButton="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			</MessageStrip>

			<MessageStrip
				text="Error with default icon and close button:"
				type="Error"
				showIcon="true"
				showCloseButton="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			</MessageStrip>

			<MessageStrip
				text="Warning with default icon and close button:"
				type="Warning"
				showIcon="true"
				showCloseButton="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			</MessageStrip>

			<MessageStrip
				text="Success with default icon and close button:"
				type="Success"
				showIcon="true"
				showCloseButton="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			</MessageStrip>

			<MessageStrip
				text="Information with default icon."
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			</MessageStrip>

			<MessageStrip
				text="Information with custom icon"
				type="Information"
				showIcon="true"
				customIcon="sap-icon://locked"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			</MessageStrip>

			<MessageStrip
				text="Error with link"
				type="Error"
				showCloseButton="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
				<link>
					<Link text="Open SAP Homepage"
						target="_blank"
						href="http://www.sap.com" />
				</link>
			</MessageStrip>

		</l:content>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: MessageStripWithEnableFormattedText

<mvc:View
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.MessageStripWithEnableFormattedText.controller.MessageStripWithEnableFormattedText">
	<l:VerticalLayout
		class="sapUiContentPadding"
		width="100%">
		<l:content>

			<MessageStrip
				text="{/default}"
				enableFormattedText="true"
				showIcon="true"
				showCloseButton="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			</MessageStrip>

			<MessageStrip
				text="{/error}"
				type="Error"
				enableFormattedText="true"
				showIcon="true"
				showCloseButton="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			</MessageStrip>

			<MessageStrip
				text="{/warning}"
				type="Warning"
				enableFormattedText="true"
				showIcon="true"
				showCloseButton="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			</MessageStrip>

			<MessageStrip
				text="{/success}"
				type="Success"
				enableFormattedText="true"
				showIcon="true"
				showCloseButton="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			</MessageStrip>

			<MessageStrip
				text="Information with multiple links %%0 %%1 %%2"
				enableFormattedText="true"
				showIcon="true"
				showCloseButton="true"
				class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom"
			>
				<controls>
					<Link href="http://www.sap.com" text="Link 1" />
					<Link href="http://www.sap.com" text="Link 2" />
					<Link href="http://www.sap.com" text="Link 3" />

			</MessageStrip>
		</l:content>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: MessageViewMessageManager
code:
<mvc:View height="100%" controllerName="sap.m.sample.MessageViewMessageManager.controller.MessageViewMessageManager"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Page id="messageHandlingPage" showHeader="false">
		<MessageView items="{message>/}">
			<MessageItem
				type="{message>type}"
				title="{message>message}"
				subtitle="{message>additionalText}"
				description="{message>description}">
			</MessageItem>
		</MessageView>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: MinHeight
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.MinHeight"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:cards="sap.f.cards"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	displayBlock="true">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Title text="Min height of the card content" />
				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>
		<mvc:View viewName="sap.f.cardsdemo.view.common.CommonCardSettings" type="XML" async="true"></mvc:View>
		<Panel>
			<w:Card
				id="donutChart"
				manifest="{manifests>/minHeight/donut}"
				baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}"
				width="400px"
				class="sapUiTinyMargin" />
			<w:Card
				id="largeList"
				manifest="{manifests>/minHeight/largeList}"
				baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}"
				width="400px"
				class="sapUiTinyMargin" />
			<w:Card
				id="staticData"
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/objectcontent/staticData.json"
				width="400px"
				class="sapUiTinyMargin" />
			<w:Card
				id="noContent"
				manifest="{manifests>/minHeight/noContent}"
				baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}"
				width="400px"
				class="sapUiTinyMargin" />
			<f:Card
				id="sapFCardMinHeight"
				width="400px"
				class="sapUiTinyMargin">
				<f:header>
					<cards:Header title="sap.f.Card (no default min-height)"></cards:Header>
				</f:header>
			</f:Card>
			<w:Card
				id="webPageCard"
				width="400px"
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/webPageMinHeight/manifest.json"
				class="sapUiTinyMargin">
			</w:Card>
		</Panel>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: MultiComboBoxSuggestionsAndValueState
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.MultiComboBoxSuggestionsAndValueState.controller.MultiComboBoxSuggestionsAndValueState"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Page showHeader="false">
		<l:VerticalLayout
			class="sapUiContentPadding"
			width="100%">
			<Label text="MultiComboBox with suggestions and success value state with a a long message:"/>
			<MultiComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
				maxWidth="500px"
				valueState="Success"
				valueStateText="Success message. Extra long text used as a success message. Extra long text used as a success message - 2. Extra long text used as a success message."
				items="{
					path: '/ProductCollection',
					sorter: { path: 'Name' }
				}">
				<core:Item key="{ProductId}" text="{Name}" />
			</MultiComboBox>
			<Label text="MultiComboBox with suggestions and information value state with a a long message:"/>
			<MultiComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
				maxWidth="500px"
				valueState="Information"
				valueStateText="Information message. Extra long text used as a information message. Extra long text used as a information message - 2. Extra long text used as a information message."
				items="{
					path: '/ProductCollection',
					sorter: { path: 'Name' }
				}">
				<core:Item key="{ProductId}" text="{Name}" />
			</MultiComboBox>
			<Label text="MultiComboBox with suggestions and an information value state with multiple links:"/>
			<MultiComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
				maxWidth="500px"
				valueState="Information"
				items="{
					path: '/ProductCollection',
					sorter: { path: 'Name' }
				}">
				<core:Item key="{ProductId}" text="{Name}" />
				<formattedValueStateText>
					<FormattedText htmlText="Value state with FormattedText used as an information message containing %%0 %%1." >
						<controls>
							<Link text="multiple" href="" press=".handleValueStateLinkPress" />
							<Link text="links" href="" press=".handleValueStateLinkPress" />

						</controls>
					</FormattedText>
				</formattedValueStateText>
			</MultiComboBox>
			<Label text="MultiComboBox with suggestions and warning value state with a a long message:"/>
			<MultiComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
				maxWidth="500px"
				valueState="Warning"
				valueStateText="Warning message. Extra long text used as a warning message. Extra long text used as a information message - 2. Extra long text used as a warning message."
				items="{
					path: '/ProductCollection',
					sorter: { path: 'Name' }
				}">
				<core:Item key="{ProductId}" text="{Name}" />
			</MultiComboBox>
			<Label text="MultiComboBox with suggestions and a warning value state with a link:"/>
			<MultiComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
				maxWidth="500px"
				valueState="Warning"
				valueStateText="Warning message. Extra long text used as a warning message."
				items="{
					path: '/ProductCollection',
					sorter: { path: 'Name' }
				}">
				<core:Item key="{ProductId}" text="{Name}" />
				<formattedValueStateText>
					<FormattedText htmlText="Value state with FormattedText used as a warning message containing a %%0." >
						<controls>
							<Link text="link" href="" press=".handleValueStateLinkPress" />
						</controls>
					</FormattedText>
				</formattedValueStateText>
			</MultiComboBox>
			<Label text="MultiComboBox with suggestions and an error value state with a a long message:"/>
			<MultiComboBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
				maxWidth="500px"
				valueState="Error"
				valueStateText="Error message. Extra long text used as a warning message. Extra long text used as an error message - 2. Extra long text used as an error message."
				items="{
					path: '/ProductCollection',
					sorter: { path: 'Name' }
				}">
				<core:Item key="{ProductId}" text="{Name}" />
			</MultiComboBox>
		</l:VerticalLayout>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: MultiInputFilteringSuggestions
code:
<mvc:View height="100%" controllerName="sap.m.sample.MultiInputFilteringSuggestions.controller.MultiInputFilteringSuggestions"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m">
	<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			<items>

			<Label text="MultiInput with suggestion list items" labelFor="multiInput4" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
			<MultiInput class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
						id="multiInput4"
						width="100%"
						showValueHelp="false"
						suggestionItems="{
				path: '/ProductCollection',
				sorter: { path: 'Name' }
			}">
				<core:Item key="{ProductId}" text="{Name}" />
			</MultiInput>

			<Label text="MultiInput with suggestion table" labelFor="multiInput2" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
			<MultiInput  class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
				id="multiInput2"
				width="100%"
				placeholder="Enter Product ..."
				showSuggestion="true"
				showValueHelp="false"
				valueState="Information"
				valueStateText="Information message. Extra long text used as a information message. Extra long text used as a information message - 2. Extra long text used as a information message - 3."
				suggestionRows="{/ProductCollection}">
				<suggestionColumns>
					<Column
						hAlign="Begin"
						popinDisplay="Inline"
						demandPopin="true">
						<Label text="Name"/>
					</Column>
					<Column
						hAlign="Center"
						popinDisplay="Inline"
						demandPopin="true"
						minScreenWidth="Tablet">
						<Label text="Product ID"/>
					</Column>
					<Column
						hAlign="Center"
						popinDisplay="Inline"
						demandPopin="false"
						minScreenWidth="Tablet">
						<Label text="Supplier Name"/>
					</Column>
					<Column
						hAlign="End"
						popinDisplay="Inline"
						demandPopin="true">
						<Label text="Price"/>
					</Column>
				</suggestionColumns>
				<suggestionRows>
					<ColumnListItem>
					<cells>
						<Label text="{Name}"/>
						<Label text="{ProductId}"/>
						<Label text="{SupplierName}"/>
						<Label text="{
 		 						parts:[{path:'Price'},{path:'CurrencyCode'}],
								type: 'sap.ui.model.type.Currency',
		 						formatOptions: {showMeasure: true}
								}"/>
					</cells>
					</ColumnListItem>
				</suggestionRows>
			</MultiInput>

			<Label text="MultiInput with suggestion table and value state message containing formatted text with link" labelFor="multiInput3" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
			<MultiInput
				id="multiInput3"
				width="100%"
				placeholder="Enter Product ..."
				showSuggestion="true"
				showValueHelp="false"
				valueState="Information"
				valueStateText="Information message. Extra long text used as a information message. Extra long text used as a information message - 2. Extra long text used as a information message - 3."
				suggestionRows="{/ProductCollection}">
				<suggestionColumns>
					<Column
						hAlign="Begin"
						popinDisplay="Inline"
						demandPopin="true">
						<Label text="Name"/>
					</Column>
					<Column
						hAlign="Center"
						popinDisplay="Inline"
						demandPopin="true"
						minScreenWidth="Tablet">
						<Label text="Product ID"/>
					</Column>
					<Column
						hAlign="Center"
						popinDisplay="Inline"
						demandPopin="false"
						minScreenWidth="Tablet">
						<Label text="Supplier Name"/>
					</Column>
					<Column
						hAlign="End"
						popinDisplay="Inline"
						demandPopin="true">
						<Label text="Price"/>
					</Column>
				</suggestionColumns>
				<suggestionRows>
					<ColumnListItem>
					<cells>
						<Label text="{Name}"/>
						<Label text="{ProductId}"/>
						<Label text="{SupplierName}"/>
						<Label text="{
								parts:[{path:'Price'},{path:'CurrencyCode'}],
								type: 'sap.ui.model.type.Currency',
								formatOptions: {showMeasure: true}
								}"/>
					</cells>
					</ColumnListItem>
				</suggestionRows>
				<formattedValueStateText>
					<FormattedText htmlText="Recommendantion based on: %%0.">
						<controls>
							<Link text="link" href="" press=".handleFormattedTextLinkPress"/>
						</controls>
					</FormattedText>
				</formattedValueStateText>
			</MultiInput>
		</items>
	</VBox>
</mvc:View>

title: MultiInputGrouping

<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.m.sample.MultiInputGrouping.controller.MultiInputGrouping"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m">
	<l:VerticalLayout
			class="sapUiContentPadding"
			width="100%">
		<l:content>
			<Label text="Multi Input with grouped suggestions" labelFor="productInputWithList"/>
			<MultiInput
					id="productMIWithList"
					type="Text"
					placeholder="Enter Product ..."
					showSuggestion="true"
					showValueHelp="false"
					suggestionItems="{
					path: '/ProductCollection',
					sorter: {
						path: 'SupplierName',
						group: true,
						ascending:false
				}
				}">
				<suggestionItems>
					<core:Item text="{Name}" key="{ProductId}"/>
				</suggestionItems>
			</MultiInput>
			<Label text="Multi Input with grouped tabular suggestions" labelFor="productMIWithTable"/>
			<MultiInput
					id="productMIWithTable"
					type="Text"
					placeholder="Enter Product ..."
					showSuggestion="true"
					showValueHelp="false"
					showTableSuggestionValueHelp="false"
					suggestionRows="{
					path: '/ProductCollection',
					sorter: {
						path: 'SupplierName',
						group: true,
						ascending:false
				}
				}">
				<suggestionColumns>
					<Column
							hAlign="Begin"
							popinDisplay="Inline"
							demandPopin="true">
						<Label text="Name"/>
					</Column>
					<Column
							hAlign="Center"
							popinDisplay="Inline"
							demandPopin="true"
							minScreenWidth="Tablet">
						<Label text="Product ID"/>
					</Column>
					<Column
							hAlign="Center"
							popinDisplay="Inline"
							demandPopin="false"
							minScreenWidth="Tablet">
						<Label text="Supplier Name"/>
					</Column>
					<Column
							hAlign="End"
							popinDisplay="Inline"
							demandPopin="true">
						<Label text="Price"/>
					</Column>
				</suggestionColumns>
				<suggestionRows>
					<ColumnListItem>
						<cells>
							<Label text="{Name}"/>
							<Label text="{ProductId}"/>
							<Label text="{SupplierName}"/>
							<Label
									text="{
 		 						parts:[{path:'Price'},{path:'CurrencyCode'}],
								type: 'sap.ui.model.type.Currency',
		 						formatOptions: {showMeasure: true}
							}"/>
						</cells>
					</ColumnListItem>
				</suggestionRows>
			</MultiInput>
		</l:content>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

	height="100%"

				}"/>

	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: MultiInputTokenUpdate
code:
<mvc:View height="100%" controllerName="sap.m.sample.MultiInputTokenUpdate.controller.MultiInputTokenUpdate"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m">
	<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
		<Text text="Open a new Excel file and write the letters from 'a' to 'f' in a column. Copy the column and paste it into the MultiInput below"/>
		<MultiInput id="tokenUpdateMI" tokenUpdate="._onTokenUpdate" showValueHelp="false" showSuggestion="false" />
		<Text text="Expected result is that tokens with texts 'c', 'd' and 'f' will be created instantly and a single
		tokenUpdate will be fired for the three of them."/>
		<Text text="Three seconds after that (simulating async validation) a token with text 'a' will be added.
		Seven seconds later the MultiInput will attempt to add another token with text 'f'.
		Adding that token again will be successful only if in the meantime the user deleted the 'f' token."/>
	</VBox>
</mvc:View>

title: MultiInputValidators
code:
<mvc:View height="100%" controllerName="sap.m.sample.MultiInputValidators.controller.MultiInputValidators"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
		<items>
			<Label text="MultiInput using two validators:" labelFor="multiInput1"/>
			<Label text="First validator creates token where the text is the same as input value; second validator adds symbol to token." labelFor="multiInput1" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
			<HBox renderType="Bare">
				<items>
					<MultiInput id="multiInput1" width="50%" showSuggestion="false" showValueHelp="false"/>
					<CheckBox id="checkbox1" text="Validate?" selected="true"/>
				</items>
			</HBox>
			<Label text="MultiInput using asynchronous validator: add token by callback validation" width="100%" labelFor="multiInput2" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
			<MultiInput id="multiInput2" width="50%" showSuggestion="false" showValueHelp="false"/>

			<Label text="MultiInput with asynchronously validation" labelFor="multiInput3" class="sapUiSmallMarginTop"/>
			<MultiInput id="multiInput3" width="50%" showSuggestion="false" placeholder= "tokens get validated asynchronously after 500ms" showValueHelp="false"/>
		</items>
	</VBox>
</mvc:View>

title: NavContainer
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.NavContainer.controller.NavContainer"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<VBox
		class="sapUiSmallMargin">

		<NavContainer
			navigationFinished="onNavigationFinished"
			id="navCon"
			width="98%"
			height="16em"
			class="navContainerControl sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
			<Page
				id="p1"
				title="Page 1" >
				<footer><OverflowToolbar><Button text="Action 1" /></OverflowToolbar></footer>
			</Page>
			<Page
				id="p2"
				title="Page 2" >
				<footer><OverflowToolbar><Button text="Action 2" /></OverflowToolbar></footer>
			</Page>
			<Page
				id="p3"
				title="Page 3" >
				<footer><OverflowToolbar><Button text="Action 3" /></OverflowToolbar></footer>
			</Page>
			<Page
				id="p4"
				title="Page 4" >
				<footer><OverflowToolbar><Button text="Action 4" /></OverflowToolbar></footer>
			</Page>
		</NavContainer>

		<HBox>
			<Button
				text="To 1"
				press="handleNav">
				<layoutData>
					<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
				</layoutData>
				<customData>
					<core:CustomData
						key="target"
						value="p1" />
				</customData>
			</Button>
			<Button
				text="To 2"
				press="handleNav">
				<layoutData>
					<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
				</layoutData>
				<customData>
					<core:CustomData
						key="target"
						value="p2" />
				</customData>
			</Button>
			<Button
				text="To 3"
				press="handleNav">
				<layoutData>
					<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
				</layoutData>
				<customData>
					<core:CustomData
						key="target"
						value="p3" />
				</customData>
			</Button>
			<Button
				text="To 4"
				press="handleNav">
				<layoutData>
					<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
				</layoutData>
				<customData>
					<core:CustomData
						key="target"
						value="p4" />
				</customData>
			</Button>
		</HBox>

		<HBox>
			<Button
				text="Back"
				type="Back"
				press="handleNav">
				<layoutData>
					<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
				</layoutData>
			</Button>
			<Select id="animationSelect">
				<core:Item text="Slide animation" key="slide" />
				<core:Item text="Base slide animation" key="baseSlide" />
				<core:Item text="Fade animation" key="fade" />
				<core:Item text="Flip animation" key="flip" />
				<core:Item text="Show animation" key="show" />
				<layoutData>
					<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
				</layoutData>
			</Select>
		</HBox>

	</VBox>
</mvc:View>

title: NavigationService
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.NavigationService"
	displayBlock="true">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Title text="Navigation scenarios" />
				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>

		<Panel>
			<VBox>
				<VBox class="sapUiMediumMarginLeft">
					<Text text="Cards using navigation service. - List and Table Content" />
				</VBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						id="listNavService"
						action=".onActionLog"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/manifest_navigationService.json"
						width="400px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
					<w:Card
						action=".onActionLog"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/manifest_navigationService2.json"
						width="400px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
					<w:Card
						action=".onActionLog"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/manifest_navigationService3.json"
						width="400px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
					<w:Card
						id="tableNavService"
						action=".onActionLog"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/manifest_navigationService4.json"
						width="400px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
				</HBox>
				<VBox class="sapUiMediumMarginLeft">
					<Text text="Cards using navigation service with hidden items. - List, Table and TimeLine Content" />
				</VBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						width="400px"
						action=".onActionLog"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/hiddenItems/manifest_navigation_hidden_list.json"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
					<w:Card
						width="400px"
						action=".onActionLog"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/hiddenItems/manifest_navigation_hidden_table.json"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
					<w:Card
						width="400px"
						action=".onActionLog"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/hiddenItems/manifest_navigation_hidden_timeline.json"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
				</HBox>
				<VBox class="sapUiMediumMarginLeft">
					<Text text="Cards using navigation service. - Analytical Content" />
				</VBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						class="sapUiSmallMargin"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/manifest_navigationAction_url_analyticalContent.json"
						height="500px"
						width="500px" />
					<w:Card
						class="sapUiSmallMargin"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/manifest_navigationAction_service_analyticalContent.json"
						height="500px"
						width="500px" />
				</HBox>
				<VBox class="sapUiMediumMarginLeft">
					<Text text="Cards using navigation service. - Object Content" />
				</VBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/manifest_navigation_objectContent.json"
						height="500px"
						width="500px"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
					<w:Card
						class="sapUiMediumMargin"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/manifest_navigation_object_service.json"
						width="auto"
						height="500px" />
				</HBox>
				<VBox class="sapUiMediumMarginLeft">
					<Text text="Cards using navigation action event." />
				</VBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						action=".onAction"
						width="400px"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/manifest_navigationAction.json"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
					<w:Card
						action=".onAction"
						width="400px"
						manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/navigationService/manifest_navigationActionTable.json"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
				</HBox>
				<VBox class="sapUiMediumMarginLeft">
					<Text text="Cards using navigation service. - Timeline Content" />
				</VBox>
				<HBox wrap="Wrap">
					<w:Card
						id="timeline"
						class="sapUiSmallMargin"
						manifest="{manifests>/timelineContent/card0}"
						baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}"
						width="300px" />
				</HBox>
			</VBox>
		</Panel>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.layout.sample.NestedGrids.NestedGrids"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid">
	<Slider
		value="100"
		liveChange=".onSliderMoved"
		class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
	<Panel
		id="panelCSSGrid"
		width="100%"
		height="100%">
		<headerToolbar>
			<OverflowToolbar height="3rem">
				<Title text="CSS Grid Nested grids example" />
			</OverflowToolbar>
		</headerToolbar>
		<grid:CSSGrid
			id="grid1"
			gridTemplateColumns="repeat(2,minmax(250px, 1fr))"
			gridTemplateRows="1fr 3fr"
			gridGap="1rem">
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Title text="A Box" wrapping="true" />
				<Text text="A Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Title text="B Box" wrapping="true" />
				<Text text="B Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<Title text="C Box" wrapping="true" />
				<Text text="C Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
			</VBox>
			<VBox class="demoBox">
				<grid:CSSGrid
					gridTemplateColumns="repeat(2,minmax(120px, 1fr))"
					gridGap="0.5rem">
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMarginTop sapUiSmallMarginBegin sapUiSmallMarginEnd demoInnerBox">
						<layoutData>
							<grid:GridItemLayoutData
								gridColumn="1 / 3"
								gridRow="1" />
						</layoutData>
						<Title text="E Box" wrapping="true" />
						<Text text="E Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
					</VBox>
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin demoInnerBox">
						<layoutData>
							<grid:GridItemLayoutData
								gridColumn="1"
								gridRow="2" />
						</layoutData>
						<Title text="F Box" wrapping="true" />
						<Text text="F Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
					</VBox>
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd demoInnerBox">
						<layoutData>
							<grid:GridItemLayoutData
								gridColumn="2"
								gridRow="2" />
						</layoutData>
						<Title text="G Box" wrapping="true" />
						<Text text="G Box subtitle" wrapping="true" />
					</VBox>
				</grid:CSSGrid>
			</VBox>
		</grid:CSSGrid>
	</Panel>
</mvc:View>

title: NetworkGraph
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.m.sample.networkGraph.NetworkGraph"
		xmlns="sap.suite.ui.commons.networkgraph"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:layout="sap.suite.ui.commons.networkgraph.layout"
		xmlns:m="sap.m"
		height="100%">
	<m:App>
		<m:Page id="messageHandlingPage" showHeader="false">
			<m:content>
				<l:FixFlex vertical="true">
					<l:fixContent>
						<m:OverflowToolbar>
							<m:content>
								<m:Label text="Orientation:" labelFor="orientation"></m:Label>
								<m:Select id="orientation"  selectedKey="{settings>/orientation}" autoAdjustWidth="true">
									<core:Item key="LeftRight" text="Left-Right"/>
									<core:Item key="RightLeft" text="Right-Left"/>
									<core:Item key="TopBottom" text="Top-Bottom"/>
								</m:Select>
								<m:Label text="Node placement:" labelFor="nodePlacement"></m:Label>
								<m:Select id="nodePlacement" selectedKey="{settings>/nodePlacement}" autoAdjustWidth="true">
									<core:Item key="BrandesKoepf" text="Brandes-Koepf"/>
									<core:Item key="LinearSegments" text="Linear Segments"/>
									<core:Item key="Simple" text="Simple"/>
								</m:Select>
								<m:Label text="Arrow position:" labelFor="arrowPosition"></m:Label>
								<m:Select id="arrowPosition" selectedKey="{settings>/arrowPosition}" autoAdjustWidth="true">
									<core:Item key="Start" text="Arrow Start"/>
									<core:Item key="Middle" text="Arrow Middle"/>
									<core:Item key="End" text="Arrow End"/>
								</m:Select>
								<m:Label text="Arrow orientation:" labelFor="arrowOrientation"></m:Label>
								<m:Select id="arrowOrientation" selectedKey="{settings>/arrowOrientation}" autoAdjustWidth="true">
									<core:Item key="ParentOf" text="Parent -> Child"/>
									<core:Item key="ChildOf" text="Child -> Parent"/>
									<core:Item key="None" text="Hidden"/>
									<core:Item key="Both" text="Both"/>
								</m:Select>
								<m:Label text="Merge Edges:" labelFor="mergeEdges"></m:Label>
								<m:Select id="mergeEdges" change="mergeChanged" selectedKey="0" autoAdjustWidth="true">
									<core:Item key="0" text="Split edges"/>
									<core:Item key="1" text="Merged edges"/>
								</m:Select>
								<m:Label text="Node Spacing:" labelFor="nodeSpacing"></m:Label>
								<m:Select id="nodeSpacing" selectedKey="55" change="spacingChanged" autoAdjustWidth="true">
									<core:Item key="20" text="Node spacing (20)"/>
									<core:Item key="40" text="Node spacing (40)"/>
									<core:Item key="55" text="Node spacing (55)"/>
									<core:Item key="80" text="Node spacing (80)"/>
									<core:Item key="100" text="Node spacing (100)"/>
								</m:Select>
							</m:content>
						</m:OverflowToolbar>
					</l:fixContent>
					<l:flexContent>
						<m:FlexBox fitContainer="true" renderType="Bare" wrap="Wrap" id="graphWrapper">
							<m:items>
								<Graph
										enableWheelZoom="false"
										orientation="{settings>/orientation}"
										nodes="{/nodes}"
										lines="{/lines}"
										groups="{/groups}"
										id="graph">
									<statuses>
										<Status key="AttributeLabel" contentColor="#e90c09"/>
										<Status key="Dashed" borderWidth="2px" borderStyle="dashed"/>
										<Status key="LineBorderStatus" title="Line border status" borderColor="red" backgroundColor="red" borderWidth="2px"
												borderStyle="3,3"/>
										<Status key="GroupCustomStatus" title="Group custom status" contentColor="white" backgroundColor="darkblue" borderColor="darkblue" />
									</statuses>
									<layoutData>
										<m:FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="1" baseSize="0%" minWidth="300px"/>
									</layoutData>
									<layoutAlgorithm>
										<layout:LayeredLayout
												mergeEdges="{settings>/mergeEdges}"
												nodePlacement="{settings>/nodePlacement}"
												nodeSpacing="{settings>/nodeSpacing}"/>
									</layoutAlgorithm>
									<nodes>
										<Node maxWidth="{maxWidth}"
											headerCheckBoxState="{headerCheckBoxState}"
											key="{key}"
											title="{title}"
											icon="{icon}"
											group="{group}"
											attributes="{path:'attributes', templateShareable:true}"
											shape="{shape}"
											status="{status}">
											<attributes>
												<ElementAttribute
														icon="{icon}"
														labelStatus="{status}"
														valueStatus="{status}"
														label="{label}"
														value="{value}"/>
											</attributes>
										</Node>
									</nodes>
									<lines>
										<Line arrowPosition="{settings>/arrowPosition}"
											arrowOrientation="{settings>/arrowOrientation}"
											from="{from}"
											to="{to}"
											status="{status}">
											<actionButtons>
												<ActionButton icon="sap-icon://lab"/>
												<ActionButton icon="sap-icon://bubble-chart" />
											</actionButtons>
										</Line>
									</lines>
									<groups>
										<Group key="{key}"
											icon="sap-icon://measure"
											headerCheckBoxState="{headerCheckboxState}"
											title="{title}"
											status="{status}">
										</Group>
									</groups>
								</Graph>
								<GraphMap id="map" graph="graph">
									<layoutData>
										<m:FlexItemData minWidth="200px" maxWidth="25%"/>
									</layoutData>
								</GraphMap>
							</m:items>
						</m:FlexBox>
					</l:flexContent>
				</l:FixFlex>
			</m:content>
		</m:Page>
	</m:App>
</mvc:View>

title: News
code:
<mvc:View controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.News"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core">

	<IllustratedMessage
		visible="{=!!${/preparationFailureMessage}}"
		title="{i18n>NEWS_PREP_FAILURE_TITLE}"
		description="{/preparationFailureMessage}"
		illustrationType="sapIllus-ErrorScreen">
	</IllustratedMessage>
	<VBox visible="{=!${/preparationFailureMessage}}">
		<NotificationList>

			<NotificationListGroup
				items="{path:  '/new', templateShareable: false}"
				title="{i18n>NEWS_NEW_GROUP_TITLE}"
				showCloseButton="false">

				<buttons>
					<Button text="{i18n>NEWS_BTN_MARK_AS_READ}" press="handleMarkAsRead" />
				</buttons>

				<NotificationListItem
					title="{title}"
					description="{description}"
					datetime="{updated}"
					close="handleNewsItemClose"
					class="sapUiDemokitCustomNLI">
					<buttons>
						<Button visible="{= %{link} !== ''}" text="{i18n>NEWS_BTN_VISIT_LINK}" press="handleVisitLink">
							<customData>
								<core:CustomData key="newsLink" value="{link}"/>
							</customData>
						</Button>
					</buttons>
					<customData>
						<core:CustomData key="newsID" value="{id}"/>
					</customData>
				</NotificationListItem>

			</NotificationListGroup>

			<NotificationListGroup
				items="{path:  '/old', templateShareable: false}"
				title="{i18n>NEWS_READ_GROUP_TITLE}"
				showCloseButton="false">

				<NotificationListItem
					title="{title}"
					description="{description}"
					datetime="{updated}"
					showCloseButton="false"
					class="sapUiDemokitCustomNLI">
					<buttons>
						<Button visible="{= %{link} !== ''}" text="{i18n>NEWS_BTN_VISIT_LINK}" press="handleVisitLink">
							<customData>
								<core:CustomData key="newsLink" value="{link}"/>
							</customData>
						</Button>
					</buttons>
				</NotificationListItem>

			</NotificationListGroup>
		</NotificationList>
	</VBox>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	displayBlock="true">

			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer />
				<Title text="Card without Header & Card without Content" />
				<ToolbarSpacer />
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>

		<Panel>
			<f:GridContainer>
				<w:Card id="i1" manifest="{manifests>/noHeaderNoContent/i1}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}">
					<w:layoutData>

					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>

				<f:Card id="f3" height="100%">
					<f:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="2" rows="2" />

					<f:content>

				</w:Card>

						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>

				<w:Card id="i6-error" manifest="{manifests>/noHeaderNoContent/i6-error}">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>

				<w:Card id="i7-error" manifest="{manifests>/noHeaderNoContent/i7-error}">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>
				<w:Card id="ListNodata-error" manifest="{manifests>/noHeaderNoContent/ListNodata-error}">

				<w:Card id="Custom-error" manifest="{manifests>/noHeaderNoContent/Custom-error}">

				</w:Card>
				<w:Card id="BadUrl-error" manifest="{manifests>/noHeaderNoContent/BadUrl-error}">

						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
					</w:layoutData>
				</w:Card>
			</f:GridContainer>
		</Panel>
		<Panel headerText="Empty Card">

		</Panel>
	</Page>
