title: NumberFormat
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	displayBlock="true"
	core:require="{LocaleType: 'local/LocaleType', FloatType: 'sap/ui/model/type/Float'}">
	<App autoFocus="false">
		<Page title="NumberFormat" enableScrolling="false">
			<HBox fitContainer="true">
				<ScrollContainer width="100%" height="100%" horizontal="false" vertical="true">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData baseSize="100%" />
					</layoutData>
					<content>
						<form:SimpleForm layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" columnsL="1" width="100%" editable="true">
							<core:Title text="Output" />
							<Image width="30px" height="20px"
								src="{parts: ['/locale'], formatter: '.formatImageSrc'}" />
							<Label text="" />
							<Input class="large largeinput"
								value="{
									parts: ['/number', '/currency', '/unit', '/type', '/formatOptions', '/locale'],
									formatter: '.genericFormat'
								}"
								change=".genericParse" />
							<core:Title text="Input" />
							<Label text="Format Options" />
							<TextArea id="formatOptions" class="large" rows="6" liveChange=".onFormatOptionChange" />
							<Label text="Type" />
							<Select selectedKey="{/type}" change=".onTypeChange">
								<core:Item key="Integer" text="Integer" />
								<core:Item key="Float" text="Float" />
								<core:Item key="Percent" text="Percent" />
								<core:Item key="Unit" text="Unit" />
								<core:Item key="Currency" text="Currency" />
							</Select>
							<Label text="Sample" />
							<Select selectedKey="{/sample}" items="{/samples}" change=".onSampleChange">
								<core:Item key="{key}" text="{text}" />
							</Select>
							<Label text="Number" />
							<Input class="large largeinput" liveChange=".onNumberLiveChange"
								value="{
									path: '/number',
									type: 'FloatType',
									formatOptions: {
										groupingEnabled: false,
										groupingSeparator: ',',
										decimalSeparator: '.',
										parseAsString: true
									}
								}" />
							<Label text="Currency" visible="{= ${/type} === 'Currency'}" />
							<Input class="large largeinput" value="{/currency}" visible="{= ${/type} === 'Currency'}"
								change=".onCurrencyChange" liveChange=".onCurrencyLiveChange" />
							<Label text="UnitCode" visible="{= ${/type} === 'Unit'}" />
							<Input class="large largeinput" showSuggestion="true" suggestionItems="{/cldrEntries}"
								value="{/unit}" visible="{= ${/type} === 'Unit'}" change=".onUnitCodeChange"
								liveChange=".onUnitCodeLiveChange">
								<suggestionItems>
									<core:Item text="{name}" />
								</suggestionItems>
							</Input>
							<Label text="Locale" />
							<Input class="large largeinput" showSuggestion="true"
								suggestionItems="{/localesSuggestions}" value= "{path: '/locale', type: 'LocaleType'}"
								change=".onLocaleChange">
								<suggestionItems>
									<SuggestionItem icon="{path: 'name', formatter: '.formatLocaleIcon'}" text="{name}" />
								</suggestionItems>
							</Input>
						</form:SimpleForm>
					</content>
				</ScrollContainer>
				<ScrollContainer width="400px" height="100%" horizontal="false" vertical="true">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData baseSize="400px" />
					</layoutData>
					<content>
						<List items="{/locales}">
							<LocaleListItem xmlns="local" locale="{}"
								text="{
									parts: ['/number', '/currency', '/unit', '/formatOptions', '/type', ''],
									formatter: '.formatLocaleText'
								}" />
						</List>
					</content>
				</ScrollContainer>
			</HBox>
		</Page>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

title: Object

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.demo.worklist.controller.Object"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:semantic="sap.f.semantic">

	<semantic:SemanticPage
		id="page"
		headerPinnable="false"
		toggleHeaderOnTitleClick="false"
		busy="{objectView>/busy}"
		busyIndicatorDelay="{objectView>/delay}">

		<semantic:titleHeading>
			<Title
				text="{Name}"
				level="H2"/>
		</semantic:titleHeading>

		<semantic:headerContent>
			<ObjectNumber
				number="{
					path: 'UnitNumber',
					formatter: '.formatter.numberUnit'
				}"
				unit="{UnitOfMeasure}"
			/>
		</semantic:headerContent>

		<semantic:sendEmailAction>
			<semantic:SendEmailAction id="shareEmail" press=".onShareEmailPress"/>
		</semantic:sendEmailAction>


	</semantic:SemanticPage>

</mvc:View>

title: ObjectPageBeforeNavigate
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		   xmlns="sap.uxap"
		   xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
		   xmlns:m="sap.m"
		   xmlns:goals="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.goals"
		   xmlns:personal="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.personal"
		   xmlns:employment="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.employment"
		   xmlns:connections="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.connections"
		   controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.ObjectPageBeforeNavigate.controller.ObjectPageBeforeNavigate"
		   height="100%">
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout"
		enableLazyLoading="true"
		beforeNavigate="onBeforeNavigate"
		useIconTabBar="true"
		showTitleInHeaderContent="true"
		upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
				<expandedHeading>
					<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true"/>
				</expandedHeading>

				<snappedHeading>
					<m:FlexBox fitContainer="true" alignItems="Center">
						<m:Avatar src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd"/>
						<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true" />
					</m:FlexBox>
				</snappedHeading>

				<expandedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</expandedContent>

				<snappedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedContent>

				<snappedTitleOnMobile>
					<m:Title text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedTitleOnMobile>

				<actions>
					<m:Button text="Edit" type="Emphasized" press="onEdit"/>
					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Delete"/>
					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Copy"/>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton icon="sap-icon://action" type="Transparent" text="Share" tooltip="action"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
		</headerTitle>

		<headerContent>
			<m:FlexBox wrap="Wrap" fitContainer="true" >
				<m:Avatar class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd" src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" displaySize="L" />

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Link text="+33 6 4512 5158"/>
					<m:Link text="DeniseSmith@sap.com"/>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:HorizontalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/linkedin.png"/>
					<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/Twitter.png" class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
			    </layout:HorizontalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="Hello! I am Denise and I use UxAP"/>
					<m:VBox>
						<m:Label text="Achieved goals"/>
						<m:ProgressIndicator percentValue="30" displayValue="30%"/>
					</m:VBox>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="San Jose, USA"/>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>
			</m:FlexBox>
		</headerContent>

		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="goals" title="2014 Goals Plan">
			<subSections>
				<ObjectPageSubSection id="goalsSS1" titleUppercase="false">
					<blocks>
						<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock"/>
					</blocks>
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="personal" title="Personal">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSS1" title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
							<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
							<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
							<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSS2" title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="employment" title="Employment">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS1" title="Job information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart1 id="jobinfopart1"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart2 id="jobinfopart2"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart3 id="jobinfopart3"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS2" title="Employee Details" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart1 id="empdetailpart1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart2 id="empdetailpart2" columnLayout="1"/>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart3 id="empdetailpart3" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS3" title="Job Relationship" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:EmploymentBlockJob id="employmentblockjob" showSubSectionMore="true">
								<employment:mappings>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp1"
												  externalPath="/Employee/0"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp2"
												  externalPath="/Employee/1"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp3"
												  externalPath="/Employee/2"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp4"
												  externalPath="/Employee/3"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp5"
												  externalPath="/Employee/4"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp6"
												  externalPath="/Employee/5"/>
								</employment:mappings>
							</employment:EmploymentBlockJob>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="connections" title="Connections">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="connectionsSS1" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<connections:ConnectionsBlock id="connectionsblock">
								<connections:mappings>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp1"
												  externalPath="/Employee/0"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp2"
												  externalPath="/Employee/1"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp3"
												  externalPath="/Employee/2"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp4"
												  externalPath="/Employee/3"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp5"
												  externalPath="/Employee/4"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp6"
												  externalPath="/Employee/5"/>

							</connections:ConnectionsBlock>
						</blocks>

			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:blockcolor="sap.uxap.sample.ObjectPageFormLayout.controller.blocks"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.ObjectPageFormFocusableInput.controller.ObjectPageFormFocusableInput"
	height="100%">
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout" upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
				<breadcrumbs>
					<m:Breadcrumbs>
						<m:Link text="Page 1 a very long link"/>
						<m:Link text="Page 2 long link"/>
					</m:Breadcrumbs>
				</breadcrumbs>

				<expandedHeading>
					<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true"/>
				</expandedHeading>

				<snappedHeading>
					<m:FlexBox fitContainer="true" alignItems="Center">
						<m:Avatar src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd"/>
						<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true"/>
					</m:FlexBox>
				</snappedHeading>

				<snappedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedContent>

				<expandedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</expandedContent>

				<snappedTitleOnMobile>
					<m:Title text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedTitleOnMobile>

				<actions>
					<m:Button type="Emphasized" text="Focus" press="handleFocusBtnPress"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
		</headerTitle>

		<headerContent>
			<m:FlexBox wrap="Wrap" fitContainer="true">
				<m:Avatar class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd" src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" displaySize="L"/>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Link text="+33 6 4512 5158"/>
					<m:Link text="DeniseSmith@sap.com"/>
					<layout:HorizontalLayout>
						<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/linkedin.png"/>
						<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/Twitter.png" class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
					</layout:HorizontalLayout>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="Hello! I am Denise and I use UxAP"/>
					<m:VBox>
						<m:Label text="Achieved goals"/>
						<m:ProgressIndicator percentValue="30" displayValue="30%"/>
					</m:VBox>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="San Jose, USA"/>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>
			</m:FlexBox>
		</headerContent>

		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal 1">
				<ObjectPageSubSection titleUppercase="false">
					<blockcolor:BlockBlue/>
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</ObjectPageSection>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal 2">
				<ObjectPageSubSection titleUppercase="false">
					<blockcolor:BlockBlue/>
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</ObjectPageSection>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal 3">
				<ObjectPageSubSection titleUppercase="false">
					<blockcolor:BlockBlue/>
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</ObjectPageSection>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal 4">
				<ObjectPageSubSection titleUppercase="false">
					<blockcolor:BlockBlue/>
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</ObjectPageSection>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal 5">
				<ObjectPageSubSection titleUppercase="false">
					<blockcolor:BlockBlue/>
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</ObjectPageSection>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal 6">
				<ObjectPageSubSection titleUppercase="false">
					<blockcolor:BlockBlue/>
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</ObjectPageSection>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="Employment" title="Employment">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection titleUppercase="false">
						<f:SimpleForm editable="true" layout="ColumnLayout" columnsM="2" columnsL="3" columnsXL="4">
							<f:content>
								<m:Label text="Name"/>
								<m:Input/>
								<m:Label text="Street/No."/>
								<m:Input/>
								<m:Input>
									<m:layoutData>
										<f:ColumnElementData cellsSmall="2" cellsLarge="1"/>
									</m:layoutData>
								</m:Input>
								<m:Label text="ZIP Code/City"/>
								<m:Input>
									<m:layoutData>
										<f:ColumnElementData cellsSmall="3" cellsLarge="2"/>
									</m:layoutData>
								</m:Input>
								<m:Input/>
								<m:Label text="Country"/>
								<m:Select id="country">
									<m:items>
										<core:Item text="England" key="England"/>
										<core:Item text="Germany" key="Germany"/>
										<core:Item text="USA" key="USA"/>
									</m:items>
								</m:Select>
								<m:Label text="Web"/>
								<m:Input type="Url"/>
								<m:Label text="Twitter"/>
								<m:Input/>
								<m:Label text="Email"/>
								<m:Input type="Email"/>
								<m:Label text="Tel."/>
								<m:Input type="Tel"/>
								<m:Label text="SMS"/>
								<m:Input type="Tel"/>
								<m:Label text="Mobile"/>
								<m:Input type="Tel"/>
								<m:Label text="Pager"/>
								<m:Input type="Tel"/>
								<m:Label text="Fax"/>
								<m:Input type="Tel"/>
							</f:content>
						</f:SimpleForm>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

						<m:Link text='Page 1'/>
						<m:Link text='Page 2'/>
						<m:Link text='Page 3'/>
						<m:Link text='Page 4'/>
						<m:Link text='Page 5'/>
					</m:Breadcrumbs>
				</breadcrumbs>

				<expandedHeading>
					<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true"/>

				</snappedHeading>

				<expandedContent>

				</snappedContent>

					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton type="Transparent" text="Copy" hideText="false" hideIcon="true"/>

				</content>

			<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
				<heading>
					<m:Title text="Denise Smith" />
				</heading>

				<expandedContent>
					<m:Text text="Example of a ObjectPage with Header Content always shown on desktop"/>
				</expandedContent>

				</snappedContent>

					<m:Title text="Example of a ObjectPage with Header Content always shown on desktop"/>
				</snappedTitleOnMobile>

					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Delete"/>
					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Copy"/>

					<m:ObjectStatus title="Cost Center" text="PI DFA GD Programs and Product"/>
					<m:ObjectStatus title="Email" text="email@address.com"/>
				</l:VerticalLayout>

				<l:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Text width="200px" text="Hi, I'm Denise. I am passionate about what I do and I'll go the extra mile to make the customer win."/>
				</l:VerticalLayout>

				<l:HorizontalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:ObjectStatus text="In Stock" state="Error" class="sapUiMediumMarginEnd"/>
					<m:ObjectStatus title="Label" text="In Stock" state="Warning"/>
				</l:HorizontalLayout>
			</m:FlexBox>
		</headerContent>

		<sections>

						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
							<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
							<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
							<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="paymentSubSection" title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout" upperCaseAnchorBar="false">

							  objectTitle="Long title that wraps and goes over more lines"
							  showTitleSelector="true"
							  titleSelectorPress="handleTitleSelectorPress"
							  showMarkers="true"
							  markFavorite="true"
							  markLocked="true"
							  markFlagged="true"
							  markLockedPress="handleMarkLockedPress"
							  objectSubtitle="Long subtitle that wraps and goes over more lines"

					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://edit" text="edit" importance="Medium" tooltip="edit"/>

					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://refresh" text="{buttons>/text}" tooltip="refresh"/>

title: ObjectPageLayoutUXDrivenFactory
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		  xmlns="sap.uxap"
		  height="100%"
		  controllerName="sap.uxap.component.ObjectPageLayoutUXDrivenFactory"
>
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout"
					  subSectionLayout="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/subSectionLayout}"
					  showAnchorBar="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/showAnchorBar}"
					  height="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/height}"
					  enableLazyLoading="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/enableLazyLoading}"
					  sections="{path: 'objectPageLayoutMetadata>/sections', templateShareable: false}"
					  headerContent="{path:'objectPageLayoutMetadata>/headerContent', factory:'.controlFactory'}"
					  showAnchorBarPopover="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/showAnchorBarPopover}"
					  upperCaseAnchorBar="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/upperCaseAnchorBar}"
					  useIconTabBar="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/useIconTabBar}"
					  showHeaderContent="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/showHeaderContent}"
					  useTwoColumnsForLargeScreen="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/useTwoColumnsForLargeScreen}"
					  showTitleInHeaderContent="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/showTitleInHeaderContent}"
					  showOnlyHighImportance="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/showOnlyHighImportance}"
					  isChildPage="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/isChildPage}"
					  alwaysShowContentHeader="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/alwaysShowContentHeader}"
					  showEditHeaderButton="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>/showEditHeaderButton}"
	>

		<!-- template for objectPageSection -->
		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection id="ObjectPageSection"
							   title="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>title}"
							   importance="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>importance}"
							   showTitle="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>showTitle}"
							   subSections="{path: 'objectPageLayoutMetadata>subSections', templateShareable: false}"
							   visible="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>visible}">

				<!-- template for objectPageSubSection -->
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="ObjectPageSubSection"
										  title="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>title}"
										  visible="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>visible}"
										  mode="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>mode}"
										  importance="{objectPageLayoutMetadata>importance}"
										  actions="{path:'objectPageLayoutMetadata>actions', factory:'.controlFactory'}"
										  blocks="{path:'objectPageLayoutMetadata>blocks', factory:'.controlFactory'}"
										  moreBlocks="{path:'objectPageLayoutMetadata>moreBlocks', factory:'.controlFactory'}">

						<!-- factory for actions, blocks and moreBlocks as the type is coming from the model -->

					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
				<!-- end template for objectPageSubSection -->

			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
		<!-- template for objectPageSection -->
	</ObjectPageLayout>

</mvc:View>

title: ObjectPageOnJSON
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:goals="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.goals"
	xmlns:personal="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.personal"
	xmlns:employment="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.employment"
	controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.ObjectPageOnJSON.controller.ObjectPageOnJSON"
	height="100%">
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout"
		showTitleInHeaderContent="true"
		showEditHeaderButton="true"
		editHeaderButtonPress="handleEditBtnPress"
		headerContentPinned="true"
		upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
				<breadcrumbs>
					<m:Breadcrumbs id="breadcrumbsId" currentLocationText="Object Page Example" >
						<m:Link text="Page 1 a very long link" press="handleLink1Press"/>
						<m:Link text="Page 2 long link" press="handleLink2Press"/>
					</m:Breadcrumbs>
				</breadcrumbs>

				<expandedHeading>
					<m:HBox>
						<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true"/>
						<m:ObjectMarker type="Favorite" class="sapUiTinyMarginBegin"/>
					</m:HBox>
				</expandedHeading>

				<snappedHeading>
					<m:FlexBox  fitContainer="true" alignItems="Center">
						<m:Avatar src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd"/>
						<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true"/>
					</m:FlexBox>
				</snappedHeading>

				<expandedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</expandedContent>

				<snappedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedContent>

				<snappedTitleOnMobile>
					<m:Title text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedTitleOnMobile>

				<actions>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton icon="sap-icon://edit" text="edit header" type="Emphasized" tooltip="edit">
						<m:layoutData>
							<m:OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="NeverOverflow"/>
						</m:layoutData>
					</m:OverflowToolbarButton>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton icon="sap-icon://pull-down" text="show section" type="Emphasized" tooltip="pull-down"/>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton icon="sap-icon://show" text="show state" tooltip="show"/>
					<m:Button text="Toggle Footer" press="toggleFooter"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
		</headerTitle>

		<headerContent>
			<m:FlexBox wrap="Wrap">
				<m:Avatar class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd" src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png"  displaySize="L" />

					<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
						<m:Link text="+33 6 4512 5158"/>
						<m:Link text="DeniseSmith@sap.com"/>
					</layout:VerticalLayout>

					<layout:HorizontalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
						<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/linkedin.png"/>
						<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/Twitter.png" class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
					</layout:HorizontalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="Hello! I am Denise and I use UxAP"/>
					<m:VBox>
						<m:Label text="Achieved goals"/>
						<m:ProgressIndicator percentValue="30" displayValue="30%"/>
					</m:VBox>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="San Jose, USA"/>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>
			</m:FlexBox>
		</headerContent>

		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="goalsSection" title="2014 Goals Plan">
				<heading>
					<m:MessageStrip text="Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry." type="Error" />
				</heading>
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="goalsSectionSS1">
						<blocks>
							<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="personalSection" title="Personal" importance="Medium">
					<heading>
						<m:MessageStrip text="Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry." type="Error" />
					</heading>
					<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSectionSS1" title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
							<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
							<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
							<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSectionSS2" title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="employmentSection" title="Employment">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSectionSS1" title="Job information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart1 id="jobinfopart1"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart2 id="jobinfopart2"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart3 id="jobinfopart3"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSectionSS2" title="Employee Details" importance="Medium" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart1 id="empdetailpart1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart2 id="empdetailpart2" columnLayout="1"/>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart3 id="empdetailpart3" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSectionSS3" title="Job Relationship" importance="Low" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:EmploymentBlockJob id="employmentblockjob" showSubSectionMore="true">
								<employment:mappings>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp1"
												  externalPath="/Employee/0"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp2"
												  externalPath="/Employee/1"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp3"
												  externalPath="/Employee/2"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp4"
												  externalPath="/Employee/3"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp5"
												  externalPath="/Employee/4"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp6"
												  externalPath="/Employee/5"/>
								</employment:mappings>
							</employment:EmploymentBlockJob>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
		<footer>
			<m:OverflowToolbar>
				<m:ToolbarSpacer />
				<m:Button type="Accept" text="Accept"/>
				<m:Button type="Reject" text="Reject"/>
			</m:OverflowToolbar>
		</footer>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:goals="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.goals"
	xmlns:personal="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.personal"
	xmlns:employment="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.employment"
	height="100%">

	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout" upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
				<expandedHeading>
					<m:Title text="Object Page Header with Progress Indicator and Rating Indicator" wrapping="true" />
				</expandedHeading>

				<snappedHeading>
					<m:HBox>
						<m:VBox>
							<m:Avatar class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd" displayShape="Square" initials="HF"/>
						</m:VBox>

						<m:VBox>
							<m:Title text="Object Page Header with Progress Indicator and Rating Indicator" wrapping="true"/>
							<m:Label text="Example of an ObjectPage with header facet"/>
						</m:VBox>
					</m:HBox>
				</snappedHeading>

				<expandedContent>
					<m:Label text="Example of an ObjectPage with header facet"/>
				</expandedContent>

				<snappedTitleOnMobile>
					<m:Title text="Object Page Header with Progress Indicator and Rating Indicator"/>
				</snappedTitleOnMobile>

				<actions>
					<m:Button text="Edit" type="Emphasized"/>
					<m:Button text="Delete"/>
					<m:Button text="Copy"/>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton icon="sap-icon://action" type="Transparent" text="Share" tooltip="action"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
		</headerTitle>

		<headerContent>
			<m:FlexBox wrap="Wrap" fitContainer="true">
				<m:Avatar class="sapUiMediumMarginEnd sapUiSmallMarginBottom" displayShape="Square" initials="HF" displaySize="L"/>

				<m:VBox class="sapUiLargeMarginEnd sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
					<m:Title class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom">
						<m:Link text="Profile"/>
					</m:Title>
					<m:Label text="Personal Information"/>
					<m:ProgressIndicator displayValue="42%" percentValue="42%"  state="Information"/>
				</m:VBox>

				 <m:VBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom sapUiLargeMarginEnd">
					<m:Title text="Reliability" class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom" />
					<m:Label text="Based on fulfiled contracts"/>
					<m:RatingIndicator value="4" iconSize="16px"/>
				</m:VBox>

				 <m:VBox width="448px" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
					<m:Title class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom">
						<m:Link text="Product Description"/>
					</m:Title>
					<m:Text text="Top-design high-quality coffee mug - ideal for a comforting moment; Pack: 6; material: Porcelain - durable dishwasher and microwave-safe porcelain that cleans easily and is ideal for everyday service. Comes in two bright colors."/>
				</m:VBox>
			</m:FlexBox>
		</headerContent>

		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="goalsSection" title="2014 Goals Plan">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="goalsSectionSS1" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="personalSection" title="Personal">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSectionSS1" title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
							<personal:BlockSocial id="social" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
							<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
							<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSectionSS2" title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="employmentSection" title="Employment">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSectionSS1" title="Job information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks >
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart1 id="jobinfopart1" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart2 id="jobinfopart2" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart3 id="jobinfopart3"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSectionSS2" title="Employee Details" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart1 id="empdetailpart1" columnLayout="1" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart2 id="empdetailpart2" columnLayout="1" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart3 id="empdetailpart3" columnLayout="1" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.uxap"

	controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.ObjectPageResetSelectedSection.controller.ObjectPageResetSelectedSection"
	height="100%">
	<m:NavContainer id="navigationContainer"
		navigate="onNavigate">
		<m:Page id="page1" title="Page 1">
			<layout:VerticalLayout
				class="sapUiContentPadding"
				width="100%">
				<m:MessageStrip showIcon="true"
					text="This example shows how to reset the selected section of the ObjectPage to the first visible and scroll to the top upon revisiting the page."/>
				<m:List>
					<m:StandardListItem
						press="onListItemPress"
						title="To ObjectPage"
						type="Navigation" />
				</m:List>
				<m:CheckBox id="resetCheck" selected="true" text="reset its selected section to the first visible and scroll to the top"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
		</m:Page>
		<m:Page id="page2" title="Page 2"
			showNavButton="true"
			navButtonPress="onBackButtonPress">
			<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout"
				enableLazyLoading="true"
				showTitleInHeaderContent="true"
				upperCaseAnchorBar="false">

					<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
						<expandedHeading>

							<m:Button text="Edit" type="Emphasized"/>
							<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Delete"/>
							<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Copy"/>
							<m:OverflowToolbarButton icon="sap-icon://action" type="Transparent" text="Share" tooltip="action"/>
						</actions>
					</ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
				</headerTitle>

				<headerContent>

						<m:Avatar class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd" src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" displaySize="L" />

						<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
							<m:Link text="+33 6 4512 5158"/>
							<m:Link text="DeniseSmith@sap.com"/>
						</layout:VerticalLayout>

						<layout:HorizontalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
							<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/linkedin.png"/>
							<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/Twitter.png" class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
						</layout:HorizontalLayout>

						<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
							<m:Label text="Hello! I am Denise and I use UxAP"/>
							<m:VBox>
								<m:Label text="Achieved goals"/>
								<m:ProgressIndicator percentValue="30" displayValue="30%"/>
							</m:VBox>
						</layout:VerticalLayout>

						<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
							<m:Label text="San Jose, USA"/>
						</layout:VerticalLayout>
					</m:FlexBox>
				</headerContent>

				<sections>
					<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="goals" title="2014 Goals Plan">
					<subSections>
						<ObjectPageSubSection id="goalsSS1" titleUppercase="false">
							<blocks>
								<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock"/>
							</blocks>
						</ObjectPageSubSection>
					</subSections>
					</ObjectPageSection>

					<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="personal" title="Personal">
						<subSections>
							<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSS1" title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
								<blocks>
									<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
									<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
									<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
									<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1"/>
								</blocks>
							</ObjectPageSubSection>

							<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSS2" title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
								<blocks>
									<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1"/>
								</blocks>
								<moreBlocks>
									<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1"/>
								</moreBlocks>
							</ObjectPageSubSection>
						</subSections>
					</ObjectPageSection>

					<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="employment" title="Employment">
						<subSections>
							<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS1" title="Job information" titleUppercase="false">
								<blocks>
									<employment:BlockJobInfoPart1 id="jobinfopart1"/>
									<employment:BlockJobInfoPart2 id="jobinfopart2"/>
									<employment:BlockJobInfoPart3 id="jobinfopart3"/>

							<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS2" title="Employee Details" titleUppercase="false">

								</blocks>
								<moreBlocks>
									<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart2 id="empdetailpart2" columnLayout="1"/>
									<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart3 id="empdetailpart3" columnLayout="1"/>
								</moreBlocks>
							</ObjectPageSubSection>

							<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS3" title="Job Relationship" titleUppercase="false">
								<blocks>
									<employment:EmploymentBlockJob id="employmentblockjob" showSubSectionMore="true">
										<employment:mappings>
											<ModelMapping externalModelName="data" internalModelName="emp1"
														externalPath="/Employee/0"/>
											<ModelMapping externalModelName="data" internalModelName="emp2"
														externalPath="/Employee/1"/>
											<ModelMapping externalModelName="data" internalModelName="emp3"
														externalPath="/Employee/2"/>
											<ModelMapping externalModelName="data" internalModelName="emp4"
														externalPath="/Employee/3"/>
											<ModelMapping externalModelName="data" internalModelName="emp5"
														externalPath="/Employee/4"/>
											<ModelMapping externalModelName="data" internalModelName="emp6"
														externalPath="/Employee/5"/>
										</employment:mappings>
									</employment:EmploymentBlockJob>
								</blocks>
							</ObjectPageSubSection>
						</subSections>
					</ObjectPageSection>
					<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="connections" title="Connections">
						<subSections>
							<ObjectPageSubSection id="connectionsSS1" titleUppercase="false">
								<blocks>
									<connections:ConnectionsBlock id="connectionsblock">
										<connections:mappings>
											<ModelMapping externalModelName="data" internalModelName="emp1"
														externalPath="/Employee/0"/>
											<ModelMapping externalModelName="data" internalModelName="emp2"

											<ModelMapping externalModelName="data" internalModelName="emp5"
														externalPath="/Employee/4"/>
											<ModelMapping externalModelName="data" internalModelName="emp6"
														externalPath="/Employee/5"/>
										</connections:mappings>
									</connections:ConnectionsBlock>
								</blocks>
							</ObjectPageSubSection>
						</subSections>
					</ObjectPageSection>
				</sections>
			</ObjectPageLayout>
		</m:Page>
	</m:NavContainer>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:goals="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.goals"
	xmlns:personal="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.personal"
	xmlns:employment="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.employment"
	xmlns:connections="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.connections"
	controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.ObjectPageSelectedSection.controller.ObjectPageSelectedSection"
	height="100%">
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout"
		enableLazyLoading="true"
		useIconTabBar="true"
		showTitleInHeaderContent="true"
		selectedSection="personal"
		upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
				<expandedHeading>
					<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true"/>
				</expandedHeading>

				<snappedHeading>
					<m:FlexBox fitContainer="true" alignItems="Center">
						<m:Avatar src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd"/>
						<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true" />
					</m:FlexBox>
				</snappedHeading>

				<expandedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</expandedContent>

				<snappedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedContent>

				<snappedTitleOnMobile>
					<m:Title text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedTitleOnMobile>

				<actions>
					<m:Button text="Edit" type="Emphasized"/>
					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Delete"/>
					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Copy"/>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton icon="sap-icon://action" type="Transparent" text="Share" tooltip="action"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
		</headerTitle>

		<headerContent>
			<m:FlexBox wrap="Wrap" fitContainer="true">
				<m:Avatar class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd" src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" displaySize="L" />

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Link text="+33 6 4512 5158"/>
					<m:Link text="DeniseSmith@sap.com"/>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:HorizontalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/linkedin.png"/>
					<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/Twitter.png" class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
				</layout:HorizontalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="Hello! I am Denise and I use UxAP"/>
					<m:VBox>
						<m:Label text="Achieved goals"/>
						<m:ProgressIndicator percentValue="30" displayValue="30%"/>
					</m:VBox>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="San Jose, USA"/>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>
			</m:FlexBox>
		</headerContent>

		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="goals" title="2014 Goals Plan">
			<subSections>
				<ObjectPageSubSection id="goalsSS1" titleUppercase="false">
					<blocks>
						<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock"/>
					</blocks>
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="personal" title="Personal">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSS1" title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
							<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
							<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
							<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSS2" title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="employment" title="Employment">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS1" title="Job information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart1 id="jobinfopart1"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart2 id="jobinfopart2"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart3 id="jobinfopart3"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS2" title="Employee Details" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart1 id="empdetailpart1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart2 id="empdetailpart2" columnLayout="1"/>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart3 id="empdetailpart3" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS3" title="Job Relationship" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:EmploymentBlockJob id="employmentblockjob" showSubSectionMore="true">
								<employment:mappings>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp1"
												  externalPath="/Employee/0"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp2"
												  externalPath="/Employee/1"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp3"
												  externalPath="/Employee/2"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp4"
												  externalPath="/Employee/3"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp5"
												  externalPath="/Employee/4"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp6"
												  externalPath="/Employee/5"/>
								</employment:mappings>
							</employment:EmploymentBlockJob>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="connections" title="Connections">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="connectionsSS1" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<connections:ConnectionsBlock id="connectionsblock">
								<connections:mappings>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp1"
												  externalPath="/Employee/0"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp2"
												  externalPath="/Employee/1"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp3"
												  externalPath="/Employee/2"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp4"
												  externalPath="/Employee/3"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp5"
												  externalPath="/Employee/4"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp6"
												  externalPath="/Employee/5"/>
								</connections:mappings>
							</connections:ConnectionsBlock>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

							path: 'TableModel>/ProductCollection',

					</ui:Table>

				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

		</sections>

<mvc:View
		height="100%"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.uxap"
		xmlns:sample="sap.uxap.sample.ObjectPageSubSectionMultiView.controller.blocks"
		controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.ObjectPageSubSectionMultiView.controller.ObjectPageSubSectionMultiView"
		>
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout" upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader
					objectTitle="Automatic layout of blocks"
					objectSubtitle="This example shows how blocks can be laid out automatically by the Object Page when their size is not specified"/>

		</headerTitle>

		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" showTitle="false">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="1 block" titleUppercase="false">

							<m:Button icon="sap-icon://synchronize"/>
							<m:Button icon="sap-icon://expand"/>

							<m:Button icon="sap-icon://expand"/>
						</actions>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: ObjectPageTabNavigationMode
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		   xmlns="sap.uxap"
		   xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
		   xmlns:m="sap.m"
		   xmlns:goals="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.goals"
		   xmlns:personal="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.personal"
		   xmlns:employment="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.employment"
		   xmlns:connections="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.connections"
		   controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.ObjectPageTabNavigationMode.controller.ObjectPageTabNavigationMode"
		   height="100%">
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout"
		enableLazyLoading="true"
		useIconTabBar="true"
		showTitleInHeaderContent="true"
		upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
				<expandedHeading>
					<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true"/>
				</expandedHeading>

				<snappedHeading>
					<m:FlexBox fitContainer="true" alignItems="Center">
						<m:Avatar src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" class="sapUiTinyMarginEnd"/>
						<m:Title text="Denise Smith" wrapping="true" />
					</m:FlexBox>
				</snappedHeading>

				<expandedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</expandedContent>

				<snappedContent>
					<m:Text text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedContent>

				<snappedTitleOnMobile>
					<m:Title text="Senior UI Developer"/>
				</snappedTitleOnMobile>

				<actions>
					<m:Button text="Edit" type="Emphasized"/>
					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Delete"/>
					<m:Button type="Transparent" text="Copy"/>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton icon="sap-icon://action" type="Transparent" text="Share" tooltip="action"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
		</headerTitle>

		<headerContent>
			<m:FlexBox wrap="Wrap" fitContainer="true" >
				<m:Avatar class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd" src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" displaySize="L" />

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Link text="+33 6 4512 5158"/>
					<m:Link text="DeniseSmith@sap.com"/>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:HorizontalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/linkedin.png"/>
					<m:Image src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/Twitter.png" class="sapUiSmallMarginBegin"/>
			    </layout:HorizontalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="Hello! I am Denise and I use UxAP"/>
					<m:VBox>
						<m:Label text="Achieved goals"/>
						<m:ProgressIndicator percentValue="30" displayValue="30%"/>
					</m:VBox>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>

				<layout:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMarginBeginEnd">
					<m:Label text="San Jose, USA"/>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>
			</m:FlexBox>
		</headerContent>

		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="goals" title="2014 Goals Plan">
			<subSections>
				<ObjectPageSubSection id="goalsSS1" titleUppercase="false">
					<blocks>
						<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock"/>
					</blocks>
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="personal" title="Personal">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSS1" title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
							<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
							<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
							<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSS2" title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="employment" title="Employment">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS1" title="Job information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart1 id="jobinfopart1"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart2 id="jobinfopart2"/>
							<employment:BlockJobInfoPart3 id="jobinfopart3"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS2" title="Employee Details" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart1 id="empdetailpart1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart2 id="empdetailpart2" columnLayout="1"/>
							<employment:BlockEmpDetailPart3 id="empdetailpart3" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSS3" title="Job Relationship" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<employment:EmploymentBlockJob id="employmentblockjob" showSubSectionMore="true">
								<employment:mappings>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp1"
												  externalPath="/Employee/0"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp2"
												  externalPath="/Employee/1"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp3"
												  externalPath="/Employee/2"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp4"
												  externalPath="/Employee/3"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp5"
												  externalPath="/Employee/4"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp6"
												  externalPath="/Employee/5"/>
								</employment:mappings>
							</employment:EmploymentBlockJob>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" id="connections" title="Connections">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="connectionsSS1" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<connections:ConnectionsBlock id="connectionsblock">
								<connections:mappings>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp1"
												  externalPath="/Employee/0"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp2"
												  externalPath="/Employee/1"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp3"
												  externalPath="/Employee/2"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp4"
												  externalPath="/Employee/3"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp5"
												  externalPath="/Employee/4"/>
									<ModelMapping externalModelName="ObjectPageModel" internalModelName="emp6"
												  externalPath="/Employee/5"/>
								</connections:mappings>
							</connections:ConnectionsBlock>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:goals="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.goals"
	xmlns:personal="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.personal"
	xmlns:employment="sap.uxap.sample.SharedBlocks.employment"
	height="100%">

	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout"
		showTitleInHeaderContent="true"
		upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
				<expandedHeading>
					<m:Title text="Object Page Header with Header Container" wrapping="true" />
				</expandedHeading>

				<snappedHeading>
					<m:HBox>
						<m:VBox>
							<m:Avatar src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd" />
						</m:VBox>

						<m:VBox>
							<m:Title text="Object Page Header with Header Container" wrapping="true"/>
							<m:Label text="Example of an ObjectPage with header facet"/>
						</m:VBox>
					</m:HBox>
				</snappedHeading>

				<expandedContent>
					<m:Label text="Example of an ObjectPage with header facet"/>
				</expandedContent>

				<snappedTitleOnMobile>
					<m:Title text="Object Page Header with Header Container"/>
				</snappedTitleOnMobile>

				<actions>
					<m:Button text="Edit" type="Emphasized"/>
					<m:Button text="Delete"/>
					<m:Button text="Copy"/>
					<m:OverflowToolbarButton icon="sap-icon://action" type="Transparent" text="Share" tooltip="action"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageDynamicHeaderTitle>
		</headerTitle>

		<headerContent>

			<m:HeaderContainer id="headerContainer" scrollStep="200" showDividers="false">
				<m:HBox class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
					<m:Avatar src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png" class="sapUiMediumMarginEnd" displaySize="L"/>

					<m:VBox class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
						<m:Title class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom">

				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="goalsSectionSS1" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>

					</ObjectPageSubSection>

			<ObjectPageSection anchorBarButtonColor="Positive" titleUppercase="false" id="personalSection" title="Personal" importance="Medium">

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSectionSS1" title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">

							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone" class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"/>

						<moreBlocks>

						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection anchorBarButtonColor="Critical" titleUppercase="false" id="employmentSection" title="Employment">

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSectionSS1" title="Job information" titleUppercase="false">

title: ObjectPageXML
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		   xmlns:m="sap.m"
		   xmlns="sap.uxap"
		   xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
		   xmlns:sample="sap.uxap.testblocks.multiview"
		   xmlns:edit="sap.uxap.testblocks.objectpageblock"
		   xmlns:bl="sap.uxap.sample.Headers.block"
		   xmlns:mb="sap.uxap.testblocks.mixedblock"
		   controllerName="sap.uxap.sample.ObjectPageXML.controller.ObjectPageXML"
		   height="100%">

	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout" upperCaseAnchorBar="false">

		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader objectImageURI="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/imageID_275314.png"
							  objectTitle="Denise Smith"
							  objectSubtitle="Senior UI Developer">

				<actions>
					<m:Button icon="sap-icon://pull-down" press="showCurrentSection" type="Emphasized"/>
					<m:Button icon="sap-icon://show" press="showObjectPageState" type="Emphasized"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageHeader>
		</headerTitle>
		<headerContent>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Link text="+33 6 4512 5158"/>
				<m:Link text="DeniseSmith@sap.com"/>
				<layout:HorizontalLayout>
					<m:Link text="twitter" target="_blank"/>
					<m:Link text="LinkedIn" target="_blank"/>
				</layout:HorizontalLayout>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Label text="Personal description"/>
				<layout:VerticalLayout id="headerDescription">
					<m:Label text="Personal description (2)"/>
					<m:Label text="Personal description (3)"/>
					<m:Label text="Personal description (4)"/>
				</layout:VerticalLayout>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Label id="headerRole" text="Role Specific info"/>
				<m:Label id="headerRole1" text="Role Specific info 1"/>
				<m:Label id="headerRole2" text="Role Specific info 2"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
		</headerContent>
		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="{ObjectPageState>/sections/0/title}" icon="sap-icon://employee">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection icon="sap-icon://employee-pane"
										  title="{ObjectPageState>/sections/0/subsections/0/title}"
										  mode="{ObjectPageState>/sections/0/subsections/0/mode}"
										  titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<bl:GeneralInfo id="generalInfoId">
								<ModelMapping internalModelName="Employee" externalModelName="ObjectPageModel"
											  externalPath="/MyEmployee"/>
							</bl:GeneralInfo>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="{ObjectPageState>/sections/0/subsections/1/title}"
										  mode="{ObjectPageState>/sections/0/subsections/1/mode}"
										  titleUppercase="false"
							>
						<actions>
							<m:Button icon="sap-icon://action" type="Transparent" press="onActionPress"/>
							<m:Button icon="sap-icon://edit" type="Transparent" press="onActionPress"/>
						</actions>
						<blocks>
							<sample:MultiViewBlock/>
							<sample:MultiViewBlock/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<sample:MultiViewBlock/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="{ObjectPageState>/sections/1/title}">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="{ObjectPageState>/sections/1/subsections/0/title}"
										  mode="{ObjectPageState>/sections/1/subsections/0/mode}"
										  titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<bl:GeneralInfo id="compensationId">
								<ModelMapping internalModelName="Employee" externalModelName="ObjectPageModel"
											  externalPath="/MyEmployee"/>
							</bl:GeneralInfo>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="{ObjectPageState>/sections/1/subsections/1/title}"
										  mode="{ObjectPageState>/sections/1/subsections/1/mode}"
										  titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<edit:SimpleEdit/>
							<mb:MixedBlock/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<sample:MultiViewBlock/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"

	xmlns="sap.uxap"

	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	height="100%"
	xmlns:template="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.template/1"
	controllerName="testdata.mvc.stashed.OP">

	<m:Page>
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader objectTitle="Section sample">
			</ObjectPageHeader>
		</headerTitle>

		<sections>

			<ObjectPageSection id="section0" stashed="true" visible="true" title="{/title}" subSections="{/subSections}">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="{foo}">
						<blocks>
							<some:SomeBlock />
							<m:Text text="A not Templated vintage style stashed section" />
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection id="section1" stashed="false" title="A not Templated vintage style stashed section">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection>
						<blocks>
							<some:SomeBlock />
							<m:Text text="A not Templated vintage style stashed section" />
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection id="section2" stashed="true" title="A section that is imma there">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection>
						<blocks>
							<some:SomeBlock />
							<m:Text text="A section that is imma there" />
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection id="section3" stashed="true" title="A not Templated vintage style stashed section">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection>
						<blocks>
							<some:SomeBlock />
							<m:Text text="A not Templated vintage style stashed section" />
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>

	</ObjectPageLayout>
	</m:Page>

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.demo.cart.controller.OrderCompleted"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Page
		id="orderCompletedPage"
		title="{i18n>orderCompletedTitle}"
		backgroundDesign="Solid"
		class="sapUiContentPadding">
		<landmarkInfo>
			<PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo
				rootRole="Region"
				rootLabel="{i18n>OrderCompleted_rootLabel}"
				contentRole="Main"
				contentLabel="{i18n>OrderCompleted_contentLabel}"
				headerRole="Region"
				headerLabel="{i18n>OrderCompleted_headerLabel}"
				footerRole="Region"
				footerLabel="{i18n>OrderCompleted_footerLabel}"/>
		</landmarkInfo>
		<content>
			<FormattedText htmlText="{i18n>orderCompletedText}"/>
		</content>
		<footer>
			<Bar>
				<contentRight>
					<Button
						id="returnToShopButton"
						type="Emphasized"
						text="{i18n>returnToShopButtonText}"
						press=".onReturnToShopButtonPress"/>
				</contentRight>
			</Bar>
		</footer>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>
