title: OverflowToolbar
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.OverflowToolbarSimple.OverflowToolbar"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns="sap.m">

	<mvc:dependents>
		<core:CommandExecution
				command="Share"
				enabled="true"
				execute=".shareAction"
			/>
	</mvc:dependents>

	<MessageStrip
		class="sapUiTinyMargin"
		text="Use this slider to resize the toolbars and observe their behaviour."
		type="Information"
		showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>

	<Slider value="{/viewPortPercentWidth}" liveChange="onSliderMoved"/>

	<MessageStrip
		class="sapUiTinyMargin"
		text="When buttons have no special layout, they are all moved to the overflow area."
		type="Information"
		showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>

	<OverflowToolbar id="otb1">
		<Label text="Buttons:"/>
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
		<Button text="New" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Open" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Save" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Save as" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Cut" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Copy" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Paste" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Undo" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Redo" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Share" press="cmd:Share" type="Transparent"/>
	</OverflowToolbar>

	<Label/>

	<MessageStrip
		class="sapUiTinyMargin"
		text="The Cut, Copy and Paste buttons have a special layout and never move to the overflow area."
		type="Information"
		showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>

	<OverflowToolbar id="otb2">
		<Label text="Buttons:"/>
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
		<Button text="New" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Open" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Save" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Save as" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Cut" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="NeverOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Copy" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="NeverOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Paste" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="NeverOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Undo" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Redo" type="Transparent"/>
	</OverflowToolbar>

	<Label/>

	<MessageStrip
		class="sapUiTinyMargin"
		text="The last two buttons have a special layout to always stay in the overflow area. Even if there is enough space for them, they will not be displayed."
		type="Information"
		showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>

	<OverflowToolbar id="otb3">
		<Label text="Buttons:"/>
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
		<Button text="New" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Open" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Save" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Save as" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Cut" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Copy" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Paste" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Undo" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="AlwaysOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Redo">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="AlwaysOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
	</OverflowToolbar>

	<Label/>

	<MessageStrip
		class="sapUiTinyMargin"
		text="The available priorities for the toolbar items are: AlwaysOverflow, Disappear, Low, High and NeverOverflow.
			By default the priority of each toolbar item is High.
			Items with AlwaysOverflow priority remain visible in the overflow area.
			Items with NeverOverflow priority remain visible in the toolbar.
			Items with Disappear, Low and High priority overflow depending on their priority and position in the toolbar.
			Items with Disappear priority overflow but they are not displayed in the overflow area."
		type="Information"
		showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>

	<OverflowToolbar id="otb4">
		<Label text="Buttons:"/><Label/>
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
		<Button text="Always 1" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					priority="AlwaysOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Always 2" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					priority="AlwaysOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Never" type="Emphasized">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					priority="NeverOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Default" type="Transparent">	</Button>
		<Button text="Low 1" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="High 1" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="High"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Disappear" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Disappear"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="High 2" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="High"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Low 2" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
	</OverflowToolbar>
	<MessageStrip
		class="sapUiTinyMargin"
		text="Toolbar items can overflow together even if they are on different positions.
			This is possible using the group property of the OverflowToolbarLayoutData element.
			By default the group value is 0, which means that the element does not belong to any group.
			When two or more elements have the same group value, this means that they belong to the same group.
			Elements that belong to a group are not allowed to have AlwaysOverflow or NeverOverflow priority."
		type="Information"
		showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>

	<OverflowToolbar id="otb5">
		<Label text="Buttons:"/><Label/>
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
		<Button text="Always 1" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					priority="AlwaysOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Always 2" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					priority="AlwaysOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Never" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					priority="NeverOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Group 1" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="High" group="1"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Group 1" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="High" group="1"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Disappear" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Disappear"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Group 2" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" group="2"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Group 2" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" group="2"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
	</OverflowToolbar>

	<MessageStrip
			class="sapUiTinyMargin"
			text="Toolbar separators are shown as horizontal lines in the overflow area. If the separator happens to be
				the first or the last element in the overflow area, it won't be displayed. It is recommended to use
				the separator within group, so it won't be left behind in an inappropriate positions."
			type="Information"
			showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>

	<OverflowToolbar id="otb6">
		<Label text="Buttons within separated groups:"/><Label/>
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
		<Button text="Never" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
						priority="NeverOverflow"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Group 1" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData group="1"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Group 1" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData group="1"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<ToolbarSeparator>
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData group="2"/>
			</layoutData>
		</ToolbarSeparator>
		<Button text="Group 2" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData group="2"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Group 2" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData group="2"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
	</OverflowToolbar>

	<MessageStrip
		class="sapUiTinyMargin"
		text="Segmented buttons are shown as Selects when in the overflow area."
		type="Information" showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>

	<OverflowToolbar id="otb7">
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
		<Select>
			<items>
				<core:Item key="1" text="Option 1"/>
				<core:Item key="2" text="Option 2"/>
				<core:Item key="3" text="Option 3"/>
				<core:Item key="4" text="Option 4"/>
				<core:Item key="5" text="Option 5"/>
			</items>
		</Select>
		<Button text="Button 1" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Button 2" type="Transparent"/>
		<ToggleButton text="Toggle Button" type="Transparent"/>
		<Button text="Button 3" type="Transparent"/>
		<SegmentedButton tooltip="Segmented Button">
			<items>
				<SegmentedButtonItem text="Segmented"/>
				<SegmentedButtonItem text="Button"/>
			</items>
		</SegmentedButton>
		<Button text="Button 4" type="Transparent"/>
	</OverflowToolbar>

	<MessageStrip
		class="sapUiTinyMargin"
		text="Toolbar items with shrinkable LayoutData and minWidth"
		type="Information"
		showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>
	<OverflowToolbar id="otb8">
		<Label text="Buttons:"/>
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					shrinkable="true"
					minWidth = "100px"/>
			</layoutData>
		<Label/>
		<Button text="Min width 50px" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					shrinkable="true"
					minWidth = "50px"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<Button text="Min width 100px" type="Transparent">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					shrinkable="true"
					minWidth = "100px"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Button>
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
		<Select>
			<items>
				<core:Item key="1" text="Option 1"/>
				<core:Item key="2" text="Option 2"/>
				<core:Item key="3" text="Option 3"/>
				<core:Item key="4" text="Option 4"/>
				<core:Item key="5" text="Option 5"/>
			</items>
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					shrinkable="true"
					minWidth = "150px"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Select>
		<Input width="10%" placeholder="Input">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					shrinkable="true"
					minWidth = "50px"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Input>
		<SearchField width="10%" placeholder="Search">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					shrinkable="true"
					minWidth = "100px"/>
			</layoutData>
		</SearchField>
		<ToolbarSpacer/>
		<CheckBox text="I'm a CheckBox!">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					shrinkable="true"
					minWidth = "30px"/>
			</layoutData>
		</CheckBox>
		<RadioButton text="I'm a radio button!">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
					shrinkable="true"
					minWidth = "100px"/>
			</layoutData>
		</RadioButton>
	</OverflowToolbar>

	<MessageStrip
		class="sapUiTinyMargin"
		text="Overflow Toolbar with grouped elements: Label with Select and Label with Input.
			Grouped elements move inside Overflow Toolbar in pairs."
		type="Information"
		showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>
	<OverflowToolbar id="otb9">
		<Label text="Grouping:"/>
		<ToolbarSpacer />
		<Label text="Select:" labelFor="labeledSelectGroup1">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData group="1" />
			</layoutData>
		</Label>
		<Select width="20%" id="labeledSelectGroup1">
			<items>
				<core:Item key="1" text="Option 1"/>
				<core:Item key="2" text="Option 2"/>
				<core:Item key="3" text="Option 3"/>
				<core:Item key="4" text="Option 4"/>
				<core:Item key="5" text="Option 5"/>
			</items>
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData group="1" shrinkable="true" minWidth="150px"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Select>
		<Label text="Input:" labelFor="labeledInputGroup2">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData group="2" />
			</layoutData>
		</Label>

		<Input width="20%" placeholder="Input" id="labeledInputGroup2">
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData shrinkable="true" group="2" minWidth="150px"/>
			</layoutData>
		</Input>
	</OverflowToolbar>
	<MessageStrip
		class="sapUiTinyMargin"
		text="Generic Tag controls in Overflow Toolbar"
		type="Information"
		showIcon="true">
	</MessageStrip>
	<OverflowToolbar id="otb10">
		<Label text="Multiple Generic Tag instances:"/>
		<ToolbarSpacer />
		<GenericTag text="Project Cost" design="StatusIconHidden" status="Error">
			<ObjectNumber state="Error" emphasized="false" number="3.5M" unit="EUR"/>
		</GenericTag>

		<GenericTag text="Shortage Expected" status="Warning">
		</GenericTag>

		<GenericTag text="Project Cost"  design="StatusIconHidden" status="Success">
			<ObjectNumber state="Success" emphasized="false" number="96" unit="%" />
			<layoutData>
				<OverflowToolbarLayoutData shrinkable="true" group="2" minWidth="70px"/>
			</layoutData>
		</GenericTag>
		<GenericTag text="In Stock" status="Success">
		</GenericTag>
	</OverflowToolbar>

	<Slider class="sapUiTinyMarginTopBottom" value="{/viewPortPercentWidth}" liveChange="onSliderMoved"/>
</mvc:View>

title: P13nContainer
code:
<mvc:View 
	height="100%"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:p13n="sap.m.p13n"
	class="sapUiContentPadding"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.p13n.Container.P13nContainer">

	<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">

		<Label labelFor="dialogChose" text="Chose Popup type"/>
		<RadioButtonGroup id="dialogChose" columns="2" class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			<RadioButton id="dlg" text="Dialog" />
			<RadioButton id="ppr" text="Popover" />
		</RadioButtonGroup>

		<Label labelFor="layoutType" text="Chose P13nContainer layout type"/>
		<RadioButtonGroup select="selectLayout" id="layoutType" columns="2" class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom">
			<RadioButton id="list" text="List" />
			<RadioButton id="tabs" text="IconTabBar" />
		</RadioButtonGroup>

		<Button id="openBtn" text="Show P13nContainer used in Popup" press="onContainerOpen"/>

		<Dialog id="d1" title="My custom p13n Dialog" verticalScrolling="false" contentWidth="25rem" contentHeight="35rem">
			<p13n:Container id="P13nContainer" listLayout="{/listLayout}" defaultView="view2">
				<p13n:AbstractContainerItem key="view1" text="View 1">
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
						<Text text="My Test View 1"/>
					</VBox>
				</p13n:AbstractContainerItem>
				<p13n:AbstractContainerItem key="view2" text="View 2">
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
						<Text text="My Test View 2"/>
					</VBox>
				</p13n:AbstractContainerItem>
				<p13n:AbstractContainerItem key="view3" text="View 3">
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
						<Text text="My Test View 3"/>
					</VBox>
				</p13n:AbstractContainerItem>
			</p13n:Container>
			<buttons>
				<Button text="Add custom view" press="addCustomView"/>
				<Button text="Close Dialog" press="closeDialog"/>
			</buttons>
		</Dialog>

		<ResponsivePopover id="p1" title="My custom p13n Popover" verticalScrolling="false" contentWidth="25rem" contentHeight="15rem">
			<p13n:Container id="P13nContainerPopover" listLayout="{/listLayout}" defaultView="view2">
				<p13n:AbstractContainerItem key="view1" text="View 1">
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
						<Text text="My Test View 1"/>
					</VBox>
				</p13n:AbstractContainerItem>
				<p13n:AbstractContainerItem key="view2" text="View 2">
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
						<Text text="My Test View 2"/>
					</VBox>
				</p13n:AbstractContainerItem>
				<p13n:AbstractContainerItem key="view3" text="View 3">
					<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
						<Text text="My Test View 3"/>
					</VBox>
				</p13n:AbstractContainerItem>
			</p13n:Container>
			<beginButton>
				<Button text="Add custom view" press="addCustomView"/>
			</beginButton>
		</ResponsivePopover>

	</VBox>

</mvc:View>

title: P13nPanels
code:
<mvc:View 
    height="100%"
    xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
    xmlns="sap.m"
    xmlns:p13n="sap.m.p13n"
    xmlns:ce="sap.ui.codeeditor"
    class="sapUiContentPadding"
    controllerName="sap.m.sample.p13n.Popup.P13nPanels">

    <VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">

        <Button id="openBtn" text="Show p13n.Popup" press="onContainerOpen"/>

        <p13n:Popup id="p13nPopup" title="My Custom View Settings" close="onClose" warningText="Are you sure?" reset=".reset">
            <p13n:panels>
                <p13n:SelectionPanel id="columnsPanel" title="Columns" enableCount="true" showHeader="true" change="parseP13nState"/>
                <p13n:SortPanel id="sortPanel" title="Sort" change="parseP13nState"/>
                <p13n:GroupPanel id="groupPanel" title="Group" change="parseP13nState"/>
            </p13n:panels>
        </p13n:Popup>

        <ce:CodeEditor id="p13nEditor" class="sapUiSmallMargin" height="50rem"/>

    </VBox>

</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:c="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:t="sap.ui.table"
	xmlns:trm="sap.ui.table.rowmodes"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	height="100%">
	<Page title="Title" enableScrolling="true" class="sapUiResponsivePadding--header sapUiResponsivePadding--footer">
		<content>
			<VBox fitContainer="true">
				<f:SimpleForm id="SimpleFormDisplay480"
					editable="false"
					layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
					title="Address"
					labelSpanL="4"
					labelSpanM="4"
					emptySpanL="0"
					emptySpanM="0"
					columnsL="2"
					columnsM="2">
					<f:content>
						<c:Title text="Office" />
						<Label text="Name" />
						<Text text="Red Point Stores" />
						<Label text="Street/No." />
						<Text text="Main St 1618" />
						<Label text="ZIP Code/City" />
						<Text text="31415 Maintown" />
						<Label text="Country" />
						<Text text="Germany" />
						<c:Title text="Online" />
						<Label text="Web" />
						<Text text="http://www.sap.com" />
						<Label text="Twitter" />
						<Text text="@sap" />
					</f:content>
					<f:layoutData>
						<FlexItemData shrinkFactor="0" backgroundDesign="Solid" styleClass="sapContrastPlus"/>
					</f:layoutData>
				</f:SimpleForm>
				<IconTabBar upperCase="true" expandable="false" applyContentPadding="true" stretchContentHeight="true" class="sapUiResponsiveContentPadding">
					<items>
						<IconTabFilter key="balances" text="Balances" />
						<IconTabFilter key="compare" text="Compare" />
					</items>
					<content>
						<t:AnalyticalTable selectionMode="MultiToggle">
							<t:rowMode>
								<trm:Auto rowContentHeight="32"/>
							</t:rowMode>
							<t:toolbar>
								<OverflowToolbar>
									<ToolbarSpacer />
									<SearchField width="12rem" />
									<ToolbarSpacer width="1rem" />
									<SegmentedButton>
										<items>
											<SegmentedButtonItem icon="sap-icon://table-view" />
											<SegmentedButtonItem icon="sap-icon://bar-chart" />
										</items>
									</SegmentedButton>
									<ToolbarSpacer width="1rem" />
									<Button icon="sap-icon://group-2" type="Transparent" />
									<Button icon="sap-icon://action-settings" type="Transparent" />
								</OverflowToolbar>
							</t:toolbar>
							<t:columns>
								<t:AnalyticalColumn />
								<t:AnalyticalColumn />
								<t:AnalyticalColumn />
								<t:AnalyticalColumn />
							</t:columns>
						</t:AnalyticalTable>
					</content>
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" baseSize="0%"/>
					</layoutData>
				</IconTabBar>
			</VBox>
		</content>
		<footer>
			<OverflowToolbar>
				<content>
					<ToolbarSpacer />
					<Button text="Grouped View" />
					<Button text="Classical Table" />
				</content>
			</OverflowToolbar>
		</footer>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: PageStandardClasses
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.PageStandardClasses.controller.PageStandardClasses"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Page
		id="idPage"
		title=" Product XY"
		class= "sapUiResponsivePadding--header" >
		<!-- this CSS class add a standard spacing to all the page content -->

		<content>
			<ObjectHeader
				title="{Name}"
				backgroundDesign="Solid"
				number="{
					parts:[{path:'Price'},{path:'CurrencyCode'}],
					type: 'sap.ui.model.type.Currency',
					formatOptions: {showMeasure: false}
				}"
				numberUnit="{CurrencyCode}" >
				<attributes>
					<ObjectAttribute title="Weight" text="{WeightMeasure} {WeightUnit}" />
					<ObjectAttribute title="Dimensions" text="{Width} x {Depth} X {Height} {DimUnit}" />
				</attributes>
				<statuses>
					<ObjectStatus title="Status" text="In Stock" state="Success" />
				</statuses>
			</ObjectHeader>
			<IconTabBar
				expanded="{device>/isNoPhone}"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom sapUiResponsiveContentPadding">
				<items>
					<IconTabFilter
						key="info"
						text="Info">
						<f:SimpleForm
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" >
							<f:title>
								<core:Title text="A Form" />
							</f:title>
							<Label text="Label"/>
							<Text text="Value"/>
						</f:SimpleForm>
					</IconTabFilter>
					<IconTabFilter
						key="attachments"
						text="Attachments">
						<List headerText="A List" showSeparators="Inner" >
						</List>
					</IconTabFilter>
					<IconTabFilter
						key="notes"
						text="Notes">
						<FeedInput />
					</IconTabFilter>
				</items>
			</IconTabBar>
			<f:SimpleForm
				layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
				class="sapUiForceWidthAuto sapUiResponsiveMargin" >
				<f:title>
					<core:Title text="A Form" />
				</f:title>
				<Label text="Label"/>
				<Text text="Value"/>
			</f:SimpleForm>
			<List headerText="A List" backgroundDesign="Translucent" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin"/>
			<Table headerText="A Table" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin"/>
			<Panel headerText="A Panel" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin"/>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: Pagination
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.Pagination"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<Page title="Pagination">
		<IconTabBar >
			<items>
				<IconTabFilter text="List">
					<mvc:View viewName="sap.f.cardsdemo.view.common.CommonCardSettings" type="XML" async="true"></mvc:View>
					<Title text="Server-Side" class="sapUiSmallMarginTopBottom"></Title>
					<f:GridContainer>
						<w:Card id="card2"
								manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/pagination/oDataManifest.json"
								action=".onAction">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card id="card3" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/pagination/oDataManifestGlobalData.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/pagination/cardWithFilters.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
					</f:GridContainer>
					<Title text="Client-Side" class="sapUiSmallMarginTopBottom"></Title>
					<f:GridContainer>
						<w:Card id="card1" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/pagination/cardManifest.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/pagination/clientSideWithDynamicData.json">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
					</f:GridContainer>
				</IconTabFilter>
				<IconTabFilter text="Table">
					<f:GridContainer>
						<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/pagination/table/clientSide.manifest.json"
								action=".onAction">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/pagination/table/serverSide.manifest.json"
								action=".onAction">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
					</f:GridContainer>
				</IconTabFilter>
				<IconTabFilter text="Timeline">
					<f:GridContainer>
						<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/pagination/timeline/clientSide.manifest.json"
								action=".onAction">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
						<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/pagination/timeline/serverSide.manifest.json"
								action=".onAction">
							<w:layoutData>
								<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
							</w:layoutData>
						</w:Card>
					</f:GridContainer>
				</IconTabFilter>
			</items>
		</IconTabBar>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.Parameters"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	displayBlock="true">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
				<Title text="List Card" />
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>
		<mvc:View viewName="sap.f.cardsdemo.view.common.CommonCardSettings" type="XML" async="true"></mvc:View>
		<Button
			text="Get Walldorf Weather"
			press=".onChangeCity"
			class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			<layoutData>
				<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="2" />
			</layoutData>
		</Button>

		<f:GridContainer class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			<w:Card id="weatherCard" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" manifest="{manifests>/paramsInRequest}" parameters="{params>/weather}">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="manifestOnly" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" manifest="{manifests>/paramsInManifestOnly}">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="listCard" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" manifest="{manifests>/paramsListCard}" parameters="{params>/location}">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="3" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="defaultFromManifest" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" manifest="{manifests>/paramsDefaultParamFromManifest}" parameters="{params>/locationCity}">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card id="defaultFromManifestEdited" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" manifest="{manifests>/paramsDefaultParamFromManifestEdited}" parameters="{params>/locationOverwrite}">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
		</f:GridContainer>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: Post
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.ui.demo.bulletinboard.controller.Post"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:semantic="sap.m.semantic">
	<semantic:FullscreenPage
			id="page"
			busy="{postView>/busy}"
			busyIndicatorDelay="0"
			navButtonPress=".onNavBack"
			showNavButton="true"
			title="{i18n>objectTitle}">
		<semantic:content>
			<ObjectHeader
					id="objectHeader"
					title="{Title}"
					number="{
						path: 'Price',
						formatter: '.formatter.numberUnit'
					}"
					numberUnit="{Currency}"
					backgroundDesign="Translucent">
			</ObjectHeader>
			<IconTabBar id="iconTabBar"
						expanded="{=! ${device>/system/phone}}"
						class="sapUiNoContentPadding">
				<items>
					<IconTabFilter icon="sap-icon://hint" key="info">
						<form:SimpleForm layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
							<form:content>
								<Label text="{i18n>postDateLabel}"/>
								<Text text="{
									path: 'Timestamp',
									formatter: '.formatter.date'
								}"/>
								<Label text="{i18n>postDescriptionLabel}"/>
								<Text text="{Description}"/>
							</form:content>
						</form:SimpleForm>
					</IconTabFilter>
					<IconTabFilter icon="sap-icon://inspection" key="statistics">
						<Text text="Viewed 55555 times" id="viewCounter"/>
					</IconTabFilter>
				</items>
			</IconTabBar>
		</semantic:content>
	</semantic:FullscreenPage>
</mvc:View>

title: Preview
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.integration.sample.Progressive.Preview"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	class="progressiveView">
	<FlexBox id="outer" direction="Column" class="OuterContainer">
		<OverflowToolbar design="Transparent" style="Clear" id="toolbar">
			<Button text="Back" press="clear" visible="false" type="Emphasized"/>
			<Label text="Size Mode" />
			<Select id="sizeModeSelect" change="updateSizeMode" selectedKey="Compact">
				<core:Item key="Compact" text="Compact" />
				<core:Item key="Cozy" text="Cozy" />
			</Select>
			<Label text="Header Type" />
			<Select id="typeSelect" change="update" selectedKey="{settings>/type}">
				<core:Item key="Default" text="Default" />
				<core:Item key="Numeric" text="Numeric" />
			</Select>
			<Label text="Content Type" />
			<Select id="contentTypeSelect" change="update" selectedKey="{settings>/contentType}">
				<core:Item key="List" text="List" />
				<core:Item key="Component" text="Component (No Header)" />
			</Select>
			<Label text="Display" />
			<Select id="displaySelect" change="update" selectedKey="{settings>/display}">
				<core:Item key="Default" text="Header and Content" />
				<core:Item key="Header" text="Header only" />
			</Select>
			<Label text="Variant"/>
			<Select id="variantSelect" selectedKey="{settings>/variant}" change="update" items="{path:'settings>/possibleVariants', filters : [{ path : 'visible', operator : 'EQ', value1 : true}]}">
				<core:Item key="{settings>key}" text="{settings>text}"/>
			</Select>
			<Label text="Icon" />
			<Select id="iconSelect" change="update" selectedKey="{settings>/icon}">
				<core:Item key="ColorSquare" text="ColorSquare"/>
				<core:Item key="ColorCircle" text="ColorCircle"/>
				<core:Item key="Transparent" text="Transparent"/>
				<core:Item key="None" text="None"/>
			</Select>
			<Label text="Action/Status" />
			<Select id="actionStatus" change="update" selectedKey="{settings>/actionStatus}">
				<core:Item key="None" text="None"/>
				<core:Item key="Status" text="Status"/>
				<core:Item key="Action" text="Action"/>
				<core:Item key="Both" text="Both"/>
			</Select>
			<Label text="Microchart" />
			<Select id="microChartSelect" change="update" selectedKey="{settings>/microChart}" enabled="{= ${settings>/type} === 'Numeric'}">
				<core:Item key="None" text="None"/>
				<core:Item key="Line" text="Line"/>
				<core:Item key="Bullet" text="Bullet"/>
				<core:Item key="StackedBar" text="StackedBar"/>
				<core:Item key="Column" text="Column"/>
				<core:Item key="Radial" text="Radial"/>
				<core:Item key="HarveyBall" text="HarveyBall"/>
			</Select>
			<Label text="Side Indicators" />
			<Select id="SideIndicatorSelect" change="update" selectedKey="{settings>/sideIndicator}" enabled="{= ${settings>/type} === 'Numeric'}">
				<core:Item key="None" text="None"/>
				<core:Item key="One" text="One"/>
				<core:Item key="Two" text="Two"/>
			</Select>
			<ToolbarSpacer />
			<Button text="Show All Header Variants" press="generateAllHeaders" />
		</OverflowToolbar>
		<Slider value="30" width="100%" id="widthSlider"
			min="0" max="200"
			liveChange="updateSlider"
			showAdvancedTooltip="true"
			showHandleTooltip="false"
			inputsAsTooltips="true"
			class="sapUiSmallMarginTop" />
		<core:HTML id="widthLine" content='<div class="WidthBar"><span></span><span></span><span></span><span></span></div>'>
		</core:HTML>
		<Text id="widthText" text="" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom WidthText sapUiTinyMarginBegin"/>
		<FlexBox id="layout" direction="Column" class="Layout">
		</FlexBox>

	</FlexBox>
</mvc:View>

title: Products
code:
<mvc:View height="100%" controllerName="mdc.sample.controller.Products"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mdcField="sap.ui.mdc.field"
	xmlns:mdc="sap.ui.mdc"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:mdcLink="sap.ui.mdc.link"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<App id="MyApp" defaultTransitionName="show">
		<l:VerticalLayout
			class="sapUiContentPadding"
			width="100%">
			<l:content>
				<VBox>
					<Label text="Link rendered as Text" wrapping="true" />
					<mdc:Field value="{products>/product1/productId}" editMode="Display">
						<mdc:fieldInfo>
							<mdc:Link delegate="{ 'name': 'mdc/sample/delegate/JSONLinkDelegate', payload: { 'product': 'product1', 'displayAs': 'Text' }}">
							</mdc:Link>
						</mdc:fieldInfo>
					</mdc:Field>
				</VBox>
				<VBox>
					<Label text="Link opening a Panel. Clicking the panel links will not navigate directly to other apps or pages." wrapping="true" />
					<mdc:Field value="{products>/product2/productId}" editMode="Display">
						<mdc:fieldInfo>
							<mdc:Link delegate="{ 'name': 'mdc/sample/delegate/JSONLinkDelegate', payload: { 'product': 'product2', 'displayAs': 'Popover' }}">
							</mdc:Link>
						</mdc:fieldInfo>
					</mdc:Field>
				</VBox>
				<VBox>
					<Label text="Link opening a Panel. Clicking the panel links will navigate directly to other apps or pages." wrapping="true" />
					<mdc:Field value="{products>/product3/productId}" editMode="Display">
						<mdc:fieldInfo>
							<mdc:Link delegate="{ 'name': 'mdc/sample/delegate/JSONLinkDelegate', payload: { 'product': 'product3', 'displayAs': 'Popover', 'alwaysNavigate': true }}">
							</mdc:Link>
						</mdc:fieldInfo>
					</mdc:Field>
				</VBox>
				<VBox>
					<Label text="Link with confirmation dialog that navigates directly to other apps or pages when clicked" wrapping="true" />
					<mdc:Field value="{products>/product4/productId}" editMode="Display">
						<mdc:fieldInfo>
							<mdc:Link delegate="{ 'name': 'mdc/sample/delegate/JSONLinkDelegate', payload: { 'product': 'product4', 'displayAs': 'DirectLink' }}">
							</mdc:Link>
						</mdc:fieldInfo>
					</mdc:Field>
				</VBox>
			</l:content>
		</l:VerticalLayout>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout" showTitleInHeaderContent="true" upperCaseAnchorBar="false">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader id="headerForTest"
							  objectTitle="Rowan Atkinson"
							  objectImageShape="Circle"
							  objectSubtitle="Manager, HCM"
							  isObjectTitleAlwaysVisible="false"
							  isObjectSubtitleAlwaysVisible="false"
							  isActionAreaAlwaysVisible="true"
							  showPlaceholder="true">
				<navigationBar>
					<m:Bar>
						<m:contentLeft>
							<m:Button icon="sap-icon://nav-back" tooltip="nav-back"/>
						</m:contentLeft>
						<m:contentMiddle>
							<m:Text text="Employee Profile"/>
						</m:contentMiddle>
					</m:Bar>
				</navigationBar>
				<actions>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://tree" text="tree" tooltip="tree"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://action" text="action" tooltip="action"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageHeader>
		</headerTitle>
		<headerContent>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:ObjectStatus title="Address" text="BLR.01, B2.023"/>
				<m:ObjectStatus title="Office phone" text="+91-90100-98100"/>
				<m:ObjectStatus title="Email" text="rowan@pic.com"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
			<layout:HorizontalLayout>
				<m:Image width="21px" height="21px"
						 src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/linkedInIcon.png"/>
				<m:Image width="20px" height="20px"
						 src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/facebookIcon.png"/>
				<m:Image width="21px" height="21px"
						 src="./test-resources/sap/uxap/images/twitterIcon.png"/>
			</layout:HorizontalLayout>
			<m:ObjectStatus state="Success" icon="sap-icon://employee-approvals" text="Available"/>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Label text="Bangalore, India"/>
				<m:Label text="3:00 PM, Friday"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>
		</headerContent>
		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="2014 Goals Plan">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<goals:GoalsBlock id="goalsblock"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection titleUppercase="false" title="Personal">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection title="Connect" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:BlockPhoneNumber id="phone"/>
							<personal:BlockSocial id="social"/>
							<personal:BlockAdresses id="adresses"/>
							<personal:BlockMailing id="mailing" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="paymentSubSection" title="Payment information" titleUppercase="false">
						<blocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart1 id="part1" columnLayout="1"/>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<personal:PersonalBlockPart2 id="part2" columnLayout="1"/>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

	xmlns="sap.m">
	<l:VerticalLayout
		class="sapUiContentPadding"
		width="100%">
		<l:content>
			<Text text="Set the ProgressIndicator to 100% with animation" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
			<ProgressIndicator
				id="pi-with-animation"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
				displayValue="0%"
				state="Success"
				displayOnly="true"/>
			<FlexBox>
				<Button id="pi-with-animation-button0"
				        class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd"
				        text="Set to 0%"
				        press="onPIChangeValueButtonPressed"/>
				<Button id="pi-with-animation-button50"
						class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd"
				        text="Set to 50%"
				        press="onPIChangeValueButtonPressed"/>
				<Button id="pi-with-animation-button100"
				        text="Set to 100%"
				        press="onPIChangeValueButtonPressed"/>
			</FlexBox>
			<Text text="Set the ProgressIndicator to 100% without animation" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
			<ProgressIndicator
				id="pi-without-animation"
				class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
				displayValue="0%"
				state="Success"
				displayOnly="true"
				displayAnimation= "false" />
			<FlexBox>
				<Button id="pi-without-animation-button0"
				        class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd"
				        text="Set to 0%"
				        press="onPIChangeValueButtonPressed"/>
				<Button id="pi-without-animation-button50"
						class="sapUiSmallMarginEnd"
				        text="Set to 50%"
				        press="onPIChangeValueButtonPressed"/>
				<Button id="pi-without-animation-button100"
				        text="Set to 100%"
				        press="onPIChangeValueButtonPressed"/>
			</FlexBox>
		</l:content>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
    xmlns="sap.m"
    xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
    xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
    controllerName="sap.f.gridlist.controller.Main">

    <f:GridList
		headerText="GridList with counters"
		items="{ path: '/' }">

        <f:customLayout>
            <grid:GridBasicLayout
				gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 16rem)"
				gridGap="0.5rem">
            </grid:GridBasicLayout>
        </f:customLayout>

		<CustomListItem counter="{counter}">
			<VBox height="100%">
				<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
					</layoutData>
					<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
					<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
				</VBox>
			</VBox>
		</CustomListItem>
    </f:GridList>

		<f:GridList
		headerText="GridList with mode 'SingleSelectLeft'"

        <f:customLayout>
            <grid:GridBasicLayout
				gridTemplateColumns="repeat(auto-fit, 16rem)"

        </f:customLayout>

		<CustomListItem counter="{counter}">
			<VBox height="100%">

						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->

					<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
					<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
				</VBox>
			</VBox>

		<f:GridList
		headerText="GridList with mode 'MultiSelect'"

            <grid:GridBasicLayout

        </f:customLayout>

		<CustomListItem counter="{counter}">
			<VBox height="100%">
				<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->

					<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
					<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />

title: PublicationObjectPage
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.core.sample.odata.v4.MusicArtists.PublicationObjectPage"
	height="100%"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<Page id="publicationObjectPage" navButtonPress=".onBack" showHeader="true" showNavButton="true">
		<content>
			<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
				<f:Form editable="true">
					<f:title>
						<core:Title text="Publication Details"/>
					</f:title>
					<f:layout>
						<f:ResponsiveGridLayout
							adjustLabelSpan="false"
							columnsXL="1"
							columnsL="1"
							columnsM="1"
							emptySpanXL="4"
							emptySpanL="4"
							emptySpanM="4"
							emptySpanS="0"
							labelSpanXL="3"
							labelSpanL="3"
							labelSpanM="3"
							labelSpanS="12"
							singleContainerFullSize="false"/>
					</f:layout>
					<f:formContainers>
						<f:FormContainer>
							<f:formElements>
								<f:FormElement label="Name">
									<f:fields>
										<Input editable="{ui-op>/bEditMode}" value="{Name}"/>
									</f:fields>
								</f:FormElement>
								<f:FormElement label="Release Date">
									<f:fields>
										<Input editable="{ui-op>/bEditMode}"
											value="{ReleaseDate}"/>
									</f:fields>
								</f:FormElement>
								<f:FormElement label="Price">
									<f:fields>
										<Input editable="{ui-op>/bEditMode}" value="{Price}"/>
										<Input editable="{ui-op>/bEditMode}"
											value="{CurrencyCode}"/>
									</f:fields>
								</f:FormElement>
							</f:formElements>
						</f:FormContainer>
					</f:formContainers>
				</f:Form>
			</VBox>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View

	xmlns="sap.m">

		<RangeSlider showAdvancedTooltip="true" range="{/RS1}" min="0" max="100" width="80%" class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom" />
		<RangeSlider showAdvancedTooltip="true" range="{/RS2}" min="-50" max="50" width="10rem" class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom"/>
		<RangeSlider showAdvancedTooltip="true" range="{/RS3}" min="0" max="100" width="10rem" class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom" />
		<RangeSlider showAdvancedTooltip="true" range="{/RS4}" min="-1000" max="1000" width="100%" class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom" />
		<RangeSlider showAdvancedTooltip="true" range="{/RS5}" min="0" max="500" width="100%" class="sapUiLargeMarginBottom" />
		<Text text="RangeSlider with inputs" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
		<RangeSlider showAdvancedTooltip="true" range="0,100" min="0" max="500" width="100%" showHandleTooltip="false" inputsAsTooltips="true" class="sapUiLargeMarginBottom" />
		<Text text="RangeSlider with tickmarks" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
		<RangeSlider showAdvancedTooltip="true" enableTickmarks="true" range="0,10" min="0" max="10" class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom"/>
		<RangeSlider showAdvancedTooltip="true" enableTickmarks="true" class="sapUiMediumMarginBottom"/>
		<Text text="RangeSlider with tickmarks and step '5'" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
		<RangeSlider showAdvancedTooltip="true" enableTickmarks="true" min="-100" max="100" step="5" class="sapUiLargeMarginBottom"/>
		<Text text="RangeSlider with tickmarks and labels" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom" />
		<RangeSlider showAdvancedTooltip="true" min="0" max="30" range="5,20" enableTickmarks="true" class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom">
			<ResponsiveScale tickmarksBetweenLabels="3"/>
		</RangeSlider>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

title: RAP
code:
<mvc:View
	class="sapUiSizeCompact"
	controllerName="sap.ui.core.sample.odata.v4.DataAggregation_RAP.RAP"
	xmlns="sap.ui.table"
	xmlns:m="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:rm="sap.ui.table.rowmodes">

	<!-- Note: for $$aggregation, see controller's onInit! -->
	<!-- Note: status is either 'B' or 'N', filter is just kiddin' ;-) -->
	<TreeTable id="table" ariaLabelledBy="title"
		rows="{path : '/Bookings',
			filters : {path : 'status', operator : 'NE', value1 : ''},
			parameters : {
				$count : true,
				$orderby : 'status,FlightPrice desc'
			}, suspended : true}"
		selectionMode="None" threshold="100">
		<extension>
			<m:Toolbar design="Transparent" class="sapMTBHeader-CTX">
				<m:Title id="title" level="H1" text="{$count} Flight Bookings"/>
				<m:ToolbarSpacer/>
				<m:SearchField id="search" placeholder="Search for anything..." search=".onSearch"
					value="{ui>/sSearch}" width="40%"/>
				<m:Button icon="sap-icon://download" press=".onDownload" tooltip="Download"/>
				<m:Button id="showMessages" icon="sap-icon://message-popup" tooltip="Show messages"
					press=".onToggleMessagePopover" text="{ui>/iMessages}"
					type="{= ${ui>/iMessages} ? 'Emphasized' : 'Default' }"/>
			</m:Toolbar>
		</extension>
		<rowMode>
			<rm:Interactive rowCount="{ui>/iVisibleRowCount}" fixedTopRowCount="1"/>
		</rowMode>
		<Column width="20em">
			<m:Label text="Airline"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{airline} - {airlineName}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Connection ID"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{ConnectionID}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="10em">
			<m:Label text="Departure"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{DepAirport} - {DepCity}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="10em">
			<m:Label text="Destination"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{DestAirport} - {DestCity}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column hAlign="End" width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Distance"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{
					parts : ['Distance', 'DistanceUnit', {
						mode : 'OneTime',
						path : '/##@@requestUnitsOfMeasure',
						targetType : 'any'
					}],
					type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Unit'
				}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Flight Date"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{FlightDate}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="4em">
			<m:Label text="Status"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{status}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="5em">
			<m:Label text="Travel ID"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{TravelID}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Booking Date"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{BookingDate}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="6em">
			<m:Label text="Booking ID"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{BookingID}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column hAlign="End" width="7em">
			<m:Label text="Flight Price"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{
					parts : ['FlightPrice', 'CurrencyCode_code', {
						mode : 'OneTime',
						path : '/##@@requestCurrencyCodes',
						targetType : 'any'
					}],
					type : 'sap.ui.model.odata.type.Currency',
					formatOptions : { showMeasure : false }
				}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column width="5em">
			<m:Label text="Currency"/>
			<template>
				<m:Text text="{CurrencyCode_code}" wrapping="false"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
		<Column hAlign="End"  width="5em">
			<m:Label text="G.L.C." tooltip="Group Level Count"/>
			<template>
				<m:Label text="{= %{@$ui5.node.groupLevelCount} }"/>
			</template>
		</Column>
	</TreeTable>

	<m:FormattedText htmlText="<em>Available URL parameters:</em>
		<ul>
			<li> <code>BookingID</code> - If present, the leaf level is individual bookings
			<li> <code>filter</code> - Comma separated list of UI5-like filter conditions,
				for example <code>status EQ B,Distance BT 1000 5000,CurrencyCode_code EQ
				USD,FlightPrice GT 1234</code>
			<li> <code>grandTotalAtBottomOnly</code> - Optional boolean (empty, false, or
				true) or <code>off</code> to turn off grand totals
			<li> <code>subtotalsAtBottomOnly</code> - Optional boolean (empty, false, or
				true) or <code>off</code> to turn off subtotals
			<li> <code>threshold</code> - A number; default 100
			<li> <code>visibleRowCount</code> - A number; default 20
			<li> <code>$orderby</code> - OData system query option for sorting,
				for example <code>FlightPrice asc</code>"/>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.ReleaseNotes"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.uxap"
		xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:m="sap.m"
		xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
		height="100%">

			<ObjectPageLayout
					id="releaseNotesObjectPage"
					busy="true"
					enableLazyLoading="false"
					showTitleInHeaderContent="false"
					sections="{/libs}"
					upperCaseAnchorBar="false">

				<headerTitle>
					<ObjectPageHeader objectTitle="{i18n>RELEASE_NOTES_TITLE}"/>
				</headerTitle>

				<headerContent>
					<layout:VerticalLayout>
						<m:Text text="This log includes the library notes for the libraries listed below."/>
						<m:Select id="VersionSelect" items="{select>/items}" change="handleVersionChange" visible="false">
							<core:Item text="{select>value}" key="{select>key}"/>
						</m:Select>
					</layout:VerticalLayout>
				</headerContent>

				<sections>

					<ObjectPageSection title="{library}" titleUppercase="false">
						<ObjectPageSubSection titleUppercase="false">
							<layout:VerticalLayout content="{path: 'versions', templateShareable: false}" width="100%">
								<m:Panel
									headerText="{version}"
									content="{path: 'notes', templateShareable: false}"
									expandable="true"
									expanded="true"
									class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent"
									width="auto">
									<m:Text width="100%" text="[{type}] {text}"/>
								</m:Panel>
							</layout:VerticalLayout>
						</ObjectPageSubSection>
					</ObjectPageSection>

				</sections>

			</ObjectPageLayout>

</mvc:View>

			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>
		<mvc:View viewName="sap.f.cardsdemo.view.common.CommonCardSettings" type="XML" async="true"></mvc:View>
		<f:GridContainer class="sapUiSmallMargin">
			<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/requests/cardManifest.json">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/requests/cardManifestLongTimeout.json">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
		</f:GridContainer>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: Resources
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.Resources"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:card="sap.f.cards"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:custom="sap.ui.documentation"
	displayBlock="true"
	height="100%">

	<ScrollContainer
		id="sapUiDemoKitResourcesPage"
		class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesPage"
		vertical="true"
		horizontal="false"
		height="100%"
		width="100%">

		<VBox class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesIntroCardSpacing">
			<f:Card class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesIntroCard">
				<f:header>
					<card:Header
						title="{i18n>RESOURCES_INTRO_CARD_TITLE}"
						subtitle="{i18n>RESOURCES_INTRO_CARD_SUBTITLE}"
						subtitleMaxLines="10" />
				</f:header>
			</f:Card>
		</VBox>

		<grid:CSSGrid class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesLayoutSpacing">
			<!-- Page Content Ratio Config -->
			<grid:customLayout>
				<grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
					<grid:layout>
						<grid:GridSettings gridTemplateColumns="1fr" gridColumnGap="1rem" />
					</grid:layout>
					<grid:layoutL>
						<grid:GridSettings gridTemplateColumns="2fr 1fr" gridColumnGap="1rem" />
					</grid:layoutL>
					<grid:layoutXL>
						<grid:GridSettings gridTemplateColumns="3fr 1fr" gridColumnGap="1rem" />
					</grid:layoutXL>
				</grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
			</grid:customLayout>

			<grid:items>
				<!-- Main -->
				<grid:CSSGrid id="sapUiDemoKitResourcesMain" class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesMain">
					<grid:customLayout>
						<grid:GridBasicLayout gridRowGap="3rem" />
					</grid:customLayout>

					<!-- #1 Category: Featured -->
					<grid:CSSGrid class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesCategoryFeatured">
						<grid:customLayout>
							<grid:GridBasicLayout gridRowGap="1rem" />
						</grid:customLayout>

						<Title
							class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesCategoryTitle"
							text="{i18n>RESOURCES_CATEGORY_TITLE_FEATURED}"
							titleStyle="{= ${device>/system/phone} ? 'H4' : 'H3' }"
							level="H3"
							wrapping="true" />

						<grid:CSSGrid>
							<grid:customLayout>
								<grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
									<grid:layoutS>
										<grid:GridSettings
											gridTemplateColumns="1fr"
											gridAutoRows="minmax(15rem, auto)"
											gridGap="1rem" />
									</grid:layoutS>
									<grid:layout>
										<grid:GridSettings
											gridTemplateColumns="repeat(2, 1fr)"
											gridAutoRows="minmax(15rem, auto)"
											gridGap="1rem" />
									</grid:layout>
									<grid:layoutXL>
										<grid:GridSettings
											gridTemplateColumns="repeat(3, 1fr)"
											gridAutoRows="minmax(15rem, auto)"
											gridGap="1rem" />
									</grid:layoutXL>
								</grid:GridResponsiveLayout>
							</grid:customLayout>

							<!-- Icon Explorer -->
							<f:Card class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesRegularCard">
								<f:header>
									<card:Header title="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_TITLE_ICON_EXPLORER}" iconSrc="sap-icon://sap-ui5" />
								</f:header>
								<f:content>
									<VBox class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesCardContentSpacing" wrap="Wrap">
										<Text text="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_DESC_ICON_EXPLORER}">
											<layoutData>
												<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
											</layoutData>
										</Text>
										<Link
											class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesCardLink"
											href="{resources>/iconExplorer/href}"
											target="_blank"
											text="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_LINK_ICON_EXPLORER}"
											tooltip="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_LINK_TOOLTIP}"
											wrapping="true" />
									</VBox>
								</f:content>
							</f:Card>

							<!-- Accessibility Guide -->
							<f:Card class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesRegularCard"
								visible="{
									path: 'resources>/accessibilityGuide',
									formatter: '.formatter.formatResourceCardVisibility'
								}">
								<f:header>
									<card:Header title="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_TITLE_ACC_GUIDE}" iconSrc="sap-icon://show" />
								</f:header>
								<f:content>
									<VBox class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesCardContentSpacing" wrap="Wrap">
										<Text text="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_DESC_ACC_GUIDE}">
											<layoutData>
												<FlexItemData growFactor="1" />
											</layoutData>
										</Text>
										<Link
											class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesCardLink"

									<grid:layoutXL>

											gridTemplateColumns="repeat(3, 1fr)"

							<!-- UI5 Tooling -->

									<card:Header title="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_TITLE_TOOLING}" iconSrc="sap-icon://hello-world" />
								</f:header>
								<f:content>

										<Link

											href="{resources>/wdi5/href}"
											target="_blank"
											text="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_LINK_WDI5}"
											tooltip="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_LINK_TOOLTIP}"
											wrapping="true" />
									</VBox>
								</f:content>
							</f:Card>

						</grid:CSSGrid>
					</grid:CSSGrid>

				</grid:CSSGrid> <!-- Main Container End-->

				<!-- Aside -->
				<grid:CSSGrid id="sapUiDemoKitResourcesAside" class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesAside">
					<VBox class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesAsideDekstop" wrap="Wrap">
						<f:Card class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesAsideCard">
							<f:header>
								<card:Header title="{i18n>RESOURCES_ASIDE_CARD_TITLE}" />
							</f:header>
							<f:content>
								<List items="{path: 'resources>/_raw/', sorter: {path: 'text'}}" showSeparators="None">
									<InputListItem
										label="{resources>text}"
										visible="{
											path: 'resources>',
											formatter: '.formatter.formatResourceCardVisibility'
										}">

										<Button
											type="Transparent"
											icon="sap-icon://action"
											accessibleRole="Link"
											tooltip="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_LINK_TOOLTIP}"
											press=".onButtonPress">
											<customData>
												<core:CustomData key="href" value="{resources>href}" />
											</customData>
										</Button>
									</InputListItem>
								</List>
							</f:content>
						</f:Card>
					</VBox>

					<VBox class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesAsideMobile" wrap="Wrap">
						<Panel class="sapUiDemoKitResourcesAsidePanel" expandable="true" headerText="{i18n>RESOURCES_ASIDE_CARD_TITLE}">
							<List showSeparators="None" items="{path: 'resources>/_raw/', sorter: {path: 'text'}}">
								<InputListItem
									label="{resources>text}"
									visible="{
										path: 'resources>',
										formatter: '.formatter.formatResourceCardVisibility'
									}">

									<Button
										type="Transparent"
										icon="sap-icon://action"
										accessibleRole="Link"
										tooltip="{i18n>RESOURCES_CARD_LINK_TOOLTIP}"
										press=".onButtonPress">
										<customData>
											<core:CustomData key="href" value="{resources>href}" />
										</customData>
									</Button>
								</InputListItem>
							</List>
						</Panel>
					</VBox>
				</grid:CSSGrid> <!-- Aside Container End-->

			</grid:items>
		</grid:CSSGrid>

		<core:Fragment fragmentName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.view.Footer" type="XML" />
	</ScrollContainer>
</mvc:View>

title: ResponsiveColumnLayout
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:grid="sap.ui.layout.cssgrid"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	controllerName="sap.f.gridlist.controller.Main">

	<f:GridList
		id="growingGridList"
		headerText="GridList with ResponsiveColumnLayout"
		items="{ path: '/' }">

		<f:customLayout>
			<grid:ResponsiveColumnLayout></grid:ResponsiveColumnLayout>
		</f:customLayout>

		<CustomListItem>
			<VBox height="100%">
				<VBox class="sapUiSmallMargin">
					<layoutData>
						<FlexItemData growFactor="1" shrinkFactor="0" /><!-- Don't shrink below minimum size. Fill space if available. -->
					</layoutData>
					<Title text="{title} (Click me)" wrapping="true" />
					<Label text="{subtitle}" wrapping="true" />
				</VBox>
			</VBox>
		</CustomListItem>
	</f:GridList>

</mvc:View>

		title="{i18n>ResumeOf} {FirstName} {LastName}"

		showNavButton="true"

				id="iconTabBar"
				headerBackgroundDesign="Transparent"
				class="sapUiResponsiveContentPadding"
				binding="{Resume}"
				select=".onTabSelect"
				selectedKey="{view>/selectedTabKey}">

						<Text text="{Information}"/>

					<IconTabFilter id="projectsTab" text="{i18n>tabProjects}" key="Projects">

					</IconTabFilter>
					<IconTabFilter id="notesTab" text="{i18n>tabNotes}" key="Notes">
						<!-- place content via lazy loading -->
					</IconTabFilter>
				</items>
			</IconTabBar>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: Root
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:uxap="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:sap.ui.layout="sap.ui.layout"
	controllerName="sap.ui.rta.test.rtaOpenUI5Only.Root" >

	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}" id="page">
		<headerContent>
			<Button text="{i18n>btnAdapt}" visible="{view>/showAdaptButton}" press=".switchToAdaptionMode" />
		</headerContent>
		<content>
			<sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout width="100%">
				<sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout id="layout1">
					<Toolbar id="toolbar">
						<Button text="UI5 Button1" id="UI5Button1" />
						<Button text="UI5 Button2" id="UI5Button2" />
						<Button text="UI5 Button3" id="UI5Button3" />
					</Toolbar>
				</sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout>

				<sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout width="100%" class="sapUiLargeMarginTop">
					<!--This Form is bound to EntityType02 in the controller -->
					<form:Form id="MainForm" title="Form with  assigned bound to EntityType02" editable="true" >
						<form:layout>
							<form:ResponsiveGridLayout/>
						</form:layout>
						<form:formContainers>
							<!--This Group is bound to EntityType01 in the controller -->
							<form:FormContainer id="GroupEntityType01" title="Group1 bound to  EntityType01" >
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType01.Prop1" label="Prop1">
									<Input editable="true" value="{Property01}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType01.Prop2" label="Prop2">
									<Input value="{Property02}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType01.Prop3" label="Prop3">
									<TextArea value="{Property03}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType02.EntityType02_Property02" label="Field bound to EntityType02" >
									<Input value="{EntityType02_Property02}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="i18n Bound Value" id="EntityType01.I18NTest" >
									<Input value="{i18n>groupElementLabelText}" />
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="Invisible field" id="EntityType01.Property04.Invisible" visible="false">
									<Input value="{Property04}" />
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="Ignored Property05 bound" id="EntityType01.BoundButton" >
									<Button text="{Property05}"></Button>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="No-Bound-Field" id="EntityType01.BoundButton34" >
									<Button text="{i18n>buttonText}"></Button>
									<TextArea value="Some Text"></TextArea>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType01.UnboundButton" >
									<Button text="No Binding"></Button>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType01.CommonProperty" visible="false" label="CommonProp">
									<Input value="{CommonPropertyName}" />
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="Invisible complex property" id="EntityType01.ComplexProperty031.Invisible" visible="false">
									<Input value="{EntityType01_Complex/ComplexProperty031}" />
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="Invisible property without binding" id="InvisibleNoBinding" visible="false">
									<Input />
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType01.Prop9" visible="false" label="Invisible with binding inside (revealable)">
									<TextArea value="{Property09}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType01.Prop10" visible="false" label="Invisible with binding inside (not revealable)">
									<TextArea value="{DELETED_CUSTOM_FIELD}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
							</form:FormContainer>
							<!--This Group is bound to EntityType02 because the form is bound to EntityType02 -->
							<form:FormContainer id="GroupEntityType02" title="Group2 bound to EntityType02" >
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType02.CompProp1" label="CompProp1">
									<Input editable="true" value="{EntityType02_Complex/ComplexProperty01}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType02.CompProp2" label="CompProp2">
									<Input value="{EntityType02_Complex/ComplexProperty02}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="Property02 bound button" id="EntityType02.Prop2Button" >
									<Button text="{EntityType02_Property02}"></Button>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="{i18n>customLabel}" id="ComplexBindingCase">
									<TextArea id="mytextarea" value="{EntityType02_Property03} {EntityType02_Complex/ComplexProperty02}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="No-Bound-Field" id="EntityType02.BoundButton34" >
									<Button text="{i18n>buttonText}"></Button>
									<TextArea value="Some Text"></TextArea>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType02.UnboundButton" label="unbound">
									<Button text="No Binding"></Button>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="Partially visible combined field, real use case from SD CustomerReturn_OP_F1708Type" id="EntityType02.PartiallyVisible" >
									<Input value="{EntityType02_Property05}"/>
									<Input value="{EntityType02_Property06}" visible="false"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement id="EntityType02.CommonProperty" visible="false" label="CommonProp">
									<Input value="{CommonPropertyName}" />
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="NavigationLabel01" id="EntityType02.NavigationProperty" visible="false">
									<Input value="{to_EntityType02Nav/NavProperty}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="IncorrectNavigationProperty" id="EntityType02.IncorrectNavigationProperty" visible="false">
									<Input value="{to_NonexistentEntity/NavProperty}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="Field with absolute binding (non-existing path)" id="EntityType02.AbsoluteBinding" visible="false">
									<Input value="{/non/existing/path}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="Field with binding to non-existent model" id="NonExistentModel" visible="false">
									<Input value="{NonExistentModel>PropertyName}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
								<form:FormElement label="Field with absolute binding (extra model)" id="EntityType02.AbsoluteBindingExtraModel" visible="false">
									<Input value="{extraModel>/data/value1}"/>
								</form:FormElement>
							</form:FormContainer>
						</form:formContainers>
					</form:Form>
				</sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout>
			</sap.ui.layout:VerticalLayout>
		</content>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: Sample
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.Sample"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:controls="sap.ui.documentation">
	<Page
			id="page"
			showHeader="false"
			showNavButton="true"
			navButtonPress="onNavBack"
			busyIndicatorDelay="0"
			class="sapUiDocumentationSamplePage">
		<landmarkInfo>
			<PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo rootRole="Region" rootLabel="Details" headerRole="Region" headerLabel="Header" contentRole="Main" contentLabel="Content"></PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo>
		</landmarkInfo>

		<subHeader>
			<Bar id="header" class="sapContrast sapContrastPlus">
				<contentLeft>
					<Button type="Back" press="onNavBack" tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_BACK_BTN_TOOLTIP}" enabled="{= ${/disableNavBack} === undefined }"/>
				</contentLeft>
				<contentMiddle>
					<Title level="H1" text="{/title}" tooltip="{/title}"/>
					<Button
							id="warningSample"
							icon="sap-icon://warning"	
							visible="{=${/showWarning}}"
							tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_EDITED_TOOLTIP}"
							class="sapUiExploredWarningIcon"
							press="onWarningSample"/>
				</contentMiddle>
				<contentRight>
					<Button
							id="infoSample"
							visible="{=${/details} !== undefined || ${/description} !== undefined}"
							icon="sap-icon://hint"
							tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_INFO_TOOLTIP}"
							press="onInfoSample"/>

					<Button id="apiRefButton" text="{i18n>SAMPLE_API_REFERENCE_BTN}" type="Emphasized" press="onAPIRefPress" visible="false"/>
					<Button
							id="prevSample"
							icon="sap-icon://navigation-up-arrow"
							class="sapUiHideOnPhone"
							tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_PREV_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
							enabled="{= ${/previousSampleId} !== undefined }"
							press="onPreviousSample"/>
					<Button
							id="nextSample"
							icon="sap-icon://navigation-down-arrow"
							class="sapUiHideOnPhone"
							tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_NEXT_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
							enabled="{= ${/nextSampleId} !== undefined }"
							press="onNextSample"/>
					<Button
							id="toggleFullScreenBtn"
							icon="sap-icon://full-screen"
							visible="{:= ${device>/system/desktop} ||
										( ${device>/system/tablet} &&
										${device>/orientation/landscape} ) }"
							tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_FULLSCREEN_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
							press="onToggleFullScreen" />
					<Button
							id="toggleRTA"
							icon="sap-icon://wrench"
							class="sapUiHideOnPhone"
							tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_ADAPT_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
							press="onToggleAdaptationMode"
							visible="{= ${/rtaLoaded} && !${/iframe} }" />
					<Button
							id="code"
							icon="sap-icon://source-code"
							tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_CODE_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
							press="onNavToCode" />
					<Button visible="{/showNewTab}"
							id="newTab"
							tooltip="{i18n>SAMPLE_NEW_TAB_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
							icon="sap-icon://inspect"
							press="onNewTab" />
					<Button id="sampleSettings"
							icon="sap-icon://action-settings"
							press="handleSettings" />
					<Button
							class="sapUiHideOnPhone"
							text="{i18n>SAMPLE_DOWNLOAD_BTN_TOOLTIP}"
							icon="sap-icon://download"
							press="onDownload" />
					<Button
							class="sapUiVisibleOnlyOnPhone"
							icon="sap-icon://download"
							press="onDownload" />
				</contentRight>
			</Bar>
		</subHeader>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.SearchPage"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:op="sap.uxap"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:app="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.CustomData/1">
		<op:ObjectPageLayout id="searchPage"
							useIconTabBar="true"
							alwaysShowContentHeader="true"
							upperCaseAnchorBar="false"
							navigate="onSwitchTab">
		<op:headerTitle>
			<op:ObjectPageHeader id="searchTitle" objectTitle="{
				parts: [
					'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_TITLE',
					'searchView>/lastProcessedQuery'
				],
				formatter: '.formatMessage'
			}">
			</op:ObjectPageHeader>
		</op:headerTitle>
		<op:headerContent>
			<ObjectAttribute title="" text="{i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_DESCRIPTION}"/>
		</op:headerContent>
 		<op:sections>
			<op:ObjectPageSection id="allSummaryTitle" title="{
				parts: [
					'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_ALL_SECTION_TITLE',
					'searchData>/matches/AllLength'
				],
				formatter: '.formatMessage'
			}">
			<op:subSections>
				<op:ObjectPageSubSection>
					<op:blocks>
						<VBox class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent" width="auto">
							<OverflowToolbar design="Transparent" height="3rem">
								<Title text="{
									parts: [
										'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_ALL_SECTION_TABLE_TITLE',
										'searchView>/visibleAllLength',
										'searchData>/matches/AllLength'
									],
									formatter: '.formatTableTitle'
								}"/>
							</OverflowToolbar>
							<CheckBox text="{i18n>API_MASTER_DEPRECATED_CB}" class="sapUiNoMarginBegin" selected="{searchData>/includeDeprecated}" select="onDeprecatedFlagChange"/>
							<List
								id="allList"
								growing="true"
								growingThreshold="25"
								updateFinished="onAllLoadMore"
								items="{
									path: 'searchData>/matches/data',
									groupHeaderFactory: '.getGroupHeader'
								}">
								<FeedListItem
									sender="{searchData>title}"
									text="{searchData>summary}"
									showIcon="false"
									app:path="{searchData>path}"
									app:external="{searchData>external}"/>
							</List>
						</VBox>
					</op:blocks>
				</op:ObjectPageSubSection>
			</op:subSections>
			</op:ObjectPageSection>
 			<op:ObjectPageSection id="apiref" title="{
					parts: [
						'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_API_SECTION_TITLE',
						'searchData>/matches/APILength'
					],
					formatter: '.formatMessage'
				}"
				visible="{=!!${searchData>/matches/APILength}}"
				app:category="apiref">
				<op:subSections>
					<op:ObjectPageSubSection>
						<op:blocks>
							<VBox class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent" width="auto">
								<OverflowToolbar design="Transparent" height="3rem">
									<Title text="{
										parts: [
											'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_API_SECTION_TABLE_TITLE',
											'searchView>/visibleAPILength',
											'searchData>/matches/APILength'
										],
										formatter: '.formatTableTitle'
									}"/>
								</OverflowToolbar>

								<CheckBox text="{i18n>API_MASTER_DEPRECATED_CB}" class="sapUiNoMarginBegin" selected="{searchData>/includeDeprecated}" select="onDeprecatedFlagChange"/>

								<List
									id="apiList"
									growing="true"
									growingThreshold="25"
									updateFinished="onAPILoadMore"
									items="{
										path: 'searchData>/matches/aDataAPI'
									}">
									<FeedListItem
										visible="{path:'searchData>category', formatter:'.categoryAPIFormatter'}"
										sender="{searchData>title}"
										text="{searchData>summary}"
										showIcon="false"
										app:path="{searchData>path}"
										app:external="{searchData>external}"/>
								</List>
							</VBox>
						</op:blocks>
					</op:ObjectPageSubSection>
				</op:subSections>
			</op:ObjectPageSection>
			<op:ObjectPageSection id="topics" title="{
					parts: [
						'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_DOCUMENTATION_SECTION_TITLE',
						'searchData>/matches/DocLength'
					],
					formatter: '.formatMessage'
				}"
				visible="{=!!${searchData>/matches/DocLength}}"
				app:category="topics">
				<op:subSections>
					<op:ObjectPageSubSection>
						<op:blocks>
							<VBox class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent" width="auto">
								<OverflowToolbar design="Transparent" height="3rem">
									<Title text="{
										parts: [
											'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_DOCUMENTATION_SECTION_TABLE_TITLE',
											'searchView>/visibleDocLength',
											'searchData>/matches/DocLength'
										],
										formatter: '.formatTableTitle'
									}"/>
								</OverflowToolbar>
								<List
									id="documentationList"
									growing="true"
									growingThreshold="25"
									updateFinished="onDocLoadMore"
									items="{
										path: 'searchData>/matches/aDataDoc'
									}">
									<FeedListItem
										visible="{path:'searchData>category', formatter:'.categoryDocFormatter'}"
										sender="{searchData>title}"
										text="{searchData>summary}"
										showIcon="false"
										app:path="{searchData>path}"
										app:external="{searchData>external}"/>
								</List>
							</VBox>
						</op:blocks>
					</op:ObjectPageSubSection>
 				</op:subSections>
			</op:ObjectPageSection>
			<op:ObjectPageSection id="samples" title="{
					parts: [
						'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_SAMPLES_SECTION_TITLE',
						'searchData>/matches/ExploredLength'
					],
					formatter: '.formatMessage'
				}"
				visible="{=!!${searchData>/matches/ExploredLength}}"
				app:category="entity">
				<op:subSections>
					<op:ObjectPageSubSection>
						<op:blocks>
							<VBox class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent" width="auto">
								<OverflowToolbar design="Transparent" height="3rem">
									<Title text="{
										parts: [
											'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_SAMPLES_SECTION_TABLE_TITLE',
											'searchView>/visibleExploredLength',
											'searchData>/matches/ExploredLength'
										],
										formatter: '.formatTableTitle'
									}"/>
								</OverflowToolbar>
								<CheckBox text="{i18n>API_MASTER_DEPRECATED_CB}" class="sapUiNoMarginBegin" selected="{searchData>/includeDeprecated}" select="onDeprecatedFlagChange"/>
								<List
									id="samplesList"
									growing="true"
									growingThreshold="25"
									updateFinished="onExploredLoadMore"
									items="{
										path: 'searchData>/matches/aDataExplored'
									}">
									<FeedListItem
										visible="{path:'searchData>category', formatter:'.categoryExploredFormatter'}"
										sender="{searchData>title}"
										text="{searchData>summary}"
										showIcon="false"
										app:path="{searchData>path}"
										app:external="{searchData>external}"/>
								</List>
							</VBox>
						</op:blocks>
					</op:ObjectPageSubSection>
 				</op:subSections>
			</op:ObjectPageSection>
			<op:ObjectPageSection id="external" title="{
				parts: [
						'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_EXTERNAL_SECTION_TITLE',
						'searchData>/matches/ExternalLength'
					],
					formatter: '.formatMessage' 
				}"
				visible="{=!!${searchData>/matches/ExternalLength}}"
				app:category="external">
				<op:subSections>
					<op:ObjectPageSubSection>
						<op:blocks>
							<VBox class="sapUxAPObjectPageSubSectionAlignContent" width="auto">
								<OverflowToolbar design="Transparent" height="3rem">
									<Title text="{
										parts: [
											'i18n>SEARCH_PAGE_EXTERNAL_SECTION_TABLE_TITLE',
											'searchView>/visibleExternalLength',
											'searchData>/matches/ExternalLength'
										],
										formatter: '.formatTableTitle'
									}"/>
								</OverflowToolbar>

								<List
									id="externalList"
									growing="true"
									growingThreshold="25"
									updateFinished="onExternalLoadMore"
									items="{
										path: 'searchData>/matches/aDataExternal'
									}">
									<FeedListItem
										sender="{searchData>title}"
										text="{searchData>summary}"
										showIcon="false"
										app:path="{searchData>path}"
										app:external="{searchData>external}"/>
								</List>
							</VBox>
						</op:blocks>
					</op:ObjectPageSubSection>
				</op:subSections>
			</op:ObjectPageSection>
		</op:sections>
	</op:ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>
