	<Page showHeader="false">
		<VBox>
			<Button  press="handleOpenDialog" text="Open Dialog" class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
			<Text id="T1" text="change event result" class="sapUiSmallMargin" />
		</VBox>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: Toolbar
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	controllerName="sap.m.sample.ToolbarShrinkable.Toolbar"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m">
	<Page showHeader="false">
		<Slider liveChange="onSliderLiveChange" step="20" value="100"/>

		<MessageStrip text="By default, Toolbar items are shrinkable if they have percent-based width (e.g. Input, Slider) or implement the IShrinkable interface (e.g. Text, Label)." class="sapUiTinyMargin" />
		<Toolbar class="sapUiMediumMarginTop" id="toolbar1">
			<Label text="I am a text control, so I will shrink whenever the toolbar overflows."/>
			<ToolbarSpacer/>
			<Button text="Non-shrinkable button"/>
			<ToolbarSpacer/>
			<SearchField width="100%" placeholder="My width is 100%, so I should shrink."/>
		</Toolbar>

		<MessageStrip text="You can configure the item's shrinking-related properties by providing ToolbarLayoutData." class="sapUiTinyMargin"/>
		<Toolbar class="sapUiMediumMarginTop" id="toolbar2">
			<Label text="I am a non-shrinkable text.">
				<layoutData>
						<ToolbarLayoutData shrinkable="false" />
				</layoutData>
			</Label>
			<ToolbarSpacer/>
			<Button text="I am a shrinkable button, so I will shrink whenever the toolbar overflows." >
				<layoutData>
						<ToolbarLayoutData shrinkable="true" />
				</layoutData>
			</Button>
			<ToolbarSpacer/>
			<SearchField width="200px" placeholder="I have a fixed width (200px), so I cannot shrink."/>
		</Toolbar>

		<MessageStrip text="You can determine to what extent an item shrinks by setting minWidth/maxWidth via ToolbarLayoutData. By default, minWidth is 48px in the Blue Crystal theme." class="sapUiTinyMargin"/>
		<Toolbar class="sapUiMediumMarginTop" id="toolbar3">
			<Label text="I should not shrink by more than 200px, because I am an important text.">
				<layoutData>
						<ToolbarLayoutData shrinkable="true" minWidth="200px"/>
				</layoutData>
			</Label>
			<ToolbarSpacer/>
			<Button text="I cannot be wider than 400px, but I can shrink up to the theme's default minimum width.">
				<layoutData>
						<ToolbarLayoutData shrinkable="true" maxWidth="400px"/>
				</layoutData>
			</Button>
		</Toolbar>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: ToolPage
code:
<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.tnt.sample.ToolPage.ToolPage"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:tnt="sap.tnt"
	height="100%">
	<tnt:ToolPage id="toolPage">
		<tnt:header>
			<tnt:ToolHeader>
				<Button
					id="sideNavigationToggleButton"
					icon="sap-icon://menu2"
					type="Transparent"
					press=".onSideNavButtonPress">
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="NeverOverflow" />
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
				<ToolbarSpacer width="20px" />
				<Button text="File" type="Transparent">
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
				<Button text="Edit" type="Transparent">
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
				<Button text="View" type="Transparent">
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
				<Button text="Navigate" type="Transparent">
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
				<Button text="Code" type="Transparent">
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
				<Button text="Refactor" type="Transparent">
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
				<Button text="Run" type="Transparent">
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
				<Button text="Tools" type="Transparent">
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="Low" />
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
				<tnt:ToolHeaderUtilitySeparator />
				<ToolbarSpacer>
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="NeverOverflow" minWidth="20px" />
					</layoutData>
				</ToolbarSpacer>
				<Button text="Alan Smith" type="Transparent" press=".handleUserNamePress" ariaHasPopup="Menu">
					<layoutData>
						<OverflowToolbarLayoutData priority="NeverOverflow" />
					</layoutData>
				</Button>
			</tnt:ToolHeader>
		</tnt:header>
		<tnt:sideContent>
			<tnt:SideNavigation
				expanded="true"
				itemPress=".onItemPress"
				selectedKey="{/selectedKey}"
				itemSelect=".onItemSelect">
				<tnt:NavigationList items="{path: '/navigation'}">
					<tnt:NavigationListItem
						text="{title}"
						icon="{icon}"
						enabled="{enabled}"
						expanded="{expanded}"
						items="{items}"
						selectable="{= ${items}.length > 3}"
						key="{key}">
						<tnt:NavigationListItem
							text="{title}"
							key="{key}"
							enabled="{enabled}" />
					</tnt:NavigationListItem>
				</tnt:NavigationList>
				<tnt:fixedItem>
					<tnt:NavigationList items="{path: '/fixedNavigation'}">
						<tnt:NavigationListItem text="{title}" icon="{icon}" ariaHasPopup="{ariaHasPopup}" design="{design}" press=".onQuickActionPress" selectable="{selectable}"/>
					</tnt:NavigationList>
				</tnt:fixedItem>
			</tnt:SideNavigation>
		</tnt:sideContent>
		<tnt:mainContents>
			<NavContainer id="pageContainer" initialPage="page2">
				<pages>
					<ScrollContainer
						id="root1"
						horizontal="false"
						vertical="true"
						height="100%"
						class="sapUiContentPadding">
						<Text text="This is the root page" />
					</ScrollContainer>
					<ScrollContainer
						id="page1"
						horizontal="false"
						vertical="true"
						height="100%"
						class="sapUiContentPadding">
						<Text text="This is the first page" />
					</ScrollContainer>
					<ScrollContainer
						id="page2"
						horizontal="false"
						vertical="true"
						height="100%"
						class="sapUiContentPadding">

title: TopicDetail
code:
<mvc:View
		height="100%"
		controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.TopicDetail"
		xmlns="sap.f"
		xmlns:m="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core">
	<DynamicPage
			id="topicDetailPage"
			preserveHeaderStateOnScroll="true"
			toggleHeaderOnTitleClick="{=${/bIsPhone} ? true : false}"
			fitContent="true">
		<title>
			<DynamicPageTitle class="sapUiDocumentationDynamicPageTitle">
				<heading>
					<m:Text text="{/topictitle1}" class="sapUiDocumentationTopicTitle" wrapping="true"/>
				</heading>
				<actions>
					<m:Button
							id="topicDetailBackToSearch"
							text="{i18n>TOPIC_DETAIL_BACK_BTN}"
							type="Transparent"
							press="backToSearch"
							visible="false"/>
					<m:Button
							visible="{= !${versionData>/isURLVersioned}}"
							icon="sap-icon://edit"
							type="Transparent"
							text="{i18n>TOPIC_DETAIL_EDIT_GITHUB}"
							tooltip="{i18n>TOPIC_DETAIL_EDIT_GITHUB_TOOLTIP}"
							press="onEditGitHubPress"/>
					<m:Button
							visible="{device>/system/desktop}"
							icon="sap-icon://full-screen"
							type="Transparent"
							tooltip="{i18n>TOPIC_DETAIL_FULLSCREEN_TOOLTIP}"
							press="onToggleFullScreen"/>
				</actions>
			</DynamicPageTitle>
		</title>

		<header>
			<DynamicPageHeader pinnable="false">
				<content>
					<m:FormattedText htmlText="{/shortdesc}" class="sapUiDocumentationTopicSubtitle"></m:FormattedText>
				</content>
			</DynamicPageHeader>
		</header>

		<content>
			<l:HorizontalLayout id="staticContentLayout" class="topicWrapper">
				<core:HTML id="staticContent" preferDOM="false"/>
			</l:HorizontalLayout>
		</content>
	</DynamicPage>
</mvc:View>

title: TopicDetailInitial
code:
<mvc:View
		height="100%"
		width="100%"
		controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.TopicDetailInitial"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:custom="sap.ui.documentation">
	<Page id="topicDetailPage"
		  showHeader="false"
		  class="sapUiNoContentPadding sapUiDemoApps">
		<landmarkInfo>
			<PageAccessibleLandmarkInfo

title: TopicMaster
code:
<mvc:View
		controllerName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.controller.TopicMaster"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
        xmlns:custom="sap.ui.documentation"
		class="sapContrast sapContrastPlus">

	<Page
			id="page"
			enableScrolling="true"
			showFooter="false"
			navButtonPress="onNavBack"
			showNavButton="false"
			class="sapUiDocumentationMasterPage">

		<customHeader>
			<Toolbar width="100%">
				<SearchField id="searchField" placeholder="{i18n>TOPIC_MASTER_FILTER_PLACEHOLDER}" liveChange="onTreeFilter" class="sapUiDocumentationFilterField"/>
				<Button icon="sap-icon://expand-all" press="onTreeExpandAll" tooltip="{i18n>TOPIC_MASTER_EXPAND_TOOLTIP}"/>
				<Button icon="sap-icon://collapse-all" press="onTreeCollapseAll" tooltip="{i18n>TOPIC_MASTER_COLAPSE_TOOLTIP}"/>
			</Toolbar>
		</customHeader>

		<content>
			<l:FixFlex id="treeContainer" fixFirst="false" minFlexSize="100">
				<l:flexContent>
					<Tree
						id="tree"
						mode="SingleSelectMaster"
						selectionChange="onNodeSelect"
						noDataText="{i18n>TOPIC_MASTER_NO_DATA_TEXT}"
						items="{ path: '/' }">
						<custom:DemokitTreeItem
								title="{text}"
								target="{key}"
								section="topic"
								selected="{isSelected}"/>
					</Tree>
				</l:flexContent>
				<l:fixContent>
					<core:Fragment fragmentName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.view.FooterMaster" type="XML" />
				</l:fixContent>
			</l:FixFlex>
		</content>

	</Page>

</mvc:View>

title: Transparent
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	displayBlock="true">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<f:GridContainer class="sapUiTinyMargin">
			<w:Card design="Transparent" id="component1" manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/transparent/component/manifest.json">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="30" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
		</f:GridContainer>

		<f:Card id="containerCard" class="sapUiTinyMargin sapFCardTransparent" width="100%">
			<f:content>
				<HBox>
					<w:Card class="sapUiTinyMargin" id="todo1" manifest="{manifests>/transparent/todo1}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" width="300px"></w:Card>
					<w:Card class="sapUiTinyMargin" id="todo2" manifest="{manifests>/transparent/todo1}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" width="300px"></w:Card>
				</HBox>
			</f:content>
		</f:Card>

		<w:Card class="sapUiTinyMargin" design="Transparent" id="object1" manifest="{manifests>/transparent/object1}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" width="600px"></w:Card>
		<w:Card class="sapUiTinyMargin" design="Transparent" id="list1" manifest="{manifests>/transparent/list1}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" width="300px"></w:Card>
		<w:Card class="sapUiTinyMargin" design="Transparent" id="todo3" manifest="{manifests>/transparent/todo1}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" width="300px"></w:Card>
		<w:Card class="sapUiTinyMargin" design="Transparent" id="table1" manifest="{manifests>/transparent/tablecard1}" baseUrl="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}" width="300px"></w:Card>
		<core:HTML id="cardCustomElement" content="<ui-integration-card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}/cardcontent/objectcontent/manifest.json" class="sapFCardTransparent"></ui-integration-card>" />
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: TreeTable
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	displayBlock="true"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mdc="sap.ui.mdc"
	xmlns:mdct="sap.ui.mdc.table">

	<f:DynamicPage id="page">
		<f:content>
			<mdc:Table
				id="table"
				header="Clothing"
				p13nMode="Column,Sort,Filter"
				type="TreeTable"
				useColumnLabelsAsTooltips="true"
				delegate="{
					name: 'mdc/sample/delegates/JSONTreeTableDelegate',
					payload: {
						bindingPath: 'clothing>/catalog/clothing'
					}
				}">
				<mdct:Column
					propertyKey="name"
					header="Name">
					<Text text="{clothing>name}"/>
				</mdct:Column>
				<mdct:Column
					propertyKey="price"
					header="Price">
					<Text text="{
						parts: ['clothing>amount', 'clothing>currency'],
						type: 'sap.ui.model.type.Currency'
					}"/>
				</mdct:Column>
				<mdct:Column
					propertyKey="size"
					header="Size">
					<Text text="{clothing>size}"/>
				</mdct:Column>
			</mdc:Table>
		</f:content>
	</f:DynamicPage>

</mvc:View>

title: TreeTableODataV2
code:
<mvc:View xmlns="sap.m"
	controllerName="sap.ui.table.mvc.TreeTableODataV2"
	height="100%"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:table="sap.ui.table"
  	xmlns:dnd="sap.ui.core.dnd"
	>
	<App>
	<pages>
	<Page>
		<content>
			<Panel
				expandable="true"
				expanded="false"
				width="auto"
				class="sapUiResponsiveMargin sapUiNoContentPadding">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar>
						<Title text="TreeTable/Binding settings" level="H2"/>
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<content>
					<f:Form id="testForm"
						editable="true">
						<f:layout>
							<f:ResponsiveGridLayout
								labelSpanL="3"
								labelSpanM="3"
								emptySpanL="4"
								emptySpanM="4"
								columnsL="1"
								columnsM="1" />
						</f:layout>
						<f:formContainers>
							<f:FormContainer>
								<f:formElements>
									<f:FormElement label="Service URL">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/serviceURL}" id="serviceURL"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Collection">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/collection}" id="collection"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Entity-Type">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/entityType}" id="entityType"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="$select properties">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/selectProperties}" id="selectProperties"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="CountMode">
										<f:fields>
											<Select width="100%" id="countMode" selectedKey="{/countMode}">
												<items>
													<core:Item text="Request" key="Request"/>
													<core:Item text="Inline" key="Inline"/>
													<core:Item text="Both" key="Both"/>
													<core:Item text="None" key="None"/>
												</items>
											</Select>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="OperationMode">
										<f:fields>
											<Select width="100%" id="operationMode" selectedKey="{/operationMode}">
												<items>
													<core:Item text="Server" key="Server"/>
													<core:Item text="Client" key="Client"/>
													<core:Item text="Auto" key="Auto"/>
												</items>
											</Select>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Table Threshold">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{path: '/tableThreshold', type:'sap.ui.model.type.Integer'}" id="tableThreshold"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="ListBinding Threshold">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{path: '/bindingThreshold', type:'sap.ui.model.type.Integer'}" id="bindingThreshold"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Root Level">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{path:'/rootLevel', type:'sap.ui.model.type.Integer'}" id="rootLevel"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="# of exp. Level">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{path: '/initialLevel', type:'sap.ui.model.type.Integer'}" id="initialLevel"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Application Filter">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/filterProperty}" id="filterProperty"/>
											<Input value="{/filterOperator}" id="filterOperator"/>
											<Input value="{/filterValue}" id="filterValue"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="RestoreTreeStateAfterChange">
										<f:fields>
											<CheckBox selected="{/restoreTreeStateAfterChange}" id="restoreTreeStateAfterChange"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
								</f:formElements>
							</f:FormContainer>
						</f:formContainers>
					</f:Form>
				</content>
			</Panel>
			<Panel
				expandable="true"
				expanded="false"
				width="auto"
				class="sapUiResponsiveMargin sapUiNoContentPadding">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar>
						<Title text="Hierarchy Properties" level="H2"/>
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<content>
					<f:Form id="hierarchyPropertiesForm"
						editable="true">
						<f:layout>
							<f:ResponsiveGridLayout
								labelSpanL="3"
								labelSpanM="3"
								emptySpanL="4"
								emptySpanM="4"
								columnsL="1"
								columnsM="1" />
						</f:layout>
						<f:formContainers>
							<f:FormContainer>
								<f:formElements>
									<f:FormElement label="Level">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/hierarchyLevelFor}" id="hierarchyLevelFor"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Parent-Node">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/hierarchyParentNodeFor}" id="hierarchyParentNodeFor"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Hierarchy-Node">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/hierarchyNodeFor}" id="hierarchyNodeFor"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Drill-State">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/hierarchyDrillStateFor}" id="hierarchyDrillStateFor"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Descendant-Count">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/hierarchyDescendantCountFor}" id="hierarchyDescendantCountFor"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="External-Key">
										<f:fields>
											<Input value="{/hierarchyExternalKeyFor}" id="hierarchyExternalKeyFor"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Use Local Metadata">
										<f:fields>
											<CheckBox selected="{/useLocalMetadata}" id="useLocalMetadata"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
								</f:formElements>
							</f:FormContainer>
						</f:formContainers>
					</f:Form>
				</content>
			</Panel>
			<Panel
				expandable="true"
				expanded="true"
				width="auto"
				height="auto"
				class="sapUiResponsiveMargin sapUiNoContentPadding"
				id="tableContainerPanel">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar>
						<Title text="TreeTable Container" level="H2" id="tableContainerTitle"/>
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<content>
					<table:TreeTable
						id="tableOData"
						selectionMode="MultiToggle"
						threshold="{/tableThreshold}"
						rootLevel="{/rootLevel}">
						<table:extension>
							<Toolbar>
								<Label text="Table-Tools" />
								<Button text="Create" icon="sap-icon://add" press=".onCreate"></Button>
								<Button text="Cut" icon="sap-icon://scissors" press=".onCut"></Button>
								<Button text="Paste" icon="sap-icon://paste" press=".onPaste"></Button>
								<Button text="Save" icon="sap-icon://save" press=".onSave"></Button>
								<Button text="Refresh and restore Tree State" icon="sap-icon://refresh" press=".onRefreshAndRestore"></Button>
								<Button text="Expand node to level 4" icon="sap-icon://expand-group" enabled="{= !${/pendingChanges}}" press=".onExpandNodeToLevel4"></Button>
								<ToolbarSpacer />
								<!--<Label text="Tree State Tools" />
								<Button text="Save" icon="sap-icon://loan" press=".onSaveTreeState"></Button>
								<Button text="Restore" icon="sap-icon://soccor" press=".onRestoreTreeState"></Button>-->
								<ToolbarSpacer />
								<Button type="Emphasized" text="doMagic()" icon="sap-icon://activate" press="onCreateTableClick"/>
							</Toolbar>
						</table:extension>
						<table:dragDropConfig>
							<dnd:DragDropInfo
								sourceAggregation="rows"
								targetAggregation="rows"
								dragStart="onDragStart"
								drop="onDrop"/>
						</table:dragDropConfig>
					</table:TreeTable>
				</content>
			</Panel>
				<Panel
				expandable="true"
				expanded="false"
				width="auto"
				class="sapUiResponsiveMargin sapUiNoContentPadding">
				<headerToolbar>
					<Toolbar>
						<Title text="Performance" level="H2" id="Performance"/>
						<Button icon="sap-icon://download" press="onDownload"/>
					</Toolbar>
				</headerToolbar>
				<content>
					<f:Form
						editable="true">
						<f:layout>
							<f:ResponsiveGridLayout
								labelSpanL="5"
								labelSpanM="5"
								emptySpanL="1"
								emptySpanM="1"
								columnsL="1"
								columnsM="1" />
						</f:layout>
						<f:formContainers>
							<f:FormContainer>
								<f:formElements>
									<f:FormElement label="overall">
										<f:fields>
											<Text id="overall" text="{/overall}"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="onBeforeRendering" >
										<f:fields>
											<Text id="onBeforeRendering" text="{/onBeforeRendering}"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="rendering">
										<f:fields>
											<Text id="rendering" text="{/rendering}"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="onAfterRendering">
										<f:fields>
											<Text id="onAfterRendering" text="{/onAfterRendering}"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="tableCreate">
										<f:fields>
											<Text id="tableCreate" text="{/tableCreate}"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="factor">
										<f:fields>
											<Text id="factor" text="{/factor}"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement>
										<f:fields>
											<Text />
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Table._createRows">
										<f:fields>
											<Text id="_createRows" text="{/createRows}"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="TreeTable._updateTableContent">
										<f:fields>
											<Text id="_updateTableContent" text="{/updateTableContent}"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Table._syncColumnHeaders">
										<f:fields>
											<Text id="_syncColumnHeaders" text="{/syncColumnHeaders}"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
									<f:FormElement label="Table._updateRowHeader">
										<f:fields>
											<Text id="_updateRowHeader" text="{/updateRowHeader}"/>
										</f:fields>
									</f:FormElement>
								</f:formElements>
							</f:FormContainer>
						</f:formContainers>
					</f:Form>
				</content>
			</Panel>
		</content>
		<footer>
			<Toolbar>
				<Button id="btn_messagePopover" icon="sap-icon://message-popup" text="{/messagesLength}" type="Emphasized"
						press="handleMessagePopoverPress"/>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
			</Toolbar>
		</footer>
	</Page>
	</pages>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View

	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:template="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.template/1"
	width="100%"
	core:require="{
		BooleanType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Boolean',
		ByteType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Byte',
		DateType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Date',
		DateIntervalType: 'sap/ui/model/type/DateInterval',
		DateTimeType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/DateTime',
		DateTimeOffsetType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/DateTimeOffset',
		DateTimeWithTimezoneType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/DateTimeWithTimezone',
		DecimalType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Decimal',
		DoubleType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Double',
		GuidType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Guid',
		Int16Type: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Int16',
		Int32Type: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Int32',
		Int64Type: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Int64',
		SByteType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/SByte',
		SingleType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Single',
		StringType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/String',
		TimeType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/Time',
		TimeOfDayType: 'sap/ui/model/odata/type/TimeOfDay'
	}">

	<Page id="page" floatingFooter="true" showHeader="false">
	<VBox width="100%">
		<HBox>
			<Button id="saveButton" text="Save" press="onSave" visible="{ui>/realOData}"/>
			<Button id="resetButton" binding="{v4>/ResetEdmTypes(...)}" text="Reset" press="onReset" visible="{ui>/realOData}"/>
			<Button id="messagesButton" icon="sap-icon://message-popup" tooltip="Show messages"
				press="onToggleMessagePopover" text="{ui>/iMessages}"
				type="{= ${ui>/iMessages} ? 'Emphasized' : 'Default' }"/>
			<Button id="resetModelButton" icon="sap-icon://sys-cancel" text="Reset Model" tooltip="Reset Model" press="onResetModel"/>
			<ToggleButton id="toggleV4Button" icon="sap-icon://switch-views" press="onV4" pressed="{ui>/v4}" text="V4"/>
			<ToggleButton id="toggleSourceCodeButton" icon="sap-icon://syntax" press="onSourceCode" text="Source Code after Templating"/>
			<Button id="resetContextBindingButton" icon="sap-icon://sys-cancel" text="Reset ContextBinding" tooltip="Reset ContextBinding" press="onResetContextBinding" visible="{ui>/v4}"/>
		</HBox>
		<Panel expandable="false" visible="{ui>/bCodeVisible}" headerText="Source Code after Templating" width="auto" class="sapUiResponsiveMargin">

		</Panel>
		<form:SimpleForm columnsL="3" columnsM="2" editable="true" labelSpanL="12"
				labelSpanM="12" layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
			<!--TODO: sap.ui.model.odata.type.Binary not yet available
			<core:Title text="sap.ui.model.odata.type.Binary" />
			<Image src="data:image/png;base64, {path: 'Binary'}" /> -->
			<core:Title text="sap.ui.model.odata.type.Boolean" />
			<Label text="sap.ui.model.odata.type.Boolean Input Field, true" labelFor="I1"/>
			<Input value="{path: 'Boolean', type: 'BooleanType'}" id="I1"/>
			<Label text="sap.ui.model.odata.type.Boolean Input Field, NOT nullable" labelFor="booleanInput"/>
			<Input id="booleanInput" value="{path: 'Boolean', type: 'BooleanType',
				constraints: {nullable: false}}"/>
			<Label text="sap.ui.model.odata.type.Boolean CheckBox, true"/>
			<CheckBox selected="{path: 'Boolean', type: 'BooleanType'}"/>

			<core:Title text="DateTime variants"/>

			<DateRangeSelection value="{parts: [{path: 'Date'}, {path: 'DateTimeOffset'}], type: 'DateIntervalType'}">
				<layoutData><layout:GridData span="XL6 L12 M12 S12"/></layoutData>
			</DateRangeSelection>

			<DatePicker value="{path: 'v4>Date', type: 'DateType', formatOptions: {relative: 'true'}}" visible="{ui>/v4}"/>

							path : 'TimezoneID',
							type : 'StringType',
							parameters : {useUndefinedIfUnresolved : true}
						}
					],
					type : 'DateTimeWithTimezoneType'}" />
			<Label labelFor="I79" text="Edm.DateTimeOffset (3 fields, with types for parts)" />
			<Input editable="false" id="I79"
				value="{
					formatOptions : {showTime : false, showTimezone : false},
					parts : [
						{
							path : 'DateTimeOffset',
							type : 'DateTimeOffsetType',
							parameters : {useUndefinedIfUnresolved : true}
						}, {
							path : 'TimezoneID',
							type : 'StringType',

						}
					],
					type : 'DateTimeWithTimezoneType'}" />
			<Input editable="false" id="I80"

					formatOptions : {showDate : false, showTimezone : false},
					parts : [

							path : 'DateTimeOffset',
							type : 'DateTimeOffsetType',
							parameters : {useUndefinedIfUnresolved : true}

						}

			<Input editable="false" id="I81"
				tooltip="The timezone of the date and time field"
				value="{
					formatOptions : {showDate : false, showTime : false},

							path : 'DateTimeOffset',
							type : 'DateTimeOffsetType',

						}

			<Label labelFor="I69"

			<Input id="I69"
				value="{
					formatOptions : {showDate : true, showTime : true, showTimezone : true},
					parts : [

title: UploadSetwithTable
code:
<mvc:View
	height="100%"
	displayBlock="true"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mdc="sap.ui.mdc"
	xmlns:mdct="sap.ui.mdc.table"
	xmlns:vm="sap.ui.fl.variants"
	controllerName="mdc.sample.controller.Page"
	xmlns:upload="sap.m.upload">

	<f:DynamicPage id="page">
		<f:content>
			<mdc:Table
				id="table-uploadSet"
				header="Documents"
				type="ResponsiveTable"
				threshold="100"
				filter="filterbar"
				showRowCount="true"
                p13nMode="Column,Sort,Group"
				delegate="{
					name: 'mdc/sample/delegate/JSONTableDelegate',
					payload: {
						bindingPath: 'documents>/items'
					}
				}"
				selectionMode="Multi"
				selectionChange="onSelectionChange">

                <mdc:variant>
                    <vm:VariantManagement id="variants" for="table-uploadSet"/>
                </mdc:variant>

				<mdc:actions>
						<upload:ActionsPlaceholder id="uploadButton" placeholderFor="UploadButtonPlaceholder" />
						<Button
                        id="downloadSelectedButton"
                        text="Download"
                        enabled="false"
                        press="onDownloadFiles"
                    	/>
						<MenuButton text="Add">
                        <menu>
                            <Menu>
                                <MenuItem
                                    text="URL"
                                    press="openAddOrEditDialog"
                                />
                            </Menu>
                        </menu>
							<layoutData>
								<OverflowToolbarLayoutData
									priority="AlwaysOverflow"
								/>
							</layoutData>
                    	</MenuButton>
                    <Button
                        id="removeDocumentButton"
                        text="Remove"
                        press="onRemoveButtonPress"
                        enabled="false"
                    >
                        <layoutData>
                            <OverflowToolbarLayoutData
                                priority="AlwaysOverflow"
                            />
                        </layoutData>
                    </Button>
                    <Button
                        id="renameButton"
                        enabled="false"
                        press="onRenameDocument"
                        text="Rename"
                    >
                        <layoutData>
                            <OverflowToolbarLayoutData
                                priority="AlwaysOverflow"
                            />
                        </layoutData>
                    </Button>
                    <Button
                        id="editUrlButton"
                        text="Edit URL"
                        enabled="false"
                        press="onEditUrl"
                    >
                        <layoutData>
                            <OverflowToolbarLayoutData
                                priority="AlwaysOverflow"
                            />
                        </layoutData>
                    </Button>
				</mdc:actions>

				<mdc:dependents>
						<plugins.UploadSetwithTable
						uploadUrl="/uploadFiles"
						multiple="true"
						beforeUploadStarts="onBeforeUploadStarts"
						itemRenamed="onDocumentRenamedSuccess"
						uploadCompleted="onUploadCompleted"
						onActivated="onPluginActivated"
						actions="uploadButton"
						>
							<rowConfiguration>
								<upload.UploadItemConfiguration
								fileNamePath="fileName"
								mediaTypePath="mediaType"
								urlPath="url"
								previewablePath="previewable"
								fileSizePath="fileSize"
                                isTrustedSourcePath="trustedSource"
								/>
							</rowConfiguration>
						</plugins.UploadSetwithTable>
				</mdc:dependents>


				<mdc:rowSettings>
						<mdc:table.RowSettings highlight="{=${documents>uploadState} === 'Complete' ? 'Indication05' : null }" >
						</mdc:table.RowSettings>
				</mdc:rowSettings>
				
				 <mdct:Column
				 	propertyKey="fileName"
				 	header="File Name">
                    <HBox>
                            <Image
                                src="{documents>imageUrl}"
                                class="sapMUSTItemImage sapMUSTItemIcon"
                                visible="{= ${documents>imageUrl} !== undefined}"
                            />
                            <core:Icon
                                src="{parts: ['documents>mediaType', 'documents>fileName'], formatter: '.getIconSrc' }"
                                visible="{= ${documents>imageUrl} === undefined || ${documents>imageUrl} === '' }"
                                class="sapMUSTItemImage sapMUSTItemIcon"
                            />
                            <VBox
                                class="sapUiTinyMargin sapUiSmallMarginBegin"
                            >
                                <Link
                                    text="{documents>fileName}"
                                    press="openPreview"
                                    class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom"
                                />
                                <Text text="{documents>documentType}" />
                            </VBox>
                        </HBox>
                </mdct:Column>
                 <mdct:Column 
				 	propertyKey="id"
				 	header="ID">
                    <Text text="{documents>id}" />
                </mdct:Column>
                 <mdct:Column 
				 	propertyKey="revision"
				 	header="Revision">
                    <Link text="{documents>revision}" />
                </mdct:Column>
                 <mdct:Column 
				 	propertyKey="status"
				 	header="Status">
                    <Text text="{documents>status}" />
                </mdct:Column>
                <mdct:Column 
				 	propertyKey="fileSize"
				 	header="File Size">
                     <Text
                            text="{parts: ['documents>fileSize'], formatter: '.getFileSizeWithUnits'}"
                        />
                </mdct:Column>
                 <mdct:Column 
				 	propertyKey="lastModified"
				 	header="Last Modified">
                    <VBox>
                            <Text text="{documents>lastModifiedBy}" />
                            <Text
                                class="sapUiTinyMarginTop"
                                text="{documents>lastmodified}"
                            />
                        </VBox>
                </mdct:Column>
                 <mdct:Column 
				 	propertyKey="removeAction"> 
					<Button
                            class="sapUiTinyMarginBegin"
                            type="Transparent"
                            icon="sap-icon://decline"
                            press="onRemoveHandler"
                        />
					</mdct:Column>
			</mdc:Table>
		</f:content>
	</f:DynamicPage>

</mvc:View>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="ObjectPageSubSection330_0" title="showSubSectionMore default value">
						<t:SimpleEdit id="ObjectPageBlockBase330_0"/>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="ObjectPageSubSection330_1" title="showSubSectionMore true">
						<t:SimpleEdit id="ObjectPageBlockBase330_1" showSubSectionMore="true"/>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="ObjectPageSubSection330_2" title="showSubSectionMore false">
						<t:SimpleEdit id="ObjectPageBlockBase330_2" showSubSectionMore="false"/>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="ObjectPageSubSection330_3"
										  title="Many block with 1 showSubSectionMore = true">
						<t:SimpleEdit id="ObjectPageBlockBase330_3" showSubSectionMore="true"/>
						<t:SimpleEdit showSubSectionMore="false"/>
						<t:SimpleEdit showSubSectionMore="false"/>
						<t:SimpleEdit showSubSectionMore="false"/>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="ObjectPageSubSection330_4"
										  title="Many blocks with all showSubSectionMore value = false">
						<t:SimpleEdit id="ObjectPageBlockBase330_4" showSubSectionMore="false"/>
						<t:SimpleEdit showSubSectionMore="false"/>
						<t:SimpleEdit showSubSectionMore="false"/>
						<t:SimpleEdit showSubSectionMore="false"/>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View

						<m:Link text='Page 5'/>

title: UxAP-69_AnchorBarBinding
code:
<mvc:View
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.uxap"
		xmlns:m="sap.m"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
		height="100%"
		core:require="{formatMessage:'sap/base/strings/formatMessage'}"  
		>

	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader id="headerExpandedGrid" objectTitle="toto">
			</ObjectPageHeader>
		</headerTitle>

		<sections>
			<!-- simple binding -->
			<ObjectPageSection id="section1" title="{/sections/0/title}">
				<ObjectPageSubSection title="first subsection">
					<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContent7" />" />
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
				<ObjectPageSubSection title="second subsection">
					<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContent7" />" />
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<!-- parts binding -->
			<ObjectPageSection id="section2" title="{
				parts:[ {path:'/compositeTitle'}, {path:'/objectCount'}],
				formatter : 'formatMessage'
			}">
				<ObjectPageSubSection title="second section first">
					<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContentA" />" />
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
				<ObjectPageSubSection title="second section second">
					<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContentA" />" />
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<!-- no binding -->
			<ObjectPageSection id="section3" title="Fixed">
				<customAnchorBarButton>
					<m:Button text="my third section"/>
				</customAnchorBarButton>
				<ObjectPageSubSection>
					<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContentC" />" />
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<!-- no title -->
			<ObjectPageSection id="section4">
				<ObjectPageSubSection>
					<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContentF" />" />
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
				<ObjectPageSubSection>
					<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContentF" />" />
				</ObjectPageSubSection>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
	</ObjectPageLayout>

</mvc:View>

<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:u="sap.uxap"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc">
	<u:ObjectPageLayout
		id="PartProfileObjectPage"
		enableLazyLoading="false"
		showAnchorBarPopover="false"
		alwaysShowContentHeader="true"
		flexEnabled="true"
		upperCaseAnchorBar="false"
		selectedSection="testSection1">

		<u:sections>
			<u:ObjectPageSection
				id="testSection1"
				title="{ProjectCount}"
				subSections="{PartProfileProjectSet}"
				titleUppercase="false">

				<u:subSections>



					<u:ObjectPageSubSection>
						<u:blocks>
							<l:Grid defaultSpan="XL12 L12 M12 S12">
								<Title
									level="H1"
									text="{ProjectName}"
									class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom"/>
								<f:SimpleForm
										editable="false"
										layout="ResponsiveGridLayout"
										labelSpanXL="12"
										labelSpanL="12"
										labelSpanM="12"
										labelSpanS="12">
										<Label text="{i18n>TXT_PART_OBJECT_PAGE_DEGREE_OF_MATURITY}"/>
									</f:SimpleForm>
							</l:Grid>
						</u:blocks>
					</u:ObjectPageSubSection>



				</u:subSections>
			</u:ObjectPageSection>

			<u:ObjectPageSection
				id="testSection2"
				titleUppercase="false">
				<u:subSections>

					<u:ObjectPageSubSection>
						<u:blocks>
							<l:Grid defaultSpan="XL12 L12 M12 S12">
								<Title
									level="H1"
									text="test"
									class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom"/>
							</l:Grid>
						</u:blocks>
					</u:ObjectPageSubSection>

				</u:subSections>
			</u:ObjectPageSection>

		</u:sections>
	</u:ObjectPageLayout>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		  xmlns="sap.uxap"
		  xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
		  xmlns:m="sap.m"
		  xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		  height="100%">
	<ObjectPageLayout id="ObjectPageLayout"
					  enableLazyLoading="false"
					  showTitleInHeaderContent="true"
					  showEditHeaderButton="true">
		<headerTitle>
			<ObjectPageHeader objectImageURI="test-resources/sap/uxap/qunit/img/person.png"
							  objectTitle="Denise Smith"
							  objectImageShape="Circle"
							  objectImageAlt="Denise Smith"
							  objectSubtitle="Senior UI Developer"

							  isObjectIconAlwaysVisible="false"
							  isObjectTitleAlwaysVisible="false"
							  isObjectSubtitleAlwaysVisible="false">
				<actions>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://pull-down" text="show section" type="Emphasized"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton icon="sap-icon://show" text="show state" type="Emphasized"/>
					<ObjectPageHeaderActionButton text="Toggle Footer" hideIcon="true" hideText="false" type="Emphasized"/>
				</actions>
			</ObjectPageHeader>
		</headerTitle>

		<headerContent>
			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Link text="+33 6 4512 5158"/>
				<m:Link text="DeniseSmith@sap.com"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>

			<layout:HorizontalLayout>
				<m:Image src="test-resources/sap/uxap/qunit/img/linkedin.png"></m:Image>
				<m:Image src="test-resources/sap/uxap/qunit/img/Twitter.png"></m:Image>
			</layout:HorizontalLayout>

			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Label text="Hello! I am Tim and I use UxAP"/>
				<m:VBox height="63px">
					<m:Label text="Achieved goals"/>
					<m:ProgressIndicator
							percentValue="30"
							displayValue="30%"
							showValue="true"
							state="None"/>
				</m:VBox>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>

			<layout:VerticalLayout>
				<m:Label text="San Jose, USA"/>
			</layout:VerticalLayout>

		<sections>
			<ObjectPageSection id="goalsSection" title="2014 Goals Plan">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="goalsSectionSS1" title=" ">
						<blocks>
							<m:Panel height="300px">
								<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContent100Pct7">goalsSectionSS1</div>" />
							</m:Panel>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection id="personalSection" title="Personal" importance="Medium">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSectionSS1" title="Connect">
						<blocks>
							<m:Panel height="300px">
								<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContent100Pct7">personalSectionSS1</div>" />
							</m:Panel>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="personalSectionSS2" title="Payment information">
						<blocks>
							<m:Panel height="300px">
								<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContent100Pct7">personalSectionSS2</div>" />
							</m:Panel>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<m:Panel height="300px">
								<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContent100Pct7">personalSectionSS2 more block</div>" />
							</m:Panel>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>

			<ObjectPageSection id="employmentSection" title="Employment">
				<subSections>
					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSectionSS1" title="Job information">
						<blocks>
							<m:Panel height="300px">
								<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContent100Pct7">employmentSectionSS1</div>" />
							</m:Panel>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSectionSS2" title="Employee Details" mode="Collapsed" importance="Medium">
						<blocks>
							<m:Panel height="300px">
								<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContent100Pct7">employmentSectionSS2</div>" />
							</m:Panel>
						</blocks>
						<moreBlocks>
							<m:Panel height="300px">
								<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContent100Pct7">employmentSectionSS2 more blocks</div>" />
							</m:Panel>
						</moreBlocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>

					<ObjectPageSubSection id="employmentSectionSS3" title="Job Relationship" mode="Collapsed" importance="Low">

								<core:HTML content="<div class="dummyBlockContent100Pct7">employmentSectionSS3</div>" />
							</m:Panel>
						</blocks>
					</ObjectPageSubSection>
				</subSections>
			</ObjectPageSection>
		</sections>
		<footer>

				<m:Button type="Accept" text="Accept"/>

title: View

<mvc:View
	controllerName="sap.ui.unified.sample.FileUploaderComplex.Controller"
	xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
	xmlns:u="sap.ui.unified"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	class="viewPadding">
	<l:VerticalLayout>
		<u:FileUploader
			id="fileUploader"
			name="myFileUpload"
			uploadUrl="upload/"
			tooltip="Upload your file to the local server"
			uploadComplete="handleUploadComplete"
			change="handleValueChange"
			typeMissmatch="handleTypeMissmatch"
			style="Emphasized"
			fileType="txt,jpg"
			placeholder="Choose a file for Upload...">
				<u:parameters>
					<u:FileUploaderParameter
						name="Accept-CH"
						value="Viewport-Width"/>
					<u:FileUploaderParameter
						name="Accept-CH"
						value="Width"/>
					<u:FileUploaderParameter
						name="Accept-CH-Lifetime"
						value="86400"/>
				</u:parameters>
			</u:FileUploader>
		<Button
			text="Upload File"
			press="handleUploadPress"/>
	</l:VerticalLayout>
</mvc:View>

	<Label text="testMany2"></Label>

		<vp:secondaryContent>

			<Button id="Button6" />
		</vp:secondaryContent>

		<vp:alternativeContent>
			<vp:ManyAggregationsControl id="myManyAggregationsControl2">
				<!-- The order of the controls inside the groundControls aggregation has to be 1,2,3,4 -->
				<Button id="InnerButton1" text="A" />

				<vp:bottomControls>
					<Button id="InnerButton2" text="B"/>
					<Button id="InnerButton3" text="C"/>
				</vp:bottomControls>

				<Button id="InnerButton4" text="D" />
				<!-- see above -->
			</vp:ManyAggregationsControl>

			<Button id="Button3" />
			<Button id="Button4" />
		</vp:alternativeContent>

		<vp:content>
			<Button id="Button1" />
			<Button id="Button2" />
		</vp:content>

		<Button id="Button7" text="inside default aggregation" />

		<vp:groundControls>
			<Button id="Button8" text="outside default aggregation"/>

title: WebPageContent
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns:f="sap.f"
	xmlns:w="sap.ui.integration.widgets"
	displayBlock="true"
	controllerName="sap.f.cardsdemo.controller.WebPageContent">
	<Page title="{i18n>appTitle}">
		<subHeader>
			<Toolbar>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
				<Title text="WebPage Content Card"/>
				<ToolbarSpacer/>
			</Toolbar>
		</subHeader>
		<mvc:View viewName="sap.f.cardsdemo.view.common.CommonCardSettings" type="XML" async="true"></mvc:View>
		<f:GridContainer id="grid" class="sapUiSmallMargin" inlineBlockLayout="true">
			<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/webPage/manifest.json">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="6" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card
				id="webPageCardWrongUrl"
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/webPage/webPageError/manifest.json">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="6" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/webPage/webPageFullscreen.json">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="6" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/webPage/baseUrl/manifest.json"
				baseUrl="https://openui5.org">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="6" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/webPage/baseUrlHttp/manifest.json"
				baseUrl="http://openui5.org">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="6" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/webPage/webPageFooter.json">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="6" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/webPage/withExtension/manifest.json">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4"/>
					</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/webPage/withJsonData/manifest.json">
					<w:layoutData>
						<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4"/>
					</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card
				id="showCard"
				manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/webPage/showCard/manifest.json">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="4" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
			<w:Card manifest="{cardsPlayground>/playgroundBaseUrl}cardcontent/webPage/minHeight/manifest.json">
				<w:layoutData>
					<f:GridContainerItemLayoutData columns="6" />
				</w:layoutData>
			</w:Card>
		</f:GridContainer>
	</Page>
</mvc:View>

									src="./resources/sap/ui/documentation/sdk/images/logo_twitter.png"
									width="2.5rem"
									densityAware="false"
									class="sapUiTinyMarginTop"/>
							<custom:TitleLink
									href="https://twitter.com/@openui5"
									target="_blank"
									text="Twitter"
									titleStyle="H2"
									wrap="false"
									class="sapUiSmallMargin sapUiNoMarginBottom sapUiNoMarginEnd"/>
							<Image
								src="./resources/sap/ui/documentation/sdk/images/link-external.png"
								tooltip="{i18n>LEGAL_DISCLAIMER_EXTERNAL_TOOLTIP}"
								width="1.25rem"
								class="sapUiDisclaimerCommunityLink"
								press="onDisclaimerLinkPress"/>
						</l:HorizontalLayout>
					</l:BlockLayoutCell>
					<l:BlockLayoutCell
						class="sapUiBlockCenteredCell communityLinkCell"
						backgroundColorSet="ColorSet10"
						backgroundColorShade="ShadeB">
						<l:HorizontalLayout>
							<core:Icon
									src="sap-icon://email"
									size="2.5rem"
									color="Default"/>
							<custom:TitleLink
									href="https://listserv.sap.com/mailman/listinfo/ui5.announce"
									target="_blank"
									text="{i18n>WELCOME_BLOCK_13_TITLE}"
									titleStyle="H2"
									wrap="false"
									class="sapUiSmallMargin sapUiNoMarginBottom sapUiNoMarginEnd"/>
							<Image
								src="./resources/sap/ui/documentation/sdk/images/link-sap.png"
								tooltip="{i18n>LEGAL_DISCLAIMER_INTERNAL_TOOLTIP}"
								width="1.25rem"
								class="sapUiDisclaimerCommunityLink"
								press="onDisclaimerLinkPress"/>
						</l:HorizontalLayout>
					</l:BlockLayoutCell>
				</l:BlockLayoutRow>
			</l:BlockLayout>
		</Panel>

		<core:Fragment id="footerFragment" fragmentName="sap.ui.documentation.sdk.view.Footer" type="XML" />

	</Page>
</mvc:View>

title: Widget
code:
<mvc:View
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m" 
	controllerName="sap.my.test.widget.component.controller.Widget"
	displayBlock="true"
>
	<Panel id="myPanel" headerText="Panel">
		<Input value="{cardParameters>/stringProperty}" />
		<Input value="{cardParameters>/text}" />
		<Input type="Number" value="{cardParameters>/intProperty}" />
		<Input type="Number" value="{cardParameters>/floatProperty}" />
		<DatePicker value="{cardParameters>/dateProperty}" />
		<Button text="Cancel" press="fireCancel"/>
		<Button text="OK" type="Emphasized" press="fireOK"/>
		<Image src="./img/app_icon.png" width="50px" height="50px" alt="Image not shown"></Image>
		<List
			headerText="Products from Northwind"
			items="{
				path: 'products>/value'
			}" >
			<StandardListItem title="{products>ProductName}"/>
		</List>
	</Panel>
</mvc:View>

								<form:SimpleForm

									<Label text="Name" required="true"/>

											valueState="{/productNameState}" id="ProductName" liveChange="additionalInfoValidation"
											placeholder="Enter name with length greater than 6" value="{/productName}"/>
									<Label text="Weight" required="true"/>

										activate="optionalStepActivation"
										title="Optional Information">
								<MessageStrip class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
										text="You can validate steps by default with the validated='true' property of the step. The next button is always enabled."
										showIcon="true"/>
								<Text text="Integer pellentesque leo sit amet dui vehicula, quis ullamcorper est pulvinar. Nam in libero sem. Suspendisse arcu metus, molestie a turpis a, molestie aliquet dui. Donec ppellentesque leo sit amet dui vehicula, quis ullamcorper est pulvinar. Nam in libero sem. Suspendisse arcu metus, molestie a turpis a, molestie aliquet dui. Donec pulvinar, sapien	corper eu, posuere malesuada nisl. Integer pellentesque leo sit amet dui vehicula, quis ullamcorper est pulvinar. Nam in libero sem. Suspendisse arcu metus, molestie a turpis a, molestie aliquet dui. Donec pulvinar, sapien	"/>
								<form:SimpleForm
										editable="true"
										layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
									<Label text="Cover photo"/>
									<u:FileUploader
											width="100%"
											tooltip="Upload product cover photo to the local server"
											style="Emphasized"
											placeholder="Choose a file for Upload..."/>
									<Label text="Manufacturing date"/>
									<DatePicker
											id="DP3"
											displayFormat="short"
											value="{/manufacturingDate}"/>
									<Label text="Availability"/>
									<SegmentedButton selectedKey="{/availabilityType}">
										<items>
											<SegmentedButtonItem key="In store" text="In store"/>
											<SegmentedButtonItem key="In depot" text="In depot"/>
											<SegmentedButtonItem key="In repository" text="In repository"/>
											<SegmentedButtonItem key="Out of stock" text="Out of stock"/>
										</items>
									</SegmentedButton>
									<Label text="Size"/>
									<Input value="{/size}"/>
									<ComboBox maxWidth="100px" selectedKey="{/measurement}">
										<core:Item key="X" text="X"/>
										<core:Item key="Y" text="Y"/>
										<core:Item key="Z" text="Z"/>
									</ComboBox>

								</form:SimpleForm>
							</WizardStep>
							<WizardStep id="PricingStep"
										activate="pricingActivate"
										complete="pricingComplete"
										validated="true"
										title="Pricing">
								<MessageStrip class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
										text="You can use the wizard previousStep() and nextStep() methods to navigate from step to step without validation. Also you can use the GoToStep(step) method to scroll programmatically to previously visited steps."
										showIcon="true"/>
								<form:SimpleForm
										editable="true"
										layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
									<Label text="Price"/>
									<Input value="{/productPrice}"/>
									<Label text="Discount group"/>
									<ComboBox selectedKey="{/discountGroup}">
										<core:Item key="Kids" text="Kids"/>
										<core:Item key="Teens" text="Teens"/>
										<core:Item key="Adults" text="Adults"/>
										<core:Item key="Elderly" text="Elderly"/>
									</ComboBox>
									<Label text=" VAT is included"/>
									<CheckBox selected="{/productVAT}"/>
								</form:SimpleForm>
							</WizardStep>
						</Wizard>
					</content>
					<footer>
						<OverflowToolbar>
							<ToolbarSpacer/>
							<Button text="Cancel" press="handleWizardCancel"/>
						</OverflowToolbar>
					</footer>
				</Page>
				<Page id="wizardReviewPage" showHeader="false">
					<content>
						<form:SimpleForm
								title="1. Product Type"
								editable="false"
								layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
							<form:content>
								<Label text="Type"/>
								<Text id="ProductTypeChosen" text="{/productType}"/>
								<Link press="editStepOne" text="Edit" />
							</form:content>
						</form:SimpleForm>

						<form:SimpleForm
								title="2. Product Information"
								editable="false"
								layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
							<form:content>
								<Label text="Name"/>
								<Text id="ProductNameChosen" text="{/productName}"/>
								<Label text="Weight"/>
								<Text id="ProductWeightChosen" text="{/productWeight}"/>
								<Label text="Manufacturer"/>
								<Text id="ProductManufacturerChosen" text="{/productManufacturer}"/>
								<Label text="Description"/>
								<Text id="ProductDescriptionChosen" text="{/productDescription}"/>
								<Link press="editStepTwo" text="Edit" />
							</form:content>
						</form:SimpleForm>

						<form:SimpleForm
								title="3. Optional Information"
								editable="false"
								layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
							<form:content>
								<Label text="Some text"/>
								<Text text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod
								tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. "/>
								<Label text="Manufacturing Date"/>
								<Text id="ManufacturingDate" text="{/manufacturingDate}"/>
								<Label text="Availability"/>
								<Text id="AvailabilityChosen" text="{/availabilityType}"/>
								<Label text="Size"/>
								<HBox>
									<Text id="Size" text="{/size}"/>
									<Text id="Size2" class="sapUiTinyMarginBegin" text="{/measurement}"/>
								</HBox>
								<Link press="editStepThree" text="Edit" />
							</form:content>
						</form:SimpleForm>

						<form:SimpleForm
								title="4. Pricing"
								editable="false"
								layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
							<form:content>
								<Label text="Price"/>
								<Text id="ProductPriceChosen" text="{/productPrice}"/>
								<Label text="Discount Group"/>
								<Text id="DiscountGroupChosen" text="{/discountGroup}"/>
								<Label text="VAT Included"/>
								<Text id="ProductVATChosen" text="{/productVAT}"/>
								<Link press="editStepFour" text="Edit" />
							</form:content>
						</form:SimpleForm>
					</content>
					<footer>
						<Bar>
							<contentRight>
								<Button text="Submit" press="handleWizardSubmit"/>
								<Button text="Cancel" press="handleWizardCancel"/>
							</contentRight>
						</Bar>
					</footer>
				</Page>
			</pages>
		</NavContainer>
</mvc:View>

title: WizardBranching
code:
<mvc:View
		height="100%"
		controllerName="sap.m.sample.WizardBranching.controller.WizardBranching"
		xmlns:layout="sap.ui.layout"
		xmlns:form="sap.ui.layout.form"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m">
	<NavContainer id="wizardNavContainer">
		<pages>
			<Page
					id="wizardContentPage"
					showHeader="false">
				<content>
					<Wizard id="ShoppingCartWizard"
							complete="completedHandler"
							enableBranching="true"
							class="sapUiResponsivePadding--header sapUiResponsivePadding--content">
						<WizardStep
								id="ContentsStep"
								nextStep="PaymentTypeStep"
								title="Shopping cart contents"
								icon="sap-icon://cart">
							<ObjectHeader
									title="Total"
									number="{/ProductsTotalPrice}"
									numberUnit="EUR">
								<attributes>
									<ObjectAttribute	text="This is the list of items in your shopping cart" />
								</attributes>
							</ObjectHeader>
							<List mode="Delete"
									items="{/ProductCollection}"
									enableBusyIndicator="true"
									delete="handleDelete"
									headerText="Items">
								<StandardListItem
										title="{Name}"
										type="Active"
										description="{Description}"
										icon="{ProductPicUrl}"
										info="{Price} {CurrencyCode}"
										iconDensityAware="false"
										iconInset="false" />
							</List>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
								id="PaymentTypeStep"
								title="Payment type"
								subsequentSteps="CreditCardStep, BankAccountStep, CashOnDeliveryStep"
								complete="goToPaymentStep"
								icon="sap-icon://money-bills">
							<Text class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
									text="We accept all major credit cards. No extra cost will be charged when paying with a credit card. Bank transfer and Cash on delivery are only possible for inland deliveries. A service charge of 2.99 EUR will be charged for these types of deliveries. Be aware, that for Bank transfers, the shipping will start on the day after the payment is received."/>
							<HBox
									alignItems="Center"
									justifyContent="Center"
									width="100%">
								<SegmentedButton selectionChange="setPaymentMethod" id="paymentMethodSelection" selectedKey="{/selectedPayment}">
									<items>
										<SegmentedButtonItem key="Credit Card" icon="sap-icon://credit-card" text="Credit card" />
										<SegmentedButtonItem key="Bank Transfer" icon="sap-icon://official-service" text="Bank transfer" />
										<SegmentedButtonItem key="Cash on Delivery" icon="sap-icon://money-bills" text="Cash on delivery" />
									</items>
								</SegmentedButton>
							</HBox>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
								id="CreditCardStep"
								title="Credit card info"
								nextStep="BillingStep"
								activate="checkCreditCardStep"
								icon="sap-icon://credit-card">
							<MessageStrip text="Enter at least 3 symbols for credit card name." />
							<form:SimpleForm
									editable="true"
									layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
								<Label text="Name on card" required="true" />
								<Input value="{/CreditCard/Name}" liveChange="checkCreditCardStep" valueLiveUpdate="true" />
								<Label text="Card number"/>
								<Input value="{/CardNumber}" />
								<Label text="Security code" />
								<Input value="{/CreditCard/SecurityCode}" />
								<Label text="Expiration date" />
								<DatePicker value="{/CreditCard/Expire}" />
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
								id="BankAccountStep"
								title="Beneficial bank info"
								nextStep="BillingStep"
								icon="sap-icon://official-service">
							<Panel>
								<headerToolbar>
									<Toolbar height="0rem">
										<Title text=""/>
									</Toolbar>
								</headerToolbar>
								<layout:Grid
										defaultSpan="L6 M6 S10"
										hSpacing="2">
									<Label text="Beneficiary Name" design="Bold" />
									<Label text="Singapore Hardware e-Commerce LTD" />
									<Label text="Beneficiary Bank" design="Bold" />
									<Label text="CITY BANK, SINGAPORE BRANCH" />
									<Label text="Beneficiary Account Number" design="Bold" />
									<Label text="06110702027218" />
									<Label text="Bank Phone Number" design="Bold" />
									<Label text="+65-6224-2622" />
									<Label text="Bank Email Address" design="Bold" />
									<Label text="customerservice@citybank.com" />
								</layout:Grid>
							</Panel>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
								id="CashOnDeliveryStep"
								title="Cash on delivery info"
								nextStep="BillingStep"
								activate="checkCashOnDeliveryStep"
								icon="sap-icon://money-bills">
							<MessageStrip text="Enter at least 3 symbols for first name." />
							<form:SimpleForm
									editable="true"
									layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
								<Label text="First Name" required="true" />
								<Input value="{/CashOnDelivery/FirstName}" liveChange="checkCashOnDeliveryStep" valueLiveUpdate="true" />
								<Label text="Last Name" />
								<Input value="{/CashOnDelivery/LastName}" />
								<Label text="Phone Number" />
								<Input value="{/CashOnDelivery/Phone Number}" />
								<Label text="Email address" />
								<Input value="{/CashOnDelivery/Email}" />
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
								id="BillingStep"
								title="Billing address"
								subsequentSteps="DeliveryAddressStep, DeliveryTypeStep"
								activate="checkBillingStep"
								complete="billingAddressComplete"
								icon="sap-icon://sales-quote">
							<MessageStrip text="Enter at least 3 symbols for each required field" />
							<form:SimpleForm
									editable="true"
									layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
								<Label text="Delivery address is different" />
								<CheckBox
										selected="{/differentDeliveryAddress}"
										select="setDifferentDeliveryAddress"/>
								<Label text="Address" required="true" />
								<Input value="{/BillingAddress/Address}" liveChange="checkBillingStep" valueLiveUpdate="true" />
								<Label text="City" required="true" />
								<Input value="{/BillingAddress/City}" liveChange="checkBillingStep" valueLiveUpdate="true" />
								<Label text="Zip Code" required="true" />
								<Input value="{/BillingAddress/ZipCode}" liveChange="checkBillingStep" valueLiveUpdate="true" />
								<Label text="Country" required="true" />
								<Input value="{/BillingAddress/Country}" liveChange="checkBillingStep" valueLiveUpdate="true" />
								<Label text="Note" required="false" />
								<TextArea rows="8" value="{/BillingAddress/Note}" />
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
								id="DeliveryAddressStep"
								title="Delivery address"
								nextStep="DeliveryTypeStep"
								icon="sap-icon://sales-quote">
							<form:SimpleForm
									editable="true"
									layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
								<Label text="Address" />
								<Input />
								<Label text="City" />
								<Input />
								<Label text="Zip Code" />
								<Input />
								<Label text="Country" />
								<Input />
								<Label text="Note" />
								<TextArea rows="8" />
							</form:SimpleForm>
						</WizardStep>
						<WizardStep
								id="DeliveryTypeStep"
								title="Delivery type"
								icon="sap-icon://insurance-car">
							<Text class="sapUiSmallMarginBottom"
									text="Standard delivery will be delivered within 5 workdays. Be aware, that around high-season sales, standard delivery may take up to one additional day. Express delivery is delivered within 36 hours. A service fee of 5.49 EUR is charged for Express delivery on a workday. For a holiday delivery, the service fee is 8,00 EUR. Express delivery is only available for inland deliveries. All service fees vary for deliveries  abroad."/>
							<HBox
									alignItems="Center"
									justifyContent="Center"
									width="100%">
								<SegmentedButton selectedKey="{/selectedDeliveryMethod}">
									<items>
										<SegmentedButtonItem key="Standard Delivery" text="Standard" />
										<SegmentedButtonItem key="Express Delivery" text="Express" />
									</items>
								</SegmentedButton>
							</HBox>
						</WizardStep>
					</Wizard>
				</content>
				<footer>
					<OverflowToolbar>
						<ToolbarSpacer/>
						<Button text="Cancel" press="handleWizardCancel"/>
					</OverflowToolbar>
				</footer>
			</Page>
			<Page id="wizardBranchingReviewPage" showHeader="false">
				<content>
					<form:SimpleForm
							title="1. List of products"
							editable="false"
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<List mode="None"
								items="{/ProductCollection}"
								enableBusyIndicator="true">
							<StandardListItem
									title="{Name}"
									type="Active"
									description="{Description}"
									icon="{ProductPicUrl}"
									info="{Price} {CurrencyCode}"
									iconDensityAware="false"
									iconInset="false" />
						</List>
						<ObjectHeader
								title="Total"
								number="{/ProductsTotalPrice}"
								numberUnit="EUR">
							<attributes>
								<ObjectAttribute
										press="_navBackToList"
										active="true"
										text="Edit" />
							</attributes>
						</ObjectHeader>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
							title="2. Payment type"
							editable="false"
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label text="Chosen payment type"/>
							<Text text="{/selectedPayment}"/>
							<Link press="_navBackToPaymentType" text="Edit" />
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
							visible="{= ${/selectedPayment}==='Credit Card' ? true : false}"
							title="3. Credit Card payment"
							editable="false"
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label text="Name on card"/>
							<Text text="{/CreditCard/Name}"/>
							<Label text="Card number"/>
							<Text text="{/CardNumber}"/>
							<Label text="Security code"/>
							<Text text="{/CreditCard/SecurityCode}"/>
							<Label text="Expiration date"/>
							<Text text="{/CreditCard/Expire}"/>
							<Link press="_navBackToCreditCard" text="Edit" />
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
							visible="{= ${/selectedPayment}==='Bank Transfer' ? true : false}"
							title="3. Bank Transfer"
							editable="false"
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
								<layout:Grid
										defaultSpan="L6 M6 S10"
										hSpacing="2">
									<Label text="Beneficiary Name" design="Bold" />
									<Label text="Singapore Hardware e-Commerce LTD" />
									<Label text="Beneficiary Bank" design="Bold" />
									<Label text="CITY BANK, SINGAPORE BRANCH" />
									<Label text="Beneficiary Account Number" design="Bold" />
									<Label text="06110702027218" />
									<Label text="Bank Phone Number" design="Bold" />
									<Label text="+65-6224-2622" />
									<Label text="Bank Email Address" design="Bold" />
									<Label text="customerservice@citybank.com" />
								</layout:Grid>
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
							visible="{= ${/selectedPayment}==='Cash on Delivery' ? true : false}"
							title="3. Cash on delivery"
							editable="false"
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label text="First Name"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/FirstName}"/>
							<Label text="Last Name"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/LastName}"/>
							<Label text="Phone number"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/Phone Number}"/>
							<Label text="Email address"/>
							<Text text="{/CashOnDelivery/Email}"/>
							<Link press="_navBackToCashOnDelivery" text="Edit" />
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
							title="4. Billing Address"
							editable="false"
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label text="Address"/>
							<Text text="{/BillingAddress/Address}"/>
							<Label text="City"/>
							<Text text="{/BillingAddress/City}"/>
							<Label text="Zip Code"/>
							<Text text="{/BillingAddress/ZipCode}"/>
							<Label text="Country"/>
							<Text text="{/BillingAddress/Country}"/>
							<Label text="Note"/>
							<Text text="{/BillingAddress/Note}"/>
							<Link press="_navBackToBillingAddress" text="Edit" />
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

					<form:SimpleForm
							title="5. Delivery type"
							editable="false"
							layout="ResponsiveGridLayout">
						<form:content>
							<Label text="Chosen delivery type"/>
							<Text text="{/selectedDeliveryMethod}"/>
							<Link press="_navBackToDeliveryType" text="Edit" />
						</form:content>
					</form:SimpleForm>

				</content>
				<footer>
					<Bar>
						<contentRight>
							<Button text="Submit" press="handleWizardSubmit"/>
							<Button text="Cancel" press="handleWizardCancel"/>
						</contentRight>
					</Bar>
				</footer>
			</Page>
		</pages>
	</NavContainer>
</mvc:View>

title: WizardCurrentStep
code:
<mvc:View
		height="100%"
		controllerName="sap.m.sample.WizardCurrentStep.controller.WizardCurrentStep"
		xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
		xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
		xmlns="sap.m">
		<NavContainer id="wizardNavContainer">
			<pages>
				<Page
				id="wizardContentPage"
				showHeader="true">
					<customHeader>
						<Bar>
							<contentRight>
								<SegmentedButton selectedKey="{/selectedShowCase}">
									<items>
										<SegmentedButtonItem text="Linear case" key="linear" />
										<SegmentedButtonItem text="Branching case" key="branching" width="150px" />
									</items>
								</SegmentedButton>
							</contentRight>
						</Bar>
					</customHeader>
					<subHeader>
						<Bar>
							<contentRight>
								<Label text="Set current step: " />
								<Select change="onCurrentStepChangeLinear" selectedKey="{/linearWizardSelectedStep}" visible="{= ${/selectedShowCase} === 'linear'}">
									<core:Item text="ProductTypeStep" key="ProductTypeStep" />
									<core:Item text="ProductInfoStep" key="ProductInfoStep" />
									<core:Item text="OptionalInfoStep" key="OptionalInfoStep" />
									<core:Item text="PricingStep" key="PricingStep" />
								</Select>
								<Select id="selectBranchingCurrentStep" change="onCurrentStepChangeBranching" selectedKey="A" visible="{= ${/selectedShowCase} === 'branching'}">
									<core:Item text="A" key="A" />
									<core:Item text="B1" key="B1" />
									<core:Item text="B2" key="B2" />
									<core:Item text="C" key="C" />
									<core:Item text="D" key="D" />
									<core:Item text="E" key="E" />
									<core:Item text="F1" key="F1" />
									<core:Item text="F2" key="F2" />
									<core:Item text="G" key="G" />
								</Select>
							</contentRight>
						</Bar>
					</subHeader>
					<content>
						<mvc:XMLView
							id="wizardViewLinear"
							async="true"
							visible="{= ${/selectedShowCase} === 'linear' }"
							viewName="sap.m.sample.WizardCurrentStep.view.Linear" />
						<mvc:XMLView
							id="wizardViewBranching"
							async="true"
							visible="{= ${/selectedShowCase} === 'branching' }"
							viewName="sap.m.sample.WizardCurrentStep.view.Branching" />
					</content>
					<footer>
						<Bar>
							<contentRight>
								<Label text="Set background design: " />
								<Select change="onBackgroundDesignChange" selectedKey="{/selectedBackgroundDesign}">
									<core:Item text="Standard" key="Standard" />
									<core:Item text="Solid" key="Solid" />
									<core:Item text="List" key="List" />
									<core:Item text="Transparent" key="Transparent" />
								</Select>
							</contentRight>
						</Bar>
					</footer>
				</Page>
			</pages>
		</NavContainer>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:core="sap.ui.core"
	xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	xmlns="sap.m"
	xmlns:helper="testdata.xml-require.helper"
	xmlns:app="http://schemas.sap.com/sapui5/extension/sap.ui.core.CustomData/1"
	displayBlock="true"
	core:require="{Box:'sap/ui/core/BusyIndicator',
		AnnotationHelper:'sap/ui/model/odata/AnnotationHelper',
		HashChanger: 'sap/ui/core/routing/HashChanger',
		OwnHelper:'testdata/xml-require/helper/Formatter'}"
	afterInit="HashChanger.getInstance()">
	<App>
		<Page id="page" title="Hello"
			app:data1="{=OwnHelper.groupA.keep('abc')}"
			app:data2="{=OutputText.foo()}"
			core:require="{Box:'sap/m/MessageBox',
				OutputText:'testdata/xml-require/helper/OutputText'}">
			<Button id="boxButton" text="Show Box" press="Box.show('Boxed')"/>
			<Button id="helperButton" text="Formatter" press="OwnHelper.groupA.upperCase()"/>
			<Button core:require="{Toast:'sap/m/MessageToast'}" id="toastButton" text="Show Toast" press="Toast.show(${$source>text})"/>
			<Button core:require="{NewBox:'sap/m/MessageBox'}" id="newBoxButton" text="Show Box re-required" press="Box.show('Boxed')"/>
		</Page>
		<Button id="outerButton" text="Show Busy Box" press="Box.show(100)"/>
		<helper:FunctionControl id="functionControl" handler="OwnHelper.groupA.lowerCase" />
	</App>
</mvc:View>

<mvc:View xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns="sap.m"
	displayBlock="true"
	controllerName="testdata.xml-require.view.XMLTemplateProcessorAsync_require_expression">
	<App>
		<Page title="Hello" core:require="{
				Foo:'testdata/xml-require/helper/OutputText',
				Bar:'testdata/xml-require/helper/OutputText',
				myDateType:'sap/ui/model/type/Date'
			}">
			<Label id="foo" text="{= ${/amount} > 1000 ? Foo.foo() : Bar.bar()}"/>
			<Label id="bar" visible="{= ${/foobar} === Foo.foo()}"/>
			<Label id="formatter" text="{path:'/test', formatter:'Foo.format'}"/>
			<Label id="formatterLocal" text="{path:'/test', formatter:'.format'}"/>
			<Label id="text" text="{= Foo.checkExistence(${/exist}) ? ${/text1} : ${/text2}}"/>
			<Label core:require="{
					myDecimal:'sap/ui/model/type/Float'
				}" id="type" text="{path:'/number', type:'myDecimal', formatOptions:{decimals: 3}}"/>
			<List core:require="{
					Factory:'testdata/xml-require/helper/Factory'
				}" id="list" items="{path:'/items', factory:'Factory.createItem'}"></List>
			<Button id="button" text="Use variable for type" press=".onButtonPress(${
					path: '/date',
					type: 'myDateType',
					formatOptions: {
						pattern: 'yyyy-MM',
						source: {pattern: 'timestamp'}
					}
				})" />
			<Button id="button1" text="Use namespace+name for type" press=".onButtonPress(${
					path: '/date',
					type: 'sap.ui.model.type.Date',
					formatOptions: {
						pattern: 'yyyy',
						source: {pattern: 'timestamp'}
					}
				})" />
		</Page>
	</App>
</mvc:View>

title: XMLTemplateProcessorAsync_style
code:
<mvc:View height="100%" xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns:html="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns="sap.m">
	<html:style id="styleOne" media="all" type="text/css">
		.small {
			width: 100px;
			height: 100px;
		}
	</html:style>
	<Panel id="panel">
		<content>
			<Button text="Button" id="button"></Button>
			<html:style id="styleTwo" media="all" type="text/css">
				.big {
					width: 200px;
					height: 200px;
				}
			</html:style>
			<html:div id="innerBox" class="small"/>
		</content>
	</Panel>
	<html:div id="outerBox" class="big"/>
</mvc:View>

title: XMLViewBindableAggregation
code:
<mvc:View content="{path: '/supplier', templateShareable:false}"
	xmlns="sap.m" xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc"
	controllerName="sap.ui.sample.mvc.XMLViewBindableAggregation"
	afterRendering=".afterRendering">
	<mvc:content>
		<Panel headerText="{name}">
			<core:ExtensionPoint name="Button_Ext_As_BindingTemplate">
				<Button id="PanelButton" text="{name}" />
			</core:ExtensionPoint>
		</Panel>
	</mvc:content>
	<mvc:dependents>
		<Dialog id="dialog" title="Shared Dialog">
			<endButton>
				<Button text="Close" press=".closeDialog" />
			</endButton>
		</Dialog>
	</mvc:dependents>
</mvc:View>

code:

	<Panel id="aPanel">
		<content>
			<mvc:View id="embedded-async-true" viewName="module:testdata/mvc/TypedView" async="true"></mvc:View>
			<mvc:View id="embedded-async-true2" viewName="module:testdata/mvc/TypedView" async="true"></mvc:View>
			<mvc:View id="embedded-async-false" viewName="module:testdata/mvc/TypedViewSyncCreateContent" async="false"></mvc:View>
			<test:TypedViewSyncCreateContent id="embedded-async-typed-declaration" async="true"/>
			<test:TypedViewWithRenderer id="embedded-async-typed-declaration-with-renderer" async="true"/>
			<mvc:View id="embedded-async-true-js" viewName="example.mvc_legacyAPIs.test2" type="JS" async="false"></mvc:View>
		</content>
	</Panel>
</mvc:View>

title: XMLViewWithTypes
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:m="sap.m">
	<m:Panel id="panel">
		<!-- valid type with options -->
		<m:Input id="inputField" value="{
			path:'/value', type:'sap.ui.model.type.Integer',
			formatOptions: {
				groupingEnabled: true,
				groupingSeparator: '.',
				groupingSize: 3
			}
		}" />

		<!-- unknown type -->
		<m:Input id="inputField_invalidType" value="{path:'/value'}" />

		<!-- custom data-->
		<m:customData>
			<core:CustomData key="myColor" value="{path:'/customDataValue', type:'sap.ui.model.type.String'}" />
		</m:customData>

		<!-- composite binding-->
		<m:Label id="label" text="{
				path:'/amount',
				type:'sap.ui.model.type.Float',
				formatOptions: {
					groupingSeparator: ',',
					decimalSeparator:'.',
					preserveDecimals: false,
					decimals: 1
				}
			} EUR on {
				path:'/date',
				type:'sap.ui.model.type.Date',
				formatOptions: {
					source: { pattern: 'timestamp'},
					pattern: 'yyyy-MM-dd',
					UTC: true
				}
			}" />
	</m:Panel>
</mvc:View>

title: XMLViewWithTypesFailure
code:
<mvc:View xmlns:mvc="sap.ui.core.mvc" xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns:m="sap.m">
	<m:Panel id="panel">
		<!-- valid type with options -->
		<m:Input id="inputField" value="{

			formatOptions: {
				groupingEnabled: true,
				groupingSeparator: '.',
				groupingSize: 3
			}
		}" />

		<!-- unknown type -->

		<m:customData>
			<core:CustomData key="myColor" value="{path:'/customDataValue', type:'sap.ui.model.type.String'}" />
		</m:customData>

		<!-- composite binding-->
		<m:Label id="label" text="{
				path:'/amount',

				formatOptions: {
					groupingSeparator: ',',
					decimalSeparator:'.',
					preserveDecimals: false,
					decimals: 1
				}
			} EUR on {
				path:'/date',
				type:'sap.ui.model.type.Date',

</mvc:View>
